45005015	Kɛɛ ti veenjɔɔ ti gba ti nyɔunyɔ ma, tawao pelei na Ngewɔ a hindawandei wiela gbama a nungaa i gba pelei na ma Adam i jumbui wieni la. Tɔnya le kɛ numu gboto ti haailɔ numu yakpei na ngi jumbui yilei na wooma. Kɛɛ pelei na Ngewɔ a ngi yauwandei gɛla i leweni na ma tawao pelei ji lɔ a ngi hindawandei wie la gbama a numu gboto kia lɔɔ pelei na i na numu yakpei na, Yesu Kristi sabui hu, i ngauwandei gɛni la.
45005016	Tawao Ngewɔ hindawandei yeehuvɛi i gba numu yilei na jumbui yeehuvɛi ma. Jumbu yakpei na wooma, Ngewɔ a nungaa kpɛlɛɛ gbɛmbo lɔ; kɛɛ Ngewɔ yauwandei va, nungaa ti yɛnga a pɔɔnablaa kia bɛɛ ti jumbuisia wienga kpoto.
45005017	Tɔnya mia kɛ ajifa numu yakpei na ngi jumbui va, yeewatii na wooma, hee mahaya majɔɛilɔ nuuvu mahu. Kɛɛ na numu yilei na, Yesu Kristi i pieni, i leweni polouŋ numu yilei na jumbui yeehuvɛi ma. Nasia gbi ta Ngewɔ yauwanda gboto wai majɔɔ kɛ ji a ti yɛ gbaama a pɔɔnablaa, ti gbayangɔ a yɛla ti lɛɛvuisia hu Kristi sabui hu.
45005018	Faale na, kia jumbu yakpei i pieni Ngewɔ i nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ lɛɛ, hii lɔɔ pɔɔna hinda yakpei na Yesu i pieni nuuvui gbi yɛ va a pɔɔnamɔ.
45005019	Tawao kia lɔɔ numu gboto ti woteni a jumbublaa jifa numu yila Ngewɔ layie gbuani hu, hii lɔɔ numu gboto ta wote a pɔɔnablaa tia Ngewɔ-ni ti luahu i gbatɛ jifa numu yila i goloni Ngewɔ wɛ.
45005020	Sawei i gbɔkuilɔ aako hinda nyamu wielei maa i to; kɛɛ jumbu hinda wielei maa ii toni, Ngewɔ yauwandei maa toilɔ i lewe ma polouŋ.
45005021	Faale na, kia lɔɔ jumbui i temaya majɔɔni jifa hee i yɛ numui gbi ma, hii lɔɔ pɔɔnɛi i teemaya majɔɔni Ngewɔ yauwandei va, i li a mue kunafɔ lɛɛvui hu mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
45006001	Gbɔɔ hɔɔ naa ma nde? Ma ndelɔ muɛɛ mu yɛ lekee a jumbui wie aako Ngewɔ yauwandei maa i to?
45006002	Muɛɛ na wie kulo bɛɛ! Jumbui ta ngi gama, mu haanga, ma yee na gu mu yɛ lekee a jumbu wie mu lɛɛvui ji hu?
45006003	Ajifa wu ji gɔɔlɔ pandawanda: ji ti mu wuani mua Yesu-ni mu wili hu, mu haailɔ kia i haani la.
45006004	Ji ti mu wuani hɔɔ, mua tieni lɔ mu haani, ti mua tieni gbɔwu aako, kia lɔɔ mu Kɛkɛ gbaya gabandengɔ wai i ngi wumbuni hee hu, mua bɛɛ mu yɛ ndɛvu nina hu.
45006005	Gbamaile ina mua tieni mu yɛlɔ yakpe hee na hu i pieni, hii lɔɔ mua tieni ma yɛ yakpe a ji Ngewɔ a mu vulu i mu wumbu hee hu kia i pieni a ngie.
45006006	Tawao mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ mu yɛyii wovei taa Kristi-ni ti haanga krɔsii ma aako jumbu wie gbayei na wɔɔ i yɛ mu yɛyii wovei hu i nyani, aako mua yɛ gbɔma a jumbui luwɔngaa.
45006007	Gbamaile numu i haangaa kɛ i gbuanga jumbui gbayei bu.
45006008	Ina mua Kristi-ni mu haanga, mu langɔe la kɛ mua tieni ma vululɔ.
45006009	Ajifa mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Kristi vulunga i ngi wumbunga hee hu tawao kunafɔ ɛɛ yaa haa gbɔma kpaya gbi ii yaa hee wɛ ngi maahu.
45006010	Hee na i pieni, i pieni jumbui gama lɔ kunafɔ va; tawao ndɛvui na naa i hu ndɛvu le Ngewɔ gama.
45006011	Hii mahoungɔ wu gili a wua yekpe kɛ wu haangɔe jumbui gama, kɛɛ wu vulungɔ Ngewɔ gama wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
45006012	Wu gbuhɛisia taa yaa yɛ jumbui gbayei bu, wa golo hindei nasia wɛ wu longɔ la jifa nuuvu a wue.
45006013	Tawao waa wu gbuhɛisia yeehinda gbi wuaa jumbui gbayei bu hinda nyamu wieva la. Kia na aa wie, a wua yekpe ve Ngewɔ wɛ kia Ngewɔ i wu gbuanga hee hu i wu vulunga, wu wu gbuhɛi kpɛlɛɛ ve ngi wɛ pɔɔna hindangaa wieva la.
45006014	Waa luma jumbui i temaya jɔɔ wu maahu; ajifa wuii Sawei bu, wu kpekpeyei na lɔ bu Ngewɔ i kɛnga a wue.
45006015	Gbɔɔ hɔɔ ma nde? Mahoungɔe mu jumbu wie jifa muii Sawei bu kɛ lekee Ngewɔ gbekpeyei? Muɛɛ na wie kulo bɛɛ!
45006016	Wu kɔɔlɔ pandawanda kɛ wu wua yekpe wuaangaa numu bu nduwɔya hu golova ngi wɛ, kɛ wu yɛnga a nduwɔngaa numui na bu wa golo ngi wɛ -- wuii yɛilɔ a jumbui luwɔngaa, wu hee jɔɔ hu, kɛ wa yɛlɔ a koloya luwɔngaa, Ngewɔ i wu yɛ a pɔɔnablaa i wua tieni luahu gbatɛ.
45006017	Kɛɛ a mu siɛ gboto gbua Ngewɔ ma! Ajifa a watii yila wɔɔ jumbui luwɔngaa yɛla a wue; kɛɛ yeewatii na wu goloilɔ a wu lii gbi tɔnyɛi nasia bu wu tɔni kaai na hu wu majɔɔni.
45006018	Ngewɔ i wu gbuailɔ jumbui gbayei bu i wu yɛ a ngi luwɔngaa aako wu pɔɔnɛi wie.
45006019	Gbɛɛ ngi tɔmaseli gbua mu luvayii hu folo gbi, ngi njɛpɛngaa le wa gu a mbugɔɔla. A watii yila wu wua yekpe wuaailɔ sawa nyanilɛi kɛɛ wɔji hinda wielei yeenduwɔyei hu aako wu hinda nyamui yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ wie. Hii lɔɔ mahoungɔ wu wua yekpe wuaa pɔɔna hinda wielei yeenduwɔyɛi hu hindei nasia wieva Ngewɔ longɔ la.
45006020	Watii na wu yɛ jumbui luwɔyɛi hu, kpa ii yɛ wu ma pɔɔna hinda wieva.
45006021	Gbɔɔ wu majɔni hindei nasia wieva wu wufengɔ ma na? Hindei nasia wu pieni yeehuvɛi lɔ a hee!
45006022	Kɛɛ kiahuna naa wu gbuanga jumbui luwɔyɛi hu, wu yɛnga a Ngewɔ luwɔngaa, wu pawɛi lɔ a ndɛvui na fengɔ vulii Ngewɔ wɛ, tawao yeengakpuami mia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui.
45006023	Ajifa jumbui pawɛi lɔ a hee; kɛɛ na Ngewɔ a fe gbama ta mia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu we.
45007001	Nya ndeengɛisia, na nya longɔ ngi nde wu ma wu yeembui gɔɔlɔ vulii ajifa wu gbi wu Sawei hinda hugɔɔlɔ. Numu a yɛlɔ lekee Sawei bu ji ndɛvu a yɛ ngi hu.
45007002	A mu hinimɔ yila wumbu lɛɛ a tɔmasɛi; taa Sawei bu ngi hinii gama ina lekee ndɛvui lɔ yeehindoi hu; kɛɛ hindoi i haangaa, kɛ i gbuanga Sawei na bu a yɛ mbu ngi hinii gama.
45007003	Faale ina, taa hindo weka ti heingaa ngi hinii vulungɔ, ta ngi lolilɔ a pue gbuamɔ; kɛɛ ngi hinii i haangaa, kɛ sawei i gbuanga ngi ma tawao a hindo weka jɔlɔ ɛɛ yaa yɛ a pue gbuamɔ.
45007004	Hii wu na, nya ndeengɛisia. Piengɔe bɛɛ wua bɛɛ wu haanga, sawei ta ngi wɛ, ajifa wua Kristi gbuhɛi-ni wu yɛnga yakpe; tawao kiahuna na ngi woo lɔ a mue, ta hii Ngewɔ i ngi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu aako mu yɛ a ngengeblaa yekpe Ngewɔ yengei hu.
45007005	Gbamaile watii na lɛ mu yɛ mu luwui liilɛli hindeisia lekee wie, Sawei i pielɔ jumbu wie mani i gbaya mu luwuisia hu, tawao mu yɛilɔ a ngengeblaa yekpe na a mu waa.
45007006	Kɛɛ kiahuna na, Ngewɔ i mu gbuanga Sawei bu ajifa mu haailɔ Sawei na wɛ i mu wungɔ wɔɔ jɔwɔ ya. Faale muii yaa Ngewɔ yengei wiema a pele wovei na Sawa nyɛingɔi i kɛni, mu yengema na a Ngewɔ Yafei welei lɔ.
45007007	Gbɔɔ naa ma nde? Ma ndelɔ muɛɛ jumbui lɔ Sawei vulii ma? Muɛɛ na le kulobɛɛ! Kɛɛ Sawei lɔ i pieni ngi kɔɔ gbɔɔ jumbu le. Ngii yɛ kɔɔ gbɔɔ mani nyamu wiela le numu weka yeya-hani ma kiaa Sawei ii ndeni aa yɛma, “Baa mani nyamu wie numu weka yeya-hani gbi ma.”
45007008	Jumbui i pele jɔɛilɔ pieva mani nyamu yeelasii gbi wiemani i nya lɔ a ji i yengeni a Sawei. Ajifa Sawei ji ii yɛlɔ na, jumbui haangɔe.
45007009	Nya vulii nya vulungɔ yɛla wɔɔ ji Sawei ii yɛ na; kɛɛ ji Sawei i wani, jumbui i vuliilɔ,
45007010	kɛ ngi haanga. Tawao Sawei yeena numu lii yɛ ma wava a ndɛvu, i wani a hee lɔ nya va.
45007011	Jumbui i pele jɔɛilɔ i nya wɛlɛ ji i yengeni a Sawei; jumbui i yengeni a Sawei lɔ i nya waani.
45007012	Faale na Sawei kpɛlɛɛ makpɔngɔ i gbuani Ngewɔ gama lɔ tawao Sawei yeengila gbi i gbuani Ngewɔ gama lɔ, tawao pɔɔnangɔ, kpekpengɔ.
45007013	Ji kɛilɔ hɔɔ kɛ na kpekpengɔ ta lɔ i wani a nya haala? Ii hii kulo bɛɛ! Jumbui mia i na wieni; jumbui i yengeni a na lɔ kpekpengɔ i wa a hee nya gama aako jumbui yɛyii yeetɔnyɛi i gɛ a nuuvungaa. Sawei a pielɔ jumbui nyamuyii i gɛ hulewengɔ.
45007014	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Sawei i mu yafeisia va lɔ; kɛɛ nya ngi yɛni a nuuvu lɔ nduwui i nya ma, nya majiangɔ a nduwɔ jumbui ma.
45007015	Ngii kɔɔ vulii gbɔɔ ngi piema; ajifa ngɛɛ na wie nya longɔ a yɛla ngi pie, nga na lɔ wie nya lolongɔ la.
45007016	Ji nga na wie ngii loni ngi pie, a kɛlɔ kɛ ngi lumanga Sawei wɔnalaa ma.
45007017	Faale nya vulii ii le ngaa yɛ hindei jisia wiema; jumbu wielei na i heini nya lii hu, ta le.
45007018	Ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ kpekpeya wiela ii nya hu -- nya nuuvuyei hu. Ajifa kia bɛɛ mani i nya ma kpekpe wieva, ngɛɛ gu ngaa pie.
45007019	Kpekpei na nya longɔ ngi pie, ngɛɛ pie; nga nyamui na lɔ wie ngii loni ngi pie.
45007020	Ina na ngii loni ngi pie ta mia nga pie, na a kɛlɔ kɛ nya ii le ngaa yɛ hindei jisia wiema; jumbui wielei na i heini nya lii hu, ta le.
45007021	Faale ngi kɔnga kɛ Sawei ji mia i yengema: kpemɛi nya longɔ a yɛla ngi na wie kpekpengɔ, na nyamungɔ ta lekee lɔ nga vɛmbɛla.
45007022	Nya lii longɔe a Ngewɔ Jawei.
45007023	Kɛɛ ngi sawa weka lɔnga, i gba yengema nya lii hu yeesawei ji a lapi a sawei yeena nya longɔ la. A nya yɛlɔ a jɔwɔyamɔ jumbui jawei na bu i yengema nya lii hu.
45007024	Nya li nyaningɔe hulewengɔ gbo. Ye lɔ a nya bawo nduwui ji yeya i piema ngi haa?
45007025	Ngi siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma nya bawo va mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu! Ji lɔ hɔɔ nya yɛyii le: a nya wuma wee nya lii a gulɔ a jialaa a Ngewɔ jawei, nya luwui ta a jia a jumbui jawei.
45008001	Faale naa, Ngewɔ ɛɛ yaa nungei nasia lɛɛ tia Yesu Kristi-ni ti wilingɔ hu.
45008002	Gbamaile Ngewɔ Yafei gbayei na a ndɛvui nina ve mu wɛ gbama ajifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, i nya gbuanga Sawei gbayei na bu a wa a jumbui kɛɛ hee.
45008003	Na Sawei ii guni aa pie jifa kpaya gbi ii nuuvu luwui wɛ, Ngewɔ i pieilɔ. Ngewɔ i yeejumbui na lɛɛlɔ i yɛ nuuvu luwui hu a ji i ngi nda Hindoloi yoyoni i wa a nduwu kpuangɔ a nuuvu nda luwu jumbungɔi aako i wote a saahanii nuuvuisia ti jumbui va.
45008004	Ngewɔ i ji wieilɔ aako mu hinda wɔnangɔi nasia wie vulii sawei a nde kɔɔ mu jia a Ngewɔ yafei nda welei, maa jia a nuuvu luwui nda welei.
45008005	Nungei nasia ta luva kia ti luwui a nde la ti ma, ta gili lekee a na lɔ ti luwui longɔ la. Nasia ta luva kia Ngewɔ Yafei a nde la ti ma, ta gili lekee a na lɔ Ngewɔ Yafei longɔ la.
45008006	Bi yaa gilima a na lekee nduwui longɔ la, yeehuvɛi a hee lɔ; bi yaa gilima a na lekee Ngewɔ Yafei longɔ la, yeehuvɛi a ndɛvui lɔ kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
45008007	Faale, nuuvui a wotelɔ a Ngewɔ juwu ji a gili a na lekee nduwui longɔ la, ajifa ɛɛ Ngewɔ Jawei hou, tawao, a tɔnya, ɛɛ gu a houla.
45008008	Nasia ta golo ti luwui liima hindei wielei bu tɛɛ gu a Ngewɔ liima hinda wiela.
45008009	Kɛɛ wua wuii luvama kia wu luwui a nde la wu ma; wuaa luvama kia Ngewɔ Yafei a nde la wu ma -- ina Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ wu hu a tɔnya. Numu gbi lekee Kristi Yafei ii ngi hu kɛ Kristi woo yaa a ngie.
45008010	Kɛɛ ina Kristi lɔ wu hu, kia bɛɛ wu luwuisia ti wama haama jumbui hu, na hu gbi Ngewɔ Yafei a ndɛvui velɔ wu wɛ ajifa Ngewɔ i wu yɛnga a pɔnablaa, i wua tieni luahu gbatɛnga.
45008011	Ina Ngewɔ na i Yesu vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu ngi Yafei lɔ wu hu, kɛ ta hii i Kristi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu a ndɛvu velɔ haa luwui jisia wɛ ti wu ma; ngi Yafei na i wu hu a ji wielɔ.
45008012	Faale naa, nya ndeengɛisia, kpa lɔ mu ma, kɛɛ luvava ii le kia mu luwui longɔ mu pie la.
45008013	Ajifa wu luvangaa kia wu luwui longɔ wu pie la, wa haalɔ; kɛɛ ina Ngewɔ Yafei sabui gbɔmi hu wa wu wiehinda jumbungɔisia waalɔ, wa ndɛvu majɔɔlɔ.
45008014	Nasia ta to Ngewɔ Yafei ma, Ngewɔ leengaa mia a tie.
45008015	Gbamaile Ngafei na Ngewɔ i fenga wu wɛ ɛɛ wu yɛ a nduwɔ aa pie waa luwa; yee-Ngafei a wu yɛ a Ngewɔ leengaa lɔ, tawao ngi gbayei hu ma Ngewɔ lolilɔ muɛɛ, “Kɛkɛ! Nya Kɛkɛ!”
45008016	Ngewɔ Yafei a gbɛɛlɔ mu yafeisia ma seliva kɛ Ngewɔ leengeisia lɔ a mue.
45008017	Jifa Ngewɔ leengaa a mua, ma lubɛi nasia majɔɔlɔ i ndama gbatɛni ngi nungɛisia va, tawao mua Kristi-ni ma gbɔlɔ na ma Ngewɔ ndama gbatɛnga ngi va, gbamaile ina Kristi gbalei mua tieni mia, mua tieni ma ngi wɔlɔyɛi bɛɛ majɔɔlɔ.
45008018	Nya langɔe la kɛ kpalɛi na i lama mu ma kiahuna numu ɛɛ huma ngɔlɔyɛi na ma Ngewɔ i wama kɛma a mue.
45008019	Ngewɔ gbatɛ-hani kpɛlɛɛ ti yaamɛi laalangɔe hu ta Ngewɔ mawulo ngi leengeisia gɛva.
45008020	Ajifa Ngewɔ pieilɔ ngi gbatɛ-hani kpɛlɛɛ ti wote a gbaama fuŋ, ti nyɛkɛ ii le, kɛɛ jifa i nɛɛni Ngewɔ wɛ yɛ hii a yɛ na. Na hu gbi Ngewɔ liilomɛi ji lɔ Ngewɔ wɛ,
45008021	kɛ folo yila Ngewɔ a ngi gbatɛ-hani gbi gbualɔ hee kɛɛ ndulayɛi hu, tawao yee kpatɛ-haniisia ta gbɔ lɔ a kohunɛ wai na veva Ngewɔ leengeisia wɛ.
45008022	Ajifa mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ haaŋ i to watii ji ma Ngewɔ gbatɛ-hani gbi tiaa wɔɔma a kpalɛ kia ndo-le-goohugbalɛi i na.
45008023	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ gbatɛ-hanisia lekee ii le; mua Ngewɔ Yafei i mu hu a hanii yeehaalayee Ngewɔ fenga mu wɛ gbama, mua bɛɛ mua wɔɔma a goohu wee, ma Ngewɔ mawulo i mu yɛ a ngi leengeisia, i yama i mu gbuhɛi gbi gbua nduwɔya hu.
45008024	Ajifa ji mu liiloni Ngewɔ ma tamia i pieni mu bawoni; kɛɛ mu na lɔngaa mu kulɔgbema, kɛ liiloma vulii ii le. Ajifa ye lɔ a hani na gulɔgbe i tɔma?
45008025	Kɛɛ mu yaa hani na gulɔgbema muii tɔma, ma mawulolɔ a ndiilo.
45008026	Hii lɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei a wa gbɔva mu ma ajifa kpaya gbi ii mu hu. Gbamaile muii kɔɔ pelei na mahoungɔ mu Ngewɔ vɛli la; Ngewɔ Yafei vulii lɔ Ngewɔ manɛnɛma mu va, a gbala a kpalɛi na lama ngi ma na numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ndela.
45008027	Tawao Ngewɔ na a nuuvuisia ti liisia hulɔ, i kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei i gilima la; ajifa Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ a Ngewɔ manɛnɛ ngi leengeisia va tawao a pielɔ a pelei na a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.
45008028	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hinda gbi hu Ngewɔ lɔ yengema kpekpe gɔliva nungei nasia va ti longɔ a ngie, nasia i wilanga a loko lola ti ma aako na i hugbatɛnga pieva i wie.
45008029	Nungei nasia Ngewɔ i wilanga a loko lola ti ma pɛiŋ, ti ya ti le, i ti gbuanga ma gba kɔɔ ti wie kia ngi Hindoloi na, aako ngi Hindoloi i yɛ a kplaloo ndewehingaa gboto lia.
45008030	Nasia Ngewɔ loko looni ti ma pɛiŋ i ya ti le, i ji wielɔ kɔɔ ti yɛ a ngi woo; tawao nasia i loko looni ti ma i ti yɛlɔ a pɔɔnablaa i taa tieni luahu gbatɛ; tawao nasia i taa tieni luahu gbatɛni, i pieilɔ ti ngi wɔlɔyɛi bɛɛ majɔɔ.
45008031	Ji na ji kpɛlɛɛ i gonanga mu ma, gbɔɔ ma nde? Ina Ngewɔ lɔ mu wooma, ye lɔ a lapi a mue?
45008032	Ii gbani ngi Hindoloi vulii bɛɛ mahu, i ngi gbuailɔ a saa mu kpɛlɛɛ va! I ngi Hindoloi veilɔ mu wɛ -- ɛɛ hani gbi ve mu wɛ gbama?
45008033	Ye lɔ a njia wɛlɛ nungei nasia ma Ngewɔ i loko longa ti ma? Ngewɔ vulii i ndenga yɛ pɔɔnablaa mia a tie.
45008034	Numu gbi a gulɔ hɔɔ i ti lɛɛ? Yesu Kristi lɔ i haani, ɔɔ mu nde muɛɛ, tamia Ngewɔ i ngi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu tawao taa heini Ngewɔ yejei hu. Taa Ngewɔ manɛnɛma mu va.
45008035	Gbɔɔ naa a gu i mu gbua Kristi lomɛi ma? Kpundɛ a gulɔ a piela ɔɔ hindagbɔundaa ɔɔ ngakpɛ nyamu ɔɔ ndɔlɛ ɔɔ fɛɛli ɔɔ hinda nyamuisia ɔɔ hee?
45008036	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Hee lɔ hɛlɛni mu mahu folo kpɛiŋ bi va Ngewɔ tiaa mu houma kia mbalangɛi nasia ti lima a tie ti waama.”
45008037	Sawo, hindei ji kpɛlɛɛ hu mu temaya lavengɔ majɔɔnga a numu na i loni a mue ngi sabui hu!
45008038	Ajifa ngi kɔɔlɔ vuli pandawanda kɛ gbɛogbɛ ɛɛ mu gbua ngi lomɛi ma: hee ɔɔ ndɛvui; malikangaa ɔɔ ngelema-mahugbeblaa kɛɛ yeekpayɛisia; ngaamɛi ji ɔɔ kulɔmɛi;
45008039	dunyei yeena i mu maahu ɔɔ dunyei yeeji i mbui -- hani gbi ii na Ngewɔ gbatɛ-hanisia lia aa gu kunafɔ a mu gbuala Ngewɔ lomɛi na ma i kɛnga mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
45009001	Na ngi ndema tɔnya le; Kristi woo lɔ a nge famia ngɛɛ ndɛɛ gula. Nya lii, toko i Ngewɔ Yafei yeya ngayengeva, i nya liilonga kɛ ngii ndɛɛ lɔ gualama.
45009002	Nya liinyani wɔlɔngɔ waa le, tawao kpalɛi na i nya lii hu nya bondɛi nasia va kɛlɛma gbi ii ma, nasia maa tieni mu luwu kɛɛ mu ŋama i yakpa!
45009003	Tia ti va, ngaa lolɔ nya vulii Ngewɔ jondii i yɛ nya ma tawao mua Kristi mu luahu i gɔlɛ.
45009004	Tia lɔ Isrɛlbleisia a tie; i ti yɛlɔ a ngi leengaa i ti gɔ ngi wɔlɔyɛi hu; i pieilɔ tia tieni ti hindangaa yangili, i Sawei ve ti wɛ; Ngewɔ vɛliyii yeetɔnyangɔi lɔ ti yeya; ti Ngewɔ laaheisia majɔɔnga;
45009005	ti gbuanga ti maada lɔwɔngɔi nasia hu lɔ, tawao Kristi ji i woteni a nuuvu, i gbuani ti bembei hu lɔ. Mahoungɔ numui gbi ti Ngewɔ lato kunafɔ va na hani gbi ti mahɛi a ngie! Amiina.
45009006	Ngii ndema ngaa yɛma Ngewɔ lahei i gbahanga; ajifa Isrɛlbleisia kpɛlɛɛ ii le taa yɛ a Ngewɔ numu huwɔyɔngɔisia.
45009007	Tawao Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia kpɛlɛɛ ii lɛ taa yɛ a Ngewɔ leengeisia. Ngewɔ ndeilɔ Ebraham ma yɛ, “Ta Aisaki bɔɔsɔɛisia wumbulɔ a bi ndɛisia.”
45009008	Ji i kɛilɔ kɛ ndeengɛi nasia ta ti gbua goohu ta ti le tii yɛni a Ngewɔ leengaa; ndeengɛi nasia ta ti le jifa Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni yɛ ta ti lelɔ, tia lɔ ti wumbungɔ a bɔɔsɔɛi yeetɔnyangɔisia Ngewɔ wɛ.
45009009	Ajifa ji Ngewɔ i yɛ Lahei na wumbuma i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Nga walɔ gbɔma watii na ma ndangɔ tawao Sera a hindolo lelɔ.”
45009010	Tawao ii gɛlɛni na ma. Ajifa Ribɛka hiingaa leengaa veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti kɛkɛ i yɛ yakpe, mu maada Aisaki.
45009011	Kɛɛ aako i gɛ kɛ hindolo yakpe wumbula i yɛni a Ngewɔ lekee ngi hugbatɛi yeehuvaa lɔ, Ngewɔ ndeilɔ ngi ma yɛ, “Ndoi yeesɛmbɛi a mɔnɛlɔ yeekuloi wɛ.” I ji leni pɛiŋ ti yaa ti le, pɛiŋ yeengila bɛɛ i yaa hinda gbi wie, yeekpekpe ɔɔ yeenyamu; faale ji Ngewɔ i ndoi yeengila wumbuni i gbuani tolii na hu lɔ i ngi lolini la, ii gbuani nuuvu wiehinda gbi hu.
45009013	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ngi loilɔ a Jekɔpi, kɛɛ ngi loloilɔ a Isɔ.”
45009014	Ma yɛ naa hɔɔ gbɛ? Ma ndelɔ muɛɛ Ngewɔ ii wɔnani? Muɛɛ na le kulo bɛɛ.
45009015	Gbamaile i ndeilɔ Mojisi ma yɛ, “Nga manulɔ numui na ma nɛɛ nya wɛ, ngi numui na mamamau lɔ a nɛɛ nya wɛ.”
45009016	Faale yeehindei ii gbuama na hu nuuvu longɔ la ɔɔ na a pie, i gbuama lekee Ngewɔ manumɛi hu lɔ.
45009017	Gbamaile Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeilɔ tokulɔ mui na ma Fɛɛro yɛ, “Ngi bi yɛilɔ a maha aako ngi bi yayenge tawao kɔɔ dunyablaa gbi ti nya biyɛi gɔɔ.”
45009018	Faale Ngewɔ a manu numui na lɔ ma a nɛɛ ngi wɛ, tawao a numu gbi woohu gbɔndalɔ a nɛɛ ngi wɛ.
45009019	Wu yilayee a nya mɔlilɔ hɔɔ yɛ, “Ina hii ji i na, Ngewɔ a yee nyamu lo numu ma? Ye lɔ a ganga a Ngewɔ liima hindei?”
45009020	Gbɛe ye lɔ a bie, ndiamɔ, Ngewɔ a yɛpɛ bi ma ba hunyɔɔ? Pɔlɔ-vɛi ɛɛ ngi gbatɛmɔi mɔli aa yɛma, “Gbɛe bi nya gbatɛni hii?”
45009021	Kpaya lɔ fɛɛ-gbatɛmɔi wɛ yengeva a bowoi a fɛɛ-gbatɛla kia ngi longa la, tawao a fɛɛ fele gbatɛlɔ a bowoi gate yakpei, yeengila i na ta yenge la lekee a ngilangila ji hinda a yɛ wiema, ta yenge a yeepekei kpele gbi.
45009022	Hii lɔɔ Ngewɔ i hindei wienga. Ngi longɔ yɛla i kɛ kɛ ngi liilewengɔ tawao ngi longɔ yɛla i pie nungaa ti ngi gbayayii gɔɔ. Faale i ngi lii houilɔ waa nasia va ngi liilewengɔ yɛla ti ma, ngi magbatɛngɔ yɛla ti nyaniva.
45009023	Ngi longɔ yɛla gbɔma i ngi wɔlɔya wai magɛ, na i njeini mu ma, mua i manuni mu ma, nasia i ti magbatɛnga ngi wɔlɔyɛi majɔɔva.
45009024	Ajifa mua lɔ i mu lolini, ii mu gbuani Juuisia lekee lia, i mu gbuailɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie bɛɛ lia.
45009025	Ji lɔ i ndei Hosia Gɔlɛi hu yɛ, “Nungei nasia tii yɛni a nya woo, nga ti lolilɔ a ‘Nya Nungeisia.’ Kɛnyɛi na ngii yɛ loni la, nga ti lolilɔ a ‘Nya Liimableisia.’
45009026	Tawao mia vulii Ngewɔ ndeni na ti ma yɛ, ‘Nya nungaa yaa a wue,’ na mia vulii ndɛvu-ve-Yewɔɛi a ti loli na a ngi leengeisia.”
45009027	Tawao Aisaya i yɛpɛilɔ ngeleya kɔlooni Isrɛl ma yɛ, “Isrɛlbleisia ti gboto bɛɛ kia ŋanyɛi na na i gboyei gbla, ti klohii mia ta bawo;
45009028	ajifa Ndemɔi a ngi gbɛmbui lewelɔ dunyabla gbi ma floflo a ndiilo.”
45009029	Piengɔe kia Aisaya i yɛ ndeni yɛ, “Kiaa Ndemɔ wai ii yɛ pieni ndeengaa taa lo mu woomɛi, maa wielɔ kia i Sɔdɔm wieni, maa wielɔ kia Gomɔra na.”
45009030	Gbɔɔ naa hɔɔ ma nde? Ma ji lɔ le: kɛ nasia Juublaa yaa tie tii lapima wɔɔ kɔɔ Ngewɔ i ti yɛ a pɔɔnabla, ti yɛnga a pɔɔnabla jifa ti langɔ a Ngewɔ;
45009031	Kɛɛ Isrɛlblɛi nasia Ngewɔ i ti wumbuni, ti sawa gɔlima na a pie ti yɛ a pɔnabla, tii tɔni.
45009032	Gbɛe tii tɔni? Ajifa na ti pieni ii gbuani ti lalei hu a Ngewɔ kɛ ti wiehindeisia. Ti lugbɛilɔ a pele-ma-gɔtii na nungaa ta lugba la.
45009033	Kɔtii na Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i yɛpɛni fa yɛ, “Kpe, nyaa kɔtu lama Jayɔn na nungaa ta ti lugba la, fawa gɔtii na a pie ti gula, Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a liilo ngi ma ngi yaa ɛɛ wufe.”
45010001	Nya ndeengɛisia, mani lɔ nya ma hulewengɔ gbo ngɛɛ Ngewɔ i Juuisia gbi bawo. Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima a nya lii gbi wu va.
45010002	Nga ti jelilɔ kɛ tia Ngewɔ hindei madi houma waa, kɛɛ madihoui ii lɔtoni yeetɔnyangɔi ma.
45010003	Jifa tii yaa pelei na gɔɔni Ngewɔ a numu yɛ la a pɔnamɔ, i tia ta luahu gbatɛ, tawao ti lapima a ti nda wele lavalɔ; faale tii toni Ngewɔ nda welei na ma na a numu yɛ la a pɔnamɔ.
45010004	Ajifa Kristi i pienga kpaya gbi ii yaa Sawei hu, aako numu gbi lekee a la a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ a ngi yɛlɔ a pɔnamɔ, i tia ta luahu gbatɛ.
45010005	Ji lɔ Mojisi nyɛini kɔlooni numu taa yɛva a pɔɔnamɔ sawei houlei va yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee a na wie Sawei i ndeni, a ndɛvui majɔɔ Sawei hu lɔ.”
45010006	Kɛɛ jimia ndengɔ Ngewɔ gɔlɛi hu kɔlooni numu taa Ngewɔ ti luahu gbatɛlɛi ma a ji numu yɛva a pɔɔnamɔ a la a Ngewɔ: “Baa nde bia yekpe ma bɛɛ, Ye lɔ a lɛ aijɛnɛ?” (yeembui lɔ a, yeeva a Kristi.)
45010007	“Baa ji bɛɛ le baa yɛma, Ye lɔ a yei ndɔwu?” (yeembui lɔ a, Kristi wumbuva hee hu.)
45010008	Na Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndema ta lɔ: “Ngewɔ wooyili lɔ wu gbla kɛɛ wu laagulisia ya kɛɛ wu lii hu” na i ma ta lɔ a ngowili ji ma nde kɔloongɔ lala ma a Ngewɔ.
45010009	Bi ndengaa leiŋ a bi laagulisia bɛɛ “Yesu lɔ Ndemɔi le,” bi la la bi lii hu kɛ Ngewɔ i ngi vuluilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu, ba bawolɔ.
45010010	Ajifa mu langɔe la mu liisia hu tawao Ngewɔ i mu yɛnga a pɔɔnablaa i mua tieni luahu gbatɛnga; mu ndeilɔ leiŋ a mu laagulisia tawao mu bawongɔe.
45010011	Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi lɔ ndema yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee i langaa a ngie ngi yaa ɛɛ wufe.”
45010012	Numu gbi ii gbuani ji ma ajifa nduahugɛ gbi ii Juuisia luahu tia nasia Juublaa yaa tie; Ngewɔ lɔ numui gbi ti Lemɔi le, tawao a nasia gbi lubalɔ waa ta ngi loli kpɔma va.
45010013	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee a Ndemɔi biyɛi loli, a bawolɔ.”
45010014	Kɛɛ ta yee ngi loli, ina tii yaa lani a ngie? Tawao ta yee la a ngie ina tii yaa ngowili mɛnini kɔlooni ngi ma? Tawao ta yee ngowili mɛni kɔɔlooni ngi ma ina tii ndeni ti ma?
45010015	Tawao ngowili a yee le ti ma ina tii tutungaa vayani hu? Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Nasia ta wa a ngowili yekpe, ti wangaa la i gabandeni kpa!”
45010016	Kɛɛ numui kpɛlɛɛ ii le taa loko hei Ngowili Yekpei bu. Aisaya vulii i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ndemɔi, ye lɔ i lani a mu wowili?”
45010017	Faale na, lanaya a gbua ngowili mɛnila hu lɔ, tawao humɛnila a gbua ngowili lɔ hu kɔlooni Kristi ma.
45010018	Kɛɛ gbɛɛ ngi mɔli, tɔnya le kɛ tii ngowili mɛnini? A tɔnya vulii ti mɛniilɔ kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ: “Ti woisia ti liilɔ ngeebu gbi; ti layieisia ti foeilɔ dunyei gɛlɛmɛi gbi.”
45010019	Gbɛɛ gbɔma ngi mɔli, tɔnya le kɛ Isrɛlbleisia tii kɔɔni? Mojisi vulii lɔ haalamɔ le i mɔli ji gbɛmboni yɛ, “Nga pielɔ wu lolo a nungei nasia kɛnyɛwu yaa a tie; nga pielɔ wu liilewe kɛnyɛi na ma yeenungeisia ti gbowangɔ.”
45010020	Aisaya i ngaulewei mato wieilɔ ji i ndeni yɛ, “Nungei nasia tii yɛ a nya gɔkɔli ti nya lɔilɔ, ngi gɛilɔ a nasia tii yɛ a nya hinda humɔli.”
45010021	Kɛɛ Isrɛlbleisia tia ti va i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngi nya lokoisia lamboilɔ folo kpɛiŋ nungei nasia gama tɛɛ golo tawao ti gangangɔ.”
45011001	Gbɛɛ ngi mɔli hɔɔ: Ngewɔ a gbelelɔ ngi gbɔugbɔu nungeisia ma? Sawo, ɛɛ pie! Nya vulii Isrɛlmɔ lɔ a nge, Ebraham bɔɔsɔ, nga gbua Bɛnjami bembei hu.
45011002	Ngewɔ ii yaa gbeleni ngi nungei nasia ma i ti wumbuni a ngi liimablaa pɛiŋ i ya a dunyei gbatɛ. Wu Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yeemia gɔɔlɔ Ilaija i gbonyɛni a Isrɛlbleisia Ngewɔ ma yɛ,
45011003	“Ndemɔi, ti bi lutuisia waanga, ti bi jaa-gbuamɛisia wongonga: nya yakpe lɔ ngi longa tawao tia lapima nya waava.”
45011004	Ngewɔ i gbɔɔ leni ngi ma? I ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngi numu Tauji wɔfla lamagbatɛnga nya yekpe va, nasia tii yaa hɛɛni ndɛɛ-Yewɔɛi Baal ma.”
45011005	Hii lɔɔ hindei i na kiahuna: Nungaa wulohii lɔ na Ngewɔ i ti wumbunga a ngi yauwandei va.
45011006	Ngi numu wumbulei i gbuani ngi yauwandei hu lɔ, ti wiehinda va ii le. Gbamaile ina Ngewɔ numu wumbulei i gbuama ti wiehindei hu lɔ, kɛ ngi yauwandei ɛɛ yɛ a ngauwanda yekpe.
45011007	Faale naa Isrɛlbleisia tii na lɔni ti yɛ a kɔkɔli. Nungaa huwɔyɔngɔi nasia Ngewɔ i ti wumbuni tia mia ti tɔni; Ngewɔ i pieilɔ yeemɔniisia ti wolii hu i lutu, tii ngi loliwoi mɛnini.
45011008	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ngewɔ i pienga tɛɛ gu a hinda gbi hugɔɔlaa; i to foloi ji vulii ma tɛɛ gu a hinda lɔlaa a ti yaamɛisia tawao tɛɛ njia mɛni a ti wolisia.”
45011009	Devidi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngewɔ i ti gomɛisia yɛ a mani ti gɔwɔla, i pie ti gula, i kpalɛ la ti ma!
45011010	I pie ti yaamɛisia ti liwi kɔɔ taa gu a hinda lɔla; i pie ti mɔnɛisia ti gboto kpele gbi.”
45011011	Nyaa hɔɔ mɔlima: Ji Juuisia ti lugbani, ti gulailɔ ti juku? Na ii wieni kulo bɛɛ! Jifa ti jumbui wieni, mbawoyei i wanga nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti gama, aako Juuisia ti tolo gbua ti ma.
45011012	Juuisia ti jumbui i wailɔ a kpekpeya waawaa gboto dunyei hu, tawao jifa tii temaya majɔɔni, i wailɔ a kpekpeya waawaa gboto nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti gama. Yeekpekpeyei ji a gboto kpa ji Juuisia nasia kpɛlɛɛ ta mbawo majɔɔ!
45011013	Ngi yɛpɛma naa wualɔ gama Juublaa yaa wue: ina lekee nyaa tomɔyɛi hu wu gama wua Juublaa yaa wue, nga mata gbualɔ a nya yengei.
45011014	Tɛnga nga gulɔ ngi pie nya nda gɛnyɛblɛisia ti tolo gbua, nya wiehindei na i pie Ngewɔ i ti lɛɛngaa bawo.
45011015	Ajifa watii na Ngewɔ i gbeleni ti ma, Ngewɔ pieilɔ dunyablaa wekeisia ti yɛ a ngi ndiamɔngaa. A yee yɛ na hɔɔ ji Ngewɔ a ti gulu? A wielɔ lɔɔ kia haablaa ta yɛ vuluma ta hiye hee hu!
45011016	Ti bledii na tii yaa a mɔni yaingaingaa ma, ti yeengaingɔmɛi yeehaalayei ve Ngewɔ wɛ, kɛ ngi woo lɔ a yeekpuhɛi bɛɛ na ta mɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ; tawao ti ngulii yeehapiisia vengaa Ngewɔ wɛ, kɛ ngi woo lɔ a yeembekeisia bɛɛ.
45011017	Ti ɔlivi wulu hingɔi yeembekeisia lɛɛnga yaingainga ti ndɔgbɔhuyei yeembekei longa nga. Nasia Juublaa yaa tie wu wiengɔe kia ndɔgbɔhu ɔlivi wulii na, Ngewɔ pielɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti kpekpei na majɔɔ fɛngɔ Juuisia wɛ.
45011018	Faale na waa lɛɛ nasia hu ti ti yaini nga kia ngulu- bekengaa. Wa yee gu wu mamani wie? Ngulu-beke lekee mia a wue; wua ii le waa yɛ ngulu hapii gɔma hapii mia a wu gɔ.
45011019	Kɛɛ ba ndelɔ bɛɛ, “Tɔnya le, kɛɛ ti mbekeisia yaliilɔ nga aako ti nya lomɛi majɔɔ.”
45011020	Ji lɔnyangɔe. Ti mbekeisia yaliilɔ ajifa tii yɛ lani a Ngewɔ, bia bi loilɔ bi lomɛi jifa bi langɔ a Ngewɔ, kɛɛ baa mamani wie ti lomɛi wumbuva; kia baa lawo, luwa bi bi mahugbe.
45011021	Ngewɔ ii manuni Juuisia ma, tia hii mbekei nasia a tie Ngewɔ kpatɛni; wu langɔ la a manulɔ wu ma?
45011022	Mu tɔnga ji hu kia Ngewɔ hindawandangɔ kɛɛ kia ngi yagbalɛngɔ. Ngi yagbalɛngɔe a nasia ti jumbu wienga, kɛɛ ngi gbekpengɔ a wue -- ina wuii gbeni a hindei nasia wiela a gbekpe a wue fa; kɛɛ wu gbengaa a ti wiela, Ngewɔ a wua bɛɛ yalilɔ nga.
45011023	Juuisia ti gbengaa a gangalaa a lala a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ a ti yamalɔ ti loma wovei, ajifa a gulɔ a ti yamala na gbɔma.
45011024	Nasia Juublaa yaa tie wu wiengɔe kia ndɔgbɔhu ɔlivi wulii yeembekei na ta ngali nga, na kpuangɔ Ngewɔ nda welei ma, ti too ɔlivi wulu hingɔe ya. Juuisia ti wiengɔe kia ɔlivi wulu hingɔi ji; tawao bɛwɛbɛwɛngɔ waa le Ngewɔ wɛ mbeke yaingaingɔi jisia yamava ti nda wuliisia ya.
45011025	Tɔnya lɔwungɔ lɔ na, nya ndeengɛisia, na nya longɔ wu kɔɔ. A pielɔ wu gbe a gilila a wu nɛmahu leweyii. Ta lɔ a ji: Isrɛlbleisia ti woohugbɔndɛi ɛɛ lɛɛmbi kunafɔ va, a yɛlɔ lekee na i lo hu nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti kpɛlɛɛ ti mbawo majɔɔ.
45011026	Tawao hii Isrɛlbleisia kpɛlɛɛ ta bawo. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Mbawomɔi a gbua Jayɔn lɔ, i pienyamuisia kpɛlɛɛ gbule Jacɔpi bɔɔsɔɛisia gama,
45011027	tawao ji lɔ nya hinda yangilingɔi le a tie, ji nga ti jumbuisia gbua ti ma.”
45011028	Ajifa Juuisia ti gbelenga Ngowili Yekpei ma, Ngewɔ juwunga lɔ a tie wu va, wua Juublaa yaa wie. Kɛɛ jifa Ngewɔ i ti wumbunga, ngi ndiamɔisia mia a tie ti maadani va.
45011029	Ajifa Ngewɔ ɛɛ ngi nɛmahu wote kɔlooni nasia ma a ti wumbu i ti luba.
45011030	Wua Juublaa yaa a wie, wu gangailɔ a Ngewɔ wɔɔ; kɛɛ kiahuna na Ngewɔ i manunga wu ma ajifa Juuisia ti gangani.
45011031	Na hu yakpe mia Ngewɔ manumɛi na wu majɔɔni, Juuisia ti falianga na a Ngewɔ, aako tia bɛɛ ti Ngewɔ manumɛi majɔɔ.
45011032	Ngewɔ i nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ wunga jɔɔwɔ ya ajifa ta ganga a ngie; i ji wielɔ aako i manuma gɛ a ti kpɛlɛɛ.
45011033	Ngewɔ gbatei i wɔlɔni kpa! Ngi nɛmahulewei kɛɛ ngi hindahugɔɔlei hu i bɔni kpa! Kitii nasia a nda, ye lɔ a gu i fasai? Ye lɔ a gu a ngi wiehindeisia yee piele hugɔɔla?
45011034	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Yelɔ i Ndemɔi nɛmahu va gɔngɔ? Yelɔ a gu a ngi laahiila?
45011035	Yelɔ wɔɔ i hani gbi venga ngi wɛ, aako yeekpɛi i yɛ ngi ma kpuava?”
45011036	Ajifa Ngewɔ lɔ i hani gbi gbatɛni, tamia a pie hani gbi ti yɛ na tawao ngi vamia ti na. Ngɔlɔya i yɛ Ngewɔ wɛ kunafɔ va. Amiina.
45012001	Faale naa, nya ndeengɛisia, Ngewɔ manuma wai va mu gama, nyaa wu manɛnɛma: a wua yekpe ve a saahanii vulungɔ Ngewɔ wɛ, na Kayemangɔ tawao hinda nɛingɔ le Ngewɔ wɛ. Hɛɛ yeetɔnyangɔi a ji lɔ mahoungɔ wu pie.
45012002	Waa hindei na wokɔɔ dunyablaa ti piema, kɛɛ a pie Ngewɔ i ndii ninangaa ve wu wɛ, i wu nɛmahui yeenina ve. Na wiengaa wa gulɔ a Ngewɔ liima hindei gɔɔla na kpekpengɔ, a ngi liilɛli tawao magbuama ii ma.
45012003	Kɛ ngauwandei va Ngewɔ pienga ngi majɔɔngɔ, ngɛɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma: waa wua yekpe lɛ nɛmahu aa lewe na ma mbɛngɔ ma. Kia aa yɛ hii, a wua yekpe mayei nɛmahu, numu gbi i kiti lewe ta yekpe ma kia ngi layii i na a Ngewɔ.
45012004	Mbeke gboto lɔ mu gbuha yilei ma, tawao yeembeke gbi ngi yengei i gba pekeisia ti ndɛisia ma.
45012005	Hii lɔɔ mu na, kia bɛɛ mu vahangɔ, kpuha yila lɔ a mue mua Kristi-ni, tawao mu wilingɔe mu nyɔunyɔ hu kia kpuha yilei yeembekeisia ti na.
45012006	Faale mahoungɔ numu gbi i yenge a ngauwandei na Ngewɔ i fenga ngi wɛ gbama. Ina mu nda yengei a Ngewɔ wowili lelaa lɔ, mu pie kia mbɛngɔ mu layii ma a Ngewɔ.
45012007	Ina kpɔma wiela le, mu kpɔma wie. Ina nungaa gaala le, mu ti gaa.
45012008	Ina nungaa wekangaa ti lii nɛpɔ va le, mu pie. Numui na lekee a nungaa gɔ na hu i ngi yeya, i pie a pandawanda; numui na lekee tokulɔ a ngie, i yenge kpayangɔ; numui na lekee a manuma hindeisia wie a nungaa wekeisia, i pie a kohunɛ.
45012009	Wu longaa a nungaa, a lo vulii a tie a wu lii gbi. A lolo a hinda nyamu, wu hɛlɛ a na kpekpengɔ.
45012010	A lo a wu nyɔunyɔ kia njekohungaa, wu baa gɔɔ wu nyɔunyɔ ma a wu lii gbi.
45012011	A yenge kpayangɔ, waa hawa wie. A yenge Ndemɔi wɛ a wu lii gbi.
45012012	Wu liilomɛi i pie wu yɛ kohunɛ hu, a liilo hinda gbɔugbɔisia hu wu yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli kpema gbi.
45012013	A Ngewɔ mableisia gɔ ti vɛlingɔ, a ti gɔ a wu yeya-hanisia, wu wu wɛleisia lawo hotangɛisia gulɔ.
45012014	A Ngewɔ manɛnɛ i nasia luba ta hitɛ wu wooma nyamuva a wue; a tɔnya, a ngi manɛnɛ i ti luba, baa ti jondu.
45012015	Nasia ti goohunɛngɔ, wua tieni a goohunɛɛ, wu wɔɔ wua nasia ta yɛ wɔɔma.
45012016	A gbewe numui gbi va mahɔngɔ. Waa mamani wie, tawao a luma ngenge na wiela ma bagɔma ii ma. Waa gili a wua yekpe kɛ wu nɛmahulewengɔe.
45012017	Numu i hinda nyamu wiengaa a bie, baa hunyɔu ngi ma a hinda nyamu. A lapi wu na wie numui gbi ta nde tɛɛ kpekpengɔe.
45012018	A hinda gbi wie wa gu ma, wua nungaa gbi wu yɛ ndiilɛli hu.
45012019	Baa hinda nyamu hunyɔu numu ma a hinda nyamu kunafɔ, nya ndiamɔisia, kia waa na wie, a gbe ma Ngewɔ liilewei ta i pie. Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “ ‘Nya lɔ nga hinda nyamu hunyɔu, nya lɔ nga yee kpɛi gbua,’ hii Ndemɔi ndeni.”
45012020	Kia waa hinda nyamu hunyɔu a hinda nyamu, Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, sao, “Ndɔlei yaa bi juwui ma, ngi gɔ a mɛhɛɛ; ngi bolohu i bengaa, ngi gɔ a njɛi i kpɔle; ajifa bi ji wiengaa kɛ bia teka gbandi waa heima ngi wumba.”
45012021	Baa luma hinda nyamu aa wɛlɛ bi mahu, wɛlɛ hinda nyamu mahu a hinda yekpe wiela.
45013001	Mahoungɔ wu gbi wu golo ndɔlɔ mahubleisia wɛ, ajifa mahumɔ gbi ɛɛ yɛ na ina Ngewɔ ii lumani ma, tawao mahumɔi na i na kiahuna, Ngewɔ lɔ i ngi wunga na.
45013002	Faale numu gbi lekee a lapi a ndɔlɔ mahumɔi na i na kiahuna, i lapima a Ngewɔ hinda hugbatɛngɔi lɔ, tawao numu gbi a na wie, a pielɔ mahubleisia ti kpalɛ la ngi ma.
45013003	Gbamaile maa ii houni nasia ta hinda yekpe wie ti luwa mahubleisia ma kɛlee nasia ta hinda nyamu wie. Wuii lonilɔ wu luwa mahumɔ ma, kɛ a hinda yekpe wie, kɛ mahumɔi vuii i wu latonga.
45013004	Gbamaile Ngewɔ yengemɔ mia a ngie, i yengema bi nda gbekpeyei valɔ. Kɛɛ bi hinda nyamu wiengaa, luwa mahumɔi ma, ajifa nimisei na a pie i nimisei la numu ma ii ngi yeya gbama. Ngewɔ yengemɔ mia a ngie tawao ta lɔ a Ngewɔ nimisei yeekpɛi gbua nasia ma ta hinda nyamu wie.
45013005	Sabui ji va mahoungɔ wu golo ndɔlɔ mahubleisia wɛ - Ngewɔ nimisei lekee va ii le, kɛɛ jifa gbɔma wu lii a nde wu ma yɛ mahoungɔ wu pie.
45013006	Sabui ji va lɔ gbɔma mahoungɔ wu pawɛi gula, ajifa mahubleisia ti yengema Ngewɔ lɔ wɛ ji ta mahayengeisia wie.
45013007	A ti gbɛi na gbua hɔɔ a yɛ wu ma; wu wu wui yeepawei gula kɛɛ wu jɔɔhani yeepawei, tawao wu bagɔma kɛɛ mbɛlɛhei ve nasia ti gbi wɛ.
45013008	Numu gbi ngi gba aa yɛ wu ma; kpɛi na lekee mahoungɔ i yɛ wu ma ta lɔ a lola a wu nyɔunyɔ. Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ a ngi mbaa nuuvu, i sawei hounga.
45013009	Sawei nasia ti ndeni tɛɛ, “Baa pue gbua; baa numu waa; baa huma wie; baa mani nyamu wie bi heinyɔui yeya-hani ma,” sawei ji kpɛlɛɛ kɛɛ pekanga ti wooma ti jɔsɔngɔe sawa yakpei ji hu, “Lo a bi mbaa nuuvui kia bi longɔ a bia yekpe.”
45013010	Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ a ngi mbaa nuuvui ɛɛ hinda nyamu wie a ngie kunafɔ. Kɛ lola a bi mbaa nuuvui ta lɔ hɔɔ sawei gbi houla le.
45013011	I gbua ji ma wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ, watii i hitinga kɔɔ wu wu njii hu. Gbamaile watii na Ngewɔ a mu bawo i lukpenga naa kpla i lewe watii na ma mu lani a Yesu Kristi a nina.
45013012	Kpindi i longa te i gbɔyɔ, ngele i longa te i wo. A mu gbe a kpindihu hindeisia wiela, mu kɔhaakeisia wumbu lapiva fofoi hu.
45013013	A mu mua yekpe mahugbe pandawanda kia nungei nasia ti heini fofoi hu; maa loko wili ndɔ gbolila hulewengɔ hu ɔɔ ndɔhou ɔɔ ngawufema hinda ɔɔ wɔji hinda ɔɔ ndapi ɔɔ tolo gbuala.
45013014	Kɛɛ a Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi gɔ-haakeisia wumbu, wu gbe a wotela wu lii na gama a wa a jumbui, kɔɔ wu ngi liima hindeisia wie.
45014001	A numui na gulu ngi lalei a Ngewɔ hugbɛɛngɔ tawao wua tieni waa ndabla wie kɔlooni ngi nda nɛmahui ma.
45014002	Numu yila lalei a Ngewɔ a lumalɔ ngi wɛ hani mɛva, kɛɛ numui na ngi lalei a Ngewɔ hugbɛɛngɔ ɛɛ hua mɛ kɛ hakpɛi lekee.
45014003	Numui na a hani gbi mɛ, aa lɛɛ numui na hu ɛɛ hani gbi mɛ tawao numui na ɛɛ hani gbi mɛ aa numui na magbua a hani gbi mɛ, ajifa Ngewɔ i ngi gulunga.
45014004	Ye lɔ a bie ba kiti lewe numu wekei luwɔi hinda ma? Ngi nda luwɔkɛi lɔ a kiti lewe ina taa kpekpe wiema ɔɔ ɛɛ gu. Tawao a gulɔ i kpekpe wie ajifa Ndemɔi a gulɔ i pie i kpekpe wie.
45014005	Numu yila a gililɔ yɛ baa i folo yila ma i lewe yee pekeisia ma, numu wekei a gili lɔ yɛ foloisia kpɛlɛɛ ti yakpe. Mahoungɔe numu gbi i la la vulii pɛiŋ kɛ na i gilima la pɔɔnangɔe.
45014006	Numui na lekee a folo yila hinda wɔlɔ, i piemaa aako i Ndemɔi bɛlɛhei; numu gbi lekee i hani gbi mɛngaa, i piemaa aako i Ndemɔi bɛlɛhɛi, ajifa a siɛgbualɔ Ngewɔ ma yeemɛhɛɛ va. Numu gbi lekee i gangangaa a hani lɛɛngaa mɛlaa, i piemaa aako i Ndemɔi bɛlɛ hei, tawao a siɛgbualɔ Ngewɔ ma.
45014007	Numu gbi ii na aa yɛ na ta yekpe lekee va, tawao numu gbi ii na aa haa ta yakpe lekee va.
45014008	Mu vulungɔ yɛngaa la, kɛ Ndemɔi vamia mu vulungɔ, tawao mu haangaa, kɛ Ndemɔi vamia mu haani. Faale mu vulu-o, ɔɔ mu haa-o, Ndemɔi woo lɔ a mue.
45014009	Gbamaile Kristi i haailɔ, i vulu i hiye hee hu aako i yɛ a fuublaa kɛɛ haablaa ti Lemɔi.
45014010	Gbɛe wa wu mbaangaa gbɛmbo? Tawao gbɛe hɔɔ wa lɛɛ wu mbaangɛisia hu? Gbamaile mu kpɛlɛɛ ma loolɔ Ngewɔ gulɔ i mu gbɛɛmbo.
45014011	Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Kia lɔɔ nya vulungɔ, hii Ndemɔi i ndenga, numui gbi ta wombi gbakpalɔ nya gulɔ, tawao numu gbi a ndelɔ fofoi hu leiŋ kɛ nyalɔ Ngewɔ a nge.”
45014012	A ngila ngila, numu gbi a ngi wiehindeisia hugɛlɔ Ngewɔ gulɔ, i sabui nasia gɛ i ti wieni fa.
45014013	Faale naa, a mu gbe a mu nyɔunyɔ gbɛmbo la. Kia maa na wie, ji mia mahoungɔ wu wu huyili pieva: waa hinda gbi wie a pie wu mbaa Kristimamɔ i yaka ɔɔ i jumbu hinda wie.
45014014	Ji mua Ndemɔi Yesu mu wilini hu, tamia i pienga ngi kɔɔngɔ vulii kɛ mɛhɛɛ gbi ii nɔhɔni Ngewɔ yaama a ngi wuma wee; kɛɛ ina numu langɔe la kɛ mɛhɛɛ gbi nɔhɔngɔe, kɛ ngi liima le kɛ nɔhɔngɔe ngi va Ngewɔ yaama.
45014015	Bi bi mbaa Kristimamɔ gbalɛngaa ajifa bi nɔɔngɔ hani lɛɛngaa mɛla ma bɛɛ kpekpengɔe, kɛ bii yaa jiama a ndoma welei. Baa pie mɛhɛɛ na ba mɛ i numui na nyani Kristi haani ngi va.
45014016	Faale, baa pie bi hinda yekpei aa yɛ a hinda nyamu nungaa wekangaa gama.
45014017	Ajifa Ngewɔ mahayɛi ii yɛni a mɛhɛɛ mɛlaa kɛɛ ndɔ gbolila, kɛlee pɔɔnɛi kɛɛ ndiilɛli kɛɛ Kohunɛ na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe.
45014018	Tawao numu gbi lekee i yengengaa Kristi wɛ a pelei ji, a pielɔ Ngewɔ goohu i nɛɛ, nuuvugaa ti ngi lato.
45014019	Faale naa, a mu hindei nasia gɔkɔli ta wa a ndiilɛli, ta gbɔma gbɔ mu ma mu nyɔunyɔ gbayava.
45014020	Mɛhɛɛ va, waa na nyani Ngewɔ i pienga. Mɛhɛɛ gbi numu a mɛlɔ kɛɛ kpulangɔ le hani gbi mɛva na a pie numu weka i jumbu hinda wie.
45014021	Na pɔnangɔ pieva ta lɔ a gbela a huɛi mɛla, ndɔi gbolila kɛɛ hani weka gbi lekee wiela na a pie bi mbaa Kristimamɔ i jumbu hinda wie.
45014022	Na bi langɔ la kɔlooni mɛhɛɛ mɛlɛi kɛɛ ndɔ gbolilei ma i yɛ wu luahu wua Ngewɔ. Kohunɛ a yɛlɔ numui ma ngi lii yahupungɔ i le kɔlooni na ma a luma i mɛ.
45014023	Kɛɛ ina numu gbi hukitingɔe kɔlooni na ma a mɛ, Ngewɔ a njia wɛlɛlɔ ngi ma ji a yeemɛhɛɛ na mɛ, ajifa ii pieni lanaya hu; tawao numu i hinda wienga ii lani la kɛ pɔɔnangɔe, kɛ jumbui mia.
45015001	Mua mu lanayei gbayangɔ mahoungɔ mu gbɔ nasia ma tii gbayani hinda gbangɔi nasia hu ta ti male. Maa ii houni mu mua yekpe liilɛli.
45015002	Kia maa na wie, mahoungɔ numu gbi i na wie a ngi mbaa-Kristimamɔi liilɛli kɛɛ tawao kpekpengɔ ngi va aako bi gbɔ ngi ma yɛva a Kristimamɔ gbayangɔ ngi lanayei hu.
45015003	Ajifa na kpɛlɛɛ Kristi i pieni, ii pieni ta yekpe goohunɛɛva, kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ngɛlii na kpɛlɛɛ ti Ngewɔ yɛlini la ti yɛni a nya yɛlingaa lɔ.”
45015004	Hani gbi nyɛingɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu, nyɛingɔe mu gaava, aako mu liiloma majɔɔ, ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi a pielɔ mu mawulo wie, mu lii i gba.
45015005	Ngewɔ na mawulo-lii kɛɛ ndiigbɛi a gbua ngi gama, i pie wu giliyii i yɛ yakpe a wu nyɔunyɔ a ji wa Yesu Kristi wokɔɔ,
45015006	aako wu kpɛlɛɛ wu mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi kɛɛ Ngewɔ wɔlɔ a ngoo yila.
45015007	A wu nyɔunyɔ gulu hɔɔ kia Kristi i wu guluni la aako nungaa ti Ngewɔ lato.
45015008	Gbamaile, ngi nde wu ma, kɛ Kristi i yɛlɔ a Juuisia ti yengemɔ kɛva kɛ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbungaa, hu ɛɛ nyani, pieva kɔɔ Ngewɔ Lahei nasia i mbumbuni mu maadani gama ti wie,
45015009	tawao gbɔma aako i pie nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti Ngewɔ wɔlɔ ngi manumɛi va. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni yɛ, “Faale nga bi latolɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti lia, tawao nga bi biyɛi latolɔ kaka ngule hu.”
45015010	I ndeilɔ gbɔma yɛ, “A goohunɛ, nasia Juublaa yaa tie wu gbi, wua Ngewɔ nungaa!”
45015011	Yɛ gbɔma, “A Ndemɔi lato, nasia Juublaa yaa tie; tawao nungaa gbi ti ngi lato !”
45015012	Gbɔma, Aisaya ndeilɔ yɛ, “Jɛsi goohu lo a walɔ, Ngewɔ a ngi lɛlɔ i yɛ a nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti mahɛi tawao ta lii valalɔ ngi ma.”
45015013	Ngewɔ na wu lii valangɔ ngi ma, i wu gɔ a kohunɛi waa kɛɛ ndiilɛli kia wu langɔ a ngie, aako Ngewɔ Yafei ngi gbayei i pie wu liivalamɛi maa i yaa a to.
45015014	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia nya vulii ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu gbekpengɔ waa le, tawao wu gaangɔ waa nahi wa gulɔ a wu nyɔunyɔ gaala.
45015015	Ngi ndiilo ji wielɔ jifa ngi hinda lɛɛngaa hitɛnga wu wɛ kɔlɛi ji hu, ngauwandei va Ngewɔ fenga nya wɛ,
45015016	yɛva a Yesu Kristi yengemɔ aako ngi yenge nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti wɛ. Nga saagbua yengei lɔ wie a ji nga Ngowili Yekpei na le a gbua Ngewɔ gama aako nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti wie kia saahanii na a Ngewɔ goohu nɛɛ ajifa Ngewɔ Yafei i wu yɛnga sɛwɛ.
45015017	Faale, ajifa mua Yesu Kristi mu wilingɔ hu, nga gulɔ ngi mata gbua ajifa ngi yengema Ngewɔ wɛ.
45015018	Nga yɛpɛlɔ naa a ndiilo, tawao a na lekee Kristi i pienga nyahu kɔɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti golo Ngewɔ wɛ, a nya layie hu kɛɛ nya wiehindeisia hu wɛ,
45015019	tɔmaselisia kɛɛ kabandeisia ti gbayei hu kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei gbayei. Faale naa, ji ngi yɛ jiama nga gbua Jelusalɛm nga wa Ilirikɔm lɛihu, ngi Ngowili Yekpei leilɔ vulii pandawanda hu gbi kɔlooni Kristi ma.
45015020	Na yeemani i nya ma wɔɔ gba ta mia a ji nga Ngowili Yekpei le hindei nasia tii yaa Kristi hinda mɛnini na ngovama, aako ngaa numu weka nda yenge lɔtongɔi yakpua.
45015021	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndenila yɛ, “Nungei nasia tii ngi yɛpɛ leni ti ma ta tɔlɔ, tawao nasia tii yaa mɛnini ta yeembui gɔɔlɔ.”
45015022	Ngengei nasia va ti yɛ nya ma, ngii yaa a guni wava wu gama.
45015023	Kɛɛ kiahuna naa ngi nya yengei gbɔyɔnga tatei jisia hu tawao kia foo gboto va nya longɔ wɔɔ ngi wa wu gama,
45015024	nya lii lɔ ma kɛ nga gulɔ naa a wala wu gama. Nya longɔ mua wueni mu lɔ ji nga yɛ lewema liva Sipeiŋ lɔleihu, wu gbɔ nya ma ngi li na, ji mua wueni ma kohunɛma hinda wie pɛiŋ kulo.
45015025	Ngaamɛi ji naa nyaa lima Jelusalɛm a njoyo-hani Ngewɔ nungeisia wɛ.
45015026	Ajifa Kristimablei nasia ti Masidonia kɛɛ Akaya lɔleihu ti hugbatɛnga a ti wuma wee hani veva gbɔva nyaniblɛi nasia ma ti Ngewɔ nungei nasia lia Jelusalɛm.
45015027	Tia yekpe vulii lɔ ti ji hugbatɛni. Kɛɛ, a tɔnya, kpa lɔ ti ma gbɔva nyaniblaa ma; Juuisia ti nasia Juublaa yaa tie gɔilɔ hani yekpei nasia hu ti majɔɔni a Ngewɔ ti yafeisia va, faale mahoungɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti langɔ a Kristi ti gbɔ Juu nasia ma ti langɔ a Kristi a ti yeya-hani nasia ta gbewe fa folo gbi.
45015028	Ngi yeengengei ji gbɔyɔngaa, navoei na ti tɛni ma ti va ngi fe ti wɛ ndavengɔ, nga pele houlɔ liva Sipeiŋ, tawao nga folɔ wu ma yeepelei hu.
45015029	Ngi wangaa wu gama, ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nga walɔ a Kristi luba lavengɔi.
45015030	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu kɛɛ naa ndomɛi na Ngewɔ Yafei i punga mu lii hu, wu gbɛɛ nya ma mu Ngewɔ vɛli nya va.
45015031	A Ngewɔ vɛli aako Judiablɛi nasia tii lani a Yesu Kristi taa nya gbalɛ, tawao Ngewɔ nungei nasia ti Jelusalɛm ti ngengei na gulu ngi piema ti wɛ.
45015032	Faale ina Ngewɔ lumailɔ nga walɔ wu gama a kohunɛ waa, tawao mua wueni mu lɔla i pie nya goohu i nɛɛ tawao ngi lɛɛvu.
45015033	Ngewɔ na ndiilɛli a gbua ngi gama, i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ gbla. Amiina.
45016001	Nya longɔ ngi hugɛ a wue kɛ mu mbaa Kristi nyahaloi Fibi na ngengemɔ a ngie Sɔsiiblei nasia lia ti Sɛnkia teihu, numu yekpe waa lɔ a ngie.
45016002	A va ngi ma Ndemɔi biyɛi hu, kia mahoungɔ Ngewɔ nungeisia ti pie, wu kpɔma gbi wie ngi ma a gbewe fa wu yeya; ajifa ta vulii ngi gbekpengɔ waa le a numu gboto kɛɛ nya vulii.
45016003	Nga va Plisila ma taa Akuila, nya mbaa ngengeblaa Yesu Kristi yengei hu;
45016004	ti ti lɛɛvui yɛni a saa nya va nyaa siɛ gboto gbuama ti ma nya yaangɔ ii le, maa nasia Juublaa gbi yaa tie ti langɔ a Yesu.
45016005	Nga va gbɔma Sɔsiiblei nasia ma ta gomɛ ti wɛlei bu. Nga va nya liima ndiamɔi Ipinɛtɔs ma, na haalamɔ yɛla Esia lɔlei hu i lani a Kristi.
45016006	Nga va Meri ma, na i yengenga kpayangɔ waa wu wɛ.
45016007	Nga va Andrɔnikɔs ma taa Junias, nya mbaa Juu nasia maa tieni mu yɛ kpindiwɛlei bu; toblɛisia ti yɛ ti gɔɔlɔ pandawanda, tawao tia yese ti yɛla a Kristimablaa nya gulɔ.
45016008	Nga va kaka Amplietɔs ma, nya liima ndiamɔi na ngi wilingɔ Ndemɔi hu.
45016009	Nga va Ɔɔbanɔs ma, mu mbaa ngengemɔi Kristi yengei hu, kɛɛ Stekis, nya liima ndiamɔi.
45016010	Nga va kaka Apɛlis ma, na ngi goloyii magɛngɔ leeŋ a Kristi wɛ. Nga va Aristɔbulɔs bondɛisia ma.
45016011	Nga va kaka Hɛrɔdiɔn ma, nya mbaa Juu, kɛɛ Nakisɔs bondɛi nasia ti langɔ a Ndemɔi.
45016012	Nga va kaka Trafina taa Traifosa ma, nasia ti yengema Ndemɔi wɛ, kɛɛ nya liima ndiamɔi Paasis, na i ngenge gboto wienga Ndemɔi wɛ.
45016013	Nyaa fama gboto yoyoma Rufɔsi wɛ, Ndemɔi yenge gugbei na, kɛɛ ngi nje, na a hindei gbi wie a nge kia nga lola.
45016014	Nga va Asinkritɔs ma kɛɛ Flɛgɔn kɛɛ Hamis kɛɛ Patrɔbas kɛɛ Hamas kɛɛ naa mu mbaa Kristimablaa wekei nasia gbi taa tieni ti hinda yila.
45016015	Nyaa fama yoyoma Failɔogɔs gama taa Julia, kɛɛ Niliɔs taa ngi ndewenyahaloi, kɛɛ Olimpas kɛɛ Ngewɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ taa tieni ti hinda yila.
45016016	A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma a ndoma-lii. Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ tia fama gboto yoyoma wu wɛ.
45016017	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia wu wu mahugbe a nasia ta nungaa luahu nyani, ta nasia yaka ti langɔ a Ngewɔ, ta kaa weka gɛ i gba kaa na ma ti wu gaani la; waa lukpe ti gbla.
45016018	Ajifa nasia ta hinda bondɛi nasia wie tii yengema mu Lemɔi Kristi wɛ, ti gbewengɔ lekee tia yekpe valɔ. Ti layia nɛnɛisia kɛɛ ndɛ latoi ta nungaa lato la a pielɔ ti nungaa wɛlɛ.
45016019	Numui gbi ti kɔɔlɔ kia wu golongɔ tawao wu longɔ a Ngowili Yekpei tawao sabui ji va lɔ wu hinda i nya goohu nɛngɔ. Nya longɔ wu nɛmahulewe wie hindei na gɔɔva kpekpengɔ, waa nyamu wiela hugɔɔ.
45016020	Tawao Ngewɔ na ndiilɛli a gbua ngi gama, a Seitana wɔpɔnyɛlɔ wu gɔɔbu hugutungɔ. Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu ma.
45016021	Nya mbaa ngengemɔi Timoti yɛ a va wu ma kaka. Nya mbaa Juuisia Lusiɔs kɛɛ Jesin kɛɛ Sosipeta tia bɛɛ ta va wu ma.
45016022	Nya nya Tatiɔs, ngi Pɔɔl layie jisia nyɛima nga va wu ma kaka kia wu mbaa Kristimamɔɔ i na.
45016023	Nya hotakɛi Gayɔs, na Kristimableisia ta gomɛ ngi yeepɛlɛbu, ta vama wu ma kaka; Ilastɔs na navoo lamagbatɛmɔi a ngie tia mu mbaa Kristimɔi Kuaatɔs tɛɛ ta va wu ma kaka. [
45016024	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu gbi ma. Amiina.]
45016025	A mu Ngewɔ wɔlɔ! Na a pie wu lo kpaŋ wu lalei hu a ngie kia nga nde la Ngowili Yekpei na hu nga nde, Ngowili kɔloongɔ Yesu Kristi ma kɛ gbɔma na tɔnya lɔwungɔi i kɛnga, tɔnyɛi na ndɔwungɔ wɔɔ foo gboto-gboto va.
45016026	Kiahuna na yeetɔnyɛi i gbuanga fofoya Ngewɔ lutuisia ti gɔlɔ nyɛingɔisia hu, tawao na kunafɔ Yewɔɛi i ndeni i pienga kɛnyɛi kpɛlɛɛ ti yeetɔnyɛi na gɔnga aako ti gbi ti la a Ngewɔ, ti golo ngi wɛ.
45016027	Ngewɔ na yakpe nɛmahulewei ngi wɛ, ngɔlɔya i yɛ ngi ma kunafɔ va Yesu Kristi sabui hu! Amiina.
46001001	Nya Pɔɔl, Ngewɔ i loko longa nya ma yɛva a tomɔi Yesu Kristi va, nya lɔ ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima, kɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimɔi Sɔstɛnisi,
46001002	Ngewɔblei nasia gama ti Kɔlinti, nasia gbi Ngewɔ i loko longa ti ma yɛva a ngi woo, tia Yesu Kristi-ni ti wilingɔ hu, kɛɛ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ hinda gbi lekee ta hɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ma, mua tieni mu Lemɔi.
46001003	Nyaa mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima kɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi aako i ti Ngauwandei kɛɛ ndiilɛli ve wu wɛ.
46001004	Nga siɛgbualɔ Ngewɔ ma kpema gbi ngauwandei va i fɛnga wu wɛ Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
46001005	Jifa wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, Ngewɔ i pienga wu magbatɛnga pelei gbi hu kpɛngɔ ngowili hugɛlɛi ma pandawanda kɛɛ ndelei nungaa ma pandawanda.
46001006	Kristi hindei nasia ti hugɛnga a wue, wu langa la a wu lii gbi
46001007	famia wuii yaa baani a kpekpeya yakpe bɛɛ majɔɔla, kia wu Ngewɔ mawuloma Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi magɛva.
46001008	A gbɔma pielɔ wu loo kpauŋ i to kɛlɛmɛi, aako sabu gbi aa yɛ na wu lɛɛva Kpɛmbo Volei na ma mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a wa.
46001009	Mahoungɔ mu la la kɛ hinda gbi Ngewɔ i ndengaa yɛ a pielɔ, a pielɔ huɛɛŋ, Ngewɔ na i loko loni wu ma aako wua ngi Hindoloi, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi wu wili hu.
46001010	Kpayei na va mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i feni mbɛ, nyaa ndema wu kpɛlɛɛ ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu woo i yɛ yila na gbi hu wa nde aako wu luahu aa gɔlɛ kulo bɛɛ. Wu woo i yɛ vulii yakpe, wu giliyii kɛɛ wu lii-hu-hindei i yɛ yakpe.
46001011	Gbamaile Kloi bondɛisia lɛɛngaa ti ndenga nya ma leiŋ nya mbaa Kristimableisia, tɛɛ wu luahu i gɔlɛkɔlɛnga.
46001012	Na nya lii i ma ndeva tamia a ji numu gbi wu lia ngi layie i gba pekeisia ti ndeisia ma. Nungaa lɛɛngaa ta ndelɔ tɛɛ, “Mu toma Pɔɔl lɔ ma;” pekeisia tɛɛ, “Mu toma Apɔlɔs lɔ ma”; yeepekeisia tɛɛ, “Mu toma Pita lɔ ma;” yeenasia tɛɛ, “Mu toma Kristi lɔ ma.”
46001013	Yesu gɔlɛkɔlɛngɔe? Pɔɔl lɔ haani Krɔsii ma wu va? Ti wu wuani a Ngewɔ yei Pɔɔl biyei hu lɔ?
46001014	Ngi siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma jifa ngii numu weka gbi wuani a Ngewɔ yei kɛlee Klipɔsi kɛɛ Gayɔs.
46001015	Numu gbi ii wu lia hɔɔ aa gu a ndela yɛ ti ngi wuailɔ a Ngewɔ yei nya biyei hu.
46001016	(Ngi Stɛfanɔs taa ngi wɛlɛbubleisia bɛɛ wuailɔ kɛɛ na wooma ngii lani la kɛ ngi numu weka gbi wuailɔ.)
46001017	Kristi ii nya looni nungaa wuava. I nya looni Ngowili Yekpei lɔ leva, tawao ngii ndema a nuuvu nɛmahulewe yɛpɛ, aako Kristi haalei krɔsii ma aa yɛ a gbama hinda.
46001018	Gbamaile Kristi haalei krɔsii ma yeengowili i yɛni a baaba hinda lɔ nasia wɛ tii mbawoya weleima; kɛɛ mua mu bawoma, i yɛni a Ngewɔ gbayei lɔ mu wɛ.
46001019	Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Nga nɛmahuleweblɛisia ti nɛmahulewei yɛlɔ a gbama fuŋ, ngi kaableisia ti hinda hugɔɔlei wote a baaba hinda.”
46001020	Faale naa, njɛpɛ gbi ii nɛmahuleweblɛisia la kɛɛ kaableisia kɛɛ nasia ti bɛɛngɔ a dunyama laablɛi wiela. Ngewɔ i kɛnga kɛ dunyablaa ti nɛmahulewei i yɛni a baabaa hinda lɔ!
46001021	Ngewɔ nɛmahulewe wai i pieilɔ nungaa tɛɛ gu taa ngi gɔɔ a ti nda nɛmahulewe. Kɛɛ nɛɛilɔ Ngewɔ wɛ nasia bawova ta la a “Baaba” wowili ji ma nde.
46001022	Juuisia ti longɔ kabande hindanga ti wie kɛva kɛ mu wowili i gbuanga vulii Ngewɔ gama lɔ. Nasia Juu yaa tie tia nɛmahulewe gɔlila lɔ kpewengɔ ti ma.
46001023	Kɛɛ mua, Kristi na ti kpakpani krɔsii ma tamia ma ngi hinda hugɛ, yeengowili a gbalɛ Juuisia ma, tawao nasia Juu yaa tie a babaa;
46001024	kɛɛ nasia wɛ Ngewɔ i ti lolinga, ti yɛ a Juungaa ɔɔ nasia Juu yaa tie, Ngowili Yekpei ji kɔloongɔ Kristi lɔ ma, na Ngewɔ gbayei a ngie kɛɛ ngi nɛmahulewei.
46001025	Gbamaile Ngewɔ wiehindei na kpuangɔ a baaba hinda, nɛmahulewe i hu i lewe nuuvu nɛmahulewe gbi ma tawao na kpuangɔ a faakaalewe i gbayani nuuvu gbaya gbi ma.
46001026	Nya ndeengɛisia, a gili lɛɛ a yɛyii wɔɔ wu yɛ hu pɛiŋ Ngewɔ i wu loli. Kia nungaa ti yɛyiisia ti na dunyei hu, wuii yɛ gbotoni wu nɛmahulewengɔ, wuii yɛ gbotoni kpaya i wu wɛ, wuii yɛ gbotoni wu gbuani maha wɛlɛ laa.
46001027	Nungɛi nasia dunyableisia ti ti wumbungɔ a baabaa, tia vulii lɔ Ngewɔ i ti wumbuni, nɛmahuleweblɛisia yawufeva, tawao i nasia lɔ wumbuni ta ti loli a faakaalewe kpayableisia yawufeva.
46001028	I nungei nasia lɔ wumbuni dunyablaa ti lɛɛngɔ ti hu tawao gbɛogbɛ yaa a tie, nungei nasia yawufeva dunyablaa ti baa gɔngɔ ti ma.
46001029	Ji a kɛlɔ kɛ numu gbi ɛɛ lawo Ngewɔ yaama.
46001030	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i wanga a wue wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilinga hu, tawao i Kristi yɛnga a mu nɛmahulewe. Ngi sabui hu lɔ Ngewɔ i mu yɛnga a pɔnablaa i mua tieni luahu gbatɛnga, mu yɛnga a ngi nda nungeisia, i mu gbuanga jumbui luwɔyɛi hu.
46001031	Faale naa, kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i lawo, i lawo a na Ndemɔi i pienga.”
46002001	Ji ngi wani wu gama, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, Ngewɔ lɔnya lɔwungɔi hugɛva, ngii ngowili waawaa leni ngaa kɛ kɛ nya gaangɔ waa le.
46002002	Ajifa watii na ngi yɛ wu gama ngi nya lii huyiliilɔ lemava hinda gbi ma lekee kɛlee Yesu Kristi, kɛɛ ngi haalei krɔsii ma.
46002003	Faale ji ngi wani wu gama nya hawangɔ yɛla, tawao nya maa a gbɛli a nduwɛi,
46002004	tawao kaai na ngi kɛni kɛɛ ngowili na ngi ndeni, ngii pieni a nuuvu nɛmahulewe yeembɛili-yɛpɛ, ngi pieni a pelei na lɔ a Ngewɔ Yafei gbayei gɛ leiŋ.
46002005	Wu lalei a Ngewɔ ii gbuani hɔɔ nuuvu nɛmahulewe hu, i gbuani Ngewɔ gbayei hu lɔ.
46002006	Na hu gbi, mu nɛmahulewe wowili lema nasia lɔ ma ti hu gbangɔ Ngewɔ hu. Kɛɛ dunyei nda yeenɛmahulewe ii le ɔɔ ngafangei nasia ti kpayei yayengema dunyei ji maahu kiahuna ti nɛmahulewe, kpayablɛi nasia ti wama gbɔyɔma.
46002007	Nɛmahulewe wowili ma nde i yɛni a Ngewɔ nɛmahulewe lɔwungɔi lɔ, ndɔwungɔ nuuvungaa ma, kɛɛ na Ngewɔ i hugbatɛnga wɔɔ kɛva a mue pɛiŋ Ngewɔ i yaa dunyei gbatɛ aako mu yɛyii i gu i wie kia ngi wɔlɔyi i na.
46002008	Ngafangei nasia mahangaa a tie dunyei hu yeengila bɛɛ ii yeenɛmahulewei ji gɔɔni. Ina ti kɔɛilɔ, Ndemɔi na ngɔlɔya ngi wɛ, tii yɛ ngi gbakpa krɔsii ma.
46002009	Na hu gbi, kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Na numu gbi ii yaa wɔɔ gba tɔni tawao ii yaa mɛnini, na numu gbi ii gilini wɔɔ gba kɛ a gulɔ i wie, ta vulii lɔ Ngewɔ i hugbatɛnga nasia va ti longɔ a ngie.”
46002010	Kɛɛ mua lɔ Ngewɔ i ngi hinda lɔwungɔi gɛnga a mue ngi Yafei sabui hu. Jifa ngi Yafei a hindei gbi hugbɛkpɛlɔ, Ngewɔ liihu hinda lɔɔwungɔisia vulii bɛɛ.
46002011	Numu nda yafei na lekee i ngi hu tamia i ngi hinda gbi hugɔngɔ; hii lɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei yakpe i Ngewɔ hinda gbi hugɔngɔ.
46002012	Kiahuna muii yaa dunyei ji yeengafei majɔɔni; kia na aa wie, mu ngafei na lɔ majɔɔnga Ngewɔ i njoyoni, aako mu na kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔ Ngewɔ i fenga mu wɛ gbaama.
46002013	Faale naa, njɛpɛi na ma nde, nuuvu nɛmahulewe ii le aa mu gaa la, kɛlee na Ngewɔ Yafei a mu gaa la, ji ma yɛ tɔnyɛi nasia hugɛma Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ a mue nasia gama Ngewɔ Yafei i ti hu.
46002014	Numu gbi lekee Ngewɔ Yafei ii ngi hu, ɛɛ hani yekpei nasia majɔɔ Ngewɔ yafei a fe gbaama. Numu bondɛi na ii ti gbekpeyii gɔɔ vulii, ti yɛni lekee a baaba lɔ ngi wɛ, ajifa numui na lekee Ngewɔ Yafei i ngi hu ta lɔ a ti gbekpeyii gɔɔ.
46002015	Na hu gbi, numui na lekee Ngewɔ Yafei i ngi hu a gulɔ a hani gbi gbekpeyii hugɔɔlaa, kɛɛ numu gbi ɛɛ gu a kiti lewela ngi ma.
46002016	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ye lɔ i Ndemɔi nɛmahu va gɔngɔ? Ye lɔ a gu a ngi laahila?” Na hu gbi, kia Kristi a gili, hii ma gili.
46003001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a tɔnya ngii guni a wu gaala kia nga nungei nasia gaa Kristi Yafei i ti hu; kpɔndangɔ yɛla nya ma wu gaava kia nungei nasia ti na dunyei woo a tie, kia ndolangaa wu lalei hu a Kristi.
46003002	Kpɔndangɔ yɛla nya ma nyiniyɛi veva wu wɛ, ngii mɛhɛɛ kpaukpau veni ajifa wu magbatɛngɔ ii yɛla fa, tawao kiahuna bɛɛ wu magbatɛngɔ ii le fa.
46003003	Ajifa wuaa lɔɔ luvama kia dunyei ji hublɛisia ti piema. Ji wu tolo gbuama wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wa yianjia, na ɛɛ kɛ kɛ dunyei ji woo lɔ a wue, wa luva kia nungaa gbamɛisia?
46003004	Ji wu yilayee a nde yɛ, “Ngi toma Pɔɔl lɔ ma,” pekei yɛ, “Ngi toma Apɔlɔs lɔ ma” wuii luvama kia dunyablaa gbaama?
46003005	Ye lɔ a Apɔlɔs? Ye lɔ a hɔɔ a Pɔɔl? Ngewɔ yengeblaa lekee lɔ a mue, mu pienga wu langa a Ngewɔ. Mu yilayee gbi a ngengei na lɔ wie Ndemɔi i fenga ngi wɛ pieva.
46003006	Nyaa ngi tuhani-galei hini, Apɔlɔs i njɛi wu ma, kɛɛ Ngewɔ lɔ i pieni tuhani na i gbekpe.
46003007	Numui na a tuhani-galei hii kɛɛ numui na a njɛi wu ma bagɔma waa ii ti yengei ma. Ngewɔ nda yengei lɔ bagɔma i ma ajifa ta lɔ a pie yeetuhani i gbekpe.
46003008	Nduahugɛ gbi ii tuhani hiimɔi luahu taa numui na a njɛi wu ma; Ngewɔ a numu gbi pawalɔ ngi nda yengei va i pienga.
46003009	Gbamaile mbangaa lɔ a mue mu ngenge yila wiema Ngewɔ wɛ, tawao Ngewɔ gbalei lɔ a wue. Ngewɔ wɛlei lɔ gbɔma a wue.
46003010	Ji ngi yengeni a kpekpeye na Ngewɔ i feni nya wɛ, ngi pɛlɛ-lomɔ yeekpekpe yenge lɔ wieni ngi pɛlei hitɛ, tawao numu weka lɔ yeepɛlei loma. Kɛɛ numu gbi a ngi mahugbelɔ kia a yee pɛlei loo.
46003011	Ajifa Ngewɔ wilanga a Yesu Kristi yɛla a pɛlɛ-hitɛngɔ yakpei, tawao pɛlɛ weka ɛɛ yaa hitɛ.
46003012	Nungaa lɛɛngaa ta yengelɔ a kani-gbɔlu ɔɔ kani-gole ɔɔ kani baagbangɔ wekangaa pɛlɛ hitɛngɔi ji lova; pekeisia ta yengelɔ a ngulii ɔɔ kpitii ɔɔ kɛi.
46003013	Tawao nungaa ta numui gbi ngi nda yengei yekpeyii lɔlɔ watii na Kristi Volei a ti magɛ. Gbamaile Foloi na ma ngɔmbui lɔ a numu gbi ngi nda yengei maagɛ; yeengɔmbui a ngengei gbi maagɛlɔ i ngi yɛyii gɛ leeŋ.
46003014	Pɛlɛ-hitɛngɔi na ti toni i ngɔmbui huvoongaa, pɛlɛ-lomɔi a pawa majɔɔlɔ.
46003015	Kɛɛ ngɔmbui i numu gbi ngi nda yengei mɔngaa, a baalɔ a pawɛi kɛɛ na hugbi a bawolɔ, bi tɔaa bɛɛ i gbua ngɔmbui hu lɔ.
46003016	Wu kɔɔlɔ vulii kɛ Ngewɔ wɛlei lɔ a wue tawao kɛ Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ heini wu hu!
46003017	Faale numu gbi i Ngewɔ wɛlei nyaningaa, Ngewɔ a ngi nyanilɔ. Ajifa Ngewɔ wɛlei magayemangɔ, tawao wua vulii lɔ ngi wɛlei a wue.
46003018	Numu gbi aa ta yekpe gbowa. Numu gbi wu lia i gilingaa yɛ dunyama nɛmahulewei lɔ ngi wɛ, mahoungɔ i yɛ a kpowamɔ aako ngi nɛmahu i lewe vulii.
46003019	Gbamaile na dunyablaa ta mbumbu tɛɛ nɛmahulewe le, kpowa hinda le Ngewɔ yaama. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ “Ngewɔ a nɛmahuleweblɛisia ti nɛmahulewei yɛlɔ a mani i ti hou la.”
46003020	Tawao Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yeehinda weka yɛ, “Ndemɔi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nɛmahuleweblɛisia ti giliisia tii yekpeni.”
46003021	Maa ii houni hɔɔ numu gbi i lawo a na nuuvunga ta gu ti pie. A tɔnya vulii wu woo lɔ a hani gbi:
46003022	Nya Pɔɔl kɛɛ Apɔlɔs kɛɛ Pita kɛɛ dunyei ji kɛɛ ndɛvui kɛɛ hee kɛɛ ngaama hindeisia kɛɛ kulɔma hindeisia ji kpɛlɛɛ wu woo mia,
46003023	tawao Kristi woo lɔ a wue, Ngewɔ woo a Kristi.
46004001	Mahoungɔ numu gbi i mu wumbu a Kristi yengeblaa, Ngewɔ i ngi lɔnya lɔwungɔisia loko wuaanga mu yeya.
46004002	Hinda yakpei na mahoungɔ ngengemɔ bondɛi na i pie tamia a lɔnyala a ngi lemɔi.
46004003	Kiahuna, nya gbewe gbi ii na ina wu kiti leweilɔ nya ma ɔɔ ina numu weka gbi i teweilɔ; ngɛɛ kiti lewe nya yekpe vulii ma.
46004004	Nya yekpe vulii ngii hinda nyamu gɔɔ ngi pienga, kɛɛ na ii kɛni kɛ ngii yaa hinda nyamu gɔɔ ngi pienga. Ndemɔi lɔ a kiti lewe nya ma.
46004005	Faale waa kiti lewe numu gbi ma yeewatii na gulɔ. Mahoungɔ kɛlɛma kiti lewelɛi i Ndemɔi walei mawulo; a ndɔwuma hindeisia gbualɔ fofo ya; i nungaa ti lii huveisia magɛ. Yeewatii na mia Ngewɔ a numu gbi lato a tatoi na mbɛngɔ ngi ma.
46004006	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngi mua Apɔlɔs wotenga a tɔmaseli aako wu gaa mu ma, waa windɛ na maahu nyɛingɔ tawao waa mata gbua a numu yila, waa lɛɛ yeepekei hu.
46004007	Ye lɔ i wu gbatɛni i wu lewe nungaa wekeisia ma? Na gbi i wu yeya Ngewɔ ii le aa fe wu wɛ? Wa yee gu wu yonga lewe bi tɔaa bɛɛ na i wu yeya Ngewɔ ii le aa fe gbaama?
46004008	Wu gilingɔ la wu hani gbi majɔnga wu gbewengɔ fa ɔɔ; wu gilingɔ la wu gbatɛnga? Wu gilingɔ la wu yɛnga a maha waawangaa mua muii ma. A nyandelɔ ina maha waawangaa vulii lɔ a wue aako mua wueni mu yeemahayɛi mɛ.
46004009	Gbamaile i wienga nya gama bi tɔaa bɛɛ Ngewɔ i mua mu toblɛisia lukpenga tomɛi yeekɛlɛmayei kia nungei nasia ti na Kotii i ti lɛɛnga ti waava faha hu aako malikeisia kɛɛ nuuvungaa ti ti haamɛi lɔ.
46004010	Kristi va kpowablaa lɔ a mue; kɛɛ wua wu gilingɔ la wu nɛmahulewengɔ ji wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu! Mua mu hawangɔ kɛɛ wua wu gilingɔ la wu gbayangɔe; nungaa ti lɛɛngɔe mu hu kɛɛ ta bagɔɔlɔ wu ma!
46004011	I to watii ji vulii ma ndɔlɛ lɔ mu ma, tawao mu bolohu bengɔ; kula hawɛisia mia ma ngili; ta mu lewelɔ; ma lewetewelɔ nga heima ii mu yeya;
46004012	ma mua yekpe gahu gbɔyɔlɔ a ngengei. Ti mu jondungaa, mu ti luba; ti juwuya hitɛngaa mu wooma, mu gu mbu;
46004013	ti mu yɛlinga, mu pote a njɛpɛ nɛnɛɛngaa. Muii gbekpeni mua lewe kɛi na ma i kaawɔɛi ma; dunyama yeekpɔkpɔɛi a mua lɔ i to watii ji vulii ma.
46004014	Ngii kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako wu wufe kɛɛ aako ngi wu gaa kia nya liima leenga.
46004015	Gbamaile kia bɛɛ kaamɔ tauji puu lɔ wu yeya Kristi hindei hu, Kɛkɛi i yakpe wu yeya. Gbamaile ngi yɛnga a wu kɛkɛ ajifa ji ngi wani a Ngowili Yekpei wu gama wu woteilɔ a Yesu Kristi woo.
46004016	Faale, ngi wu manɛnɛ, a nya wokɔɔ.
46004017	Sabui ji vamia ngi Timoti looma wu gama nya liima loo wɔnangɔi Kristi hu. A nya jiayii gbi hugɛlɔ ndɛvu ninɛi ji hu mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, na nga Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ gaa la hu gbi.
46004018	Wu lɛɛnga wua mata gbuama jifa wu langa la kɛ ngii wama vama wu ma.
46004019	Na hu gbi, Ndemɔi i lumangaa nga walɔ wu gama hugutungɔ, tawao na hu mia nya yekpe nga kpayei na lɔ i mamaniblɛi jisia wɛ, tawao njɛpɛ gbamɛi na ta nde ta ii le.
46004020	Ajifa numu i wuaanga Ngewɔ mahayɛi bu, numu a kɔɔ ngi wiehindei ma lɔ na ii le a nde.
46004021	Ji nga wa bi gama a fomɛi, ɔɔ ndoma yekpeihu kɛɛ hinda manɛɛnɛ, yee gbɔɔ bi longɔla?
46005001	Kiahuna tiaa vulii ndema tɛɛ puegbua hindeisia lɔ wiema wu lia, maluwangɔ wa na hii nasia vulii bɛɛ tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ tɛɛ pie. Ti hugɛnga a nge kɛ numui tia ngi kɛkɛ nyahɛi lɔ lama.
46005002	Kɛ wa yee na gu wu mata wie? Kia waa mata wie, mahoungɔ wu lii i nyani, tawao numui na a na nyɔkɔ wie, mahoungɔ wu ngi gbɛ wu wooma.
46005003	Tawao kia bɛɛ nya gbuhɛi maguhangɔ a wue, nyaa gilima a wue; tawao ji piengɔe bi tɔaa bɛɛ nya gbuhɛi lɔ miando wu lia tawao mu Lemɔi Yesu gbayei hu ngi wilanga a numui na lɛɛla i hinda maluwangɔi ji wienga. Ji wa gomɛ hinda yila piengɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ nyaa wu lia, mu Lemɔi Yesu gbayei hu,
46005005	wa yeenumui ji loko wuaalɔ Seitana yeya ngi gbuhɛi waava aako ngi yafei i bawo Kpɛmbo Volei na ma mu Lemɔi Yesu a wa.
46005006	Ii wɔnani wu va wu mamani wie! Wu njɛpɛwoi ji gɔɔlɔ: “Yisti wulo hii a pielɔ bledii gbi i ve i yɛ buufa.”
46005007	Mahoungɔ wu jumbu yisti wovei gbi wua wu ma aako wu yɛ vulii sɛwɛsɛwɛ. Na wiengaa kɛ wu wienga kia lɛwɛ lɔgbɔngɔ nina na yisti gbi ii hu, kia ngi kɔɔngɔ la vulii kɛ hii vulii wu na. Ajifa mu Lewema Gomɛi hugbatɛngɔe, kia na ti Kristi, mu Lewema Gomɛi yeembalɛi gbuanga a saa.
46005008	Faale a mu mu Lewema Gomɛi ga, kɛɛ muɛɛ ka a bledii na yisti wovei, jumbui kɛɛ pienyamui, i hu; ma ka a bledii na lɔ yisti gbi ii hu, sɛwɛsɛwɛi kɛɛ tɔnyɛi yeebledii.
46005009	Kɔlɛi na hu ngi nyɛini wu gama ngi ndeilɔ wu ma ngɛɛ waa gbɛɛ ngawufemablɛisia ma.
46005010	Ngii yɛpɛma nasia va tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ta puegbua hindei wie, ɔɔ ta maninyamu wie nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma, ɔɔ ta humɛi wie, ɔɔ ta hɛɛ nɔmɔliisia ma. Wua tieni waa gbɔ hinda gbi ma, kɛɛ ngii ndema ngɛ wu gbua dunyei hu feu.
46005011	Na nya lii i ma ji ngi kɔlɛi nyɛini tamia ngɛɛ waa gbɛɛ numui na ma a ta yekpe loli a wu mbaa Kristimɔ kɛɛ a puegbua hindei wie, ɔɔ a mani nyamu wie nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma, ɔɔ a hɛɛ nɔmɔliisia ma, ɔɔ a njafɛi wie, ɔɔ ndɔhoumɔɔ a ngie, ɔɔ a humɛi wie. Waa hei wua yeenumu bondɛi na waa mɛhɛɛ mɛ.
46005012	Nya yenge ii le kiti leweva nasia ma Kristimablaa yaa a tie, Ngewɔ lɔ a kiti lewe ti ma. Kɛɛ mahoungɔ wu kiti lewe wu mbaa Kristimableisia ma kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “A numu nyamui gbɛ i gbua wu lia.”
46006001	Wu yilayee ngi mbaa Kristimamɔi i hinda nyamu wiengaa a ngie, gbɛe a li a yeenjiɛi nasia gama tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti Kotii hu kia aa pie Ngewɔbleisia ti nde?
46006002	Wuii kɔɔ kɛ Ngewɔbleisia lɔ ti wama dunyei gbɛmboma? Kɛ ina wua lɔ wu wama dunyei gbɛmboma, wuɛɛ gu a njia mumuisia lela?
46006003	Wuii kɔɔ kɛ mua lɔ mu wama malikeisia gbɛmboma? Mahoungɔ le mu bɛɛ a kiahuna yiɛisia lela?
46006004	Njia bondɛi nasia ti gulangaa, wa li a tie nungei nasia lɔ gama toma ii ti yeya Ngewɔmableisia lia?
46006005	Wuɛɛ wufe? I gbɔu bɛɛ nɛmahulewemɔ yila a yɛlɔ wu lia a gu a njia lela Kristimableisia luahu.
46006006	Kia waa ji wie, Kristimamɔi lɔ lima a ngi mbaa Kristimamɔi nasia gama tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ, ta yeenjiɛi le.
46006007	Ji vulii Kotii yiangaa ta gula wu luahu a kɛlɔ kɛ wu gbuanga Kristi welei ma. Ɛɛ fesa wu va ti hinda nyamu wie a wue i lo wu ma? Ɛɛ fesa wu va ti wu gapu i lo wu ma?
46006008	Kia waa na wie, wua vulii wa nyamui lɔ wie a wu nyɔunyɔ tawao wa wu nyɔunyɔ gapu wu mbaa Kristimableisia vulii bɛɛ.
46006009	Wu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ nasia ta nyamu wie tɛɛ Ngewɔ mahayɛi majɔɔ. Waa wua yekpe gbowa; nungei nasia ta ngawufema hindei wie ɔɔ ta hɛɛ nɔmɔliisia ma ɔɔ ta pueigbua ɔɔ ta ti mbaa hingeisia jɔɔ,
46006010	ta humɛi wie, ɔɔ ta mani nyamu wie nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma, ɔɔ ndɔhoubleisia a tie, ɔɔ njafablaa, ɔɔ humablaa, jisia kpɛlɛɛ yeengila bɛɛ ɛɛ Ngewɔ mahayɛi majɔɔ.
46006011	Hii wɔɔ wu lɛɛnga wu yɛ na. Kɛɛ Kristi i jumbui wuanga wu ma wu yɛnga sɛwɛ, wu yɛnga a Ngewɔ woo; tawao wu yɛnga a pɔnablaa Ngewɔ gama, Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei biyei hu.
46006012	Nungaa ta ndelɔ tɛɛ, “Sawei ɛɛ mu maabali hinda gbi wieva.” Tɔnya le, kɛɛ hindei gbi ii le aa nyande. Nga gulɔ a ndela ngɛɛ Sawei lumangɔe nya wɛ hinda gbi wieva, kɛɛ ngɛɛ luma hinda gbi i nya yɛ a ngi luwɔ.
46006013	Numu wekei a ndelɔ yɛ, “Mɛhɛɛ i numu goi va lɔ, numu goi i mɛhɛɛ lɔ va.” Tɔnya le, kɛɛ folo yila Ngewɔ a ti veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ nyanilɔ. Numu gbuhɛi ii na ngayengeva puegbua hinda va, i na yengeva Ndemɔi lɔ wɛ; tawao Ndemɔi lɔ mahɛi le numu gbuhɛi maahu.
46006014	Ngewɔ i Ndemɔi vuliilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu, tawao ngi gbayei a mua bɛɛ vululɔ ndɛvu ninɛi va.
46006015	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu gbuhɛisia ti yɛni a Kristi gbuhɛi yeembekengaa lɔ. Mahoungɔe ngi Kristi gbuhɛi yeembeke yila wumbu ngi pote a puegbua nyahɛi gbuhɛi yeembeke? Na ɛɛ gu a wiela kulo bɛɛ!
46006016	A tɔnya wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ numui na a ngi luwui wili puegbua nyahɛi ndɛi hu i pienga tia ta ti yɛnga a kpuha yila. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeilɔ leiŋ yɛ, “Hindoi taa ngi nyahɛi ti veenjɔɔ ta yɛ a numu yila lɔ.”
46006017	Kɛɛ numui na a ta yekpe wili Ndemɔi hu tia ta ta yɛlɔ a yakpe.
46006018	A gbele puegbua hinda ma. Jumbu hinda weka gbi numu a pie ɛɛ hinda wie a ngi gbuhɛi kɛɛ numui na a puegbua hindei wie i jumbu wulinga ngi gbuhɛi vulii ma.
46006019	Wuii kɔɔ kɛ wu gbuhɛi i yɛni a Ngewɔ Yafei wɛlei lɔ, na i wu hu tawao Ngewɔ i feni wu wɛ? Wu woo yaa wua yekpe, Ngewɔ lɔ ngi woo a wue;
46006020	i wu yeyani a hani lɔ. Faale a wu gbuhɛisia yayenge Ngewɔ wɔlɔva.
46007001	Nyaa na yɛpɛma kɔlooni hindei nasia ma wu kɔlɔ nyɛini nya gama fa. A nyandelɔ hindo va ina ii nyaha jɔni gbi.
46007002	Kɛɛ jifa puegbua la gbotongɔ hu waa, mahoungɔe hindo gbi i ngi wuma nyahɛi jɔɔ, tawao nyaha gbi i ngi wuma hinii jɔɔ.
46007003	Mahoungɔ hindoi i ngi mayengei wie ngi nyahɛi gama, nyahɛi i ngi mayengei wie ngi hinii gama, ti veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti lapi ti ti nyɔunyɔ liima hindei wie.
46007004	Nyahɛi ii le ngi woo aa yɛ a ngi gbuhɛi, ngi hinii lɔ ngi woo a ngie; hii lɔɔ hindoi bɛɛ ii le ngi woo aa yɛ a ngi gbuhɛi, ngi nyahɛi lɔ ngi woo a ngie.
46007005	Waa ganga a wu nyɔunyɔ lava kɛlee wu pu ngooyila hu lɔwɔ wulo va aako wu Ngewɔ vɛli; kɛɛ i gbɔyɔngaa lekee wu yama lama. Wu ji wiengaa Seitana ɛɛ gu aa pie waa puegbua jumbu wie ajifa wue gbaha a wu huhoula.
46007006	Sawa ii le ngaa yɛ fema wu wɛ ji wieva; ngi wu laahimaa lekee ngɛɛ wu pie.
46007007	A tɔnya vulii ngaa lolɔ wu yilayee gbi i wie kia ngi na, kɛɛ Ngewɔ i numui gbi gɔni a kpaya ngilangila lɔ, numui ji ndɛi a ji, yeena ndɛi a na.
46007008	Nyaa na ndema hindo-gbawui ma kɛɛ nyaha gbawui, kɛɛ ponyahɛi ngɛɛ a fesalɔ wu va wu lo kpawuyei hu kia ngi na.
46007009	Kɛɛ ina wuɛɛ gu a wua yekpe huhoula kɛ hindoi i nyaha gɔli, nyahɛi i hini jɔɔ. Ji fesangɔ i lewe ji sɔɔ-manii a wu gbalɛ.
46007010	Sawa lɔ nya yeya nyahableisia tia hinibleisia va, nya ii le ngaa nda, Ndemɔi le. Nyahɛi aa gbele ngi hinii ma,
46007011	kɛɛ i gbelenga ngi ma, i lo kpawuyei hu, ina na ii le, i yama ti taa ngi hinii luahu gbatɛ tawao hinii aa gbele ngi nyahɛi ma.
46007012	Nyaa ndema yeemɔniisia ma, nya vulii, Ndemɔi ii le, Kristimamɔi yeehindoi i longaa a nyaha na Kristimamɔ ii le, tawao yeenyahɛi i lumangaa taa ta ti heilaa ma, maa ii houni hiindoi na i gbele ngi ma.
46007013	Tawao Kristimamɔi yeenyahɛi i longaa a hindo na Kristimamɔ ii le, tawao yeehindoi i lumangaa taa ta ti heilaa ma, maa ii houni nyahɛi na i gbele ngi ma.
46007014	Ajifa hindoi na Kristimamɔ ii le a yɛlɔ a Ngewɔ woo jifa taa ngi nyahɛi na Kristimamɔ a ngie ti wilingɔ hu, tawao nyahɛi na Kristimamɔ ii le a yɛlɔ a Ngewɔ woo jifa taa ngi hinii na Kristimamɔ a ngie ti wilingɔ hu. Ina ji ii yɛ hii, ti leengeisia taa yɛ a ndeengɛi nasia lɔ tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ; kɛɛ kia i hii, ti yɛngɔe a Ngewɔ woo.
46007015	Na hu gbi, numui na Kristimamɔ ii le i longaa i gbele ngi mbaa na ma Kristimamɔ le, i wie hii. Yeehinda bondɛi na hu, numui na Kristimamɔi a ngie yeehinii ɔɔ nyahɛi, nyaha-jɔɔ jawei ɛɛ gula ngi ma lumava sɔɛi na vayala ma. Ngewɔ i wu lolingalɔ heiva ndiilɛli hu.
46007016	Kristimamɔi yeenyahɛi, bɛɛ gu baa kɔɔ kɛ ba bi hinii bawolɔ? Ɔɔ Kristimamɔi yeehinii, bɛɛ gu baa kɔɔ kɛ ba bi hinii bawolɔ?
46007017	Wu yilayee gbi i luva a pelei na Ndemɔi i kɛnga a ngie kɛɛ yɛyii na wɔɔ i yɛ hu Ngewɔ i ngi lolini. Ji lɔ sawa le nga nungaa gaa la sɔsii kpɛlɛɛ hu.
46007018	Numui na ngi heingɔ biliya i Ngewɔ loli gulungaa, aa lapi bili yeekpoi gbuava ta yekpe ma; numui na ngi heingɔ ii le bili ya i Ngewɔ lolii gulungaa, aa pie ti ngi hei bili ya.
46007019	Gbamaile numu heingɔ i yɛla bili ya-o, ngi heingɔ ii le nga-o, gbɛogbɛ yaa na; na hindei yeembawa le tamia a Ngewɔ jaweisia houle.
46007020	Numu gbi i yɛ ngi yɛyii na hu i yɛ hu wɔɔ pɛiŋ i yaa Ngewɔ loli gulu.
46007021	Nduwɔ lɔ yɛla a bie ji Ngewɔ i bi lolini? Na aa gbewe bi ma, kɛɛ ina pele i yaa bi wɛ gbuava nduwɔyɛihu, bi yeepelei hou.
46007022	Gbamaile nduwɔi na Ndemɔi a ngi loli ii yɛni a nduwɔ Ndemɔi gulɔ; hii lɔɔ na, numu na nduwɔ ii yɛni a ngie piɛŋ na Kristi a ngi loli i yɛni a ngi luwɔ lɔ.
46007023	Ngewɔ i wu yeyani a hani lɔ, waa yɛ a nuuvungaa ti luwɔ.
46007024	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, numu gbi i vɛfɛ Ngewɔ ma kpaŋ tawao i lo ngi yɛyii hu kia lee i yɛ na wɔɔ Ngewɔ i ngi lolini.
46007025	Nyaa na yɛpɛma kɔlooni kɔlɛi na ma wu nyɛini nya gama ndalongɔ nasia ma nyaha ɔɔ hini ii ti yeya. Sawa ii nya yeya a gbua Ndemɔi gama kɛɛ nyaa nya nda nɛmahui gɛma jifa Ndemɔi i manunga nya ma, wa gulɔ a lala a nge.
46007026	Kpundɛi nasia va ti na kiahuna, nya langɔ la fesangɔe numu gbi i lo kia i na.
46007027	Ina nyaha lɔ bi yeya, kɛ baa lapi gbeleva ngi ma. Ina nyaha ii bi yeya; kɛ baa nyaha gɔli.
46007028	Kɛɛ bi nyaha jɔnga, jumbu hinda yaa na baa pie; tawao kpawu nyahɛi i hini jɔngaa, jumbu hinda yaa na aa pie. Kɛɛ ngaa lolɔ vulii fawɔli nasia ta nyahablaa kɛɛ hiniblaa male folo gbi aa wu male.
46007029	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, na nya lii i ma ta lɔ a ji: lɔwɔi ii yaa gbotoni i longa, faale, i hiye watii ji ma mahoungɔ nyahableisia ti luva bi tɔaa bɛɛ nyaha ii ti yeya;
46007030	nasia ta wɔɔ, ti pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ ti mamanungɔ ii le; nasia ta yɛlɛ, ti pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ ti goohu nɛngɔ ii le; nasia ta hani yeya, ti pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ ti woo yaa hani na ti ngeyani;
46007031	nasia ta dunyama gbateisia yayenge, ti pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ tii gbeweni fa. Ajifa kia dunyei yɛyii i na kiahuna, i gbɔyɔmaa hugutungɔ.
46007032	Nya longɔ ndiihɛlɛ gbi aa yɛ wu ma. Kpawu hindoi gbewengɔ Ndemɔi yengei lɔ va, ajifa a na gbi lɔ wie a gu ma Ndemɔi liilɛliva.
46007033	Kɛɛ nyahamɔi a gbewe dunyama hindei nasia lɔ va ta wie folo gbi, ajifa ngi longɔ i ngi nyahɛi liilɛli;
46007034	faale ngi lii yablangɔe. Kpawu nyahɛi ɔɔ mbɛlɛhu nyahɛi ta, Ndemɔi yengei lekee lɔ kpewengɔ a yɛla ngi ma ajifa ngi longɔ i ngi gbuhɛi kpɛlɛɛ ve Ndemɔi yengei wɛ; kɛɛ hinimɔi a gbewe dunyama hindei nasia lɔ va ta wie folo gbi ajifa ngi longɔ i ngi hinii liilɛli.
46007035	Ngi ji lemaa ajifa nya longɔ ngi gbɔ wu ma. Ngii lapima wu huyiliva a sawangaa. Kia ngaa na wie, nya longɔ wu na wie pɔɔnangɔ, a wu lii gbi Ndemɔi gama.
46007036	Hindoi taa nyahɛi ti Lahei wumbungaa heiva kɛɛ ti ndea tɛɛ taa sɔɔ wie, na wooma hindoi i kɔɔ kɛ taa hinda nyamu wiema a nyahɛi tawao i tɔ kɛ ta vulii ɛɛ yaa gu a ta yekpe huhoula faale mahoungɔ ti sɔɛi wie, kɛ ti pie, kia ngi longɔ la. Jumbu gbi ii ji hu.
46007037	Kɛɛ ina hindoi na, tii kpɔndani gbi ngi ma, i ngi lii huyilinga yɛ ɛɛ nyaha majɔɔ tawao i gu vulii a ta yekpe huhoula, i ngi nɛmahu gbatɛ gbɔɔ i piema, kɛ a nyandelɔ aa nyahɛi na jɔɔ.
46007038	Faale hindoi na a nyahɛi jɔɔ, i kpekpe lɔ wieni; kɛɛ hindoi na ɛɛ nyaha gbi jɔɔ i kpekpe lɔ wieni tewengɔ nyaha-jɔmɔi ma.
46007039	Hinimɔi gbɛɛngɔ ngi hini ma ina lekee ngi hini lɔ ndɛvu hu. Kɛɛ ngi hinii i haangaa, kɛ ngi hu i yɔkɔnga hini weka gbi jɔva ngi longɔ la, ina lekee ta bɛɛ Kristimamɔ lɔ a ngie.
46007040	Na hu gbi, i longaa ponyahayɛi hu ngi goohu a nɛɛlɔ i lewe na ma. Nya nɛmahuvɛi lɔ a ji tawao nya langɔe la kɛ nya bɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ a nya hitɛ pele ma.
46008001	Nyaa na yɛpɛma kɔlooni kɔlɛi na ma wu nyɛini nya gama ndalongɔ mɛhɛɛ na ma ta kpua a saa nɔmɔliisia ma. Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ mu gbi mu hinda hugɔɔlɔ, kia ta nde la. Na hu gbi, yeehinda hugɔɔlei ji a pielɔ numu yaama i lɛ; kɛɛ ndomɛi a pielɔ mu Kristimableisia mu wooyilɛi i gbaya.
46008002	Numui na a gili yɛ i hinda hugɔɔlɔ, ii na gɔɔ vulii mahoungɔ i kɔɔ.
46008003	Kɛɛ numui na ngi longɔ a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi gɔɔlɔ.
46008004	Faale naa, gbɛɛ ngi mɔli gbɛmbo kɔlooni mɛhɛɛ na ma ta kpua a saa nɔmɔliisia ma, mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ nɔmɔlii i yɛni a hani wokɔɔngɔ lɔ, tawao yeehani ii na gbi; mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ weka gbi ii na kɛlee Ngewɔ waa yakpe.
46008005	Ina bɛɛ, kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ta nde la, Ngewɔ wekangaa lɔ na, ti yɛ ngelegoohu ɔɔ dunyei hu, tawao kia bɛɛ yee ngewɔɛisia kɛɛ yeendeblɛisia ti gbotongɔe,
46008006	na hu gbi Ngewɔ i yakpe mu Kristimableisia wɛ, mu Kɛkɛ, na i hani gbi gbatɛni, na mu ngi va; tawao Ndemɔi i yakpe tamia a Yesu Kristi, na ngi va Ngewɔ i hani gbi gbatɛni a ngi loko, tawao mu vulungɔ ngi sabui hu lɔ.
46008007	Kɛɛ numui gbi ii le aa tɔnyɛi ji gɔɔ. Nɔmɔliisia ti hinda i Kristimableisia lɛɛngaa gɔnga wa wɔɔ, ti yeemɛhɛɛ bondɛi na mɛnga na, ti langɔ yɛla la lɛ lɔɔ kɛ nɔmɔlii ngi mɛhɛɛ mia; ti nɛmahu huhaangɔ tawao ta gili la kɛ yeemɛhɛɛ i ti nɔhɔnga Ngewɔ yaama.
46008008	Na hu gbi mɛhɛɛ ɛɛ mua Ngewɔ-ni mu luahui lɛ gulɔma; muii mɛhɛɛ mɛni bɛɛ, na ɛɛ gbɛogbɛ wie a mu luahui mua Ngewɔ-ni, tawao mu mɛhɛɛ mɛ bɛɛ, ɛɛ mu nafa a pele gbi.
46008009	A wu mahugbe, ajifa Ngewɔ lumangɔ wu mɛ mɛhɛɛ gbi mɛva kpaungɔ a saa nɔmɔliisia gama aa pie nasia ti nɛmahu huhaangɔ ti wili jumbu hu yee mɛhɛɛ mɛva.
46008010	Numui na ngi layii a Kristi huhaangɔ aa yɛ loi i wu lɔ wua wu gilingɔ la wu hinda hugɔɔlɔ, wa mɛhɛɛ na mɛ kpuangɔ a saa nɔmɔli wɛlei bu, wu ji wiengaa ji numu na ngi nɛmahu haanga a yɛna ɛɛ ngi liilo mɛhɛɛ na mɛva ti kpuanga a saa nɔmɔlingaa ma?
46008011	Faale na, wu mbaa Kristimɔ huhaangɔi ji Kristi i haani ngi va a jukulɔ bi hinda hugɔɔlei wooma.
46008012	Ji wiengaa kɛ wuaa jumbui wulima Kristi ma a ji wa jumbu wuli wu mbaa Kristimableisia ma, tawao wa ti nɛmahu huhaangɔi nyani.
46008013	Faale naa, mɛhɛɛ i piengaa nya mbaa Kristimamɔi i jumbu wie, kunafɔ ngɛɛ yaa mɛhɛɛ na mɛ ta kpua a saa nɔmɔlingaa ma, aako ngaa pie nya mbaa Kristimamɔi i jumbu wie.
46009001	Nya gbuangɔ nduwɔyɛi bu, nya tomɔ lɔ a nge tawao ngi Yesu mu Lemɔi lɔnga. Wu kpɛlɛɛ nya yengei Ndemɔi wɛ yeehuvɛi lɔ a wie.
46009002	Kia bɛɛ nungaa wekangaa tii lani la kɛ tomɔ lɔ a nge, wua wu langɔe la vulii! Ji wu yɛnga a Kristimableisia Ndemɔi hu, wua vulii lɔ tɔmaseli a wue kɛ tomɔi lɔ a nge.
46009003	Nungaa ti yaa nya magbuama, hii nga nya yekpe magao.
46009004	Pɔɔnangɔ ii le kɔɔ mu mɛhɛɛ majɔɔ kɛɛ hani kpɔliva mu yengei va?
46009005	Pɔɔnangɔe nya bɛɛ ngi ya li a nyahɛi na Kristimamɔ a ngie jiɛisiamii kia toblaa wekeisia kɛɛ Ndemɔi ndeengɛisia kɛɛ Pita-ni ta pie?
46009006	Mua Banabasi felekpe ii le mahoungɔ mu yenge navoo ma nguava mu mahindeisia hu?
46009007	Sojei yeegbɔɔ a ta yekpe ngi mapawɛi waa kɔɔ i yɛ ngi yengei hu? Kpalamɔi yegbɔɔ a tuhani hii ɛɛ yeenguɛi mɛ? Mbala lomɔi yeegbɔɔ ɛɛ ngi baalangɛisia ti nɔnɔi gboli?
46009008	Ngii tɔmaseli jisia gbuama nɛmahu ajifa Sawei i yeenjɛpɛ yakpei ji lɔ leni.
46009009	Nyɛingɔe Mojisi Jawei hu tɛɛ, “Nikɛi i yaa bi bei yangama, baa ngi lɛi yili.” Ngewɔ ii gbeweni nikɛi na vulii va?
46009010	Mua ii le ngi lii aa yɛ mu ma ji i na leni? Mɔlima ii ma, nyɛingɔ mua lɔ va ajifa mba-wumɔi a pulɔ, ngangamɔi i nganga, ta gili kɛ ta mbei majɔɔlɔ.
46009011	Mu ngafa yekpei hinga wu liisia hu ji mu yɛ a ngowili yekpei le. Maa ii houni mu dunyama hanisia yeekpekpeyei majɔɔ a wue?
46009012	Ina pɔɔnangɔe numu wekeisia va ti lii i yɛ wu ma kpekpeyei jisia majɔɔva a wue mu nda wɔnɛi ii leweni ti ndɛi ma? Na hu gbi mu yaa toni i pɔɔnɛi ji wooma. Kia ngaa na wie, ngi gunga hinda gbɔugbɔi gbi bu aako mu pie Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni Kristi ma i vaya hu.
46009013	Wu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ nungei nasia ta yenge Ngewɔ Wɛlei bu ta ti mɛhɛɛ jɔɔ a Ngewɔ Wɛlei lɔ tawao nasia ta yeesaaisia gbua saagbuamɛi, ta saahaniisia ti ndɛi majɔɔlɔ.
46009014	Hii lɔɔ Ndemɔi i sawa langa kɛ nasia ta Ngowili Yekpei le ta ti jɔɔ hanisia majɔɔ Ngowili Yekpei hu lɔ.
46009015	Kɛɛ ngii yaa toni nya lɔnyɛi ji wooma tawao ngii kɔlɛi ji nyɛima yeekpekpeyei jisia majɔɔva nya yekpe va. Ajifa mahoungɔ ngi haa kia numu aa nya baa a hani na nga lawoo la.
46009016	Sabu gbii na ngi lawo jifa lekee nga Ngowili Yekpei le; ajifa kpa lɔ nya ma ndeva. Gbamaile kpundɛ maluwangɔ waa a gulalɔ nya ma ina ngii Ngowili Yekpei leni!
46009017	Ina ngi yeengengei ji wiema a nya wuma we lɔ, nya lii aa yɛlɔ nya pawala ma; kɛɛ ngi piemaa jifa kpɔndangɔ nya ma, ajifa Ngewɔ i yeengengei ji loko wuaanga nya yeya.
46009018	Gbɔɔ nya pawɛi le? Tamia a ji ngi sabu majɔɔnga Ngowili Yekpei leva ngɛɛ hani gbi mɔli fa tawao ngɛɛ gbewe kpekpeyei nasia va mahoungɔ ngi majɔɔ Ngowili Yekpei leva.
46009019	Nduwɔ yaa nge, numu gbi luwɔ yaa a nge; kɛɛ ngi nya yekpe yɛnga a numui gbi ti luwɔ aako ngi yɛ a nungaa mato majɔɔ ti yɛ a Kristimableisia.
46009020	Ngi yaa Ngowili Yekpei lema Juuisia ma nga pielɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ Juumɔi mia a nge aako ngi gu ti ma; tawao kia bɛɛ nya vulii ngii Mojisi Jawei bu, nga pielɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ ngi mbu lɔ ji nga yɛ Ngowili Yekpei lema nasia ma ti mbu, aako ngi gu ti ma.
46009021	Hii lɔɔ nga pie ji nga yɛ yengema nasia Juu yaa tie ti lia, nga pielɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ Juumɔ yaa nge, ngii toni Juuisia ti Jawei wooma, aako ngi gu nasia ma Juumɔ yaa tie. Ji ii kɛni kɛ ngɛɛ Ngewɔ Jawei hou; ngi Kristi jawei bu lɔ vulii a tɔnya.
46009022	Ji nga yɛ nasia lia ti layii a Kristi ii gbayani, nga hawalɔ kia ti yilayee gbi i na, aako ngi gu ti ma. Faale nga wotelɔ a hani gbi numu gbi gama, aako ngi ti lɛɛnga bawo a pele gbi lekee nga gu la.
46009023	Nga ji gbi wielɔ Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu gbi, aako ngi yeelubɛi kulo majɔɔ.
46009024	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ piimɛblaa gboto lɔ ta wiimɛ mawali ma kɛɛ numu yakpe lɔ a gu yeemawaai ma. Mahoungɔ wu wiimɛi aako wu gu yeemawai ma.
46009025	Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i wili kaahu-looli nasia hu ta pie mawali ma, a makɛ kpaukpau waa lɔ wie aako i lewe ngi mbaangɛisia gbi ma. I lewengaa numui gbi ma, ta maha-bɔlɔ wɛlɛlɔ ngi wumba na ɛɛ lɛmbi panda. Kɛɛ mua ma pielɔ aako mu maha-bɔlɔ majɔɔ na ɛɛ nyani kunafɔ.
46009026	Famia nga piimɛi wie yakpe pɔɔnangɔ ngi fo kalɛi ma; famia nya wiengɔ kia bɔɔtani wilimɔi na ngi bɔɔtani ɛɛ gbula numu ma.
46009027	Nga nya magbatɛlɔ pandawanda pɛiŋ aako ngi ngowili yekpei leengaa nungaa wekeisia gama, taa nya vulii gbɛ na yeesawei nyaniva.
46010001	Nya longɔ i hitɛ wu wɛ, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, gbɔɔ i mu maadani nasia wieni ti toni wɔɔ Mojisi ma. Njagbili na yɛ ti gulɔ i yɛlɔ a ti mahugbe tawao ti gboyei na leweilɔ ta toli a Rɛd Sii hinda ii ti wieni.
46010002	Ti ti gbi wuailɔ njagbilii hu kɛɛ yeegboyei, ti wote a Mojisi woomablɛisia.
46010003	Ti kpɛlɛɛ ti mɛhɛɛ yakpei na mɛilɔ Ngewɔ i yɛ njei,
46010004	tawao ti gbi ti nja yakpei na gboli Ngewɔ i yɛ fe. Njɛi na ti kpɔleni i gbuani Ngewɔ gɔtii hu lɔ, tia yeekɔtii-ni ti lini, tawao yeekɔtii i yɛni a Kristi vulii lɔ.
46010005	Na hu gbi, ti gbotoma ti hinda ii yɛ nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ, faale ti haailɔ, ti womɛisia ti vayafaya ndɔgbɔ lambɛi ma gbi.
46010006	Kiahuna, ji kpɛlɛɛ i yɛni a ndahii lɔ mu va maa lo a hani nyamungaa kia ti pieni,
46010007	tawao maa hɛɛ nɔmɔlingaa ma kia ti lɛɛngaa ti pieni. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Nungeisia ti heiilɔ komɛ-mɛhɛɛ mɛma, kɛ yeekomɛi i wotenga a ndɔhou kɛɛ puegbua gomɛ waa.”
46010008	Maa ii houni kulo bɛɛ mu gbiti puegbua hinda ma kia ti lɛɛngaa ti pieni folo yakpei goohu ti tauji numu gbɔyɔngɔ maahu sawa ti gula ti haa.
46010009	Maa ii houni kulo bɛɛ mu Kristi layie gbuahu kia ti lɛɛngaa ti pieni, kaalingɛisia ti ti waa.
46010010	Maa ii houni mu gbonyɛ kia ti lɛɛngaa ti pieni numu Waa Malikei i ti waa.
46010011	Hindei jisia ti ti wieilɔ aako ti yɛ a tɔmaseli nungaa wekeisia va, tawao ti ti nyɛilɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu aako ti yɛ a ndahii mu va, ajifa mu watii ji magutungɔ waa le a dunyei gbɔyɔ-gbelei.
46010012	Numui na i gilima yɛ ngi layii a Ngewɔ gbayangɔe, i ngi mahugbe aa gula.
46010013	Kɔlɛya gbi lekee a wa wu gama, nyɔkɔ mia lɔɔ a wa nungaa gama. Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Lahei hu ɛɛ nyani tawao kɔɔlɛya aa wa wu maahu tewengɔ wu gahui ma. Watii na kɔɔlɛyɛi a wa wu gama, a wu gɔlɔ a kpayei na a pie wu gu mbu, i wu gbua-wele ve.
46010014	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia waa lukpe nɔmɔli vɛlila gbla.
46010015	Nyaa yɛpɛma wu gama kia nɛmahuleweblaa wua yekpe a kiti lewe na ma nga nde.
46010016	Bolei na ma yenge la Ndemɔi Gbɔkɔ Mɛhɛɛ mɛmɛi, ma siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma fa; ji ma ngulu-wua lɔi gboli hu, Kristi ŋamɛi tɛngaa mia ma kpɔle. Tawao bledii na ma ngaingai: mu mɛngaa, kɛ mua Kristi luwui mɛma.
46010017	Ajifa bledii gbuhɛi i yakpe, tawao kia bɛɛ mu gbotongɔ, mu kpɛlɛɛ kpuha yila lɔ a mue jifa ma bledii gbuha yakpei lɔ mɛ.
46010018	A gili lɛɛ a Isrelbleisia; nasia ta hani nasia lɛɛngaa mɛ kpuangɔ a saa, tia Ngewɔ-ni ti wilinga hu, saai na va ta kpua ngi ma saagbuamɛi.
46010019	Wu lii lɔ ma wue ngi ndeilɔ ngɛɛ hani gbi lɔ nɔmɔlii hu kɛɛ mɛhɛɛ na ta kpua a saa ngi ma?
46010020	Sawo! Na ngi ndema ta lɔ a ji kɛ hani na nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ta kpua a saa nɔmɔliisia ti jaa-gbuamɛi ti kpuama ngafa nyamungaa lɔ ma, Ngewɔ ii le; tawao ngii loni wu yɛ a ngafa nyamungaa ti mbangaa.
46010021	Wuɛɛ gu wu ngulu-wua lɔi gboli Ndemɔi bolei hu wu gbɔma kpɔle ngafa nyamungaa ti bolei hu; wuɛɛ gu wu hei Ndemɔi Gbɔkɔ Mɛhɛɛ gɔɔbu wu gbɔma hei ngafa nyamungaa ti nda gɔɔbu.
46010022	Ɔɔ mu longɔe mu pie Ndemɔi i tolo gbua? Mu gilingɔe la kɛ mu gbayani ngi ma?
46010023	Nunga ta ndelɔ tɛɛ, “Sawei ɛɛ mu maabali hinda gbi wieva.” Tɔnya le, kɛɛ hindei gbi ii le aa nyande. Sawei lumangɔe mu wɛ hinda gbi wieva, kɛɛ hindei gbi ii le a yɛ gbɔma Kristimableisia ma.
