46010024	Numu gbi aa ta yekpe lekee ngi gbekpeyei gɔli, mahoungɔ i ngi mbaangɛisia bɛɛ ti gbekpeyei gɔli.
46010025	Sawei lumangɔe wu wɛ ndahɛi gbi mɛva ta majia ndaahɛ majiamɛi, kiti gbi aa yɛ wu nɛmahu.
46010026	Ajifa kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ndemɔi lɔ ngi woo a dunyei kɛɛ hani gbi i hu.”
46010027	Numui na ii Ngewɔ gɔɔ i wu lolingaa mɛhɛɛ ma tawao wu luma wu li na, a na mɛ a hei wu gɔɔbu. Kiti gbi aa yɛ wu nɛmahu kɔlooni ma.
46010028	Kɛɛ numu i ndengaa wu ma yɛ, “Ti mɛhɛɛ ji gbuanga a saa nɔmɔliisia ma,” kɛ waa yeemɛhɛɛ na mɛ numui na va kɛɛ ngi nɛmahu va i hugɛni a wue
46010029	wu nda nɛmahu ii le, kɛ numu wekei na nɛmahu va. Numu yila a mɔlilɔ yɛ, “Kɛ gbɛe numui na ngi layii a Kristi huhaangɔ a pie ngɛɛ na wie ngi kɔɔngɔ pɔɔnangɔe?
46010030	Ngi siɛgbuangaa Ngewɔ ma nya mɛhɛɛ va, gbɛe numu gbi a nya magbua mɛhɛɛ na va nga siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma?”
46010031	Wu mɛhɛɛ mɛ ɔɔ wu ndɔ gboli ɔɔ wu gbɛogbɛ wie, a pie aako numui gbi ti Ngewɔ wɔlɔ.
46010032	A luva a pelei na ɛɛ pie Juungaa, ɔɔ nasia Juu yaa tie, ɔɔ Kristimableisia taa jumbu hinda wie.
46010033	A pie kia lɔɔ nga pie; nga lapilɔ numui gbi liilɛliva hinda gbi hu nga pie, ngɛɛ gili a nya nda gbekpeyei, nga gili a numui gbi ti ndɛi lɔ, aako ti mbawo majɔɔ.
46011001	A nya wokɔɔ hɔɔ, kia lɔɔ nga Kristi wokɔɔ la.
46011002	Nyaa wu latoma jifa kpelema gbi wuɛɛ lema nya luvayii ma tawao wa to kaai nasia wooma ngi tewenga wu gama.
46011003	Kɛɛ nya longɔ wu hugɔɔ kɛ Kristi mia i hindo gbi mahu, hinii mia ngi nyahɛi mahu, tawao Ngewɔ mia i Kristi mahu.
46011004	Faale hindoi na a yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima ɔɔ a yɛ Ngewɔ wowili lema Ngewɔ vɛli vahɛi ma ngi wui mawɛɛngɔ, i Kristi yawufenga.
46011005	Kɛɛ nyaha gbi lekee a yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima ɔɔ a yɛ Ngewɔ wowili lema Ngewɔ vɛli vahɛi ma ngi wui mawɛɛngɔ ii le, i ngi hinii yawufenga, ajifa nduahugɛ gbi ii ngi ma tia nyahɛi na ngi wui wolengɔ.
46011006	Nyahɛi ii ngi wui mawɛɛlɔ, mahoungɔ hɔɔ i ngi wui wole. Tawao jifa ngufema hinda le nyaha va i ngi wui wole ɔɔ i ngi wui maahu lewetewe, mahoungɔ i ngi wui mawɛɛ.
46011007	Sabu gbi ii na hindoi i ngi wui mawɛɛ ajifa hindoi gbatɛngɔ a Ngewɔ gbuayei lɔ tawao numu a Ngewɔ wɔlɔ yɛi lɔlɔ ngi hu. Kɛɛ nyahɛi a hindoi wɔlɔyɛi lɔlɔ ngi hu
46011008	ajifa hindoi ii gbuani nyahɛi hu nyahɛi lɔ i gbuani hindoi hu.
46011009	Tawao tii hiindoi gbatɛni nyahɛi va, nyahɛi lɔ ti ngi gbatɛni hindoi va.
46011010	Kɛɛ malikeisia tia ti va, mahoungɔ nyaha i ngi wui mawɛɛ kɛva kɛ i ngi hinii gbayei bu lɔ.
46011011	Na hu gbi kia mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, nyahɛi a gbewelɔ hindoi va kia lɔɔ hindoi a gbewe nyahɛi va.
46011012	Ajifa kia Ngewɔ i haala nyahɛi gbuani hindoi hu lɔ i kpatɛni, hii lɔɔ nyahɛi lɔ na a hindoi le; tawao Ngewɔ lɔ a hani gbi gbatɛ.
46011013	Wua yekpe a kiti lewe ina nyandengɔe nyaha i Ngewɔ vɛli faha lia hani gbi ii ngi wui ma.
46011014	Kia hindeisia ti na, wuɛ gaa kɛ ngugbitii i yɛni a ngufema hinda lɔ hindo va.
46011015	Kɛɛ i yɛni a nyande hani lɔ nyaha ta ngi va. Ngewɔ i njombo guhaguhɛi venga ngi wɛ ngi mawɛɛva.
46011016	Numu gbi longaa i ji hou a mawali, na lekee nga nde tamia a ji kɛ, mua kɛɛ Ngewɔ sɔsii wekeisia tɛɛ na nyɔkɔ wie Ngewɔ vɛlima.
46011017	Na hu gbi, njɛpɛi jisia ngi wama ndema wu ma, ngii wu latoma ajifa Ngewɔ vɛli gomɛi nasia wa pie tii wu yɛma a Kristimablaa yekpe, ti wu nyamumaa lekee.
46011018	Haala hindei, ti hugɛnga a nge kɛ ji wa gomɛ, wu luahu gɔlɛkɔlɛngɔe wa lapi luahu; tawao nya langɔe la kɛnga tɔnya le a ji.
46011019	I laailɔ ke kɛ nduahugɔɔleisia ta yɛlɔ wu lia aako wu nasia gɔɔ gbalauŋ ti lalei lɔnyangɔ.
46011020	Ji wa gomɛ hinda yila mɛhɛɛ mɛva, mɛhɛɛ ba mia wa mɛ, Ndemɔi Gbɔkɔ Mɛhɛɛ ii le.
46011021	Ajifa ji wa yɛ mɛhɛɛ mɛma, numu gbi a tɔtoo pɛiŋ a mɛla ngi mbaangɛisia ti yaa foo, famia ndɔlei a yɛ ti lɛɛngaa ma lɔ, ndɔi i yeenasia houngɔ.
46011022	Pɛlɛngaa tii wu yeya waa mɛhɛɛ mɛ na, wa ndɔ gboli? Wu longɔe wu lɛɛ Ngewɔ sɔsii hu, wu nungei nasia yawufe hinda gbɔungɔ ti laa? Gbɔɔ wu lii i nya ma ndeva wu ma kɔloongɔ ji ma? Mahoungɔe ngi wu lato? Sawo, ngɛɛ pie gbi!
46011023	Gbamaile kaai na ngi teweni wu gama, ngi majɔɔni a Ndemɔi lɔ, tamia a kpindi na ti yɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu vema, i Bledii gbuha yila wumbuilɔ,
46011024	i siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma, i ngaingai yɛ, “Nya gbuahɛi lɔ, na i na wu va. A Bledii ji mɛ nya hinda hitɛva wu wɛ.”
46011025	Hii lɔɔ kpɔkɔ mɛhɛɛ mɛngɔi wooma i ndɔ bolei wumbuni yɛ, “Ngewɔ hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi lɔ nya ŋamɛi hu. Watii gbi lekee wu ndɔi ji gbolingaa, a kpɔle nya hinda hitɛva wu wɛ.”
46011026	Ji i kɛilɔ kɛ watii gbi lekee wu bledii ji mɛngaa, wu ndɔi ji gboli bolei ji hu, wuaa Ndemɔi haalei hitɛma nungaa wɛ haaŋ i lohu i wa.
46011027	Ji i kɛilɔ kɛ numu i Ndemɔi bledii mɛngaa, i ndɔi gboli ngi bolei hu, a pelei na a baa gbua Ndemɔi ma, kɛ i jumbu wulinga Ndemɔi gbuhɛi ma kɛɛ ngi ŋamɛi.
46011028	Faale na, mahoungɔ numu gbi i ta yekpe lii hugbee pɛiŋ i yaa yeebledii mɛ, tawao i yeendɔi gboli yeebolei hu.
46011029	Ajifa ii kɔɛilɔ pɛiŋ kɛ bledii na kɛɛ ndɔi ti Ndemɔi gbuhɛi na va lɔ i feni a saahanii mu va, i yeebledii mɛngaa, i yeendɔi gboli, Ngewɔ a kpalɛ lalɔ ngi ma.
46011030	Na vamia wu gbotoma wu heegbɛngɔ, tawao wu lɛɛnga wu haanga.
46011031	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ ɛɛ kpalɛ la mu ma ina mu mu liisia hugbeilɔ pɛiŋ mu yaa Ndemɔi Gbɔkɔ Mɛhɛɛ mɛ.
46011032	Kɛɛ Ndemɔi a mu lɛɛlɔ i kpalɛ la mu ma aako aa mu gbɛmbo mua nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ.
46011033	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu gomɛngaa Ndemɔi Gbɔkɔ Mɛhɛɛ mɛva, a wu nyɔunyɔ mawulo.
46011034	Tawao ndɔlei i yaa numu gbi ma, mahoungɔ i mɛhɛɛ mɛ pɛiŋ ngi yeekuwuhu aako Ngewɔ gbɛmbui aa la wu ma ji wa gomɛ hinda yila. Njɛpɛ wekei nasia pungɔ wu gɔlɛi hu, nga ti lelɔ ji nga wa.
46012001	Nyaa na yɛpɛma kɔloongɔ na ma wu kɔlɔ nyɛini fa, tamia a hani nasia Ngewɔ Yafei a fe gbama. Nya longɔ wu tɔnyɛi gɔɔ kɔlooni ti ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia.
46012002	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ watii na wuii yɛ lɛ Ngewɔ gɔɔ, ti wu yakɛilɔ hɛɛva nɔmɔli haangɔngaa ma.
46012003	Nya longɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ numu gbi ii na Ngewɔ Yafei a pele gɛ a ngie aa gu a ndela yɛ, “Yesu jondungɔe!” Tawao numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ndela yɛ “Yesu lɔ Ndemɔi le” kɛlee Ngewɔ Yafei i pele gɛ a ngie.
46012004	Hani nasia Ngewɔ Yafei a fe gbama yeelasii gbotongɔe, kɛɛ Ngafa yakpei mia a ti ve.
46012005	Tawao pele gboto lɔ na yengeva kɛɛ numui gbi ta yenge Ndemɔ yakpei lɔ wɛ.
46012006	Mu guyii a yengela mahɔngɔ ii le kɛɛ Ngewɔ yakpei lɔ a kaahui ve numu gbi wɛ nga yenge va.
46012007	Ngewɔ Yafei yeetɔmaseli lɔ numu kpɛlɛɛ hu, Kristimableisia gbi ti gbekpeyei va.
46012008	Ngewɔ Yafei a numu yila gɔlɔ a nɛmahulewe yɛpɛva, yee-Ngafa yakpei i numu wekei gɔ a nɛmahulewe na hinda-hugɔɔla va.
46012009	Ngafa yakpei ji a pielɔ numu yila i kpaya majɔɔ lava a Ngewɔ, i yeepekei gɔ a kpaya heegbɛblaa bawova.
46012010	Ngafei a numu yila gɔlɔ a kpaya kabandeisia wieva; i yeepekei gɔ a kpaya Ngewɔ wowili leva; i gbɔma yeepekei gɔ a kpaya ngafangaa luahu gɔva. A numu yila gɔlɔ a kpaya kɛnyɛyia weka gboto leva, i pekei gɔ a kpaya kɛnyɛyiɛisia fasaiva.
46012011	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafa yakpei mia a ji kpɛlɛɛ ve; kia a nɛɛ la ngi wɛ, a numu gbi gɔlɔ a hani i gba ngi mbaangɛisia ti ndɛisia ma.
46012012	Kristi gbuangɔ a numu gbuha yila lɔ, mbeke gboto i ngi ma; nasia tii kɛni kɛ, numu gbuha gboto mia a ngie, numu gbuha yakpe mia a ngie, kia bɛɛ ngi gbatɛngɔ a mbeke gboto.
46012013	Hii lɔɔ mu gbi, mu yɛ a Juungaa ɔɔ nasia Juu yaa tie, nduwɔngaa ɔɔ nasia nduwɔ yaa tie, Ngafa yakpei na i mu wuanga a Ngewɔ yei mu yenga a kpuha yila, tawao Ngafa yakpei ji i wunga mu liisia hu.
46012014	Gbamaile numu gbuhɛi ii gbatɛni a mbeke yakpe, taa ngi ma kpoto.
46012015	Ina kɔwɔi i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Jifa toko yaa a nge, ngii kpuhɛi ma,” na ɛɛ pie aa gbua mbeke ma.
46012016	Tawao ina numu wolii i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Jifa ngaama yaa a nge, ngii numu gbuhɛi ma,” na ɛɛ pie aa gbua kpuhɛi ma.
46012017	Ina numu gbuhɛi gbi i yɛni lekee a ngaama yila lɔ, aa yee njia mɛni? Tawao kiaa i yɛni a ngoli yakpe lɔ, aa yee gu a hani gu mɛnila?
46012018	Kɛɛ tɔnyɛi a ji lɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i numu gbuhɛi yeehani gbi wuilɔ mia ngi longɔ i pu na.
46012019	Numu gbuhɛi a yee yɛ na ina kpɛlɛɛ gbatɛngɔ a mbeke yakpe lɔ?
46012020	Tɔnyɛi a ji lɔ kɛ yeembeke gbotongɔe kɛɛ numu gbuhɛi i yakpe.
46012021	Faale na, ngaamɛi ɛɛ gu aa nde tokoi ma yɛ, “Ngii gbeweni bi va!” Tawao ngui bɛɛ ɛɛ gu aa nde kɔwɔi ma yɛ, “Ngii gbeweni bi va.”
46012022	I gbua na ma, mahoungɔ mu mbekei nasia majɔɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ tii gbayani;
46012023	tawao yeembekei nasia mu baa gɔɔ ti ma, tia mia ma ti mahugbe, yeembekei yeenasia tii nyandeni ma wufe a yɛpɛlaa kɔloongɔ,
46012024	tawao mu mbeke yeenyandemɛisia maa i houni mu ti mahuwɛɛ. Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i numu gbuhɛi yangɔyɔnga i kpatɛnga a pelei na hii bagɔma veva mbeke nasia wɛ tii gbeweni fa.
46012025	Faale na, numu mbekei luahu gɔlɛngɔ ii le, kɛɛ yeembekei-hanisia gbi ti gbewengɔe ti nyɔunyɔ va kia ti piengɔ a tia yekpe.
46012026	Numu mbekei yeehinda yila i gbalɛngaa, tia mbekei hani wekeisia kpɛlɛɛ mia ta gbalɛ; yeehani yila i tato majɔɔngaa, yeehani-hani wekeisia lɔ ta ngi goohunɛɛi wie.
46012027	Wu kpɛlɛɛ Kristi gbuhɛi lɔ a wue, tawao ngi gbuhɛi yeembekei lɔ a wu yilayee gbi.
46012028	Kristimableisia lia Ngewɔ i numui gbi longa tomɛi na ngi bɛngɔ na. I haala lomɛi veni ngi loblɛisia lɔ wɛ, i yeefelei ve ngi lutuisia we, i yeesawei ve kaamɔisia wɛ; na wooma nasia ta kabande hindeisia wie, kɛɛ a nasia ta heegbɛisia bawo ɔɔ ta gbɔ nungaa wekeisia ma ɔɔ tokulɔbleisia ma ɔɔ ta kɛnyɛyia wekangaa gboto le.
46012029	Numui kpɛlɛɛ ii le taa yɛ a toblɛisia, ɔɔ Ngewɔ lutungaa ɔɔ kaamɔngaa. Numui gbi ii le kpaya aa yɛ ngi wɛ kabande hindangaa wieva
46012030	ɔɔ heegbɛisia bawova ɔɔ yɛpɛva kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu ɔɔ yeekɛnyɛyiɛisia fasaiva.
46012031	A gbewe hani yeebawai nasia va Ngewɔ Yafei a fe gbama. Tawao nga pele gɛlɔ a wue kpekpengɔ waa i lewe kpɛlɛɛ ma.
46013001	Kia bɛɛ nga gulɔ a yɛpɛla nuuvungaa ti layiesia hu kɛɛ malikeisia ti ndɛi, kɛɛ ina ndoma ii nya lii hu, nya layie a yɛ a sɔlewoo gbama lɔ ɔɔ bamande jɔlɛwoo.
46013002	Kia bɛɛ kpaya lɔ mbɛ ngowili yɛpɛisia hugɛva; kia bɛɛ ngi hindei gbi hugɔɔlɔ, ngi ndɔwuma hindei kpɛlɛɛ hugɔngɔ; kia bɛɛ nya layii a Ngewɔ a pielɔ ngi gu a ngiye waawangaa gulela, kɛɛ ina ndoma ii nya lii hu, gbɛogbɛ yaa a nge.
46013003	Kia bɛɛ nga nya yeya-hani kpɛlɛɛ velɔ nungaa wɛ gbama tawao kia bɛɛ nga nya gbuhɛi velɔ ngɛɛ ti mɔ, kɛɛ ndoma i yɛlɔ nya lii hu, ngɛɛ nafa gbi jɔɔ hu.
46013004	Ndoma a gulɔ kpalɛ bu huguhangɔ tawao ngi hindawandangɔ ɛɛ tolo gbua, ɛɛ lawo, ii mamanini;
46013005	ndoma ii makɛvɛlini, ɛɛ ta yekpe ngi gbekpeyei lekee gɔli, ngi lii ɛɛ lewe fulo, ndoma ɛɛ nyamu lamagbatɛ ngi lii hu;
46013006	ndoma goohu ɛɛ nɛɛ nyamu maahu kɛɛ a goohunɛɛlɔ tɔnyɛi maahu.
46013007	Ndoma ɛɛ gbaha; a pielɔ muɛɛ gbe a lala a Ngewɔ, muɛɛ gbe a liilolaa, muɛɛ gbe a mu lii houla.
46013008	Ndoma ɛɛ gɛlɛ. Kulɔma yia yɛpeisa tɛɛ lɛmbi; kɛnyɛyia wekeisia lelaa hu a lewelɔ; ngafa yekpe hinda hugɔɔlei a gbɔyɔlɔ.
46013009	Ajifa kpayei na Ngewɔ Yafei i feni mu wɛ hinda hugɔva kɛɛ kulɔma yia leva ngakpuangɔ ii le;
46013010	kɛɛ kpemei na yeengakpuangɔi a wa, yeena ngakpuangɔ ii le a lolɔ hu.
46013011	Watii na ngi yɛ ndopoyɛi hu, ngi yɛ yɛpɛlɔ kia ndopo, ndopo lii i nya goohu, nga gili kia ndopo; kɛɛ kiahuna na ngi lakpangaa, ngi ndopo hindei kpɛlɛɛ gulanga.
46013012	Na mu tɔma kiahuna kpuangɔ a numu magbindingɔ lɔ mɛmɛɛ hugbindingɔ hu; kɛɛ Kristi wangɔi hu, ma ngi lɔlɔ gbalauŋ. Na ngi kɔɔngɔ kiahuna, kɛlɛngɔe; kɛɛ a watii na, nda a velɔ, ndavengɔ kia Ngewɔ i nya gɔngɔ la.
46013013	Kia hindeisia ti na kiahuna, hinda sawei jisia lɔ na: lala a Ngewɔ kɛɛ liiloma kɛɛ ndoma; kɛɛ na tewengɔ ti kpɛlɛɛ ma tamia a ndoma.
46014001	Ndoma lɔ hɔɔ mahoungɔ wu lapi wu majɔɔ. A wu lii wu hani yekpei nasia hinda hu Ngewɔ Yafei a fe gbama, aako wu Ngewɔ wowili vulii le.
46014002	Numui na a yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu, ɛɛ yɛpɛ nungaa wekeisia gama, a yɛpɛ Ngewɔ lɔ gama, ajifa numu gbi ɛɛ ngi layie mɛni. I tɔnya lɔwungɔi lɔ hugɛma Ngewɔ Yafei hu.
46014003	Kɛɛ numui na a Ngewɔ wowili hugɛ a yɛpɛ nungaa lɔ gama a gbɔ ti ma, a ti lii gba, a ti nɛpɔ.
46014004	Numui na a yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu a gbɔ ta yekpe lekee lɔ ma, kɛɛ numui na a Ngewɔ wowili le a gbɔ Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ lɔ ma.
46014005	Nya longɔe wu kpɛlɛɛ wu yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekeisia hu kɛɛ na vulii nya longɔ la tamia a ji wa kpaya majɔɔ Ngewɔ wowili hugɛva. Ajifa numui na a Ngewɔ wowili hugɛ, bagɔma lɔ ngi ma i lewe numui na ma a yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu kɛlee numu i yɛ ngaama a gu i ngi layieisia fasai aako Kristimableisia gbi ti kpɔma majɔɔ.
46014006	Faale, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngi wangaa wu gama, kpekpeyei yeegbɔɔ nga pie a wue ina ngi yɛpɛilɔ kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu? Ngɛɛ kpekpeya wulo bɛɛ wie, kɛlee ngi wa wu gama a hinda lɔwungɔ Ngewɔ i hugɛnga a nge ɔɔ nya hinda hugɔngɔ ɔɔ Ngewɔ wowili ɔɔ kaa.
46014007	A gili lɛɛ a ngaihani nasia ndɛvu ii ti hu, kia nyɔkɔ koolei na ɔɔ mbakɛi numu a yee ngulei na gɔɔ ti ngaama kɛlee ti ngai vulii, hu yaa loke?
46014008	Tawao ina bulu vɛmɔi ii kɔ-bulii vɛni hu yaa loke, ye lɔ a ngi magbatɛ kɔ va?
46014009	Hii gbɔma, numu a yee hindei na gɔɔ bi yɛpɛma kɔlooni ma ina bi wowili na bi ndenga kɛnyɛyia weka hu lɔ numu ɛɛ gu i humɛi gbalauŋ? Fɛfɛi lɔ a li a bi layieisia!
46014010	Kɛnyɛyia ngilangilɛi gbotongɔe dunyei hu, na hu gbi yeengila bɛɛ ii na nungaa tɛɛ humɛni.
46014011	Kɛɛ ina ngii kɛnyɛyiɛi na gɔɔ ti ndema, numui na i ndema a yɛ a kɛnyɛmɔ lɔ nya gama, nya bɛɛ kɛnyɛmɔ a nge ngi gama.
46014012	Jifa wu haamingɔ waa hani nasia va Ngewɔ Yafei a fe gbama, a lapi vulii wu yenge waa a yeenasia ta gbɔ Kristimableisia ma.
46014013	Numui na a yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekeisia hu, mahoungɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli i kpaya jɔɔ ngi layieisia fasaiva.
46014014	Ajifa ngi Ngewɔ vɛlingaa kɛnyɛyia weka hu kɛ nya yafei lɔ Ngewɔ vɛlima vulii kɛɛ nya nɛmahui nda gbi ii ma.
46014015	Gbɔɔ hɔɔ mahoungɔ ngi pie? Nga Ngewɔ vɛlilɔ a nya yafei, kɛɛ nga ngi vɛlilɔ gbɔma a nya nɛmahui bɛɛ; nga wulelɔ a nya yafei kɛɛ nga wulelɔ gbɔma a nya nɛɛmahui bɛɛ.
46014016	Bi siɛgbuangaa Ngewɔ ma a bi yafei lekee, numu gbamɛi na wua tieni wu gomɛnga a yee nde yɛ Amiina bi jiɛgbua Yewɔ vɛlilei ma? Pele gbii na kɔɔva gbɔɔ bi ndema.
46014017	Kia bɛɛ bi jiɛgbua Yewɔ vɛlilei nyandengɔ waa le, ɛɛ gbɔ numu wekei na ma kulo bɛɛ.
46014018	Ngi siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ajifa nga yɛpɛ pɛɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia weka hu i lewe wu gbi ma.
46014019	Kɛɛ mu gomɛngaa Sɔsiihu, nga yɛ loni ngi njɛpɛ lɔɔlu le na nungaa ta gu a humɛnila aako ngi nungaa wekangaa gaa la kia ngaa njɛpɛ tauji puu le kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu.
46014020	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, waa gili kia ndopo mumungaa ta pie. A yɛ a ndopo mumungaa jumbu wielei hu kɛɛ a yɛ a kpakolongaa kilii nasia hu wa pie.
46014021	Nyɛingɔe Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu tɛɛ Ndemɔi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Nga lalɔ kɛnyɛblaa wekangaa hu ta kɛnyɛyia wekangaa le, ngi yɛpɛ nya nungeisia gama, kɛɛ na hu gbi nya nungeisia tɛɛ wolo nya ma,”
46014022	Faale na, kpayei na a pie numu i gu a kɛnyɛyia wekangaa lela i yɛni a seli lɔ nasia va tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ, Kristimableisia va ii le, tawao kpayei na a pie numu i gu a ngowili yekpei lela i yɛni a seli lɔ Kristimableisia va, nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti va ii le.
46014023	Faale na Kristimableisia ti gomɛngaa hinda yila numui gbi ti tɔtoo a yɛpɛla kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu, tawao ina numu wekangaa ɔɔ nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti wuaailɔ na, tɛɛ nde taa yɛma wu kpɛlɛɛ wu gbowangɔe?
46014024	Kɛɛ numui gbi ti yaa Ngewɔ wowili lema watii numui na ii lani a Ngewɔ i wuaa na, na a mɛni a pielɔ i la la kɛ jumbumɔ lɔ a ngie. Na kpɛlɛɛ a mɛni a pielɔ ngi lii i ngi gbɛmbo.
46014025	Kili malɔwungɔi nasia ti ngi liihu ta gbualɔ foofo ya, tawao a mawɛɛlɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli, a gaye yɛ, “A tɔnya, Ngewɔ lɔ mbei wu lia!”
46014026	Ji mia nya lii i ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia. Wu gomɛngaa Ngewɔ vɛliva, ngulei a yɛ numu yila lɔ yeya kpuava, kaai i pekei yeya, hinda gɛngɔi yila i yeepekei yeya, ngowili lelei kɛnyɛyia wekeisia hu i yeena ma, fasailei i yeepekei ma. Mahoungɔ kpɛlɛɛ i yɛ a kpɔma Kristimableisia gbi va.
46014027	Ina numu i yɛpɛmaa kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu, numu fele ɔɔ sawa lɔ ta yɛpɛ a ngilangila, aa lewe na ma, tawao numu weka a yɛlɔ na a na fasai ta nde.
46014028	Kɛɛ ina numu gbi ii na aa gu a na fasaila ta nde kɛ mahoungɔ numui na a yɛpɛ kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu i londo, i yɛpɛ ta yekpe gama kɛɛ Ngewɔ.
46014029	Mahoungɔ tutungaa fele ɔɔ sawa ti yɛpɛ, kɛ yeepekeisia ti kiti lewe na ma ta nde.
46014030	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i ngowili yeingaa numu yila ma komɛi na hu, mahoungɔ numui na i yɛpɛma, i gbe a yɛpɛla.
46014031	Wu kpɛlɛɛ wa Ngewɔ wowili hugɛlɔ a ngilangila aako numui gbi ti gaa tawao ti kpɔma majɔɔ.
46014032	Ngewɔ wowili lela yeekpayɛi a yɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia ti gbayei bu lɔ,
46014033	ajifa Ngewɔ ii loni a ji mu woo a vaya hu Sɔsiihu kɛ ji ma yɛ ndiilɛli hu. Kia a wie la Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ lia hinda gbi,
46014034	mahoungɔ nyahangɛisia ti maa i yɛ louŋ Ngewɔ vɛli gomɛisia hu. Maa i houni ti yɛpɛ, kia Juuisia ti jawei ndeni la, maa ii houni ti yɛ komɛ maahu.
46014035	Hinda i yɛngaa na ti longɔ ti kɔɔ, ti ti hinii mɔli pɛleibu. Ngufema hinda le nyaha va kɔ i yɛpɛ Ngewɔ vɛli gomɛ hu.
46014036	Kɛ Ngewɔ wowili i gbuani wua lɔ gama? Ɔɔ wua lekee lɔ i fonga wu ma?
46014037	Numu gbi i gilingaa yɛ Ngewɔ lutu lɔ a ngie ɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei i kpaya venga ngi wɛ, mahoungɔ i kɔɔ kɛ ji ngi nyɛima wu gama i yɛni a Ndemɔi jawei lɔ.
46014038	Kɛɛ ii woloilɔ ji ma ngi nyɛima, waa wolo ngi ma.
46014039	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a wu lii wu Ngewɔ wowili lela hu kɛɛ waa nungaa maabali ji ta yɛ yɛpɛma kɛnyɛyia wekangaa hu.
46014040	Mahoungɔe hindei gbi i wie panda tawao ndangɔ pele ma.
46015001	Kiahuna na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nya longɔ ngi Ngowili Yekpei hitɛ wu wɛ, na ngi ndeni wu ma, na wu majɔɔni, tawao wu langɔ la kpauŋ.
46015002	Tia mia a Ngowili Yekpei na ngi ndeni wu ma ngɛɛ a wu yafeisia bawolɔ ina wu houilɔ mba kpaŋ, kɛlee wu lalei a Kristi i yɛ a baaba hinda.
46015003	Na ngi majɔɔni ngi teweilɔ wu gama, tawao ta lɔ bagɔma i ma i lewe hindei gbi ma, a ji: kɛ Kristi i haailɔ mu jumbuisia va, kia nyɛingɔ la Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu;
46015004	kɛ ti ngi gbɔwuilɔ tawao kɛ Ngewɔ i ngi vuluilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu lɔwɔi yeesawei ma, kia nyɛingɔ la Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu;
46015005	kɛ i gɛilɔ a Pita, na wooma i gɛ a toblaa puu maahu feleisia kpɛlɛɛ.
46015006	Na wooma i gɛilɔ a ngi woomablɛisia ti lewengɔ hɔndɔ lɔɔlu ma a leenga, tawao ti gbotoma tiaa heini lɛ, kia bɛɛ ti lɛɛngaa ti haanga.
46015007	Na wooma i gɛilɔ a Jemisi, i yama i gɛ a toblɛisia kpɛlɛɛ.
46015008	Kɛlɛmɛi gbɔma, i gɛilɔ a nya bɛɛ, kia bɛɛ nya gbuangɔ a numui na ti ngi leni watii na maa ii houni ti ngi le.
46015009	Gbamaile bagɔma i toblaa kpɛlɛɛ ma i lewe nya ma, nya maa ii houni bɛɛ nya loliva a tomɔ ajifa ngi juwuya hitɛilɔ Ngewɔbleisia wooma.
46015010	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ yauwandei va ngi yɛnga hii kia ngi na, tawao ngauwandei na i pieni a nge ii pilini. Ngi yengenga kpaukpaungɔ i lewe toblaa wekeisia kpɛlɛɛ ma kia bɛɛ ii yeni a nya vulii nya wiehinda kɛlee Ngewɔ yauwandei na yengema nya hu.
46015011	Faale na, i yɛ a nya ngi Ngowili Yekpei le wu ma ɔɔ tia, Ngowili yakpei mia mu gbi ma nde tawao tamia wu langɔ la.
46015012	Kiahuna, ina mu wowili i yɛni a ji lɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Kristi vuluilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu, wu lɛɛngaa wa yee gu wu nde wuɛɛ haablɛisia tɛɛ vulu taa hiye hee hu?
46015013	Ina haablaa tɛɛ hiye hee hu, kɛ Ngewɔ ii Kristi wumbuni hee hu,
46015014	tawao ina Ngewɔ ii Kristi wumbuni hee hu, kɛ mu wowili lelei i yɛni a baaba gbama lɔ tawao kɛ wu lala la i yɛni a gbama hinda lɔ.
46015015	Tewengɔ na ma, kɛ mua ndɛɛ gulama Ngewɔ ma, ajifa mu ndeilɔ muɛɛ i Kristi vuluilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu; kɛɛ ina tɔnya le kɛ haablɛisia tɛɛ vulu taa hiye hee hu, kɛ ii Kristi wumbuni hee hu.
46015016	Gbamaile ina haablɛisia tɛɛ hiye hee hu, kɛ Ngewɔ ii Kristi bɛɛ wumbuni.
46015017	Tawao ina Ngewɔ ii Kristi wumbuni hee hu, kɛ wu lalei a Kristi i yɛni a baaba gbama lɔ tawao kɛ wuaa lekee jumbui luwɔyɛi hu.
46015018	A gɛlɔ gbɔma kɛ nasia ti lani a Kristi kɛɛ ti haanga, ti jukulunga.
46015019	Ina ndiiloi na mu piengɔ Kristi ma kpekpengɔ ndɛvui ji va lekee lɔ, peka gbi ii poma, kɛ mu mamanungɔe i lewe numu weka gbi ma dunya.
46015020	Kɛɛ tɔnyɛi a ji lɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Kristi vuluilɔ i ngi wumbu hee hu kɛva kɛ nasia ta haa Ngewɔ a tia bɛɛ wumbulɔ hee hu.
46015021	Ajifa kia lɔɔ numu yila i pieni hee i wani numui gbi va, hii lɔɔ numu yila lɔ a pie haablaa ti hiye hee hu.
46015022	Gbamaile kia lɔɔ numui kpɛlɛɛ ta haa jifa ti wilingɔ Adam hu, hii lɔɔ ti kpɛlɛɛ ta vulu ti hiye hee hu jifa ti wilingɔ Kristi hu.
46015023	Kɛɛ numu a hiye hee hu a ngi nda hiye-gbelei lɔ, Kristi yese pɛiŋ, na wooma kpemɛi a wa, nasia ngi woo a tie ta hiyelɔ.
46015024	Na wooma, dunyei gɛlɛ-gbelei a hitilɔ; Kristi a ngafa nyamuisia yeemahangeisia nyanilɔ kɛɛ yeemahublɛisia kɛɛ yeekpayablɛisia, i mahayɛi loko wuaa ngi Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ yeya.
46015025	Gbamaile mahoungɔ Kristi i lo mahayɛi ma haaŋ Ngewɔ i wɛlɛ juwuisia kpɛlɛɛ maahu, i ti wuaa ngi bu.
46015026	Ngewɔ juwui yeekɛlɛmayei a wɛlɛ maahu talɔ a hee.
46015027	Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Ngewɔ i hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaailɔ ngi gɔwɔ bu.” I laailɔ ke kɛ kia i ndeni yɛ “Hani Kpɛlɛɛ,” na ii gbɛlɛni Ngewɔ ma, na i hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaani Kristi bu.
46015028	Kɛɛ watii na Ngewɔ a hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaa Kristi mahayɛi bu, yeewatii mia ta vulii, Ngewɔ Hindoloi a ngie, a ta yekpe wuaa Ngewɔ bu, na i hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaani ngi bu; kɛ hani kpɛlɛɛ i wuaanga Ngewɔ mahayɛi bu.
46015029	Ɔɔ gbɛe vamia ta nungei nasia wua a Ngewɔ yei a haablɛisia ti jɔngɔ? Gbɔɔ ti lii i ma pieva? Ina tɔnya le, kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ta nde la, kɛ Ngewɔ ɛɛ haablɛisia wumbu hee hu, gbɛe ti nungei nasia wuama haablɛisia va?
46015030	Kɛɛ mua ta gbɛe vamia kpundɛ i hɛlɛni mu maahu kpele gbi?
46015031	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, hee lɔ hɛlɛni nya maahu folo gbi! Matɛi na nga kpua a wue jifa mua mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, famia nga ji le.
46015032	Ina nyɔkɔ mua “fulahuangaa” mia mu lapinga mbei Ɛfisɔs lɛi hu kia nuuvu gbama i na, kɛ gbɛ nafa lɔ ngi sɔɔnga? Kɛɛ ina Ngewɔ ɛɛ haablɛisia wumbu hee hu, kɛ kia nungaa ta nde la, “A mu mɛhɛɛ mɛ, mu ndɔ gboli, ajifa mu haamaa sina.”
46015033	Waa wua yekpe hubaa. Kia nungaa ta nde la, “Hukpɔva a jumbu wieblaa a wu wiehindeisia hunyanilɔ.”
46015034	Wu nɛmahu yekpei i yama wu ma wu gbua jumbu weleisia ma. Gbɛɛ ngi nde wu wufe kɛ wu lɛɛnga wuii Ngewɔ gɔɔ.
46015035	Tɛnga numu yila a mɔlilɔ yɛ, “Haablɛisia ta yee gu ti hiye hee hu? Nduwui yeegbɛ nyɔkɔ lɔ a yɛ ti ma?”
46015036	Bi kpowamɔi! Bi tuhani galei hiingaa ndɔmei, ɛɛ vale kɛlee i haa pɛiŋ.
46015037	Tawao na ba hii i yɛni a tuhani galɛ gbasangɔ yakpe lɔ, tɛnga ketei ɔɔ tuhani gaalɛ weka, a yɛ gba tuhani yeefalei na ma i wama lakpama.
46015038	Ngewɔ lɔ a tuhani galei na gɔ a nduwui na a nɛɛ ngi wɛ feva; a tuhani gaalɛ gbi gɔlɔ a nduwui na mbɛngɔ ma.
46015039	Tawao nduwu laasi yakpei ii le aa yɛ ndɛvu-hani kpɛlɛɛ ma. Nduwu laasi yila mia i nuuvuisia ma, fuuhanisia ti ndɛi i gba, ŋɔningɛisia ti ndɛi i gba, nyɛngɛisia ti ndɛi i gba.
46015040	Tawao ngelema hakeisia lɔ na kɛɛ dunyama hakeisia; ngelema hakeisia ti nyandei i gba dunyama hakeisia ti nyandei ma.
46015041	Foloi nda nyandei i gba, ngalui nda nyandei i gba, tumbekeisia ti ndei i gba; tawao tumbekeisia vulii bɛɛ ti nyandei i gba ti nyɔunyɔ ti ndɛi ma.
46015042	Hii a yɛ na ji haablɛisia ta hiye hee hu. Ti nduwui gbɔwungaa, a yɛ a nduwu lɔ a haa; i hiyengaa hee hu, a yɛ a nduwu lɔ ɛɛ haa.
46015043	Nduwui nyamungɔ a yɛla watii na ta kpɔwu tawao kpaya gbi ɛɛ yɛ hu; kɛɛ watii na a hiye, nyandengɔ a yɛla, tawao kpayangɔ.
46015044	Watii na ta nduwui gbɔwu nuuvu luwu a yɛla; watii na a hiye, ngafa luwui a yɛla. Nuuvu luwui lɔ na, faale ngafa luwui a yɛlɔ na huɛɛŋ.
46015045	Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Ngewɔ i haala hindoi Adam gbatɛni ngi vulungɔ;” kɛɛ Adam yeekɛlɛmayei, i yɛni a Kristi lɔ.
46015046	Ngafa luwui yese ii le aa loo kulɔ, kɛ nuuvu luwui, ngafa luwui i poma.
46015047	Adam yeehaalayei, ngi gbatɛngɔ a pɔlɛi, i gbuani pɔlɛi hu lɔ; Adam yeefelei i gbuani ngelegoohu lɔ.
46015048	Nasia dunyei woo a tie, ti gbuangɔ a numui na lɔ ngi gbatɛngɔ a pɔlɛi; nasia ngelegoohublaa a tie ti gbuangɔ a numui na lɔ i hiyeni ngelegoohu.
46015049	Kia lɔɔ numui na ti kpatɛni a pɔlɛi ngi gbuayei a mue, hii ma gbua a Hindoi na i gbuani ngelegoohu.
46015050	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, na nya lii i ma ta lɔ a ji: na kpatɛngɔ a nduwui kɛɛ ŋamɛi ɛɛ gu aa wuaa Ngewɔ mahayɛi hu, tawao na kpatɛngɔ a haa-luwui ɛɛ gu aa yɛ na hu a yɛna kunafɔ.
46015051	A wolo tɔnya lɔwungɔi ji ma: mu kpɛlɛɛ muɛ haa, kɛɛ watii na kɛlɛma bulii a vɛ, mu gbi ma maluvelɔ fulo
46015052	kia numu a yaama yali gbamaile bulii i vɛngaa, haablɛisia ta hiyelɔ hee hu, tɛɛ yaa haa gbɔma, tawao mu kpɛlɛɛ mu maa a luvelɔ.
46015053	Gbamaile na a lula, maa a luvelɔ huɛɛŋ a na ɛɛ lula; na a haa, maa a luvelɔ huɛɛŋ a na ɛɛ haa.
46015054	Faale ji wiengaa, na a haa i maluve a na ɛɛ haa, kɛ Ngewɔ layie na i ngi Gɔlɛi hu i longa ma ji i ndeni yɛ, “Temayɛi i hee gbolinga!”
46015055	“Hee, bi lemayɛi lɔ mi? Hee, bi gbayei na ba numu gbalɛ la taa mindo?”
46015056	Hee a ngi gbayei majɔɔ a jumbui lɔ a numu gbalɛ la, tawao jumbui a ngi gbayei majɔɔ a Sawei lɔ.
46015057	Kɛɛ a mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma na i temayɛi venga mu wɛ hee maahu mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu!
46015058	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a lo kpaŋ waa jɛɛjia. Kpele gbi a wu wugbakpa ngengei na hu wu piema Ndemɔi wɛ, ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hinda gbi wu pieni Ndemɔi yengei hu bagɔma lɔ ma.
46016001	Kɔlɛi na va wu nyɛini ndalongɔ navoei na ma ma fe gbɔva Ngewɔmablei nasia ma ti Judia lɔlei hu. Mahoungɔ wu na wie ngi ndeni Kristimablei nasia ma ti Galesia lɔlei hu ngɛɛ ti pie.
46016002	Sɔnde gbi ma, numu gbi i navoo la gba kia ngi jɔhani a yɛ na, wu ndamagbatɛ aako navoo wɔyɔla aa yɛ wu ma ji nga wa.
46016003	Ngi wangaa, nga wu magona gɔlɔngaa velɔ nasia wɛ wa la a tie, ngi ti lo Jelusalɛm a wu vehani.
46016004	I nyandengaa nya va livaa, kɛ mua tieni ma lilɔ.
46016005	Nga walɔ wu gama ji nga Masidonia lɔlei blandia ajifa kpa lɔ nya ma leweva a Masidonia goohu wee.
46016006	Tɛnga vuli nga lɛmbilɔ saha wu gɔɔma, tɛngaa nga haamɛi kpɛlɛɛ gbɔyɔlɔ wu gɔɔma, na wooma wa gbɔlɔ nya ma ngi li gulɔma a nya jiei, mia gbi lekee nga li na ji nga gbua wu gɔɔma.
46016007	Ngii loni ngi wu lɔ na kɛ ngi lewenga wu ma fulo; nya lii lɔ ma lɛmbiva wu gama, Ndemɔi i lumangaa.
46016008	Ngi yɛmaa mbei Ɛfisɔs lɛi hu haaŋ Pɛntikɔsti volei i hiti.
46016009	Ngi watii yekpe waa majɔɔnga mbei baama yenge wieva kia bɛɛ numu gboto ti na ti lapima a nge.
46016010	Timoti i fonga wu ma, a loko hei ngi bu vulii pandawanda ajifa Ndemɔi yengei na lɔɔ ngi piema tamia i piema.
46016011	Numu gbi aa lɛɛ ngi hu tawao wu gbɔ ngi ma i li gulɔma a ngi jiei ndiilɛli hu aako i yama nya gama; ajifa nyaa ngi gulɔ gbema tia mu mbaa Kristimableisia.
46016012	Mu ndee Apɔlɔs ta, ngi nɔɔnga ngi ma kaka ngɛɛ i foo wu ma taa mu mbaa Kristimablaa wekeisia, kɛɛ ii yaa nɛni ngi wɛ wava wu gama a watii ji. Na hu gbi, kpemɛi ngi hu i gbɛmbongaa, a walɔ.
46016013	Waa lema wua yekpe ma, a hou kpaŋ wu lii na ma falangɔ Kristi ma, a wu lii hou waa hawa wie.
46016014	A wu yengei kpɛlɛɛ wie a ndoma.
46016015	Wu Stɛfanɔs hinda hugɔɔlɔ tia ngi wɛlɛbuleisia; tia yese pɛiŋ ti woteni a Kristimablaa Akaya lɔlei hu gbi tawao ti tia yekpe venga Ngewɔmableisia ti yengei wɛ.
46016016	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu wuaa numu bondɛi jisia ti lokulɔyɛi bu kɛɛ numu weka gbi tia tieni ti yengema ta fɔndɔ jeende.
46016017	Nya goohu nɛngɔe Stɛfanɔs walei va tia Fɔɔtunatɔs kɛɛ Akeikɔs; ti wu wooma gbewe gbuanga
46016018	tawao ti nya lii nɛpɔnga waa kia lɔɔ ti wu lii nɛpɔni. Mahoungɔ wu wolo panda nama yee nungei jisia ta nde.
46016019	Kristimablei nasia ti heiheini Esia lɔlei hu gbi ta va wu ma. Akuila taa Plisila kɛɛ Kristimablei nasia ta gomɛ ti wɛlei bu tiaa Kristimamɔ-vama gbɔtu yoyoma wu wɛ.
46016020	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ ti mbei ta va wu ma kaka. A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma a ndoma lii.
46016021	Nya Pɔɔl, nya vulii lɔ ngi famɛi jisia nyɛima a nya lokoi.
46016022	Numu gbi lekee ii loni a Ndemɔi, sondu lɔ ngi ma! Mu Lemɔi, wa!
46016023	Mu Lemɔi Yesu ngi yauwandei i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
46016024	Nya lomɛi i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ gama Yesu Kristi woo a wue. Amiina.
47001001	Nya nya Pɔɔl, Ngewɔ i loko loni nyama yɛva a tomɔ Yesu Kristi va, mua mu mbaa Kristimɔi Timoti mia mu kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Ngewɔblei nasia gama ti Kɔlinti kɛɛ Ngewɔblei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ti Akaya lɔlei luwuma gbi.
47001002	Nyaa mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ti wu gɔ a ngauwaundei kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
47001003	A mu siɛgbua mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi kɛɛ Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ ma, manuma Kɛkɛi na a gbɔ mu ma kpelema gbi.
47001004	Ngewɔ na a gbɔ mu ma mu hinda gbɔugbɔi kpɛlɛɛ hu aako mu gu a gbɔla nasia ma hinda gbɔugbɔu laasi gbi i ti ma; mu yeekpɔma yakpei na yayenge mu majɔɔnga a Ngewɔ.
47001005	Kpalɛ gboto i lailɔ Kristi ma, tawao kpalɛ a lalɔ mua bɛɛ ma kia i lani la ngi ma; tawao kia Ngewɔ i gbɔni la Kristi ma, hii Kristi sabui hu Ngewɔ a gbɔ mu ma hulewengɔ gbo.
47001006	Watii gbi lekee kpalɛ i langaa mu ma, wu gbɔmi vamia, aako wu kpɔma majɔɔ wu lanayei i gbaya; tawao mu kpɔma majɔɔnga a Ngewɔ, wa yeekpɔma yakpei na majɔɔlɔ a pie wu gu kpalɛ laasi yakpei nasia bu a ndiilo ta la mu ma.
47001007	Faale mu layii a wue mahu ɛɛ gbua; mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ kia lɔɔ kpalɛi na i langa mu ma i langa wu ma, kpɔmɛi na ma majɔɔ wa majɔɔlɔ.
47001008	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, mu longɔ wu hinda gbɔugbɔi na gɔɔ i lani mu ma Esia lɔlei hu. Kahɛi nasia ti ndani mu wumba ti wɔlɔyii kɛɛ ti miniyii i pielɔ mu la la kɛ mu lɛɛvui i gbɔyɔmaa.
47001009	Mu langɔ yɛla la vulii kɛ mu haamaa fɔ; kɛɛ na wieilɔ aako maa liivala mua yekpe ma, mu liivala Ngewɔ yakpe ma, na a haablaa vulu i ti wumbu hee hu.
47001010	I mu gbuɛilɔ haa maluwangɔi na nyɔkɔ hu, mu langɔ la kɛ a mu bawolɔ tawao mu liivalanga ngi ma kɛ a mu bawolɔ gbɔma,
47001011	ji wua bɛɛ wa gbɔ mu ma a Ngewɔ vɛlila mu va. Wu Ngewɔ vɛlingaa mu va na gbotongɔ, Ngewɔ a mɛnilɔ tawao a mu lubalɔ; tawao nungaa wekangaa gboto ta siɛgbualɔ Ngewɔ ma mu luba va.
47001012	Ma mata gbualɔ ajifa mu lii yekpei lɔ selima kɛ mu jianga panda dunyei hu, wua vui wu gama, a pɔɔnɛi kɛɛ ndiigolei na Ngewɔ longɔ la. Nuuvu nɛmahulewe ii le maa jia la kɛlee Ngewɔ yauwandei yeekpayei.
47001013	Na wa gu a kaala tawao wa mbugɔɔ, ta lekee lɔ ma nyɛi wu gama. Na hu gbi, wuɛɛ mu wiehindei kpɛlɛɛ hugɔɔ pandawanda kiahuna, kɛɛ nya lii lɔ ma kɛ wa mu wiehindei hugɔɔlɔ gbalauŋ, aako Foloi na ma mu Lemɔi Yesu a yama mbei nuuvunga gbɛmbova, wa mata gbualɔ a mue kia ma kpua a wue.
47001015	Nya langɔ waa yɛla a ji kpɛlɛɛ famia ngi hugbatɛni haala fova wu ma aako wu kohunɛ fele majɔɔ.
47001016	Nya longɔ yɛla ngi foo wu ma ji nga yɛ lima Masidonia lɔleihu kɛɛ ji gbɔma nga yɛ yamama aako wu gbɔ nya ma ngi yama Judia lɔleihu.
47001017	Ji ngi yɛ hugbatɛi ji wiema ngi pieni a sɔbɛ lɔ. Ji nga nya hugbatɛisia wie, ngii ti wieni nya yekpe lɔ nafava, ngɛ luma nga mawali a leenga?
47001018	Kia lɔɔ Ngewɔ lɔnyangɔ, mu layie na ma nde wu ma ɛɛ ya a tuma kɛɛ mawali.
47001019	Gbamaile Ngewɔ Hindoloi Yesu Kristi na mua Silvanɔs kɛɛ Timoti mu ngi wowili leni wu ma, ii yɛ a tuma kɛɛ mawali, ta lɔ Ngewɔ lumawoi a ngie kpelema gbi;
47001020	jifa ta lɔ Ngewɔ Lahei kpɛlɛɛ yeetumawoi a ngie. Na vamia ji ma Ngewɔ vɛli ma nde muɛɛ “Amiina” Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu Ngewɔ wɔlɔ va.
47001021	Ngewɔ vulii lɔ a pie mua wueni mu yɛ a Kristi woo; Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i mu gbuanga ma gba ngi yengei va;
47001022	i loko longa mu ma kɛva kɛ ngi woo lɔ a mue tawao i Ngewɔ Yafei venga mu wɛ mu liisia hu a kpɔmbɛi na kpɛlɛɛ va i ngi yeya mu va.
47001023	Ngewɔ lɔ nya jeli le, ta lɔ i nya lii huvaa gɔngɔ! Aako ngaa wu huyili, famia ngii wani Kɔlinti.
47001024	Ii mu lii hu ndeva wu ma a kpaya gbɔɔ mahoungɔ wu la la; mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu na gɔɔlɔ vulii wu langɔ la, faale mua wueni mu yengemaa aako wu goohu i nɛɛ.
47002001	Faale ngi nya lii huyiliilɔ ngɛ ngaa wa wu gama wu lii aa gbɔma nyani.
47002002	Ajifa ina nya wala wu gama yeehuvɛi a yɛ lekee a ndiinyani lɔ, numu weka gbi ɛɛ yɛ na nya lii nɛpɔva kɛlee wua ngi wu lii nyaninga.
47002003	Na vamia ngi kɔlɛi na nyɛini ngii yɛ loni ngi wa wu gama ngi ndiinyani majɔɔ a nungei nasia vulii mahoungɔ ngi kohunɛ majɔɔ a tie. Ajifa nya langɔe vulii la kɛ nya goohu i nɛngaa, kɛ wua bɛɛ wu gbi wu goohu i nɛnga.
47002004	Gbamaile watii na ngi kɔlɛi na nyɛini nya lii mɔnɛngɔ yɛla hulewengɔ gbo, ngayɛi a yei nya yaama; nya lii ii yɛ ma pieva wu lii i nyani, kɛɛ aako wu kɔɔ kia nya longɔ a wu gbi.
47002005	Numui na i wani a kpalɛi na, ii pieni a nge kɛ wua ɔɔ, i gbɔu bɛɛ, wu lɛɛngaa. Ngi ndeilɔ a kɛyii ji hu we kɔɔ ngaa ngagbalɛ hulewengɔ wie a yeenumui na i wani la.
47002006	Kpalɛi na wu gbotoma wu ndanga ngi ma i lo hii.
47002007	Na hu gbi mahoungɔ wu manu ngi ma, wu ngi lii gba, aako ngi lii aa nyani hulewengɔ.
47002008	Faale nyaa wu manɛnɛma aako wu pie i kɔɔ kɛ wu longɔe a ngie.
47002009	Ngi kɔlɛi na nyɛilɔ wu hugɔɔva aako ngi kɔɔ ina wu woloilɔ ndahii ma ngi feni wu wɛ.
47002010	Wu manungaa numu gbi ma na va i pienga, nya bɛɛ nga manulɔ ngi ma. Ajifa ngi manungaa numu ma kɛ ngi pienga wu va lɔ, nya jeli a Kristi lɔ,
47002011	aako Seitana aa gu aa wɛlɛ mu mahu; ajifa mu kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ i ngi nɛmahu.
47002012	Ji ngi foni Toasi leihu Ngowili Yekpei leva kɔloongɔ Kristi ma, ngi tɔilɔ kɛ Ndemɔi i pele lawonga nya wɛ yeengengei ji wieva na.
47002013	Kɛɛ nya liihɛlɛngɔ waa yɛla ajifa ngii mu ndee Taitɔs maleni na. Faale ngi vɛlilɔ ti ma ngi lewe ngi li Masidonia lɔleihu.
47002014	Kɛɛ a mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma! Ajifa i temayɛi venga Kristi wɛ jumbui gbayei maahu tawao mu toblɛisia mua Kristi-ni mia ma yeekɔ-vaya-gomɛi ga. Ngewɔ a yenge a mu loko lɔ kɔɔ Kristi hindei hugɔɔlei i vaya hu gbi kia hani gu nɛnɛɛ.
47002015	Gbamaile mu wiengɔe kia hani gu nɛnɛɛ Kristi i kpuani a saa i fe Ngewɔ wɛ faya va nasia lia ti bawoma kɛɛ nasia ti jukuluma.
47002016	Nasia va ti jukuluma, i yɛni a hani gu nyamunyamu waa lɔ a gu a numu waala; kɛɛ nasia va ti bawoma, i yɛni a hani gu nɛnɛɛ waa lɔ a wa a ndɛvui. Ye lɔ na hɔɔ a gu a ngenge bondɛi ji wiela?
47002017	Ajifa muii wieni kia numu gboto ti na, tɛɛ gu yeengengei ji ma. Ta Ngowili Yekpei lelɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ feehani na ta majia ta ti mɛhɛɛ jɔɔ hu. Kɛɛ mua mu wɔnangɔe mu yengei hu; ma Ngowili Yekpei le a pelei na lɔ Ngewɔ kɛni a mue kia tutungaa i ti loni kɛɛ kia Kristi yengeblaa.
47003001	Njɛpɛi na ngi nyɛinga saange ii kɛni kɛ mua lawoma gbɔma a mua yekpe. Muii gbeweni kɔlɔngaa va mu magonava wu ma tawao muii gbeweni kɔlɔngaa va wu yeya mu magonava Kristimablaa wekangaa ma kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ti na.
47003002	Wua vulii lɔ mu magona gɔlɛi a wue, nyɛingɔ mu liisia ma numui gbi va ti kaa ti kɔɔ.
47003003	I laailɔ ke kɛ Kristi vulii lɔ i yeekɔlɛi ji nyɛini, i njooyo a mue. Ii nyɛini a loko kɛlee, kɛ Ngewɔ vulungɔi Yafei, tawao ii nyɛini kɔtu magbatɛngɔ ma, i yɛ nuuvungaa ti liisia ma lɔ.
47003004	Mua ji lema ajifa mu langɔwa a Ngewɔ, Kristi sabui hu.
47003005	Gbɛogbɛ i mu hu na a pie mu yongalewe, kɛ mua ma gulɔ mu gengei nasia wie. I kpayei na mu yeya i gbuani Ngewɔ gama lɔ;
47003006	Ngewɔ lɔ i pienga mu gunga a yɛla a ngengeblaa ngi wɛ hinda yangilingɔ nina hu, na ii yɛni a sawa nyɛingɔ kɛ Ngewɔ Yafei. Sawa nyɛingɔi a wa a hee lɔ numu yafei va kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei a wa a ndɛvui lɔ.
47003007	Sawei nyɛini kɔtu magbatɛngɔi lɔ ma, tawao watii na i feni, Ngewɔ nɔlɔi i gɛilɔ foofo gbayangɔ waa hu. Mojisi yaumbui i yɛlɔ a voo a Ngewɔ nɔlɔi na i hulɔni tawao kia bɛɛ mahu i yɛla a gbua, kpayangɔ waa yɛlɔ na hii i Isrɛlbleisia ti yaama ii yɛ gu aa lo ngi yaumbui ma. Ngewɔ nɔlɔi yeefoofo wai i gɛilɔ watii na Sawei ji a wa a hee i yɛ vema Mojisi wɛ,
47003008	kɛ Ngewɔ nɔlɔi yeefoofo wai i leweilɔ polouŋ na ma watii na Ngewɔ hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi na yeendii a Ngewɔ Yafei i wani.
47003009	Gbamaile ina Sawei na a wa a numu yafei haala ngi wala wɔlɔngɔ yɛla hii, Ngewɔ Yafei na a pɔɔna vɛ numu wɛ ngi walei a yɛ wɔlɔni kpa!
47003010	Ma ndelɔ hɔɔ muɛɛ ji na ngɔlɔyɛi yeembawai i wanga, ngɔlɔyɛi na wɔɔ i yɛ voo ngovama i gbɔyɔnga.
47003011	Gbamaile ina ngɔlɔya i yɛlɔ hinda yangilingɔ wovei na hu ii lɛmbima, ngɔɔlɔya a yɛ kpa hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi na hu i yɛma na kunafɔ va!
47003012	Jifa mu lii valamɛi ji i na, ma yɛpɛlɔ a ngaulewe waa.
47003013	Muii wieni kia Mojisi i na, i kulei wɛlɛni wumba aako Isrɛlbleisia taa fofoi gbɔyɔmɛi lɔ ngi yaama.
47003014	A tɔnya ti nɛmahuisia laagbɔungɔ yɛla tii yeembui gɔɔni, tawao i to foloi ji vulii ma, kulei na wɔɔ Mojisi pɛlɛni wumba, pɛlɛngɔe ti nɛmahuisia ma ji ta yɛ hinda yangilingɔ wovei yeekɔlɛisia gaama. Na lekee a kulɛi na gbule tamia a ji numu a yɛ a Kristimamɔ.
47003015	Foloi ji bɛɛ, watii gbi ti Mojisi Jawei gaangaa, kulei lɔ lɛ wɛlɛni ti nɛmahuisia ma.
47003016	Kɛɛ numu i wotengaa Ndemɔi gama, kulei na a gulelɔ ngi yaama.
47003017	Kiahuna, Ndemɔi lɔ Ngafei le; tawao mia lekee gbi Ndemɔi Yafei i na, mbawo lɔ na.
47003018	Mu kpɛlɛɛ, kula gbi ii wɛlɛni mu yaama, ma Ndemɔi nɔlɔi lɔlɔ; tawao yeenɔlɔ yakpei ji i gbuama Ndemɔi na gama, Ngewɔ Yafei a ngie, a mu maluvelɔ mu gbua a ngie, ngi nɔlɔi i ya a mato mu ma.
47004001	Ngewɔ i manunga mu ma i ngengei ji venga mu wɛ pieva, muɛɛ gbe a piela.
47004002	Mu loko gbi ii ngufema hindangaa wiela hu ndɔwuma, muɛɛ kaasoo hinda wie, muɛɛ ndɛɛ guala Ngewɔ Wowili Yekpei lela hu. Ngewɔ lɔ mu jeli le kɛ ma Ngowili Yekpei yeetɔnyɛi lekee lɔ le fofoya tawao mu lii lɔ ma kɛ numui gbi ta kili yekpe wielɔ a mue.
47004003	Gbamaile ina Ngowili Yekpei ji ma nde ndɔwungɔe, kɛ ndɔwungɔ lekee nasia lɔ ma ti jukuluma.
47004004	Tii lani a mu Wowili ajifa Seitana, dunyei yeengewɔ nyamui, i pienga tɛɛ gu a yeembui gɔla. A pielɔ tɛɛ fofoi na lɔ i vooma ti ma, foofoi na a gbua Ngowili Yekpei hu kɔlooni Kristi wɔlɔyɛi ma, na Ngewɔ gbuayei a ngie.
47004005	Muii yɛpɛma kɔloongɔ mua yekpe ma; mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi lɔ mu yɛpɛma kɔɔlongɔ ngi ma, mu yɛngɔ a wu yengeblaa jifa mu toma Yesu lɔ ma.
47004006	Ngewɔ na i ndeni yɛ, “Fofoi a voolɔ i gbua kpindi hu!” yee Ngewɔ yakpei ji lɔ i pieni ngi voofoi i voo mu liisia hu, pieva mu Ngewɔ nɔlɔi na gɔɔ i vooma Kristi yaumbui ma.
47004007	Kɛɛ mua Ngewɔ Yafei yeekpatɛi ji i mu yeya, mu wiengɔe kia pɔlɔ-vɛɛngaa gbama ti na, kɛva kɛ kpayei na tewengɔ kpɛlɛɛ ma i Ngewɔ lɔ wɛ, mua ii le.
47004008	Nungaa lɔ kpalɛ lama mu ma pɛɛpɛ, kɛɛ na ɛɛ pie mu gbe mu yengei ma; mu kitingɔe watii lɛɛnga, kɛɛ muɛɛ gbe mu yengei ma;
47004009	nungaa ta mu yakpelɔ, kɛɛ Ngewɔ ɛɛ gbele mu ma; tawao ta mu nɛɛmulɔ waa ti mu gula watii lɛɛnga ma kɛɛ tɛɛ mu waa.
47004010	Watii gbi lekee hee na Yesu i pieni taa hɛlɛni mu mahu tawao ji vulii mu vulungɔ lɛ a kɛlɔ kɛ Yesu bɛɛ ngi vulungɔe.
47004011	Kia bɛɛ mu vulungɔ, hee lɔ hɛlɛni mu maahu watii gbi Yesu va, tawao ji vulii mu vulungɔ lɛ a kɛlɔ kɛ Yesu bɛɛ ngi vulungɔe.
47004012	Ji a kɛlɔ kɛ hee lɔ hɛlɛni mu toblɛisia mahu tawao ji lɔ i pienga wu ndɛvu majɔɔnga.
47004013	Nyɛingɔe Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu tɛɛ, “Ngi Ngewɔ yiɛi leilɔ nungaa ma jifa nya langɔ a Ngewɔ.” Hii mua bɛɛ mu langɔ a Ngewɔ famia ma Ngowili Yekpei le.
47004014	Jifa mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ na i Yesu vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu, a mua bɛɛ wumbulɔ hee hu kia i pieni a Yesu, i li a mua wieni Yesu gama.
47004015	Ji kpɛlɛɛ i mu wiema wu va lɔ; tawao kia Ngewɔ yauwandei i piema a nungaa mato lekee, nungaa ta siɛgbua hɛɛ mato wielɔ, Ngewɔ wɔlɔ va.
47004016	Sabui ji valɔ muɛɛ gbaha. Kia bɛɛ mu luwui i nyanima kulokulo, mu lii lɔ ninama folo gbi.
47004017	Kpalɛi jisia ta la mu ma ti mumungɔe tawao ti hugutungɔ ina mu gilingaa a na i wama; ajifa ta walɔ mu wɛ a hani lakpa waa tewengɔ kpalɛi nasia ma, hani na a yɛ mu yeya kunafɔ, tamia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui Ngewɔ gama.
47004018	Faale mu lii ii looni dunyama hani nasia ma numu a gu a tɔla kɛlee ngelegoohu hanii nasia muɛɛ gu a tɔla. Ajifa hanii nasia ma gu a tɔla tɛɛ lɛmbi, kɛɛ nasia muɛɛ gu a tɔla, ta yɛlɔ na kunafɔ.
47005001	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ watii na kpoe ji mu mbu, na i yɛni a mu gbuhɛi mbei dunya a wolo, pɛlɛ gbuhɛi a yɛlɔ Ngewɔ yeya ngelegoohu mu va, heimi na ta vulii i kpatɛni tawao ɛɛ nyani kunafɔ.
47005002	Ji nduwui ji a yɛ mu ma dunya, ma gbalalɔ a ndiinyani ajifa mu longɔ a nduwui yeepeka, yeena a gbua ngelegoohu, i wu mu ma.
47005003	Mu longɔ mu luwu ninɛi i yɛ mu ma, na wiengaa, muɛɛ yaa baa a nduwu kunafɔ.
47005004	Ajifa kia lɛ mu kpoe ji bu, ma gbalalɔ a ndiihɛlɛi; ii wieni bɛɛ mu longɔ mu dunya luwui ji gbua mu ma, kɛɛ mu longɔ ngelegoohuyei i wu dunyayei mahu aako haa-luwui i kunafɔ lɛɛvu majɔɔ.
47005005	Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i mu magbatɛnga ji va, tawao i ngi Yafei veilɔ mu wɛ a tokola na kpɛlɛɛ va i ngi yeya mu va.
47005006	Faale ndiigba lɔ mu wɛ kpele gbi. Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ na lekee mu wɛlei na mu mbu a nduwui ji lɔ, mu maguhangɔe a Ndemɔi yeepɛla.
47005007	Mu luvayii i gbuani mu lalei hu lɔ a Kristi, tii yɛma jifa mu ngi lɔnga.
47005008	Ndiigba waa lɔ mu wɛ tawao ma yɛ loni vulii mu gbua mu luwui yeepɛlei ji bu mua Ndemɔi Yesu-ni mu li mu yɛ heini.
47005009	Faale, na mu longɔ la i lewe hani gbi ma tamia a ji ma Ndemɔi liima hindei wie, mia gbi mu na, mu yɛ lɛ mu luwui ji hu mbei ɔɔ mu gbuangɔ i yɛla hu ndɛvui yeena hu Ndemɔi gama.
47005010	Ajifa mu kpɛlɛɛ ma lolɔ huɛɛŋ Kristi gulɔ i mu gbɛmbo. Numu gbi a pawɛi na ɔɔ kpalɛi na lɔ majɔɔ mbɛngɔ ngi ma. Kristi a ji wielɔ hinda yekpei kɛɛ hinda nyamui nasia va nungaa ti pienga dunya lɛɛvui ji hu.
47005011	Mu kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ luwala le Ndemɔi ma, famia ma lapi kɔɔ mu nungaa wekeisia lii manɛɛ. Ngewɔ i mu gɔɔlɔ pandawanda, tawao nya lii lɔ ma kɛ wu nya gɔɔlɔ hi wu liisia hu.
47005012	Muii mua yekpe latoma wu gama gbɔma. Sawo, na mu lapima mu pie tamia a sabu yekpe vela wu wɛ mata gbuava a mue; tawao na wiengaa wa kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ wa nde nasia ma ta lawo a ti luwumɛi yɛyii, tɛɛ laawo a ti jiayii.
47005013	Ina mu gbowangɔ yɛla vulii, kɛ Ngewɔ vamia; ɔɔ mu nɛmahu lewengɔi, kɛ wu vamia.
47005014	Ajifa Kristi lomɛi na mu va ta lɔ i jiama a mue, kia na mu kɔɔnga kɛ Kristi i haailɔ numui kpɛlɛɛ va, faale numui gbi ti haanga tia bɛɛ.
47005015	Kristi haani numui gbi lɔ va kɔɔ nasia ta to ngi ma taa gbɔma yɛ na tia yekpe lekee ti nafava, kɛɛ ti yɛ na Kristi va. Ajifa ti va lɔ i haani, Ngewɔ i ngi vulu i ngi wumbu hee hu.
47005016	I hiye watii na ma mu lani a Kristi, muɛɛ gili a numu gbi a nuuvu giliyii. Ina bɛɛ mu giliilɔ wɔɔ a Kristi a nuuvu giliyii, muɛɛ yaa gili hii a ngie.
47005017	Faale numu gbi taa Kristi ti wilingaa hu, a yɛ a numu nina lɔ; yeengovei i ya, yeeninɛi i wanga.
47005018	Ngewɔ lɔ i ji kpɛlɛɛ wieni, na Kristi sabui hu, i mu yɛnga a ngi ndiamɔngaa, i genge venga mue pieva nungaa wekeisia bɛɛ ti yɛ a ngi ndiamɔngaa.
47005019	Mu wowili a ji lɔ kɛ Ngewɔ longɔ i nuuvungaa kpɛlɛɛ yɛ a ngi ndiamɔngaa Kristi sabui hu. Ngewɔ i manuilɔ ti ma gbama ti jumbuisia va i lema yeejumbuisia ma tawao ngowili na a hugɛ kia Ngewɔ a yee nuuvungaa yɛ a ngi ndiamɔngaa, i toko wuaanga mu yeya.
47005020	Faale na mua lɔ Kristi yaamɛi a mue ma yɛpɛ ngi va, bi tɔaa bɛɛ Ngewɔ vulii i wuama mu hu lɔ manɛnɛi ji va nuuvungaa kpɛlɛɛ yɛva a ngi ndiamɔnga. Mua wu manɛnɛma a Kristi jɔngɔ; a luma Ngewɔ i wua tieni luahu gbatɛ i wu yɛ a ngi ndiamɔnga.
47005021	Kristi ii jumbu hinda yakpe bɛɛ wieni, kɛɛ mu va Ngewɔ pielɔ i mu jumbui wumbu. Faale, kia mua Kristi-ni mu wilinga hu, mu yɛnga a pɔɔnablaa Ngewɔ gulɔ.
47006001	Mua Ngewɔ-ni mia mu yengema faale mua wu manɛnɛma wu ngauwandei na yayenge Ngewɔ i pienga a wue, hu aa nyani gbama.
47006002	Faale Ngewɔ ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ji watii i hitini gbɔva wu ma, ngi wu woo mɛnilɔ, Ngi gbɔilɔ wu ma ji foloi i hitini wu bawo va.” A woolo! Watii ji lɔ Ngewɔ i gbɔma wu ma! Foloi ji lɔ Ngewɔ i wu bawoma!
47006003	Mu yengei ji mu piema, muii loni numu gbi i mu magbua, famia muɛɛ gbani yili numu gbi gulɔ.
47006004	Kia maa na wie, ma kɛlɔ mu wiehindei kpɛlɛɛ hu kɛ Ngewɔ yengeblaa lɔ a mue ji mu liilongɔ wa fawɔliisia hu kɛɛ hinda gbɔugbɔisia kɛɛ hinda gbangɔisia.
47006005	Ti mu lewenga ti mu wunga kpindi-wɛlei bu, kɛɛ sɔlɛisia kɛɛ ngamɔnɛisia, tawao ti njii-manii kɛɛ, ndɔlei wilinga mu ma.
47006006	Mu wiehindei sɛwɛsɛwɛyii kɛɛ mu Wowili Yekpei gɔɔyii kɛɛ mu liiloyii hinda gbɔugbɔu hu kɛɛ mu hindawanda wieyii, kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei va i mu hu kɛɛ ndoma yekpei mu piengɔ a nungaa wekeisia,
47006007	kɛɛ mu Wowili lɔnyangɔi kɛɛ Ngewɔ gbayei a kɛlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ yengebla lɔ a mue. Ma kɔi gɔ a mu jiayii yekpei lɔ, ma kɔi wɛlɛ la mu juwuisia ma, tawao ma mu magao la.
47006008	Nungaa lɛɛnga ta mu bɛlɛ nyanilɔ, pekeisia ta mu bɛlɛ hei; nungaa lɛɛngaa ta mu yia yekpe lelɔ, pekeisia ta mu yia nyamu le. Nungaa ti mu wumbuni a ndɛɛ gualablaa lɔ, kɛɛ ma tɔnyɛi lɔ le.
47006009	Tiaa ndema tɛɛ gbɛogbɛ yaa a mue kɛɛ numui gbi ti mu gɔɔlɔ; tɛɛ mu yɛ haama kɛɛ mu vulungɔe keya, wua vulii wuaa tɔma. Ta mu gbalɛlɔ nyamungɔ waa, kɛɛ muɛɛ haa;
47006010	kia bɛɛ ta mu lii nyani, mu goohu nɛngɔe watii gbi; mu wiengɔe kia fɛɛlibla ti na, kɛɛ mua piema numu gboto ta gbatɛ; mu wiengɔe bi tɔaa bɛɛ gbɛogbɛ ii mu yeya, kɛɛ a tɔnya, hani gbi lɔ mu yeya.
47006011	Nya liima ndiamɔisia wu Kɔlinti, mu yɛpɛnga wu gama muii pɛlɛni nga; mu ndii gole gɛilɔ a wue.
47006012	Muii ndii nyamu gɛni a wue; wua mia wu ndii nyani gɛni a mue.
47006013	Nga yɛpɛlɔ wu gama na kia nya goohu leengaa; a mu wumbu kia mu wu wumbungɔ la. A ndii gole gɛ a mue wua bɛɛ.
47006014	Waa lapi waa gbɔ hinda gbi ma wua nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ wu mahɔngɔe wua tieni, ajifa nyɔkɔ ɛɛ wie. Pɔɔna tia jumbu ta yee gu ti yɛ a mbaangaa? Foofo taa kpindi ta yee makpɔ ti hei hinda yakpe?
47006015	Kristi taa Seitana ta yee ngooyila wie? Kristimamɔi taa numui na ii lani a Kristi ti yɛyii i yee yɛni yila?
47006016	Ngewɔ wɛlei taa nɔmɔliisia ta yee makpɔ hinda yila? Gbamaile mua lɔ Ngewɔ vulungɔe wɛlei a mue! Kia Ngewɔ vulii i ndeni la yɛ, “Nga heilɔ nya nungeisia lia nga lewetewe ti lia; nga yɛlɔ a Ngewɔ na ta ngi vɛli, tawao ta yɛlɔ a nya woo.”
47006017	Famia Ndemɔi i ndenga ngi nungeisia ma yɛ, “Wa gbɛle lɔ yee nungei nasia ma, wua tieni wu luahu i gɔlɛ. Waa gbiti hani gbi ma na nɔhɔngɔ nya yaama, wu na wiengaa nga wu gululɔ.
47006018	Nga yɛlɔ a wu Kɛkɛ, tawao wa yɛlɔ a nya hingaleengeisia kɛɛ nya nyahaleengeisia, hii ngi ndeni, nya Ndemɔ wai a nge.”
47007001	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, Ngewɔ i Lahei jisia wumbunga mu gama. Faale na, a mu mua yekpe yɛ sɛwɛ a ji ma gbele hindei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ma ta mu gbuhɛi kɛɛ mu lii nɔhɔ Ngewɔ yaama. Tawao aako mu mbɛlɛhei ve Ngewɔ wɛ, a mu mu lɛɛvui kpɛlɛɛ ve ngi wɛ.
47007002	A ndii gole gɛ a mue wu liisiahu. Muii yaa nyamu gani a numu gbi; muii yaa numu gbi lalei a Ngewɔ hunyanini, tawao muii yaa hani gbi gbuani numu gbi yeya a kava.
47007003	Ngii ji lema aako wu gili la kɛ wu nyamu lɔ wienga; ajifa kia ngi ndenga la ngovama, mu longɔe a wue hulewengɔ na hii gbɛogbɛ ɛɛ gu aa mua wueni luahu gɔlɛ, hee vulii bɛɛ ɔɔ hani weka gbi lekee ndɛvui ji hu.
47007004	Nya langɔ waa le a wue tawao nga mata waa gbualɔ a wue! Kpalɛi ji kpɛlɛɛ i langa mu ma ii yaa pieni ngaa yɔkɔ; tawao nya goohu nɛngɔe watii gbi.
47007005	Kia bɛɛ mu foni Masidonia lɔlei hu muii lɛɛvuni kulo bɛɛ. Fawɔlisia ti yɛlɔ hu gbi, nungaa lɛɛnga ta wa a njiɛisia mu mahu, mu lii hɛlɛngɔ.
47007006	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ na a ndiinyanimɔi nɛpɔ, i mu nɛpɔilɔ a ji Taitɔs i wani.
47007007	Ngi walei lekee ii le aa mu lii nɛɛ, kɛ ji i gonani a nɛpɔyei na wu ngi lii nɛpɔni la. I hugɛilɔ a mue yɛ wu longɔ waa le wu nya lɔ gbɔma, yɛ wu lii mɔnɛngɔe na va wu pienga a nge, tawao yɛ wu magbatɛngɔ waa le nya mayialeva; famia nya goohunɛɛi maa i toilɔ waa.
47007008	Gbamaile ina bɛɛ kɔlɛi na ngi nyɛini wu gama i wu mamanuilɔ, kɛ nya lii ii nyanini nyɛiva. Nya lii aa nyanilɔ ji ngi tɔni kɛ yeekɔlɛi i wu mamanuilɔ kia bɛɛ watii wulo lekee vamia.
47007009	Kɛɛ kiahuna na, nya goohu nɛngɔe, tii yɛma jifa ngi pieni wu maa i manu, kɛɛ jifa wu liinyani i pielɔ wu wu luvayiisia maluve. Wu guilɔ yeendinyanii bu a pelei na Ngewɔ longɔ la, faale muii hinda gbi hunyanini wu ma a kɔlɛi na nyɛila.
47007010	Gbamaile ndiinyani na a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ a pielɔ numu lii i wote pelei na hu a li a ngie kunafɔ lɛɛvui hu tawao ndiinyani ii na hu! Kɛɛ ndiinyani na a nɛɛ numu wɛ a wa hee lɔ ngi mahu.
47007011	A tɔ lɛɛ kia wu nda liinyani na nɛngɔ Ngewɔ wɛ i pienga wu maluvenga: i pielɔ wu maa i gbɛli kɛva kɛ wuii nyamu gbi wieni. Wu lii i leweilɔ na va i wieni, wu luwa na ma a gbua hu. I pielɔ nya lɔ-mani i wu lɔ; i pieilɔ wu maa i gbɛli nya magaova kɛɛ kpalɛ lava numui na ma i yeenyamui na gani. Yeehindei ji hu gbi wu kɛilɔ kɛ wu nda gbi ii na ma i wieni.
47007012	Faale kia bɛɛ ngi kɔlɛi na nyɛini, numui na va ii le i nyamui gani ɔɔ numui na ti nyamui gani a ngie. Ngi nyɛilɔ ngi hugɛ gbalauŋ a wue kɛ Ngewɔ i ndoma wai na gɔɔlɔ wu piengɔ a mue.
47007013	Faale mu lii i nɛɛilɔ waa, kɛɛ Taitɔs nda goohunɛɛi i mu lii nɛɛilɔ tewengɔ na ma. Ajifa i hugɛilɔ a mue yɛ wu pielɔ ndiihɛlɛi kpɛlɛɛ i gbua ngi ma.
47007014	Ngi lawoeilɔ vulii Taitɔs gama a wu hinda tawao wuii nya yawufeni. Ma tɔnya yiɛi lɔ le wu ma watii gbi tawao ndawoei na bɛɛ mu pieni Taitɔs gama lekee i yɛnga a tɔnya.
47007015	Famia ndomɛi na i piengɔ a wue maa lɔ toma lekee, ji i gilini a kuloi wu wua yekpe guloni la kɛɛ baagɔma wai na wu feni ngi wɛ kɛɛ ji wu kpɛlɛɛ wu valangɔ yɛla golova na gbi bu i wu gaani la.
47007016	Nya goohu nɛngɔe jifa nga gulɔ ngi la a wue pandawanda.
47008001	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, mu longɔ wu kɔɔ gbɔɔ Ngewɔ yauwandei i pienga Kristimablei nasia lia ti Masidonia lɔlei hu gbi.
47008002	Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti Masidonia, hinda gbɔugbɔu gboto i langa ti ma kɛɛ ti goohu nɛngɔe kpele gbi. Ti nyaningɔ waa le gbɔma kɛɛ ta hani gboto waa lɔ ve.
47008003	Nga gulɔ a ndela wu ma kɛ a ti nyɛkɛ ti na veilɔ ta gu ma, tawao tewengɔ bɛɛ na ma ta gu ma.
47008004	Ta mu manɛnɛ tɛɛ mu pie ti gbɛɛ nasia ma ti gbɔma Ngewɔblei nasia ma ti Judia.
47008005	Ti wiehindei ji lewengɔ yɛla na ma mu lii yɛ ma! Ti tia yekpe yese veni Ndemɔi wɛ; na wooma ti tia yekpe ve mua bɛɛ wɛ kia i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ kɔɔ ti pie.
47008006	Taitɔs lɔ i navoo gboto ve-yengei ji lɔtoni wu lia, faale mu ngi manɛnɛilɔ muɛɛ i madi hou i gbɔ wu ma wu yeendoma yengei ji yakpua.
47008007	Hindei kpɛlɛɛ hu wu lewengɔe Kristimablaa wekeisia ma: wu layii hu a Kristi, Ngowili Yekpei lelei hu, tɔnyɛi gɔɔlɛi hu, wu lumayii hu kpɔma wieva kɛɛ wu loyii hu a mue. Faale nya longɔ wu lewe pekeisia ma ndoma yengei ji bɛɛ hu.
47008008	Sawangaa ii le ngaa yɛ ndama. Kɛ ngi laalilɔ Masidoniableisia ti magbɛliyii ma kpɔma wieva aako ngi pie wu kɛ kɛ wu lomɛi tɔnya le.
47008009	Wu hugɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i na; i pielɔ kia bɛɛ i yɛ Ngewɔyɛi yeekpatɛi hu, i wailɔ dunyei hu i wote a nyanimɔ wu va, yeenyanii ji va wu gbatɛ Ngewɔ gɔla hu.
47008010	Kpɔma navoo velei va, nya langɔ la mahoungɔe wu na yakpua wu tɔtoni voonu. Ii gɛlɛni felei lekee ma, wua yese wu lii nɛni feva.
47008011	A madi hou na wu yeengengei na wie! Wu maa i gbɛli kpɔyɔva kia wu maa i gbɛlini hugbatɛva, tawao a pie a na i wu yeya kiahuna.
47008012	Wu maa i gbɛlingaa hani veva, Ngewɔ goohu a nɛɛlɔ na va bi gbayei a gu a fela kpoto. Ngewɔ lii ii wu ma na veva ii wu yeya.
47008013	Ngii lapima kaha minimini lava wu wumba, ngi yee powopowoisia la pekeisia wumba;
47008014	kɛɛ kia hani i wu yeya sɛmbɛngɔ kiahuna, mahoungɔ wu gbɔ nasia ma hinda gbɔungɔ ti laa. Na wooma hinda i gbɔungaa wu laa tawao hani gbotongɔ ti yeya, ta gbɔlɔ wua bɛɛ ma, kɛ wu maa i hɔɔnga.
47008015	Kia nyɛingɔ la Ngewɔ gɔlɛi hu, “Nasia ta mɛhɛɛ lɛma kpoto, hani gbi ɛɛ mɔnu ti yeya, tawao nasia ta tɛma kulohii ɛɛ gbɔyɔ ti yeya.”
47008016	A mu siɛgboto gbua Ngewɔ ma jifa i pienga Taitɔs maa i gbɛlinga gbɔva wu ma kia lɔɔ mu na.
47008017	Ajifa ii gɛlɛni na ma i lumani gbɔva wu ma ji mu ndeni ngi ma; ngi maa gbɛlingɔ yɛla pɛiŋ gbɔva wu ma tawao ngi magbɛlingɔ yɛla a ngi nyɛkɛ liva wu gama.
47008018	Mua ta kɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimamɔi na yoyoma Kristimableisia gbi gama ti bagɔnga ngi ma Sɔsiisia gbi hu Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu.
47008019	Ii gɛlɛni na ma Kristimableisia gbi ti ngi gɔɔngɔ pandawanda ti gbi ti loko longa ngi ma kɔɔ mua tieni mu ya a lewetewe. A gbɔlɔ mu ma ndoma navoei ji hugbatɛva ma tɛma, wava a ngɔlɔya mu Lemɔi gama, kɛɛ kɛva kɛ mu magbɛlingɔe gbɔva mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ma hinda gbɔungɔ ti laa.
47008020	Mua mua yekpe mahugbeema vulii aako maa pie numu gbi i gbonyɛ a mue pelei na va mu navoo gbotoi ji yayengema.
47008021	Na mu kɔima tamia a pɔɔna wiela Ndemɔi yaama kɛɛ nuuvungaa bɛɛ.
47008022	Faale mua gbɔma mu mbaa Kristimɔ weka yoyoma. Mu ngi hugɔnga kpoto tawao mu tɔnga kɛ watii gbi ngi magbɛlingɔe kpɔma wieva. Tawao kia na i langa waa hii a wue, ngi magbɛlingɔe tewengɔ yeengovei ma gbɔva wu ma.
47008023	Taitɔs ta, nya mbaa mia tawao mua tamia ma yenge gbɔva wu ma; mu mbaa Kristimablei felei nasia taa tieni ti lima tia lɔ Kristimablei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ti yaamɛi a tie tawao ti yengei a walɔ a ngɔlɔya Kristi ma.
47008024	A ndoma gɛ a tie aako Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ ti mɛni ti la la kɛ muii ndawoo gbama wieni a wue.
47009001	Maa ii houni bɛɛ ngi yɛ a kɔlɔ nyɛi wu gama kɔloongɔ kpɔmɛi ji ma wa njoyo mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia wɛ ti Judia lɔlei hu.
47009002	Ajifa ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu lumangɔe kpɔma wieva tawao ngi lawonga a wue Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ gama ti Masidonia ngɛɛ, “Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti Akaya lɔlei hu ti magbatɛngɔe kpɔma wieva i hiye voonu ma.” Kpɔma lii na i wu goohu i ti gbi lii wɔlɔnga nyɔkɔ wieva.
47009003	Faale nyaa na mu mbaa Kristimablei jisia looma wu gama aako ndawoei kpɛlɛɛ mu pieni a wue yeehindei ji hu aa yɛ a njɛpɛ gbama. Kɛɛ kia lɔɔ ngi ndeni la Kristimableisia ma Masidonia, wu magbatɛngɔ a yɛla a kpɔma navoo.
47009004	Na hu gbi, ina mua Masidoniableisia mu wailɔ wu gama kɛɛ muii maleni kpɔma navoo aa yɛ wu yeya, maa a wufe kpa, wu nda wufei va lee yana, kɛ mua bɛ va, jifa mu lani a wue.
47009005	Faale ngi tɔilɔ kɛ mahoungɔe ngi mu mbaa Kristimablei jisia manɛnɛ liva wu gama nya gulɔ aako wu kpɔma navoei na lɛma wu yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva; aako wu tɛma pɛiŋ mu yaa foo. Wa fe a wu nyɛkɛ lɔ, tɛɛ kpua wu yeya a kpaya.
47009006	I hitɛ wu wɛ kɛ numui na a tuhani hii kulo hii, a tewe kulo hii; kɛɛ numui na a tuhani hii kpotongɔ, a tewelɔ kpotongɔ waa.
47009007	Numu gbi i na ve hɔɔ a wu ngi lii hu feva; aa fe a ndiinyani ɔɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ ngi magba le, gbamaile Ngewɔ longɔ a numui na lɔ a hani ve a kohunɛ.
47009008	Ngewɔ a gulɔ a wu gɔla a na wu gbewengɔ fa yeemaalema aako na wa gbewe fa wua yekpe va a yɛlɔ wu yeya kpele gbi kɛɛ yeemɔnu gboto hinda yekpe gbi wieva la.
47009009	Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “A hani velɔ kpotongɔ waa nyanibleisia ti wɛ; ngi hindawanda wielei ɛɛ gɛlɛ kunafɔ.”
47009010	Ngewɔ lɔ a tuhani galɛi ve numu wɛ hiiva, i ngi gɔ a mɛhɛɛ mɛva. Faale Ngewɔ a tuhani galɛi na kpɛlɛɛ velɔ wu wɛ wa gu a hiila tawao a pielɔ yeetuhani i yekpe, i wua. Ji wiengaa kɛ kpɔma-hani na wa fe i gbotonga kia tuhani a wua.
47009011	Ngewɔ a pielɔ wu gbatɛngɔ i yɛla kpele gbi kpɔma-hani waawaa veva watii gbi aako numu gboto ti siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma wu gbɔma-hani va ma li la ti wɛ.
47009012	Gbamaile ngengei ji wu piema ɛɛ haani lekee gbua wu mbaa Kristimableisia ma kɛɛ a pielɔ numu gboto ti siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma kaka.
47009013	Gbamaile ngengei ji wu piema a kɛlɔ ina yeelɔ a wue, tawao a pielɔ ti Ngewɔ lato, wu goloyii va Kristi Wowili Yekpei na bu wu langɔ la. Ta gbɔma Ngewɔ latolɔ wu gbekpeyei va ti gama kɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimablaa wekeisia.
47009014	A ndomɛi ti pieni, ta Ngewɔ vɛlilɔ wu va, jifa Ngewɔ i ngauwanda wai na gɛngɔ a wue.
47009015	A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ngi gbekpeyei na va mue gu a hugɛla.
47010001	Nya, nya Pɔɔl nya vulii lɔ naa wu manɛnɛma. Nungaa lɛɛnga lɔ ndema tɛ ngi yɛngaa wu lia nya luwangɔ a yɛla a yɛpɛla, kɛɛ nya maa i guhangaa kɛ ngi ndiiloi wienga. Nya longɔ nya mayeingɔ i yɛla tawao nya hindawandangɔ kia Kristi i yɛ na.
47010002	Faale nyaa wu manɛnɛma, waa pie ngaa yaa wu gbalɛ ji nga foo wu ma! Ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nga gulɔ a ngagbalɛ hinda wiela a nungei nasia ti ndema tɛɛ nya layieisia kɛɛ nya wiehindeisia ti yɛni a dunyamamɔ gbama nda lɔ.
47010003	Tɔnya le kɛ mua dunyei ji hu kɛɛ muii jiama a dunyama nɛmahulewe mu gɔisia vayava.
47010004	Kɔhakei nasia ma lapi la tii yɛni a dunyei nda gbatɛngɔisia, ti yɛni a Ngewɔ gɔ-hani gbayangɔi nasia lɔ ma gɔlɔ gbayangɔngaa wongoo la.
47010005	Mamani mawali gbi nungaa ta hou kɛɛ gbani gbi ta ngili aako nungaa taa Ngewɔ gɔɔ, yeekɔ-haakei jisia ta gulɔ a hunyanila. Nasia ti gangangɔ a Ngewɔ, ma ti giliyii houlɔ a yeekɔ-haakɛi jisia, mu yama a tie Ngewɔ gama mu ti yɛ a nungei nasia ti liima a yɛ a golola Kristi lɔ wɛ.
47010006	Ma yeekɔ-haakɛi jisia yayengelɔ kangamɔ gbi ma a lo, ji wua yese vulii wa kpɔyɔ a golola pandawanda.
47010007	Na i wu mɔnɛngɔ tamia a ji wu hindeisia gbema a mahu we kɛɛ wuii mbu gɔɔ. Ina numu gbi ngi gilingɔe la kɛ Kristi woo lɔ a ngie, i gili gbɔma a ta yekpe ajifa Kristi woo lɔ a nge kia lɔɔ yeenumui na i na.
47010008	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i kpaya venga mu wɛ wu maahu kɛɛ wu nyaniva ii le; wu gbekpeva le, tawao kiaa bɛɛ nga lawolɔ a yeekpayei ngi pili kulo kaalɛ wooma, ngɛɛ wufe.
47010009	Ngii loni wu gili la kɛ nyaa lapima wu huluwava a nya gɔlɛisia.
47010010	Ajifa nungaa lɔ ndema tɛɛ, “Pɔɔl maguhangɔ yɛla a njɛpɛ yagbalɛngɔ lekee lɔ le mu ma ngi gɔlɛisia hu, kɛɛ i fonga mu ma baagɔma yekpe gbi ii ngi ma tawao gbɛogbɛ ii ngi layie hu.”
47010011	Mahoungɔe nungaa bondɛi nasia ti kɔɔ kɛ na lɔɔ ma nyɛi kɔlɛi nasia hu nga nyɛi wu gama, ta lɔ nga pie ji nga wa wu gama.
47010012	Ɛɛ hitɛ mu wɛ kulo bɛɛ ndeva muɛɛ mu mahɔngɔe mua nungei nasia ta tia yekpe lɛ ɔɔ mu huma ti ma. Ti gbowani kpa! Ta tia yekpe huma ti nyɔunyɔ lɔ ma tawao tia yekpe lɔ ta ti gɛlɛmɛi na gɛ a bɛ ti ma.
47010013	Na hu gbi muɛɛ lawo maa pili kaalɛ wooma; ma gɛlɛ kaalɛi na goohu lɔ Ngewɔ i na venga mu wɛ yengeva na tawao wu yeekaalɛi goohu lɔ.
47010014	Jifa wu yeekaalɛi ji goohu lɔ, muii windɛni kaalɛ wooma ji mu wani wu gama a Ngowili Yekpei ndalongɔ Kristi ma.
47010015	Faale muɛɛ lawo a ngengei na nungaa wekangaa ti pienga kaalɛi nasia wooma Ngewɔ i feni mu wɛ. Na mu lii i ma ta lɔ a ji wu lalei a Kristi a gbaya aako mu gu a ngenge jɛmbɛ wiela wu lia tewengɔ yeengovei ma, watii gbi mu kaalɛi na goohu Ngewɔ a kɛ a mue.
47010016	Na wiengaa ma gulɔ a Ngowili Yekpei lelaa ndɔlɔ wekangaa hu ti ma guhangɔ tawao muɛɛ lawo a ngengei na ti wilanga a piela numu weka nda gakamɛi.
47010017	Kɛɛ kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i lawo, i laawo a na Ndemɔi i pienga.”
47010018	Ajifa ɛɛ nasia gulu ta tia yekpe lato, Ndemɔi a nasia lɔ gulu ta vulii a ti lato.
47011001	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma ngɛɛ nya luvayii i gu wu hu, ngi kpowa hinda wulo bɛɛ wie. Kɔnɛɛ bɛɛ le!
47011002	Nyaa wu malolo gbuama kia lɔɔ Ngewɔ i piema; wu wiengɔe kia mbɛlɛhu-nyahɛi na i na, ngi Lahei wumbunga feva hindo yekpe wɛ a ngi nyaha, yeehindoi lɔ a Kristi vulii.
47011003	Kɛɛ nya liihɛlɛngɔe ngɛɛ na wɔɔ i Iiv wieni aa wu wie. Kali gasongɔ yɛla tawao i pielɔ Iiv i jumbu hinda wie. Wua bɛɛ ta wu wuhu nyanilɔ hii, wu gbe a lola a Kristi yakpe.
47011004	Ajifa numu gbi lekee a wa wu gama a Yesu weka hinda hugɛ i gba na ma mu ngi hinda hugɛma, wa loko heilɔ ngi bu a kohunɛ; tawao wa ngafa kɛɛ ngowili gululɔ ti gba polouŋ Ngewɔ Yafei kɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei na ma, wu majɔɔni a mue!
47011005	Kɛɛ nungei nasia wu ti wumbungɔ a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa tii leweni nya ma kulo bɛɛ.
47011006	Kia bɛɛ nya laahu ii leweni a yɛpɛla, ngi Wowili Yekpei na gɔɔlɔ pandawanda nga nde wu ma tawao nya langɔ la wu ji gɔɔlɔ na ajifa mu pienga leiŋ wu gama kaka a pelei gbi.
47011007	Ngii hani gbi gbuani wu yeya ji ngi Ngewɔ Ngowili Yekpei leni wu ma; ngi nya yekpe mayeilɔ kɔɔ baagɔma i yɛ wu ma.
47011008	Watii na ngi yɛ yengema wu lia Kristimablaa wekangaa lɔ ti yɛ nya pawa. Nga gulɔ a ndela kɛ ngi ti humɛilɔ aako ngi gbɔ wu ma.
47011009	Tawao watii na ngi yɛ wu gama ngi gbeweilɔ navoo va kɛɛ ngii wɛlɛni wu ma gbɔva nya ma; mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti gbuani Masidonia lɔlei hu ti wailɔ a hani kpɛlɛɛ nya gbewengɔ yɛla fa. Kia lɔɔ wɔɔ nga pie, hii ngi loma piema; ngɛɛ kaha gbi la wu wumba.
47011010	Kristi a tɔnyɛi lɔ wɔɔ le watii gbi tawao yeehinda yakpei mia ngi piema ji ngi ndema ngɛɛ matɛi ji ngi kpuama a wue navoo hindei va, numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa pie ngi gbe a kpuala Akaya lɔlei hu gbi.
47011011	Ngi ji lemaa jifa ngii loni a wue? Ngewɔ kɔɔlɔ kɛ nya lɔnyangɔe a wue.
47011012	Na ngi piema kiahuna nga yɛlɔ a pie, tawao ngɛɛ hani gbi hou wu yeya fa, ngii loni nasia wu ti wumbungɔ a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa ti sabu gbi jɔɔ lawova tɛɛ ti yengema a pelei na lɔ nga pie la.
47011013	Gbamaile ndɛɛ lutungaa lɔ a numu bondɛi nasia, ta ndɛi guala kɔlooni ti yengei ma, ta tia yekpe maluve aako ti gbua a Kristi loblaa yekpeisia.
47011014	Na ɛɛ gɔla numu gbi ma! Jifa Seitana vulii bɛɛ a ta yekpe maluvelɔ a malikei na a voo.
47011015	Faale ɛɛ gɔla numu ma ina ngi yengebleisia ti tia yekpe maluveilɔ ti gbua a pɔɔnamɔi yengebleisia. Kɛlɛmɛi, Ngewɔ a ti hinda nyamuisia yeekpalɛi lɔ la ti ma.
47011016	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma gbɔma: waa gili la kɛ ngi gbowangalɔ ji ngi yɛpɛma hii. Kɛɛ wu gili bɛɛ hii, mahoungɔe ngi lo kpowɛi hu wu woolo nya ma aako hinda wulo i yɛ na nya bɛɛ nga lawo la kia ti piema.
47011017	A tɔnya ndawoei ji nyɔkɔ ii le Ndemɔi aa nya lo piema ajifa nyaa hindei wiema kia kpowamɔ vulii.
47011018	Kɛɛ jifa numu gboto lɔ miando ta lawo wu gama tɛɛ ti gabandengɔ waa le a dunyama hanisia, gbɛɛ nya bɛɛ ngi laawo:
47011019	wua vulii wuɛɛ wu nɛmahulewengɔ, famia wa woolo kpowablaa ma a kohunɛ!
47011020	Ajifa a gulɔ wu hu ji nungaa ta wu wote a ti luwɔngaa ɔɔ ta wu yeyahani kpɛlɛɛ mɛ ɔɔ ta wu gava ɔɔ ta lɛɛ wu hu ɔɔ ta wu baama gbolɛ.
47011021	Nya wufengɔe lumava ma kɛ kaahu ii yɛ mu ma kɛɛ ndiilo hinda bondɛi nasia wieva! Kɛɛ na gbi lekee ta liilo ti lawo la nyaa gbɔma yɛpɛma kia kpowamɔ nya bɛɛ nga liilolɔ ngi laawo la.
47011022	Kia lɔɔ Hibublɛisia a tie, hii ngi na. Kia lɔɔ Isrɛlblaa a tie, hii ngi na. Kia lɔɔ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia a tie, hii ngi na.
47011023	Ina Kristi yengeblaa lɔ a tie nya layie gbuangɔe a kpowa yia kɛ Kristi yengemɔ yekpe lɔ a nge i lewe ti ma! Ngi yengenga kpayangɔ tewengɔ ti ma, ti nya wunga kpindi-wɛlei bu kpotongɔ i lewe ti ma, ti nya lewenga kaka i lewe ti ma tawao hee i hɛlɛnga nya maahu pɛɛpɛ i lewe ti ma.
47011024	Juubleisia ti mahublɛisia ti ndewe numu gbɔyɔngɔ maahu puu maahu taalui veilɔ mbɛ heima lɔɔlu.
47011025	Heima sawa Rom mahangeisia ta nya lewe a nguliisia; heima yila nungaa ta lapi nya waava a ji ti yɛ nya hɔwɔhɔwɔ a kɔtiisia. Njaya-lɛndɛi i lɔmbunga a nge gboyei hu heima sawa, tawao heima yila ngi luveilɔ gboyei hu kpɛiŋ, ngi yii hu kpindi yila kɛɛ folo yila.
47011026	Jia kpoto hu ngi kanga, kpundɛngaa ti hɛlɛnga nya maahu njaveisia hu, kɛɛ humablaa yeya, kɛɛ nya mbaa Juubleisia kɛɛ nasia Juublaa yaa tie. Kpundɛngaa ti hɛlɛnga nya maahu taa waawaisia hu kɛɛ ndɔgbɔ lambɛisia ma kɛɛ gboyeisia ya kɛɛ nungei nasia ti yɛ nde tɛɛ Kristimablaa lɔ a tie kɛɛ tii yɛni la.
47011027	Ngi yengenga kpayangɔ waa nya gahu i gbɔyɔnga; njii gboto i nyaninga nya ma; ndɔlɛ gboto i nya lɔnga tawao nya bolohu a be; watii gboto ngii yɛ gu mɛhɛɛ ma kɛɛ njiima kɛɛ kula ngiliva.
47011028	I baa ji kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛɛ pekangaa, ndiihɛlɛ minimini lɔ nya ma Tuuŋ Kristimablei nasia gbi va ti heiheini hu gbi.
47011029	Kristimamɔ yila i yɛngaa nyɔngɛ, nya bɛɛ nga yɛlɔ nyɔngɛ; Kristimamɔ yila i wilingaa jumbu hu, nya lii a nyanilɔ waa.
47011030	Ina kpɔndangɔe nya ma lawova, nga laawo a hindei nasia lɔ ta nya vakaleweyii gɛ.
47011031	Mu Lemɔi Yesu ngi Yewɔɛi kɛɛ ngi Kɛkɛ na numui gbi ta ngi lato kunafɔ i kɔɔlɔ kɛ ngii ndɛɛ gulama.
47011032	Ji ngi yɛ Damaskɔs, gɔvinei na i yɛ yenge Mahɛi Aritas bu i sojeisia loilɔ yee tei lamɛisia gbi aako ti nya hou.
47011033	Kɛɛ nya mbaa Kristimableisia ti nya gbuɛilɔ tei hu a gɔlɛi yeefolemɛi wee ti nya yei bɛki hu ngi lɔwu ngi yeya.
47012001	Kpɔndangɔe nya ma lawova kia bɛɛ kpekpeya gbi ɛɛ gbua hu. Kɛɛ nga yɛpɛlɔ naa kɔloongɔ ndɔwuma hindei nasia ma Ndemɔi i kɛnga a nge.
47012002	Ngi Kristimamɔ yila gɔɔlɔ na Ngewɔ i ngi jogbani i lɛ a ngie Aijɛnɛ yeemahuyei hu kungɔ na a foo puu maahu naani. Nya yekpe vulii mia ngi nya ma, kɛɛ ngii yaa kɔɔ ina ji i wieilɔ vulii ngi foo vulii aijɛnɛ ɔɔ ina hinda mia ngi hulɔni, Ngewɔ lekee lɔ i kɔɔngɔ.
47012003	Gbɛɛ ngi nde gbɔma, ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i nya jogbɛilɔ i lɛ a ngie aijɛnɛ. Ngii kɔɔ gbɔma ina i wieilɔ vulii ɔɔ ina hinda mia ngi hulɔni Ngewɔ lekee lɔ i kɔɔngɔ,
47012004	tawao i hindangaa humɛniilɔ na numu ɛɛ gu aa hugɛ, hindangaa kpaya ii numu gbi wɛ yɛpɛva la.
47012005	Faale nga lawolɔ a yeehindei jisia kɛɛ ngɛɛ lawo a nya yekpe, kɛlee hindei nasia ta nya vakaleweyii gɛ.
47012006	Kia bɛɛ nga lolɔ ngi lawo, ngɛ yɛ a kpowamɔ, ajifa tɔnyɛi lɔ nga nde. Kɛɛ ngɛɛ lawo aako numu aa gili a nge tewengɔ na ma i tɔnga nya hu kɛɛ i mɛninga nga nde.
47012007	Kɛɛ aako nya yaama aa lɛ kabande hinda gbotoi nasia va ngi hulɔni, Ngewɔ i kpalɛ nyamunyamu wɛlɛnga nya luwui ma. Yee kpalɛi lɔ a Seitana lutui yengei wie a ji a nya lewe aako kunafɔ nya yaama aa lɛ hulewengɔ.
47012008	Heima sawa ngi yɛ Ndemɔi manɛnɛ ngɛɛ i kpua nya ma.
47012009	Kɛɛ i ndeilɔ nya ma yɛ, “Ngauwanda wai ji ngi piengɔ a bie a gulɔ bi va, ajifa watii na ba yɛ nyɔngɛnyɔngɛ, yeewatii mia nya gbayei na i bi hu a yenge i lewe kpɛlɛɛ ma.” Kiahuna nya goohu nɛngɔ waa le lawova a nya yɛla nyɔngɛnyɔngɛ aako Kristi gbayei i yei nya ma nya mahugbeva.
47012010	Faale nya goohu nɛngɔe ji kpalɛ a la nya ma Kristi va. Nya gbewe ii fakalewe hu ɔɔ mbɛlɛnyani ɔɔ hou nyamu ɔɔ hinda gbɔugbɔu ɔɔ fitini hu. Gbamaile watii na nga baa a nya nda gahui kpɛlɛɛ, ta lɔ Kristi gahui a wuaa nya hu.
47012011	Nya luvama kia kpowamɔ na, kɛɛ wua mia wu kpɔndanga nya ma pieva. Wua mia mahoungɔ wu nya lato. Gbamaile ngii yɛni bɛɛ a gbɛogbɛ, nasia wu ti wumbunga a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa tii leweni nya ma a pele gbi.
47012012	Kabande hinda waawaa gbotoi nasia ta kɛ kɛ Kristi loomɔ mia a nge, ngi ti wielɔ wu lia a ndiihou wa.
47012013	Gbɔɔ ngi pienga sɔsiblaa wekangaa wɛ tamia ngi pieni wu wɛ, kɛlee ji lekee ngii loko heini wu wɛ navoo va nguava nya mahindeisia hu. A manu nya ma nyamui ji va ngi pieni a wue!
47012014	Heima yeesawa lɔ na ngi nya magbatɛnga wava wu gama tawao ngɛɛ loko hei wu wɛ hani gbi va ajifa wu yeyahani ii le ngaa lo la kɛ wua vulii. Gbɛva sie ndeengaa ii le mahoungɔ ti ti leblɛisia gɔ, ndebleisia lɔ mahoungɔ ti ti leengeisia gɔ.
47012015	Nya goohu a nɛɛlɔ nya yeyahani gbi veva kɛɛ nya gbuhɛi vulii gbɔva wu ma. Wa lolɔ a nge kulo hii jifa nya longɔ a wue hulewengɔ?
47012016	Wa lumalɔ ma na kɛ ngii wani a navoo hinda yeekaha gbi wu maahu. Kɛɛ wu lɛɛnga wa ndelɔ wuɛɛ kaasoo mia ngi kulanga wu ma, ngi wu hounga kia mani a ndei.
47012017	Kɛɛ nga yee na wie? Tutui nasia ngi ti loni wu gama ti hani gbi gbuɛilɔ wu yeya?
47012018	Ji ngi Taitɔs manɛnɛni ngɛɛ i li wu gama, ngi pielɔ taa mu mbaa Kristimamɔ weka ti li, Taitɔs i hani gbi gbuɛilɔ wu yeya ta yekpe va? Mua ta ma yenge ngafa yakpei hu lɔ, mua ta ma jia mu nyɔunyɔ gɔɔwɔi hu, ma hinda gbi wie a pele yakpei.
47012019	Tɛnga wuaa wɔɔ gba gilima kɛ mua mu magaoma wu gulɔ. Na ii le kulo bɛɛ. Ma tɔnyɛi lɔ le kia Kristi longɔ mu nde Ngewɔ gulɔ, tawao, nya liima ndiamɔisia, hindei gbi ma pie, mu piema gbɔva lɔ wu ma.
47012020	Nya liihɛlɛngɔe tɛnga ji nga wa wu gama nga male wu gba na ma nga lo la, tawao tɛngaa, wuɛɛ lo a na nga pie. Nya liihɛlɛngɔe tɛngaa nga male wa yianjia, wa tolo gbua wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wa liilewe wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wa gbewe wu gbekpeyei lekee va, wa yɛpɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ, wa mamani hindangaa wie, wa hindeisia huwu.
47012021	Nya liihɛlɛngɔe vulii kɛ ji gbɔma nga wa, mu Yewɔɛi a nya yawufelɔ wu yaama tawao nga wɔlɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ va ti jumbui nasia wiema lekee ti piema wɔɔ ngovama, tawao tii yaa gbeni ngawufema hindei ma kɛɛ puegbuala hindeisia.
47013001	Heima yeesawa lɔ naa ngi wama wu gama. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu gbi i sawei nyaningaa, numu fele ɔɔ sawa ti seli tɛɛ ti tɔilɔ i pie.”
47013002	Wu mbaangɛi nasia ti jumbu wieni ngovama kɛɛ yeepekeisia gbi, nya longɔ ngi ti laahii; ngi ti laahilɔ ji ngi pɛi yeefelei wieni wu gama, tawao nyaa ti laahiima gbɔma kiahuna lɛ nya maguhangɔ: kɛɛ watii wekei na nga wa nga kpalɛ lalɔ ti ma, ngɛɛ manu numu gbi ma.
47013003	Tɔmaseli kpɛlɛɛ wu longɔ la nga felɔ wu wɛ kɛva kɛ Kristi mia i yɛpɛma nya hu. Kristi vakalewengɔ ii le ji wua tieni wa gbɔ hinda ma, a ngi gbayayii gɛlɔ wu lia.
47013004	Tɔnya le kɛ Kristi vakalewengɔ yɛla ti ngi waani Krɔsii ma, kɛɛ Ngewɔ gbayei i pienga ngi vulungɔ kiahuna. Mua bɛɛ, ji mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, mu vakalewengɔe. Kɛɛ kpelei na ma foo wu ma Kɔlinti, mua wueni mu hu i kpɔ, ma yɛlɔ mbɛya hu mua Kristi vulungɔi-ni, kɛ mu Ngewɔ gbayei majɔɔnga hinda wieva.
47013005	A wua yekpe wogbɛ pandawanda aako wu tɔ ina wu langɔe vulii a Kristi. A tɔnya vulii wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ wu hu, ina ji wu wua yekpe wogbɛni wu tɔilɔ kɛ wu gbahailɔ.
47013006	Nya langɔ la wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ ti mu wogbɛnga ti tɔnga kɛ toblaa mia a mue vulii a tɔnya.
47013007	Kɛɛ mua Ngewɔ vɛlima kɔɔ waa hinda nyamu wie; kɛva ii le kɛ mu gungɔi, kɛɛ aako wu na wie pɔɔnangɔ, kia bɛɛ piengɔe bɛ kpahabublaa mia a mue.
47013008	Jifa hindei nasia lekee ta Ngowili Yekpei lɛ gulɔma tia lɔ ma gu a ti wiela; muɛɛ gu a gbɛogbɛ wiela Ngowili Yekpei yamava wooma.
47013009	Gbamaile mu goohu a nɛɛlɔ mua mu vakalewengɔ a yɛla kɛɛ wua wu gbayangɔ. Famia ma Ngewɔ vɛli aako wu li gulɔma a yɛla a Kristimablaa yekpengaa.
47013010	Na vamia ngi ji kpɛlɛɛ nyɛima wu gama kia nya maguhangɔ a wue, aako watii na nga foo wu ma, ngaa sabu jɔɔ ngagbalɛ hinda wieva a wue ji nga yɛ kpayei na yayengema Ndemɔi i fenga mbɛ wu loova, wu wolova ii le.
47013011	Faale naa, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a mu kpɔkɔ-o. A lapi wu yɛ a Kristimablaa yekpengaa; a nya laahiisia wumbu; wu wo i yɛ yila, wu hei ndiilɛli hu, tawao Ngewɔ na ngi longɔ a ndoma kɛɛ ndiilɛli a yɛlɔ wu lia.
47013012	A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma a ndoma lii. Ngewɔbleisia gbi mbei tɛɛ ta va wu ma kaka.
47013013	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei kɛɛ Ngewɔ lomɛi kɛɛ
47013014	Kayema Yafa mbaayɛi ti yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
48001001	Nya Pɔɔl, tomɔ lɔ a nge, nuuvu ii le aa loko lo nya ma tawao nuuvu sabu hu ii le, kɛ Yesu Kristi taa ngi Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ, na i ngi wumbuni hee hu.
48001002	Mua nya mbaa Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ mu mbei mua fama gboto yoyoma Galesia lɔlei yee sɔsiisia gama.
48001003	Nyaa mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ngɛɛ ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
48001004	Aako i mu bawo nyamu hinda yeya kiahuna, Kristi i koloya gbatɛilɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ lima hindei wieva i ta yekpe gbua a saa mu gbuava jumbui yeya.
48001005	Ngɔlɔyɛi kpɛlɛɛ i yɛ Ngewɔ ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
48001006	Wu hinda gualangɔe nya ma ajifa hinda hugutungɔi ji wuaa gbelema Ngewɔ na ma i loko loni wu ma ngauwandei na wooma Kristi i pieni a wue, wa ngowili weka gulu.
48001007	A tɔnya vulii, “Ngowili yekpe” weka ii na, kɛɛ ngi ji lemaa ajifa nungaa lɛɛngaa lɔ wu wuhu wuma a ji ti lapima Ngowili Yekpei kɔloongɔ Kristi ma maluveva.
48001008	Kɛɛ mua ɔɔ malika bɛɛ i gbua ngelegoohu i ngowili le wu ma na i gba na ma mu ndeni wu ma, Ngewɔ i ngi wuaa jahama.
48001009	Mu ndenga ngovama tawao nyaa na ndema gbɔma: numu gbi i ngowili lengaa wu ma na i gba na ma wu kuluni, Ngewɔ i ngi wuaa jahama.
48001010	Ji ngi ndenga a kɛlɔ kɛ ngi lapimaa kɔɔ nuuvunga ti nya lato? Sawo, ii hii kulo bɛɛ! Na nya longɔ la ta mia a Ngewɔ latoi! Ngi lapimaa aako nya hinda i nɛɛ nuuvungaa wɛ? Sawo, ina na mia lɛ ngi lapimaa pieva, ngɛ yɛ a ngengemɔ Kristi va.
48001011	Gbɛɛ ngi hugɛ a wue gbalauŋ, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kɛ Ngowili Yekpei na ngi ndeni wu ma ii gbuani nuuvu gama.
48001012	Ngii majɔɔni a nuuvu gbi tawao numu ii le aa nya gaa la. Yesu Kristi vulii lɔ i kɛni a nge.
48001013	Wu mɛninga kia ngi yɛ luva watii na ngi yɛ Ngewɔ vɛli a Juubleisia ti nda welei, kia ngi yɛ a Juwuya gbakpa la Ngewɔblɛisia wooma, ngɛɛ manu ti ma kulo bɛɛ, nga lapi a nya sɔbɛi gbi yee Ngewɔ hindei na hunyaniva.
48001014	Nya mbaa Juublei nasia mua tieni mu mahɔngɔ yɛla ngi yɛ leweni ti gbotoma ma Juublaa ti Yewɔ hindei wiela hu kɛɛ kaai nasia maadani ti ndoni a mue.
48001015	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i ngauwanda wieilɔ a nge a ji i nya gbuani ma gba pɛiŋ ti yaa nya le, i loko lo nya ma yengeva ngi wɛ. Tawao watii na i nɛni ngi wɛ
48001016	ngi Hindoloi gɛva a nge aako ngi ngi Ngowili Yekpei le nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie ndalongɔ ngi ma, ngii numu gbi mɔlii ndahii va,
48001017	tawao ngii lini Jelusalɛm nasia lɔva ti yɛni a toblɛisia nya gulɔ. Kia ngaa na wie, ngi lini yakpe Arebia lɔlei hu lɔ, na wooma ngi yama Damaskɔs lɛi hu.
48001018	Foo sawa i leweni pɛiŋ ngi yaa li Jelusalɛm aako mua Pita mu yɛpɛ, tawao mua ta mu yɛ na hoki fele.
48001019	Ngii tomɔ weka gbi lɔni kɛlee Jemisi, Ndemɔi ndewei.
48001020	Na ngi nyɛima tɔnya le. Ngewɔ kɔɔlɔ kɛ ndɛɛ ii le ngaa yɛ kulama.
48001021	Na wooma ngi liilɔ taangaa hu Siria lɔlei hu kɛɛ Silisia lɔlei hu.
48001022	A watii na Kristimablei nasia ti yɛ heiheini Judia lɔlei hu tii yɛ nya gɔɔ.
48001023	Na lekee ti yɛ kɔɔngɔ ta mia a na nungaa wekeisia ti yɛ nde tɛɛ, “Numui na wɔɔ i yɛ a pie juwuya i yɛ la mu ma taa na Yesu Wowili Yekpei na lema i yɛ lapi wɔɔ hunyaniva.”
48001024	Faale ti siɛgbuɛilɔ Ngewɔ ma kɔloongɔ nya ma.
48002001	Foo puu maahu naani na wooma, mua Banabasi mu yamɛilɔ gbɔma Jelusalɛm, ngi li a Taitɔs bɛɛ.
48002002	Ngi liilɔ jifa Ngewɔ i kɛilɔ a nge kɛ mahoungɔe ngi li. Ji mua tokulɔisia lekee mu gomɛni ngi Ngowili na hugɛilɔ a tie nga nde nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie. Ngii yɛ loni nya yengei na ngi pienga ngovama kɛɛ na ngi piema kiahuna i yɛ a kɛɛ-mɔɔnɛ.
48002003	Nya mbaa Taitɔs, kia bɛɛ Grikimɔ a ngie, tii kpɔndani ngi ma ngi heiva bili ya,
48002004	kia bɛɛ nungaa lɛɛngaa ti yɛ loni na i wie. Yeenungɛi jisia ti wuaailɔ mu lia yɛlɛŋ mu yabɛɛva, ta kɛ bi tɔaa bɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimableisia mia a tie aako ti tɔ kia mu gbuangɔ la nduwɔyahu jifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu. Ti longɔ yɛla ti mu yɛ a nduwɔngaa,
48002005	kɛɛ aako mu Ngowili Yekpei yee tɔnyɛi lamagbatɛ wu va hinda aa pie, muii lumani na ma ti longɔ yɛla mu pie.
48002006	Kɛɛ nasia Kristimablaa wekeisia ti ti wumbuni, a tokulɔisia, nyaa ji lema ajifa nya gbewe ii le ti yɛni a gbɔɔ; Ngewɔ ɛɛ kiti lewe numu ma bi yɛyii va; nyaa ndema kɛ, tokulɔi nasia tii hinda nina gbi wuni nya gulɔ pieva.
48002007	Kia taa na wie, ti tɔilɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Ngowili Yekpei lela nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie yeengengei loko wuaanga nya yeya, kia lɔɔ i Ngowili Yekpei lela Juublaa ma yeengengei veni Pita wɛ.
48002008	Faale Ngewɔ gbayei lɔ i pieni ngi yɛni a tomɔ nasia gama Juublaa yaa tie kia lɔɔ Pita i yɛni a tomɔ Juubleisia gama.
48002009	Jemisi, Pita kɛɛ Jɔn, nasia Kristimableisia ti ti wumbuni a tokulɔisia ti kɔɛilɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i ngengei ji venga nya wɛ gba; faale ti loko wuaailɔ mua Banabasi yeya kɛva kɛ mbaanga mia a mua tieni kpɛlɛɛ. Mu hugbatɛilɔ kɛ mua Banabasi ma yenge nasia lia lɔ Juublaa yaa tie, tia ta yenge Juubleisia lia.
48002010	Na lekee ti mu mɔlini fa tamia a ji tɛɛ mu yaa gili a hinda-gbɔundablei nasia ti ti lia tawao na vulii mia nya magbɛlingɔ yɛla pieva.
48002011	Kɛɛ kia Pita i foni Antiɔk, ngi ngi wiehindei magbuɛilɔ Kristimableisia yaama ajifa i yɛ laailɔ ke kɛ kpulanga mia i pieni.
48002012	Pɛiŋ Juublei nasia lɛnga Jemisi i ti looni ti yaa foo Antiɔk, Pita tia mu ndeengɛi nasia Juublaa yaa a tie ti yɛlɔ a mɛhɛɛ mɛ hinda yakpe. Kɛɛ yeenungeisia ti fongɔi wooma, i gbuɛilɔ ti woohu, ɛɛ luma tia tieni taa gbɔma mɛhɛɛ mɛ jifa i luwɛilɔ nasia ma ti yɛ nde tɛɛ kɛlee ti nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti hei bili ya.
48002013	Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia Juublaa a tie tia bɛɛ ti toilɔ Pita ma a nduwɛi ji wiela, tawao Banabasi vulii bɛɛ i ti wokɔɛilɔ i na wie i kɔɔngɔ kɛ ii wɔnani.
48002014	Kia ngi tɔni kɛ tii jiama a tɔnya welei na Ngowili Yekpei i kɛni, ngi ndeilɔ Pita ma ti gbi yaama ngɛɛ, “Juumɔ lɔ a bie, na hu gbi biaa gɛ hindei wiema kia nasia Juublaa yaa tie, ba na wie ii gbuani a Juumɔ. Gbɛe na hɔɔ bi lapima kpɔndava nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie bɛɛ ti luva kia Juungaa?”
48002015	Tɔnya le kɛ Juungaa lɔ a mue mu leyii hu, muii yɛni a “Nasia Juublaa yaa tie yee jumbungɔisia”.
48002016	Na hu gbi mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ a numu yɛlɔ a pɔɔnamɔ i tia ta luahu gbatɛ jifa lekee ngi langɔ a Yesu Kristi, na wieva ii le Sawei longɔ la. Mua bɛɛ mu langa a Yesu Kristi aako Ngewɔ i mu yɛ a pɔɔnablaa i mua tieni luahu gbatɛ jifa mu langɔ a Kristi, na wieva ii le Sawei longɔ la. Gbamaile numu gbi tia Ngewɔ ti luahu ɛɛ gbatɛ jifa a na wie Sawei longɔ la.
48002017	Ina hɔɔ kia mu lapima mua Ngewɔ-ni mu luahu gbatɛva a ji mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, mu woteilɔ a “Jumbublaa,” kia lɔɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti na, kɛ Kristi i mɔnɛma aako jumbui i li gulɔma? Ii hii kulo bɛɛ!
48002018	Sawei yeenasia ngi ti hunyanini ngɛɛ tii yaa gbekpeni Kristimamɔ va, ina ngi tɔɔtoilɔ gbɔma a ti hugbatɛla, kɛ ngi kɛnga kɛ jumbumɔ vulii lɔ a nge.
48002019	I gɛlɛ Sawei lekee ma, nya haangɔe, Sawei vulii lɔ i nya waani, aako ngi vulu yengeva Ngewɔ wɛ. Ti mua Kristi waanga wɔɔ krɔsii ma,
48002020	faale nya ii le gbɔma nya vulungɔ aa yɛla, Kristi mia ngi vulungɔ nya hu. Ndɛvui ji na i nya hu kiahuna, i nya hu lɔ jifa nya langɔ a Ngewɔ Hindoloi na i loni a nge, i ngi lɛɛvui ve nya va.
48002021	Ngii gbeleni Ngewɔ yauwandei ma. Kɛɛ Sawei i yɛngaa a sabu Ngewɔ i tia numu luahu gbatɛ, kɛ Kristi i haailɔ gbama.
48003001	Wu Kristimablaa gbowangɔi nasia wu Galesia! Ye lɔ i wu gbɛgbɛlinga? Hee na Yesu Kristi pieni krɔsii ma, ngi nduawoilɔ gbalauŋ wu gama!
48003002	A mɔli yilei ji gbɛmbo lɛ nya wɛ: wu Ngewɔ Yafei majɔɛilɔ jifa wu na wieni Sawei longɔ la ɔɔ jifa wu Ngowili Yekpei humɛnini kɛ wu laala?
48003003	Wa yee gu wu gbowa hii! Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ i pieni wu ndɛvu nina lɔto; wu longɔe na wu ngakpua a wu wuma gbaya?
48003004	Na kpɛlɛɛ i wu wienga ii yɛni a gbɛogbɛ wu gama? A tɔnya na i yɛni vulii a hinda lɔ.
48003005	Ngewɔ a ngi Yafei velɔ wu wɛ, i kaabande hindangaa wie wu lia jifa wa na wie Sawei longɔ la ɔɔ jifa wa Ngowili Yekpei humɛni wu la la?
48003006	A gili a na i Ebraham wieni; kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “I lailɔ a Ngewɔ tawao ngi lava a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi wumbuilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ.”
48003007	Mahoungɔe hɔɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia yeetɔnyangɔisia a nungei nasia lɔ ti langɔ a Ngewɔ.
48003008	Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i kulɔmayia leilɔ yɛ Ngewɔ a taa nasia Juublaa yaa tie luahu gbatɛlɔ ji ta la a ngie. Faale Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i Ngowili Yekpei hinda hugɛilɔ a Ebraham ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ngewɔ a pielɔ luba i yɛ nuuvu kpɛlɛɛ ma bi sabui hu.”
48003009	Ebraham i lailɔ a Ngewɔ tawao i luba majɔɛilɔ; faale nasia kpɛlɛɛ ta la a Ngewɔ ta luba majɔɔlɔ kia i ngi wieni.
48003010	Nasia ta gili tɛɛ Ngewɔ a ti gululɔ jifa ta Sawei hou, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ti ma. Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu na gbi ii loni na kpɛlɛɛ wiela ma tɔnyangɔ Sawa Gɔlɛi hu, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ngi ma!”
48003011	I langa na ke kɛ Ngewɔ ɛɛ tia numu gbi luahu gbatɛ jifa a na wie Sawei longɔ la, ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numui na lekee Ngewɔ a tia ta luahu gbatɛ jifa ngi langɔ a Ngewɔ, tamia a ndɛvui majɔɔ.”
48003012	Kɛɛ Sawei houla kɛɛ lola a Ngewɔ ti gba polouŋ ti nyɔunyɔ ma. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Numui na lekee a na kpɛlɛɛ wie Sawei longɔ la a ndɛvui majɔɔ hu lɔ.”
48003013	Kristi i mu wumawonga sondui yeya na Sawei a wala, ji i woteni a sondumamɔ mu va; ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ti ngi waani ti ngi hɛlɛ ngulii ma, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ngi ma.”
48003014	Kristi i ji wieilɔ aako lubei na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni pieva a Ebraham i foo nasia gama Juublaa yaa tie Yesu Kristi sabui hu, kɔɔ mu langaa a Kristi mu kpɛlɛɛ mu Ngewɔ Yafei na majɔɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa.
48003015	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, hindei nasia ta wie folo gbi, nyaa yeengila yɛma a Ngewɔ Lahei yeetɔmaseli. Numu fele ti hinda yangilingaa, ti kɔlɔ gbatɛ fa ti ti lɛisia nyɛi ma, numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa nganyani ɔɔ i mato a hani gbi.
48003016	A nda nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ i ngi laheisia wumbuni Ebraham lɔ gama kɛɛ ngi bɔɔsɔɛi. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ii ndeni aa yɛma “bɔɔsɔɛisia” ngi lii aa yɛ faha ma, ngi lii i yɛ “bɔɔsɔ” yakpe lɔ ma tamia a Kristi.
48003017	Na nya lii i ma tamia a ji; kɛ Ngewɔ tia Ebraham ti hinda yangililɔ tawao Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbu yɛ ɛɛ nganyani. Sawei na Ngewɔ i feni foo hɔndɔ naani kaalɛ numu gbɔyɔngɔ maahu puu na wooma ɛɛ gu aa hinda yangilingɔi na yanyani tawao ɛɛ gu i Ngewɔ Lahei lufe.
48003018	Gbamaile ina jifa numu a Sawei hou famia Ngewɔ a hinda yekpe wie a ngie, kɛ ii piema Lahei na va i mbumbuni, na hu gbi, jifa Ngewɔ lahei wumbuni, famia i feni Ebraham wɛ.
48003019	Kɛ gbɔɔ hɔɔ Sawei yengei yɛla? Ngewɔ i ngi hinda yangilingɔi matoilɔ a Sawei kɛva kɛ nuuvunga ti jumbu wienga tawao Sawei yɛma lekee wɔɔ na haaŋ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛi na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni ngi gama fa i wa. Malikeisia lɔ Ngewɔ i pieni ti yei a Sawei Mojisi wɛ, Mojisi i fe nungeisia wɛ kɛ i wotenga a nduahu jiagamɔ Ngewɔ taa nungeisia luahu.
48003020	Kɛɛ watii na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni Ebraham gama, ta yakpe lɔ i pieni, nduahumɔ ii yɛ ma.
48003021	Kɛ Sawei tia Ngewɔ laheisia ti gɔmaa a ti nyɔunyɔ? Sawo, tii gɔma kulo bɛɛ! Gbamaile ina Ngewɔ jawei a gulɔ a numu bawola, Ngewɔ a taa numui gbi luahu gbatɛlɔ jifa ta yeesawei hou.
