48003022	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ dunyablaa gbi lɔ jumbui gbayei yeya; faale kpekpeyei wɔɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni pieva, a pie a nasia lɔ ta la a Yesu Kristi.
48003023	Kɛɛ pɛiŋ lala a Kristi yeewatii i yaa wa, mu magbangɔ yɛla sawei yeya, haaŋ i to lalei magɛ gbei ma.
48003024	Faale Sawei lɔ mu yɛ ngi va haaŋ Kristi i wa, aako i mua Ngewɔ-ni luahu gbatɛ ji ma la a Kristi.
48003025	Kia na watii i hitinga lava a Kristi, muii yaa Sawei gbayei bu.
48003026	Jifa wu langɔ a Kristi famia wu kpɛlɛɛ wu yɛnga a Ngewɔ leengeisia, wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
48003027	Ti wu wuailɔ kɛ wua Kristi-ni wu wilinga hu, tawao kiahuna na wu kpɛlɛɛ wu wu lii huyilinga wieva kia Kristi vulii i na.
48003028	Faale nduahugɛ gbi ii yaa Juublaa luahu tia nasia Juublaa yaa tie, nduwɔngeisia tia nasia nduwɔ yaa tie, hingeisia tia nyahangɛisia, wu kpɛlɛɛ numu yakpe lɔ a wue, wu wilingɔ hu wua Yesu Kristi-ni.
48003029	Ina Kristi woo lɔ a wue, kɛ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia lɔ a wue, tawao wa poohani na majɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa.
48004001	Na nya longɔ ngi nde tamia a ji: ndoi na ngi kɛkɛ woohani i loma ngi yeya, ta ngi houlɔ kia nduwɔ watii lɛ ngi gulongɔ, kia bɛɛ ta vulii lɔ ngi woo a hanii gbi.
48004002	Ngi gulongɔi hu, nungaa lɔ na ta ngi mahugbe, ta ngi hindei hugbatɛ haaŋ i to watii na ma ngi kɛkɛ a kɛ ta yekpe ngi hindei hugbatɛva.
48004003	Hii lɔɔ mua bɛɛ mu yɛ dunyei yeengafangeisia ti luwɔyɛi hu haaŋ mu yafeisia ti lakpa.
48004004	Kɛɛ ji watii yekpei i hitini sɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi Hindoloi yoyoilɔ dunyei hu. I woteilɔ a nuuvu, dunyama nyaha i ngi le, i wuaa Juublaa ti Jawei bu,
48004005	nasia mabawova ti yɛ yee Sawei bu, aako mu gbi mu yɛ a Ngewɔ leengeisia.
48004006	Kɔɔ Ngewɔ i kɛ kɛ ngi leengeisia mia a mue, i ngi Hindoloi Yafei wuaailɔ mu hu, Ngafei na a Ngewɔ loli gbalauŋ yɛ “Kɛkɛ, nya Kɛkɛ.”
48004007	Faale na, ndɔwu yaa gbɔma a bie, ndo lɔ na a bie. Tawao jifa ngi lui lɔ a bie, Ngewɔ a bi gɔlɔ na kpɛlɛɛ hu i ngi yeya ngi leengeisia va.
48004008	Wɔɔ ta, wuii yɛ Ngewɔ gɔɔ, famia wu yɛ nduwɔya hu haningaa yeya tii yɛni a Ngewɔngaa.
48004009	Kɛɛ kiahuna na wu Ngewɔ gɔnga, ɔɔ, mu nde muɛɛ Ngewɔ i wu gɔnga. Gbɛe wu longɔ wu yama gbɔma dunyama yafeisia gama nasia ti dunyei mahu nasia kpaya gbi ii ti wɛ? Gbɛe wu longɔ wu yama gbɔma ti luwɔyɛi hu?
48004010	Wa hɛɛ-gomɛngaa houlɔ folo lɛɛngaa ma kɛɛ ngalu lɛɛngaa kɛɛ foi yeewatii lɛɛnga kɛɛ foo lɛɛnga.
48004011	Wu hinda i nya liihɛlɛngɔe! Kɛ ngengei kpɛlɛɛ ngi pienga gbɔva wu ma i yɛma a kɛɛwɛ-mɔɔnɛ lɔ?
48004012	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu lemungɔe, a wie kia ngi na, ajifa nya bɛɛ ngi wienga kia wu na. Wuii yaa hinda nyamu gbi wieni a nge.
48004013	Taa wu nɛmahu kɛ ngi Ngowili Yekpei leilɔ wu ma haalei hu; jifa nya heegbɛngɔ yɛla.
48004014	Kɛɛ kia bɛɛ nya heegbɛi i yɛni a kaha wu ma, wuii lɛɛni nya hu, tawao wuii gbeleni nya ma. Kia waa na wie, wu loko heiilɔ nya bu kia numu a loko hei Ngewɔ malika bu; wu loko heiilɔ nya bu bi tɔa bɛɛ Yesu Kristi mia wu loko heima ngi bu.
48004015	Wu goohu nɛngɔ waa yɛla! Nya vuli nga ndelɔ kɛ wu yɛ wu yamɛisia gbualɔ hu wu fe nya wɛ, ina wu yɛ gulɔ. Kɛɛ gbɔɔ na wienga?
48004016	Wu nya wotenga na a wu juwu jifa ngi tɔnyɛi lenga wu ma?
48004017	Nungaa wekeisia lɔ lapima vulii aako wu lewe ti wooma, kɛɛ na i ti nɛmahu pieva ii nyandeni wu va. Na lekee ti longɔ la ta mia a ji wa gbele nya wohu wu yɛ ti va, aako ti hinda i gbewe wu ma kia wu ndɛi gbewengɔ ti ma.
48004018	Nyandengɔe numu i gbewe hii numu wekei va ina na i ngi nɛmahu kpekpengɔe. Ji lɔnyangɔe kpele gbi, nya yɛngɔi hu lekee ii le wu lia.
48004019	Nya liima leengeisia, ndo-le-goohu-gbalɛi na a yɛ koonyahɛi ma, nyɔkɔ mia i nya ma wu va haaŋ i lohu wu wie kia Kristi na.
48004020	Nya longɔ waa le mua wueni mu yɛ mia ngaamɛi ji, aako ngi nya yɛpɛyii wu gama maluve. Wu hinda i nya liihɛlɛngɔ waa le.
48004021	A hugɛ lɛɛ na a nge, wua wu longɔ wu yɛ Sawei bu, wuii na mɛnima Sawei i ndema?
48004022	Yɛ hindolo fele lɔ ti yɛ Ebraham yeya, tia nduwɔ-nyaha yila ti yeengila le, kɛɛ nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ti yeepekei le.
48004023	Ndoi na nduwɔ-nyahɛi i ndeni taa Ebraham lɔ ti ndeni kia ta ndoo gbi le la, kɛɛ nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ngi nda loi i yɛni a Ngewɔ Lahei yeehuvɛi lɔ.
48004024	Tɔmaseli lɔ a ji. Nyaha felei jisia ti na hinda yangilingɔ fele lɔ va. Yeena i ndeengaa leni nduwɔyɛi hu tamia a Hega tawao ta lɔ hindei na Ngewɔ taa Isrɛlbleisia ti ngangilini Sainai Yiyei wumba, yeetɔmaseli a ngie.
48004025	Hega, na looni Sainai Yiyei va Arebia lɔlei hu, i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ taa wai Jelusalɛm na va i na kiahuna, ajifa tiaa nduwɔya hu taa ngi leengeisia gbi.
48004026	Kɛɛ Jelusalɛm yeena i mahui i yɛni a nyahɛi na lɔ nduwɔ yaa ngie, tawao ta lɔ mu nje le.
48004027	Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Goohunɛɛ, nyaha gbemangɔi! Yelei gula a kohunɛ, bia bii ndoo-le-goohugbaalɛ yaati gɔɔni! Gbamaile nyahɛi na ti vayani ngi ma a ndeengaa mato jɔlɔ i lewe nyahɛi na ma ngi hinii ii gbeleni ngi ma.”
48004028	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, Ngewɔ leengeisia lɔ a wue kia Aisaki i yɛ na Lahei na va Ngewɔ i mbumbuni.
48004029	A watii na wɔɔ ndoi na ti ngi leni a ndoo gbi leyii i juwuya gbakpailɔ yeena ma Ngewɔ Yafei i pieni ti ngi le. Yeehinda yakpei mia i wiema kiahuna bɛɛ.
48004030	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ gbɛ? Yɛ, “Nduwɔ-nyahɛi taa ngi loi gbɛ mbei ti li; ajifa nduwɔ-nyahɛi loi taa nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie loi tɛɛ gbɔ ti kɛkɛ yeyahaniisia ma.”
48004031	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nduwɔ-nyahɛi leengaa yaa a mue, nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ngi leengeisia lɔ a mue.
48005001	Mu yaa nduwɔyahu, Kristi i mu gbuanga nduwɔyɛi hu! A yɛ na naa, kɛɛ nduwɔya hu ii le, waa luma taa gbɔma wu wote a nduwɔngaa.
48005002	A woolo! Nya nya, Pɔɔl ngi nde wu ma kɛ wu lumangaa ti wu hei bili, ya kɛ na gbi Kristi pienga ii yɛni a gbɛ-o-gbɛ wu wɛ.
48005003	Nyaa gbɔma numui na laahima a luma ti ngi hei bili ya kɛ kpa lɔ ngi ma Sawei kpɛlɛɛ houva.
48005004	Wua wu lapima aako Ngewɔ i wu yɛ a pɔɔnablaa sawa houle wooma, wu wua yekpe gbendanga Kristi ma tawao wu baanga a Ngewɔ yauwandei.
48005005	Kɛɛ mua, na mu kulɔgbema ta mia a ji kɛ Ngewɔ a mu yɛlɔ a pɔɔnablaa; ji lɔ mu mawuloma tawao Ngewɔ Yafei a gbɔlɔ mu ma, jifa mu langɔ a Kristi.
48005006	Ajifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu yɛngaa la, numu heingɔ i yɛla bili ya ɔɔ ngi heingɔ ii le bili ya, gbɛ-o-gbɛ yaa na. Na baama hinda le ta mia a ji ma kɛ kɛ mu langɔe a Kristi a ji ma lo a nungaa wekeisia.
48005007	Wuaa gɛ wiimɛ ma pandaa! Ye lɔ i pienga wu gbenga a golo la a tɔnyɛi? I yee pieni i guni wu ma?
48005008	Ngewɔ na i loko loni wu ma ta ii le aa ji wie.
48005009	Kia ta nde la tɛɛ, “Yisti wulo hii lekee mia a pie lɛwɛ wai gbi i ve i yɛ buufa.”
48005010	Kɛɛ nya nya lii longɔe Ndemɔi ma wu va. Jifa mua wueni kpɛlɛɛ mu wilingɔ hu, nya langɔe la kɛ wuɛɛ nya nda nɛmahui gula waa peka wumbu tawao nya langɔe la kɛ numui na i wu lii gbavoma, i yɛ a numu-o-numu, Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ lalɔ ngi ma.
48005011	Kɛɛ nya, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ina kia ti ndema la, nyaa lekee nungaa gaama ngɛ mahoungɔ ti yɛ a nungaa hei bili ya, kɛ gbɛe nungaa ti juwuya hitɛngɔ nya wooma lekee? Ina nyaa vulii na lema, kɛ Ngowili Yekpei ji nga nde kɔloongɔ Kristi haalei ma krɔsii ma ii yɛ numu gbi vawɔli.
48005012	Nga yɛ loni nasia ti wu lii gbavoma ti nɔɔ ma ti ngakpua; ti nɔɔ ma vulii ti lewe bili ma ti tia yekpe nuuni.
48005013	Kɛɛ wua, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, Ngewɔ i wu gbuanga nduwɔya hu. Kɛɛ waa wu gbuala nduwɔyahu aa yɛ a wu gbuawee wu luwui ma hindeisia wieva. Kia waa na wie, a wu nyɔunyɔ magbewe gbua ndoma hu.
48005014	Ajifa Sawei kpɛlɛɛ wuaangɔ njɛpɛ yakpɛi ji lɔ hu; “Lo a nungaa wekeisia kia bi longɔ a bia yekpe.”
48005015	Kɛɛ wu luvangaa kia fulahuangɛisia ta pie la, wa wu nyɔunyɔ nyinyi, wa wu gbaalɛ, kɛ a wu mahugbe, ina na ii le wa wu nyɔunyɔ hinda huwulɔ kpɛmgbɛjɛɛ.
48005016	Na ngi ndema ta mia a ji: A jia a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ a wue, tawao waa wu luwui liima hindeisia wie.
48005017	Gbamaile mu luwui liima hinda nyamui nasia mu nuuvuyei longɔ a piela, Ngewɔ Yafei ii loni mu ti wie; tawao hinda yekpei nasia ma lo mu ti wie ji Ngewɔ Yafei a yɛ mu hu, tamia mu nuuvuyei ii loni la. Hinda felei jisia ti mu hu tiaa Tuuŋ lapima wɛlɛva ti nyɔunyɔ maahu tawao ta pielɔ wuɛɛ gu waa na wie wu longɔ wu pie.
48005018	Wu jiangaa a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ, kɛ kpa ii yaa wu ma sawei houva.
48005019	Gbɔɔ nuuvuyei a pie i lailɔ kengelee, hinda nyamui jisia mia ta gbua hu: manɔhɔ hindeisia, ngawufema hindeisia;
48005020	hɛɛla nɔmɔliisia ma kɛɛ huana hindei. Nunga ta juwuyalɔ a ti nyɔunyɔ, ta lapi a ti nyɔunyɔ; ta lololɔ, ti liilewengɔ tawao hani gbi ɛɛ gu a tie. Ti luahu a gɔlɛkɔlɛlɔ ti hei a tiwa kɛɛ kuluma;
48005021	ta tomaya wie, ndɔi a ti hou, ta ndɔ-gboli-gomɛisia ga, ta hinda wekeisia wie kia jisia ti na. Nyaa na wu laahima kia ngi pienga la ngovama, nasia ta hindei jisia wie tɛɛ Kohunɛ na majɔɔ nasia ti Ngewɔ Mahayɛi bu ta majɔɔ.
48005022	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei i yaa yengema a mue, na a gbua hu tamia a ndoma, kohunɛ, ndiilɛli, ndiigɔlɛ, hindawanda, kpekpeya, pɔɔna hinda wiela,
48005023	ngayei kɛɛ ndiihou. Sawa gbii na kɛva kɛ hindei jisia ti nyamungɔ.
48005024	Tawao nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ Yesu Kristi woo a tie ti ti nuuvuyei gbakpanga krɔsii ma, tia ngi manima hindeisia kɛɛ ngi liima hindeisia.
48005025	Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ i ndɛvui venga mu wɛ, mahoungɔ ta i kɛ a mue ma yee jia hinda gbi hu.
48005026	Mu yaama aa lɛ, maa jia mu nyɔunyɔ liima, ɔɔ maa lolo a mu nyɔunyɔ.
48006001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu tɔngaa wu yilayee i hinda nyamu laasi gbi wienga, mahoungɔ wua Ngewɔ Yafei i wu hu wu ngi lo pele yekpe ma, kɛɛ waa pie a ŋajiŋaji. Tawao a wu jiayii mahugbe aako wua bɛɛ hinda nyamu wie mani aa wu lɔ.
48006002	A ya a gbɔ wu nyɔunyɔ ma wu hinda gbɔugbɔisia hu; wu na wiengaa kɛ wu Kristi jawei hounga.
48006003	Numu i ta yekpe wumbungaa a baamamɔ waa kɛɛ gbɛ-o-gbɛ yaa a ngie, kɛ i ta yekpe lekee lɔ wɛlɛma.
48006004	Numu gbi i ngi wiehindei jɔgbɛ. Kpekpengɔ yɛngaa la, kɛ a mata gbualɔ a na ta vulii i pienga, kɛɛ aa huma na ma numu weka i pienga.
48006005	Gbamaile numu gbi a ngi nda ngahɛi lɔ hou.
48006006	Mahoungɔe numui na ti ngi gaama a Ngewɔ layiei i luma taa ngi Kaamɔ ti gbɔ hani yekpei kpɛlɛɛ ma i ngi yeya.
48006007	Waa wua yekpe wɛlɛ; numu gbi ɛɛ Ngewɔ wuhu baa. Tuhani na numu a hii, tamia lɔɔ a tewe.
48006008	Numu i tuhani hinga ngi luwui liima hindeisia yeekpalɛi hu, na a tewe na tamia a hee; i tuhani hiingaa Ngewɔ Yafei gbaalɛi hu, na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe ngi wɛ teweva, tamia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui.
48006009	Faale mu gahu aa gbɔyɔ a hinda yekpe wiela; gbamaile muii gbeilɔ kpekpe wiela ma, watii a hitilɔ ma yeenafei majɔɔ.
48006010	Faale, watii gbi lekee mu sabu jɔnga, mahoungɔ mu hinda yekpe wie a numu gbi, kakayee nasia mua tieni mu langɔ a Kristi.
48006011	A kɔlɔ-loi jisia wɔlɔyii lɔ lɛɛ ngi nyɛima ji ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima na wu gama a nya lokoi vulii!
48006012	Nungɛi nasia ti lapima bili gbɔndava wu ma tia mia a nasia ta ti luwumɛi nyandeyii magɛ, ta gbɔma lawo la. Na hu gbi, ta pielɔ lekee aako nungaa taa hitɛ ti wooma a juwuya Kristi krɔsii va.
48006013	Nasia vulii bɛɛ ta ti hei bili ya tɛɛ Sawei hou; ti longɔ ti wu hei bili ya kɔɔ ti lawo kɛ ti gunga wu ma lumava ti yenge wu luwui ma.
48006014	Na hu gbi, nya nga lawo lekee a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi krɔsii lɔ; ajifa ngi krɔsii sabui hu lɔ dunyei haangɔ nya wɛ, nya haangɔ dunyei wɛ.
48006015	Hinda gbi ii le ina numu heingɔe bili ya ɔɔ ngi heingɔ ii le bili ya. Na baa i ma ta mia a ji Ngewɔ a numu gbatɛ a nina.
48006016	Nasia ta sawei ji hou ti lɛɛvuisia hu, Ngewɔ i ti gɔ a ndiilɛli kɛɛ manuma tia kɛɛ Ngewɔ nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ!
48006017	Pɛiŋ ngi ya kɔlɛi ji nyɛila gbɔyɔ: gbɛɛ ngi nde; numu gbi aa gbɔma nya vawɔli, ajifa kpɔi jisia ti nya luwuma ta kɛlɔ kɛ Yesu luwei mia a nge.
48006018	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia. Amiina.
49001001	Nya Pɔɔl, nya i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ i nya yɛni a tomɔ Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Kristimablei nasia gama ti ɛfisɔs, nasia tɛɛ wote jifa ti wilingɔ hu tia Yesu-ni:
49001002	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
49001003	A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma jifa kia mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, i ngelegoohu gbekpeyɛi yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ wienga a mue mu yafeisia.
49001004	Pɛiŋ bɛɛ wɔɔ dunyei i yaa gbatɛ, Ngewɔ i loko longa wɔɔ mu ma yɛva a ngi woo, a ji mua Kristi-ni ma wili hu aako mu jiayii i yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ Ngewɔ yaama, tawao jumbu gbi aa yɛ mu ma. Ndomɛi va Ngewɔ pieni a mue,
49001005	hugbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi lii hu mu woteva a ngi leengeisia Yesu Kristi sabui hu, ji lɔ nɛngɔ yɛla ngi wɛ pieva.
49001006	Na a pielɔ tato i yɛ Ngewɔ ma ngi yauwanda wai va i pieni a mue gbaama, ngi Hindoloi sabui hu, na ngi langɔ la.
49001007	Jifa Kristi i haani krɔsii ma, i mu wumawonga a ngi ŋamɛi tawao Ngewɔ i gbenga mu jumbuisia ma. Ngewɔ yauwandei ya wɔlɔni ma kpa;
49001008	na ya wɔlɔngɔ wa i pieni a mue a ngi nɛmahu gbi kɛɛ ngi hinda hugɔɔlei.
49001009	Ngewɔ i na wieilɔ i yɛ ngi lii hu, i hinda hugbatɛngɔ lɔwungɔi na hugɛ a mue i yɛ ngi lii hu pieva a Kristi loko.
49001010	Yeehinda hugbatɛngɔi na Ngewɔ a ngakpua lɔ ji yeewatii a hiti, ta mia a ngi gbatɛ-hani kpɛlɛɛ lɛla ma hinda yila; hani gbi ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunyei hu, i Kristi yɛ a ngui ti mahu.
49001011	Hindei gbi a wielɔ kia i Ngewɔ lii hu kɛɛ kia i hugbatɛni la; tawao Ngewɔ i loko loilɔ mu ma yɛva a ngi nungeisia, mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu kia i yɛ ngi lii hu pieva pɛiŋ wɔɔ i yaa hani gbi gbatɛ.
49001012	Mua, mua yese mu liiloni Kristi ma. Kɛɛ i loko loilɔ mu ma aako mu tato ve Ngewɔ wɔlɔyei wɛ.
49001013	Wua bɛɛ wu woteilɔ a Ngewɔbleisia ji wu ngowili yeetɔnyangɔi mɛnini, Ngowili Yekpei na i pieni Ngewɔ i wu bawoni. Wu lailɔ a Kristi tawao Ngewɔ i ngi lokowoi wuilɔ wu ma yɛva a ngi woo a ji i ngi Yafei na veni wu wɛ i Lahei wumbuni fa.
49001014	Ji mu Ngewɔ Yafei majɔɔnga, mu langa la kɛ ma na majɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva ngi nungeisia wɛ, tawao a pielɔ mu la la kɛ Ngewɔ a nasia gbualɔ yɛlɛŋ nduwɔyahu ngi woo a tie. A mu ngi wɔlɔyei lato!
49001015	Sabui ji va lɔ i hiye watii ma ngi mɛnini kɛ wu langɔe a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi, tawao wu longɔ a Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ,
49001016	ngi yaa lɛɛvui a siɛgbuala Ngewɔ ma wu va. Nga wu laa gɛlɔ ji nga yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima
49001017	tawao nga mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ wɔlɔngɔ wai manɛnɛ aako i ngi Yafei ve wu wɛ, yee-Ngafei i pie wu nɛmahu i lewe, i Ngewɔ gɛ a wue, aako wu tɔnyɛi gɔɔ kɔloongɔ ngi ma.
49001018	Nyaa ngi vɛlima gbɔma kɔɔ wu nɛmahuisia ti lawo tɔnyɛi na gɔva gbalauŋ a gbua Ngewɔ gama aako wu hani na gɔɔ i wu lolinga kulɔgbeva, kɛɛ kabande gbekpeya gboto wai na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbunga feva ngi nungeisia wɛ,
49001019	kɛɛ ngi gbayei huleweni kpa i yengema mu hu, mua mu langɔ a Kristi. Yeekpekpeya yakpei ji i yengema mu hu ti yakpe tia kpaya wai na
49001020	Ngewɔ i Kristi wuni la hee hu, i ngi hei ngi yeja gakei ma ngelegoohu.
49001021	Ngewɔ Kristi yɛlɔ a maha, ngi lewengɔ polouŋ mahubleisia gbi ma kɛɛ nasia kpaya wuangɔ ti yeya, kɛɛ tomableisia, kɛɛ mahawaisia tawao i leweni toma-biyɛi yeekpayei ma i dunyeihu kɛɛ na poma.
49001022	Ngewɔ i hani kpɛlɛɛ wuailɔ Kristi bu, kɛ i ngi wotɛnga a ngui hani gbi mahu sɔsii va.
49001023	Sɔsii i yɛni a Kristi gbuhɛi lɔ, tawao sɔsii lɔ i Kristi yakpuani, Kristi na i hani kpɛlɛɛ yakpuani dunyei hu gbi.
49002001	Bi wiengɔ kia haamɔ Ngewɔ yaama, ajifa wu gangani a Ngewɔ, wa jumbu hindeisia wie.
49002002	A watii na, wu jiani a pele na lɔ hinda nyamublaa ti jiama la; wu golongɔ yɛla ngafa nyamui nasia ti hinda gbi ti maha nyamui wɛ, ngafei na i yengema kiahuna a nungei nasia ti gangangɔ a Ngewɔ.
49002003	A tɔnya kia ti na, hii wɔɔ mu gbi mu yɛ na, ma lewe a mu nyɛkɛ gbuala, ma hinda gbi lekee wie mu gbuhɛisia liilɛliva kɛɛ mu nɛmahuisia. Kia lee nungaa gbi ti na, Ngewɔ i liileweilɔ huɛɛŋ mu ma jumbui va.
49002004	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ manumangɔ waa le, tawao ngi longɔ waa a mue,
49002005	faale kia bɛɛ mu haangɔ Ngewɔ yaama yɛla jifa mu gangangɔ a ngie, ji mua Kristi mu wilingɔ hu i mu vuluilɔ i mu wumbu hee hu. Ngewɔ yauwandei wooma mia wu bawonga.
49002006	Jifa mu wilingɔ hu mua Kristi-ni, i mua tieni wumbuilɔ hee hu i pie mu yɛ ngi mahayɛi ma ngelegoohu.
49002007	I ji wieilɔ aako watii gbi va ngi yauwanda hulewengɔ wai i gɛ, kɛɛ ndomɛi na va i pieni a mue Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
49002008	Gbamaile Ngewɔ yauwandei wooma mia wu bawonga mu lalei va a Kristi, wua yekpe wu wiehindeisia va ii le, aako numu gbi aa lawo.
49002010	Ngewɔ mia mu gbatɛni, tawao Kristi sabui hu, i mu gbatɛnga ngenge yekpei nasia wieva lɔ i hugbatɛni mu va a ngova pieva.
49002011	Wua ti wu leni Juublaa yaa wue, Juublaa ta wu loli a “pɔnɔblɛisia” ta tia yekpe loli a biliblɛisia, jifa ta ti luwui lewe ma. A gili gbɔɔ wɔɔ a wue.
49002012	A watii na wuii yɛ Kristi gɔɔ. Hotangaa lɔ wɔɔ a wue, wu gba Ngewɔ nungei nasia ma i ti wumbuni. Wuii yɛ Ngewɔ hinda yangilingɔi nasia ma toongɔ laaheisia ma i mbumbuni ngi nungeisia gama, wu yɛlɔ na dunyei hu wu liiloma gbi ii na, tawao wuii yɛ Ngewɔ gɔ.
49002013	Kɛɛ kiahuna na, wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, wua wɔɔ wu maguhangɔ polouŋ a Ngewɔ, i wu lalangaa gbla jifa Kristi i woteni a saahanii i haa.
49002014	Gbamaile Kristi vulii i wanga mu wɛ a ndiilɛli a ji i Juublaa tia nasia Juublaa yaa tie yɛnga a numu yila. A ngi gbuhɛi vulii lɔ i pɛlɛ-bondɛi na woloni la, na i ti luahu gɔlɛngɔ wɔɔ, kɛ ndiimanyamu wuaangɔ ti luahu.
49002015	A ngi haalei i Juubleisia ti jawei gbuɛilɔ kɛɛ yeesawa mumuisia aako i kɛnyɛ felei jisia wote a numu nina yakpe tia tieni ti wilingɔ hu, kɛ i ndiilɛli wuaanga ti luahu.
49002016	Hee na Kristi pieni krɔsii ma, ta lɔ i ndiimanyamui gbɔyɔni ti luahu; yeehee na mia i kɛnyɛ felei jisia wɛlɛni hu, i ti yɛ a numu gbuha yila, i yama a tie Ngewɔ gama.
49002017	Famia Kristi i wailɔ i Ngowili Yekpei le wu ma kɔloongɔ ndiilɛli ma numui gbi va, wua Juublaa yaa wue wu maguhangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, kɛɛ Juubleisia, ti magutungɔ a ngie.
49002018	Kristi sabui hu lɔ mu kpɛlɛɛ, Juublaa kɛɛ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ma gu a wala mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ gama ngi Yafei gbayei hu.
49002019	Faale naa, wua Juublaa yaa wue wuii yɛni gbɔma a hotangaa; wu mbaa taalingaa lɔ a Ngewɔ nungeisia, wua tieni kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ leengeisia a wue.
49002020	Wua bɛɛ wu wiengɔe kia pɛlɛ na. Tobleisia tia tutuisia lɔ ti kpujani, tawao yeendiihu ngajei vuilɔ a Yesu Kristi!
49002021	Ta lɔ i houni pɛlei kpɛlɛɛ ma, a pie ti lo yeepɛlei loma i wote a pɛlɛ magayemangɔ Ndemɔi gɔɔma.
49002022	Wua bɛɛ wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, a wu makpɔlɔ wua Ngewɔblaa wekɛisia gbi i wu wote a pɛlei na Ngewɔ Yafei a yɛ mbu.
49003001	Sabui ji vamia, nya Pɔɔl, nga hɛɛ wu va, kia bɛɛ kpindiwɛlɛbumɔ a nge Yesu Kristi va, wua wu va Juublaa yaa wue.
49003002	Pɛiŋ ngi ya li gulɔ, i laailɔ leiŋ kɛ Ngewɔ, ngi yauwandei hu, i ngengei ji venga nya wɛ kɔɔ ngi pie wu gbekpeyei va.
49003003	Ngewɔ i ngi hugbatɛ lɔwungɔe hugɛilɔ a nge, kia ngi nyɛinga sange.
49003004	Tawao wu na gaangaa ngi nyɛini, wa gulɔ a na gɔla ngi kɔɔngɔ kɔlooni Ngewɔ hinda lɔwungɔi na ma Kristi i ngayengema.
49003005	Wɔɔ ta, Ngewɔ ii yeehinda lɔwungɔi ji magɛni a nuuvungaa kɛɛ kiahuna i pienga ngi Yafei i hugɛnga a kayema looblɛisia kɛɛ ngi lutuisia.
49003006	Yeehinda lɔwungɔi a ji lɔ kɛ Ngowili Yekpei i pienga nasia Juublaa yaa tie tia Juubleisia ti gbɔnga Ngewɔ lubeisia ma; ti yɛni a Kristi gbuha yakpei lɔ, ti gbɔngɔ hani na ma Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa, Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
49003007	Ngewɔ pienga ngi yɛnga a ngengemɔ ngowili yekpei va a ngi yauwandei hu we, na i feni mbɛ gbama, a ngi gbayei yengeihu wɛ.
49003008	Numui na Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ ti lewengɔ ngi ma, i leweni nya ma; na hu gbi nya lɔ Ngewɔ i ngauwandei ji veni nya wɛ liva nasia Juublaa yaa tie gama a Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni Kristi gbatɛ wai na ma tɛɛ gu a mbugɔɔla;
49003009	tawao gbɔma ngi fasai numui kpɛlɛɛ gama kia Ngewɔ a yee ngi hinda hugbatɛngɔ lɔwungɔi yayenge. Ngewɔ na hani gbi gbatɛni, i ngi hugbatɛ lɔwungɔi lɔwuilɔ foo gboto lewengɔ kpɛlɛɛ va wɔɔ,
49003010	aako sɔsii sabui hu, malikei yeemahangeisia tia ngafa nyamui nasia ti na ti ngi nɛmahulewei yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔ.
49003011	Ngewɔ i ji wieilɔ kia lɔɔ wɔɔ dunyei lɔtomɛi i hugbatɛni pieva, tawao i pieni a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi loko lɔ.
49003012	Jifa mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu tawao mu langa a ngie, ma ndiigba jɔlɔ liva Ngewɔ gɔɔbu, mu kɔɔngɔ kɛ a wololɔ mu ma.
49003013	Faale nyaa wu manɛnɛma, waa yɔkɔ jifa kpalɛ i lama nya ma wu va; ji kpɛlɛɛ i wiemaa aako wu nafa.
49003014	Sabui ji va lɔ kia ngi ji kpɛlɛɛ lenga nga gula lɔ mu Kɛkɛ gɔwɔbu,
49003015	na a hani gbi gɔ ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya a ndɛvui.
49003016	Nyaa Ngewɔ manɛnɛma kɔɔ i pie ngi Yafei i kpaya gbua ngi wɔlɔya wai hu i fe wu wɛ aako wu yafeisia ti gbaya,
49003017	tawao nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima ngɛɛ i pie Kristi i hei wu liisia hu kia wu langɔ a ngie. Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima ngɛɛ wu gbɔku ndoma hu, tawao i gbaya wu liisia hu,
49003018	aako wua Ngewɔbleisia gbi wu kpaya majɔɔ Kristi lomɛi yawɔlɔyii hugɔva gbalauŋ kɛɛ ngi guhayii kɛɛ ngi wungɛi kɛɛ ngi hubɔyii.
49003019	Ngewɔ i pie wu Kristi lomɛi gɔɔ, kia bɛɛ numu ɛɛ gu aa kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔ, aako wu gbua vulii a Ngewɔ.
49003020	Ngewɔ na, ngi gbayei i yengema mu hu, a gulɔ i na wie kpotongɔ kaka tewengɔ polouŋ na ma ma ngi mɔlila ɔɔ ma gilila,
49003021	Yesu Kristi kɛɛ Ngewɔbleisia ti mbɛlɛya ve Ngewɔ wɛ watii gbi va, kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
49004001	Faale ngi wu manɛnɛ, nya nya Pɔɔl, ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu jifa Ndemɔi yengemɔ a nge, a luva a tuvei na i yɛ Ngewɔ nɛmahu jii wu lolini.
49004002	A wua yekpe mayei tawao, wu makɛngɔ i yɛla kpele gbi, tawao ndiihou i yɛ wu wɛ. A ndoma gɛ wu hinda i gu wu nyɔunyɔ hu.
49004003	A lapi a wu sɔbɛ gbi yɛva ngoyilɛi na hu Ngewɔ Yafei i hugbatɛnga, a ji wa hei ndiilɛli na hu i wu yɛnga a numu yila.
49004004	Kpuha yakpei mia a mue tawao Ngewɔ Yafei i yakpe, kia lɔɔ liiloma yakpei na Ngewɔ i mu lolinga kulɔgbeva.
49004005	Ndemɔi yakpe, lalei yakpe, nguɛi na i yakpe ti mu wuani la Ngewɔ biyei hu;
49004006	Ngewɔ yakpe taa Kɛkɛi nuuvu kpɛlɛɛ va, na Ndemɔi le nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ mahu, a yenge a numui gbi tawao, i numui kpɛlɛɛ hu.
49004007	Mu gbi a ngilangila, mu mboya hanisia majɔɔnga kia Kristi i kɔɛkɔɛini mu ma.
49004008	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ji i yɛ lɛma ngeleima, i liilɔ a kɔhou gboto waa; i mboya haningaa gɔɛkɔɛilɔ nuuvungaa ma.”
49004009	Gbɔɔ “i lɛilɔ ngelemahu” yeembui le i gbua ji ma i yeilɔ gbɔma ndɔu.
49004010	Faale ta lɔɔ i yeini ndɔu, talɔ gbɔma i lɛni polouŋ ngelemahu, aako i yɛ hani gbi hu dunyei hu gbi.
49004011	Ta lɔ i mboya haningaa venga nuuvungaa wɛ gbama; i kpaya veilɔ mu lɛɛnga wɛ yɛva a toblaa, i kpaya ve pekeisia wɛ yɛva a Ngewɔ lutungaa, i kpaya ve ti lɛɛngaa wɛ ta lewetewe ta Ngowili Yekpei le, yeenasia ti yɛngɔ a sɔsii mahublɛisia kɛɛ kaamɔngaa.
49004012	I ji wieilɔ aako i Ngewɔbleisia gbi magbatɛ Kristi yengei va kɔɔ mu Kristi gbuhɛi lo.
49004013	Faale na, mu kpɛlɛɛ ma lɛlɔ ma mu yɛ a numu yila mu layii hu a Ngewɔ kɛɛ ngi Hindoloi gɔlɛi; ma wotelɔ a numu lakpangɔngaa, mu wiengɔ kia Kristi na.
49004014	Na wiengaa muɛɛ yaa wie kia ndopongaa, ndɛi nasia numu wɛlɛbleisia ta nungaa gaa la ti yakava, taa wu hɔwɔhɔwɔ la hu kia viivii tia njavei ta pie a ndɛndɛ mumuisia.
49004015	Kia na aa wie, mu yɛngaa a tɔnya le, mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ, ma lakpalɔ a pele gbi mu wie kia Kristi, na sɔsii yeengui a ngie.
49004016	Ta lɔ i pieni ngi gbuhɛi yeemahakɛisia gbi ti looni nga pandaa, yeengila i ngi nda yɛmɛi. Yeehakɛi kpɛlɛɛ ti yengengaa pandawanda a leenga kia mahoungɔ yeengila gbi i ngi nda yengei wie la, kpuhɛi gbi a loolalɔ kia nungeisia ta lo a ti nyɔunyɔ.
49004017	Nyaa naa wu laahima kpɔtukpɔtu a Ndemɔi gbayei ngɛɛ waa yaa luva kia nungei nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ta pie, nasia tɛɛ gili a hinda yekpe gbi kɛlee baabaa hindeisia,
49004018	tawao nɛmahu gbi ii ti ma. Ti nda gbi ii ndɛvu ninɛi na ma Ngewɔ a fe nungaa wɛ jifa tii gbɛogbɛ gɔɔ tawao ti woohu gbɔndangɔ.
49004019	Tɛɛ yaa wufe kulo bɛɛ; gbɛogbɛ ii gbeweni ti ma kɛlee pie nyamu hindei, ta manɔhɔ hindei yeelasii gbi wie kɛlɛma ii ma.
49004020	Kɛɛ na ii le taa wu gaa la kɔloongɔ Kristi ma!
49004021	Wu ngi hinda humɛninga vulii tawao kia ngi woomablaa a wue, ti wu gaailɔ a tɔnyɛi na i Yesu Kristi hu.
49004022	A gbe wu luvayii wovei na ma i yɛ pie wa hinda nyamui nasia wie, wu luvayii wovei na i yɛ wu nyani, a ji i yɛ pie hindei nasia ta numu yaka yeemani a wu lɔ.
49004023	Mahoungɔe vulii ndii nina kɛɛ nɛmahu nina ti yɛ wu hu,
49004024	tawao mahoungɔe wu tuva nina wumbu na Ngewɔ kpatɛni kɔɔ i wie kia i na, pɔɔnahu kɛɛ kayemahu a tɔnyahu we.
49004025	Faale a gbe ndɛɛ gulalei ma, numu gbi i yɛ a tɔnyɛi le ngi mbaa Kristimamɔi ma ajifa Kristi gbuha yakpei yeemahaakɛisia lɔ a mue.
49004026	Wu lii i lewengaa, waa luma wu liilewei aa wu lo jumbu hinda wiema; tawao waa luva kpɛiŋ yeendilewei hu.
49004027	Waa pele ve Seitana wɛ pieva wu jumbu wuli.
49004028	Numu na wɔɔ ngi hɛlɛngɔ a humɛi, mahoungɔ i gbe humɛi ma, i tɔtoo a ngengei na wiela a navoo jɔɔ hu pɔɔna hu ngi mahindeisia va kɛɛ gbɔva fɛɛliblɛisia ma.
49004029	Waa njia nyamu le numu ma kɛlee njɛpɛi nasia ta kpɔma wie, njɛpɛi nasia nyɔkɔ ta hinda hugbatɛ nungaa ti gbewengɔ fa aako na wa nde i kpekpe wie a nasia ta wu woi mɛni.
49004030	Waa Ngewɔ Gayema Yafei lii nyani; ajifa Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ Ngewɔ lokowoo le i wu ma kɛva kɛ ngi woo lɔ a wue haaŋ i to mbayoya voloi ma.
49004031	A gbe ndiimanyamui gbi ma kɛɛ ndiimavulɛi kɛɛ ndiilewei. Waa yaa lumbe, waa numu yɛli, tawao waa kili nyamu wumbu numu gbi va.
49004032	Kia waa na kpɛlɛɛ wie, a hindawanda wie a wu nyɔunyɔ, wu nasia mamamau lɔ hinda nyamu a ti wie, wu manu wu nyɔunyɔ ma, kia Kristi i pienga Ngewɔ i maanunga wu ma.
49005001	Faale naa, kia Ngewɔ liima leengeisia a wue, mahoungɔe vulii wu lapi aako wu wiehindeisia ti gbua a ngi ndei.
49005002	Mahoungɔ ndoma i jia a wue hinda gbi hu wu lɛɛvui hu, kia lɔɔ Kristi i loni a mue, i ngi lɛɛvui ve a saahanii gu nɛnɛɛ na nɛngɔ Ngewɔ wɛ.
49005003	Jifa Ngewɔ nungeisia a wue, puegbua hinda ɔɔ manɔhɔ hinda ɔɔ mani nyamu wiela nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma, maa ii houni kulo bɛɛ ndaa gɛva vulii bɛɛ wu lia.
49005004	Tawao maa ii houni wu loko wili ngufeba yɛpɛ lela hu ɔɔ baaba yɛpɛ ɔɔ ndawɔ yɛpɛ. Kia waa na wie, a ya a siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma.
49005005	A la la kɛ numu gbi lekee a puegbua hindei wie ɔɔ manɔhɔ hinda ɔɔ a mani nyamu wie nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma ɛɛ heima gbi jɔɔ kunafɔ mia Kristi taa Ngewɔ ta yɛ na mahayɛi ma; gbɛva hanimanimɔ wiengɔi kia numu na a vɛfɛ nɔmɔli yewɔi vɛlilei ma
49005006	Waa luma numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ a baabaa yɛpɛngaa; yeehindei nasia vulii va lɔ Ngewɔ a liilewe nasia ma tɛɛ golo ngi wɛ.
49005007	Faale gbɛ-o-gbɛ aa yɛ wua numu bondɛi nasia luahu.
49005008	Wua vulii wu yɛ wɔɔ kpindi hu lɔ, kɛɛ i hiye watii na ma wu woteni a Ndemɔi woo, wu fofoi hu lɔ. Faale mahoungɔ wu luva kia fofohublaa,
49005009	gbamaile yeefofoi ji huvei lɔ a pie nungaa ti hinda gbi wie na kpekpengɔ, pɔɔnangɔ, tawao tɔnyangɔ.
49005010	A lapi wu Ndemɔi liima hindei gaa wu kɔɔ.
49005011	Waa wili baabaa hindei nasia hu kpekpeya gbi ii hu nungaa ta pie, gbɛva nasia ti kpindi hu tia mia ta yeehindei nasia wie. Kia waa na wie, a yeehindei jisia magbundɛ gula fofoya.
49005012	Mawufengɔe hulewengɔ gbo laliva vulii hindei nasia ma ta pie ndɔwuma.
49005013	Kɛɛ foofo i wungaa yeehindei jisia kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛ ti yɛyii yeetɔnyɛi maa i gɛnga gbalauŋ.
49005014	Ajifa hani gbi lekee numu a gu a tɔla, foofo le. Famia ta nde tɛ: “Njiimɔi, wu, bi hiye hee hu, tawao Kristi a voolɔ i foofo wu bi ma.”
49005015	Faale a wu luvayii mahugbe. Waa luva kia nungei nasia tii hinda hugɔɔ, kɛɛ a luva kia nɛmahuleweblaa.
49005016	Watii gbi lekee wa gu a hinda yekpe wiela mahoungɔ wu pie, ajifa nuuvuisia ti nyamungɔe a folei ji.
49005017	Waa yɛ a kpowablaa, a lapi kɔɔ gbɔɔ Ndemɔi longɔ la wu pie.
49005018	Ndɔ aa wu hou, ajifa a hinda lɔ huwu lekee; kia na aa wie, Ngewɔ Yafei ta i wu laave.
49005019	A wule wu nyɔunyɔ gama ngulei nasia ti Saam Gɔlɛi hu kɛɛ Kristimableisia ti wuleisia; a Kristimableisia ti wuleisia yaa kɛɛ Saamisia kɛɛ ngulii nasia Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ, a wu lii gbi siɛgbuava Ndemɔi ma.
49005020	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu a siɛgbua mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ ma kpele gbi hindei gbi va i wiema.
49005021	A wuaa wu nyɔunyɔ bu mbɛlɛhei na gɛva i wu yeya Kristi va.
49005022	Hiniblɛisia, a wuaa wu hiningɛisia bu, bi tɔngaa bɛɛ Ndemɔi mia wu wuama ngi bu.
49005023	Gbamaile hinii lɔ kpaya i ngi wɛ nyahɛi maahu kia lɔɔ kpaya i Kristi wɛ sɔsiblɛisia maahu; tawao Kristi na ngi gbuhei a sɔsiblɛisia ta vulii lɔ i sɔsiblɛisia bawoni.
49005024	Faale mahoungɔe hinimɔ gbi i golo ngi hinii wɛ kia sɔsiblɛisia ti golongɔ Kristi wɛ.
49005025	Nyahamɔi, lo a bi nyahɛi a ndomɛi na nyɔkɔ Kristi i piengɔ a sɔsiblɛisia gbi, i ngi lɛɛvui ve ti va.
49005026	I ji wieilɔ kɔɔ i sɔsiblɛisia wua fo a njɛi kɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei;
49005027	aako i sɔsiblɛisia ve ta yekpe wɛ kia numui na, nyandengɔ waa tawao mbɛ gbi ii ngi ma.
49005028	Mahoungɔe hingeisia ti lo a ti nyahangɛisia kia ti longɔ a tia yekpe ti gbuhɛisia. Hindoi na ngi longɔ a ngi nyahɛi ngi longɔe a ta yekpe.
49005029	Numu gbii na aa lolo a ta yekpe ngi gbuhɛi. Kia aa na wie, a ngi gbuhɛi makɛlɔ a mɛhɛɛ, a mahugbe, kia lɔɔ Kristi a pie a sɔsiblɛisia,
49005030	ajifa ngi gbuhɛi yeemaahakɛisia lɔ a mue.
49005031	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Sabui ji va, hindo a ngi kɛkɛ lolɔ kɛɛ ngi nje i vɛfɛ ngi nyahɛi ma, kɛ ti veengɔ ti yɛnga a numu yila.”
49005032	Tɔnya hubɔngɔ lɔwungɔ lɔ hugɛngɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ji hu, tawao ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ kɔlooni Kristi kɛɛ sɔsii lɔ ma.
49005033	Kɛɛ kɔlooni wua bɛɛ lɔ ma: mahoungɔ nyahamɔ gbi i lo a ngi nyahɛi kia ngi longɔ a ta yekpe tawao mahoungɔ hinimɔ gbi i baa gɔɔ waa ngi hinii ma.
49006001	Ndeengɛisia, kpa le wu ma na gbi wieva wu leblesia ta nde wu ma pieva ajifa Ndemɔi woomia a wue, tawao namia pɔɔnangɔ pieva.
49006002	Sawei kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ i feni Mojisi wɛ yeehaalayei lɔ Lahei langɔ ma, i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Bagɔɔ bi kɛkɛ ma taa bi nje,
49006003	aako hindei gbi i nɛɛ bi ma tawao bi lɛɛvui hu i guha dunyei hu.”
49006004	Ndolebleisia, waa hinda wie a wu leengeisia a pie ti lii i lewe. Kia waa na wie, a ti makɛ a pelei na mahoungɔ Kristimamɔ i pie, wu ti gaa a na mahoungɔ ti pie.
49006005	Nduwɔngeisia, a golo wu luwɔkɛisia wɛ, nduwahu kɛɛ magbɛlihu; tawao a pie a ndiigole bi tɔngaa bɛɛ wu piema Kristi lɔ wɛ.
49006006	Watii na wu luwɔkɛisia ta yɛ wu gbema yeewatii lekee ii le waa yɛ ngenge yekpe wiema aako ti wu lato; kɛɛ a yɛ a na wie Ngewɔ longɔ la a wu lii gbi kia Kristi luwɔngaa.
49006007	A wu luwɔyengei wie a kohunɛ bi tɔngaa bɛɛ wu yengema Ndemɔi lɔ wɛ, nuuvungaa gbama ii le.
49006008	A la la kɛ Ndemɔi a numu gbi pawalɔ ngenge yekpei na va a pie, i yɛ a nduwɔ ɔɔ ii yɛni a nduwɔ.
49006009	Nduwɔkɛisia, hii mahoungɔ wu wu luwɔngɛisia hou kpekpengɔ; wu gbe a ti huluwala. I yɛ wu nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ na ngelegoohu ngi woo lɔ a wua kɛɛ wu luwɔngɛisia tawao mu gbi mu gbɛmboyii i yakpe, Ngewɔ ɛɛ topooma wie.
49006010	Gbɛɛ ngi kɔlɛi ji gɛlɛ a ndela ngɛɛ, wu gbayei i lɛ gulɔma Ndemɔi ngi gbaya wai hu.
49006011	A wu mayili a kɔhakei nasia kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ a fe wu wɛ aako wu gu a lapila a kaaso nyamui nasia Seitana a nungaa wɛlɛ la.
49006012	Gbamaile muii lapima a nuuvungaa; mu lapima a ngafa nyamui nasia lɔ ti na hinda gbi, yeemahangeisia kɛɛ yeekpaayablɛisia kɛɛ ngafangei nasia nungaa ta hɛɛ ti ma a watii ji mu hu kia kpindi.
49006013	Faale a wu mayili a kɔhakei nasia Ngewɔ fenga wu wɛ wu mahugbeva. Aako yeefolo nyamui nasia ti gbuangaa, wuɛ yama a wooma we ji wu gɔnyamui a gbundɛ wu ma; tawao yeendapi na i gɛlɛngaa, wa gulɔ huɛɛŋ a loola kpaukpaungɔ.
49006014	Faale a loo kpakpaungɔ wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla, wu lia yilingɔ a tɔnyɛi, pɔɔnɛi yɛngɔ a kɔlu-lɛɛvɛ i wɛlɛni wu liimɛi,
49006015	tawao wu gɔwɔhu gɔwɛi i yɛ a magbatɛi na wa yɛ hu Ngowili Yekpei leva kɔlooni ndiilɛli ma.
49006016	Watii gbi lalei hou yeya kia kɔvɛlɛi na; ajifa i yɛngaa wu yeya, ndikpa gbandi-gbandi nasia Seitana a pili wu ma wa gulɔ a ti huhoula la, tɛɛ foo wu ma.
49006017	Tawao wu mbayoyei gulu wu pɛlɛ wumba a bɔlei, kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yiɛi i yɛ a kɔbolei na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe wu wɛ.
49006018	A ji kpɛlɛɛ wie, wa Ngewɔ vɛli Tuuŋ, wa ngi gbɔmi huvɛli. Wu yaa hinda gbi wiema a Ngewɔ vɛli a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ. Faale gbɛogbɛ i wie, waa gbe a Ngewɔ vɛlila waati gbi, tawao a yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli Tuuŋ Ngewɔ nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ va.
49006019	A Ngewɔ vɛli nya bɛɛ va aako i yɛ a ngowili wu nya laa ji nga lo ngi yɛpɛ aako ngi yɛpɛ a ngaulewe, ngi pie nungaa ti hinda lɔwungɔi na gɔɔ Ngowili Yekpei i hugɛnga.
49006020	Ngowili Yekpei ji va, Yesu Kristi yaamei lɔ a nge kia bɛɛ ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu kiahuna. A Ngewɔ vɛli aako ngaulewe i yɛ nya hu ngowili yekpei leva kia mahoungɔ ngi ndela.
49006021	Mu mbaa Kristimamɔi Taikikɔsi, na mu longɔ la tawao Ndemɔi yengemɔ yekpe waa a ngie, a nya mavaa gbi gɛlɔ a wue, aako wua bɛɛ wu nya yɛyii gɔɔ.
49006022	Na vamia ngi ngi loma wu gama aako i mu kpɛlɛɛ mu yɛyii hugɛ a wue, i yama i wu lii gba.
49006023	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ kɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ti Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ gɔ a ndiilɛli kɛɛ ndoma kɛɛ lanaya.
49006024	Ngewɔ i ngauwanda ve nasia gbi wɛ ti longɔ a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a kunafɔ lomɛi. Amiina.
50001001	Nya Pɔɔl, kɛɛ Timoti, Yesu Kristi yengeblaa a mue, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Kristimablei nasia gama ti Filipai, tia Yesu Kristi-ni ti wilingɔ hu vulii kɛɛ tokulɔisia tia nasia ta gbɔ ti ma.
50001002	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
50001003	Nga siɛgbualɔ nya Yewɔɛi ma wu va watii gbi wu hinda a hitɛ nya wɛ;
50001004	tawao watii gbi ngi yaa Ngewɔ vɛlima wu kpɛlɛɛ va nga ngi vɛli a kohunɛ waa lɔ,
50001005	pelei nasia va wu gbɔnga la nya ma Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu i hiye folei na vulii ma wu lani a Yesu Kristi i to folei ji ma.
50001006	Faale nya langɔe la kɛ Ngewɔ na i ngenge yekpei ji lɔtoni wu hu, a lolɔ piema i kpɔyɔ Folei na ma Yesu Kristi a yama.
50001007	Wu hinda lɔ Tuuŋ nya lii hu! Faale pɔɔnangɔ nya va giliva hii kɔlooni wu ma; ajifa wu gbɛɛnga nya ma mua ngengei na wiema Ngewɔ i fenga nya wɛ gba pieva kiahuna na ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu kɛɛ watii na nya hugbɛmbongɔ yɛla kɛva kɛ tɔnya lɔ a Ngowili Yekpei kɛɛ pieva nungaa ti la la kiti gbi aa yɛ ti ma.
50001008	Ngewɔ lɔ nya jeli le kɛ tɔnyɛi mia nga nde wu ma ji nga nde ngɛɛ nya longɔe a wu kpɛlɛɛ kia lɔɔ Yesu Kristi vulii ngi longɔ a wue.
50001009	Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima aako i pie ndoma lii na i wu goohu wu nyɔunyɔ va i ya a gbaya Tuuŋ kɔɔ wu gu a tɔnyɛi gɔla, tawao wu yɛ a kiti lewe pɔɔnangɔ,
50001010	aako hindei na kpekpengɔ tewengɔ hinda yekpei kpɛlɛɛ ma wu gu a mbumbula pieva. Na wiengaa wu sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ a yɛla tawao tɔwanyani ɛɛ yɛ wu ma Folei na ma Kristi a yama.
50001011	Na gbi wa pie a yɛ a hinda yekpe waa lɔ tawao Yesu Kristi yakpe lɔ a pie wu ji wie, aako nungaa ti Ngewɔ wɔlɔ, ti ngi lato.
50001012	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nya longɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ hindei nasia ti nya wienga ti pienga numu gboto lɔ lekee lama a Ngowili Yekpei.
50001013	Famia sojei nasia gbi ta Rom Maha Wai wɛlei mahugbe kɛɛ pekei nasia gbi ti mbei ti kɔɔlɔ kɛ jifa Kristi yengemɔ a nge famia ti nya wuni kpindiwɛlei bu.
50001014	Tawao nya wuava kpindiwɛlei bu i pienga Kristimableisia gbotoma ti lii valanga panda Ndemɔi ma na hii ti lii lɔ lekee gbaama Ngowili Yekpei leva a ngaulewe.
50001015	Tɔnya le kɛ ti lɛɛnga ta Ngowili Yekpei lelɔ kɔlooni Kristi ma tolo gbuava kɛɛ jifa ti longɔ a njianjia, kɛɛ pekeisia ta pie vulii a ndii yekpe lɔ ti longɔ kpekpeya i gbua hu.
50001016	Kɛlɛmayei jisia ta pielɔ hii jifa ti longɔ a nge ajifa ti kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ kɛnga a nya yenge ndeva leiŋ kɛ tɔnya lɔ a Ngowili Yekpei.
50001017	Pekei nasia ti lolongɔ tɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei le kɔlooni Kristi ma a ndii yekpe, ta ndelɔ aako ti kpekpeya jɔɔ hu tia yekpe va; ti lii lɔ ma tɛɛ ta hinda gboto huwulɔ nya yeya kia lɛ ngi mbei kpindiwɛlei ji bu.
50001018	Njia gbi ii na ma ti longɔ ti pie a nge! Na kpewengɔ nya ma ta mia a Ngowili Yekpei lelei a pele gbi lekee, i yɛ lema sabu yekpe ma ɔɔ ndɛhu. Tawao nga goohunɛɛlɔ Tuuŋ,
50001019	ajifa ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ na wa fɛli nya va kɛɛ kpɔmɛi na a gbua Yesu Kristi Yafei gama ta pielɔ mahubleisia ti gbe nya ma.
50001020	Na kpewengɔ waa nya ma tawao nya lii i ma ta mia a ji kunafɔ ngaa gbaha a nya yengei wiela, tawao waati gbi, kakayee ngamɛi ji, ngi ndiilo waa majɔɔ aako nya layie hu kɛɛ nya wiehindei ngi pie nungaa ti Kristi mbɛlɛhei gɔɔ, ngi haa bɛɛ ɔɔ ngi vulu.
50001021	Gbamaile gbɔɔ ndɛvui yeesabui le? Nya nya wɛ, ndɛvui yeesabui lɔ a yengela Kristi wɛ. Nya haala ta, a walɔ a nafa wa nya gama.
50001022	Kɛɛ ngi lɛmbingaa nga gulɔ a ngenge yekpe mato wiela, faale ngii kɔɔ ina nga nya haalɛi lɔ wumbu ɔɔ nya lɛmbilɛi.
50001023	I wienga bi tɔaa bɛ tia nya laalama a leenga ngejahu we kɛɛ kɔwɔhu. Nya longɔ waa le ngi gbua ndɛvui ji hu ngi yɛ Kristi gama, tawao ji nyandengɔ polouŋ nya va.
50001024	Kɛɛ aako ngi gbɔ wu ma, baagɔma lɔ nya yɛla ma ndɛvu hu i lewe nya haalɛi ma.
50001025	Nya langɔe a ji, faale ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ ngi yɛmaa lɛ na gbɔva wu gbi ma, aako wu lalei a Kristi kɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ mato.
50001026	Nga ji wielɔ kɔɔ ngi wangaa gbɔma wu gama wu sabu matongɔ jɔɔ mata gbuava a nge tuvei va wu piema wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
50001027	Kiahuna hinda yakpei na baagɔma i ma tamia a ji wa luva kia Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni Kristi ma i ndeni yɛ wu pie, kɔɔ ngi gungaa a wala wu gama ɔɔ ngii guni, nga mɛnilɔ kɛ wuaa looni kpaŋ, wu lii i hani yakpe ma tawao wa lapi a ngooyila kɛɛ wu liima hindei yakpe lalei na va a gbua Ngowili Yekpei hu,
50001028	tawao waa luwa nasia ma ti lolongɔ a wu yengei. Wu lii i loo watii gbi; ji lɔ a kɛ a tie kɛ ta gbahalɔ tawao kɛ wua wa temaya majɔɔlɔ, jifa Ngewɔ lɔ a teemayɛi ve wu wɛ.
50001029	Gbamaile wua wu sabu yekpe waa majɔɔnga gbama yɛva a Kristi yengeblaa, wu lava lekee ii le a ngie, kɛɛ jifa gbɔma kpaalɛ a la wu ma ngi va.
50001030	Wa gulɔ na a gbɛɛla nya ma yeendapii ji hu. Ndapi yakpei na wu yɛ tɔ wɔɔ nga kɔ ta mia, kia wu tɔma la, ngi kɔma kiahuna bɛɛ.
50002001	Ina wu luvayii Kristi hu i wu gɔnga a ndii kpakpau, ina ngi lomɛi a wu nɛpɔlɔ, ina wua Ngewɔ Yafei-ni wuaa mbaaya hu, tawao hindawanda kɛɛ manuma lɔ wu hu wu nyɔunyɔ va,
50002002	Nyaa na wu manɛnɛma hɔɔ, kɔɔ wu pie nya goohu i nɛɛ waa a ji wu giliyii a yɛ yakpe, wu longɔ a wu nyɔunyɔ mahɔɔngɔ, wu lii i yɛ yakpe kɛɛ wu liima hindei.
50002003	Waa hinda gbi wie wua yekpe lekee nafava, ɔɔ aako nungaa ti nde tɛɛ numu waawaangaa lɔ a wue, kɛɛ a wua yekpe mayei wu nyɔunyɔ gama, kpema gbi wa nungaa wekɛisia fesa wua yekpe ma.
50002004	Wu mbaangɛisia ti nda hindei i gbewe wu ma vulii, wu wumayei lekee ii le.
50002005	Mahoungɔ wu wiehindei tia Yesu Kristi wiehindei ti yɛ yakpe:
50002006	Tia Ngewɔ ti gbatɛyii i yakpe wɔɔ gba, kɛɛ ii gilini la lapiva kɔɔ taa Ngewɔ ti maa i hɔɔ a kpaya.
50002007	Kia aa na wie, i gbuailɔ toma wai na a ngi wumaye, i wote a nduwɔ. I wieilɔ kia lɔɔ nuuvu, i gbua nga ngi yɛngɔ a nuuvu.
50002008	I ta yekpe mayeilɔ, i lo goloma Ngewɔ wɛ i luma i haa, hee na i pieni krɔsii ma.
50002009	Na vamia Ngewɔ i ngi loni tomɛi na tewengɔ tomɛi kpɛlɛɛ ma ngelegoohu, i mbiyɛ ve ngi wɛ tewengɔ mbiyɛ weka gbi ma.
50002010	Faale, baagɔma veva Yesu biyɛi wɛ, Hani kpɛlɛɛ ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya kɛɛ ndɔu ta mawɛɛlɔ ngi gɔɔbu,
50002011	tawao ti gbi ta ndelɔ leiŋ tɛɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ ti Lemɔi le ngɔlɔyɛi veva mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.
50002012	Faale naa nya liimablɛisia, kia lɔɔ wu yɛ woolo nya layie ma tuuŋ watii na ngi yɛ wu lia, fesangɔ waa a yɛla wu golo mbɛ tewengɔ na ma ji ngɛɛ yɛ wu lia. A wua yekpe ve Ngewɔ wɛ nduwahu kɛɛ magbɛli wu yɛ lɔɔ a lapi haaŋ wu mbawoyei majɔɔ,
50002013	ajifa Ngewɔ lɔ tuuŋ yengema wu lia, aako i pie mani i wu lɔ tawao wu kpaya majɔɔ ngi nda liima hindei wieva.
50002014	Wu yɛngaa hinda gbi wiema, waa gbonyɛ wu nyɔunyɔ ma tawao waa wu nyɔunyɔ laabla,
50002015	aako numu gbi aa wu yia nyamu le tawao wu joowi jumbui ma, wu yɛ sɛwɛ kia Ngewɔ leengaa yekpengaa, wu heini dunya hu kavablaa kɛɛ jumbublaa ti ndavengɔ. Mahoungɔ wu voo ti lia kia tumbekeisia ta ngelei ma voo la,
50002016	a ji wa Ndɛvu ve yiɛi le ti ma. Wu ji wiengaa, nga sabu jɔlɔ mata gbuava a wue Folei na ma Kristi a wa, ajifa na wu pienga a kɛlɔ kɛ ngenge gbayangɔi kpɛlɛɛ ngi pieni ii yɛni a kɛɛwɛ-mɔɔnɛ.
50002017	Tɛnga ti nya waamaa nya ŋamɛi i wu kia saahanii na wa fe Ngewɔ wɛ, tamia a wu lalei a Kristi. Na wiengaa hii, kɛ nya goohu nɛngɔe tawao kɛ mua wueni kpɛlɛɛ lɔ mu gbɔnga nya goohunɛɛi ma.
50002018	Hii lɔɔ mahoungɔ wua bɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ, mua wueni mu gbɔ wu goohunɛɛi ma.
50002019	Ndemɔi i lumangaa, taa nya lii hu Timoti loova wu gama hugutungɔ, kɔɔ ngi wu gama va gɔɔ nya lii i lɛli.
50002020	Ta yakpe lɔ wu hinda i mua ta lii hu tawao ngi gbewengɔe vulii wu va.
50002021	Yeepekeisia gbi ti gbewengɔ ti wuma hindei lekee lɔ va, tii gbeweni Yesu Kristi liima hindei wieva.
50002022	Tawao wua vulii wu ngi gbekpeyii gɔɔlɔ, kia mua ta mu Ngowili Yekpei yeengengei wienga la kia hindolo tia ngi kɛkɛ.
50002023	Faale ngi nya hindei gɛlɛyii gɔngaa lekee, ta lɔ nya lii ngi ma ngi loova wu gama.
50002024	Tawao nya lii lɔ looni Ndemɔi ma kɛ a pielɔ vulii ngi gu a wala wu gama hugutungɔ.
50002025	Ngi tɔnga kɛ a nyandelɔ ngi mu ndee Ipafɔditɔsi lo wu gama na mua ta mu ngenge gboto wienga, mu ndapi gboto gɔnga Kristi va tawao wu vamia i wanga, gbɔva nya ma.
50002026	Wu gbi wu lɔ-mani lɔ waa ngi ma, tawao ngi lii gbuangɔe ngi goohu jifa wu yɛ mɛniilɔ kɛ i heegbɛilɔ.
50002027	I heegbɛilɔ vulii a tɔnya, i loni te i haa. Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i manuilɔ ngi ma, tawao ta yaangɔ ii le, i manuni nya bɛɛ lɔ ma, i ndiinyani gboto veela nya ma.
50002028	Faale nya longɔ waa le ngi ngi lo wu gama aako wu goohu i nɛɛ gbɔma ji wa ngi lɔ, nya bɛɛ nya liinyani i gɛlɛ.
50002029	Kɔnɛle a loko hei ngi bu a kohunɛ waa ajifa wu ndee mia a ngie, wua tieni wu longɔ a Ndemɔi. A baagɔma ve nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ wɛ ta na wie i pienga,
50002030	ajifa i ngi lɛɛvui gbuɛilɔ ndɔgbɔ a lo te i haa Kristi yengei va, kɔɔ i kpɔmɛi na wie nya ma wua vulii wuii yɛ gu a piela.
50003001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, pɛiŋ ngi yaa kɔlɛi ji gɛlɛ, nya longɔ ngi nde ngɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ jifa wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu. Ɛɛ yɛ a mɔnɛ gbi nya va lajiava hindei nasia hu ngi nyɛinga ngovama, tawao ngi lajiangaa ti hu, kpundɛi na i wu mahu, mahu a yeilɔ.
50003002	A wu mahugbe a nasia ta hinda nyamuisia wie, ngilangɛi nasia, nungei nasia ti nɔɔngɔ hu tɛɛ kɛ ta numu luwui lewe ma.
50003003	Mua mia mu heingɔ bili yeekpekpei ya, yeenungei nasia ii le, ajifa mua ma Ngewɔ vɛli ngi Yafei gbɔmi hu lɔ, tawao gbɔma mu goohu nɛngɔ jifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu. Muii lani a hindei nasia nungaa ta pie ti luwui lewe gomɛisia hu.
50003004	Nga gulɔ vulii a hɛlɛla a hinda bondɛi nasia. Ina numu gbi langɔe la kɛ a gulɔ a hɛlɛla a ngi luwui lewela ma, sabu gboto lɔ nya wɛ tewengɔ ti ma pieva hii.
50003005	Ajifa ti nya leni hoki yila kɛ ti nya heinga bili ya, Isrɛlmɔ mia a nge ndavengɔ, ngi gbuani Bɛnjami bembei hu lɔ, Juumɔ a nya kɛkɛ kɛɛ nya nje. Juubleisia ti Jawei houla va, Farisiimɔ lɔ wɔɔ a nge,
50003006	tawao na kpewengɔ waa yɛla nya ma, tamia a juwuya hitɛ la Kristimableisia wooma. Ina Sawei houla a gulɔ i numu yɛ a pɔɔnamɔ, kɛ nyamu yakpe bɛɛ ngii kani.
50003007	Kɛɛ hindei kpɛlɛɛ wɔɔ ngi mbumbuni a nafa hinda, ngii yaa mbumbuni a gbɛogbɛ na va Kristi i pienga nya wɛ.
50003008	Hindei nasia lekee ii le, ngi hani kpɛlɛɛ wumbunga a gbɛ-o-gbɛ yee na va ngi jɔngɔi lewengɔ polouŋ ti ma, tamia a nya Lemɔi Yesu Kristi gɔlɛi. Ngi va lɔ ngi hani gbi wilinga; ngi ti kpɛlɛɛ wumbunga a manɔhɔ gbama lɔ, aako ngi yɛ a Kristi woo,
50003009	mua ta mu wili hu pandawanda. Pɔɔnamɔ yaa gbɔma a nge Ngewɔ yama hindei nasia va ngi pienga, pɔɔnamɔi na nyɔkɔ numu a wote la ji a Sawei hou. Ngewɔ i nya yɛnga na a pɔɔnamɔ jifa nya langɔ a Kristi; pɔɔni na a gbua Ngewɔ gama jifa nya langɔ a Kristi.
50003010	Na lekee kpewengɔ nya ma tamia a ji mua Kristi ma wili hu, kɛɛ kpayei na yayenge i ngi hiyengɔi hu hee hu, kpaalɛi nasia ti lani ngi ma, nyɔkɔ i la nya ma, ngi hee na nyɔkɔ wie i pieni,
50003011	nya lii ma ngɛɛ Ngewɔ a nya bɛɛ wumbulɔ hee hu i nya vulu.
50003012	Ngii ndema ngaa yɛma ngi wilanga a na kpɛlɛɛ wiela Ngewɔ longɔ ngi pie ɔɔ kɛ ngi yɛnga a numui na mahoungɔ ngi yɛla. Nya lapima tuuŋ mawaa na va Yesu Kristi i welanga a nya yɛla a ngi woo fa.
50003013	Tɔnya le, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngii lani la vulii kɛ ngi gunga yeemawaa ma; na hu gbi hinda yakpei na nga pie ta lɔ a ji nga gbewe gbua lɔ na kpɛlɛɛ hu i lewenga, ngi lapi a nya sɔbɛ gbi fova na ma i nya gulɔ.
50003014	Faale, nyaa wiimɛ ma tuuŋ nga li yakpe piimɛi gɛlɛmɛi aako ngi gu mawaa ma, tamia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui Ngewɔ i nya lolinga ma Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
50003015	Mua kpɛlɛɛ mu layii a Kristi huhitingɔ, mahoungɔ ndii yakpe ji i yɛ mu goohu. Kɛɛ ina ndii weka mia i wu lɛɛngaa goohu, Ngewɔ a pielɔ wu hugɔɔ gbalauŋ.
50003016	I yee gbi yɛna, a mu yɛ a jia tuuŋ a sawa yakpei na mu jianga la wɔɔ i to kiahuna ma.
50003017	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a yɛ tuuŋ a nya wokɔɔ. A woolo nasia ma ti jiama a pele wɔnɛi nasia mu kɛnga a wue.
50003018	Ngi ji lenga wɔɔ wu ma kaka, tawao nyaa laajiama hu nga wɔɔ; numu gboto lɔ na ti luvayii i Kristi haalɛi krɔsii ma yɛnga a gbama hinda.
50003019	Ti gɛlɛmɛi a jahama lɔ, gbamaile ti luwui liima hindeisia lɔ ti yewɔɛi le. Ta matɛi gbua a na lɔ mahoungɔ ti wufe fa, tawao ta gili lekee a dunyei ji hu hanisia lɔ.
50003020	Na hu gbi, mua mu yɛmii a ngelegoohu lɔ tawao mua mu Bawomɔi, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi mawuloma, i gbua ngelegoohu i wa.
50003021	Mu gbuha huhaangɔi jisia ta haa, Kristi i wangaa a yeekpuhɛi jisia maluvelɔ i pie ti wie kia ngi nda wai i na ngɔlɔya hu, a kpayei na yayenge a pie i gu a hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaala ngi mahayɛi bu.
50004001	Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngi loni a wue kpa tawao wu mani i nya lɔnga kpa! Wa pie kpa nya goohu i nɛɛ tawao nga mata gbua kpa kpele gbi a wue! Nya liima ndeengɛisia, hii mia mahoungɔ wu loo kpaŋ, waa wote wu luvayii hu kia wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
50004002	Yuodia wua Sintiki, nyaa wu manɛnɛma, a lapi wu woo i yɛ yila kia ndeenyahalengei nasia tia Ndemɔi-ni ti wilingɔ hu.
50004003	Kɛɛ bia, nya mbaa ngengemɔ lɔnyangɔi, nya longɔ bi gbɔ nyahangɛi jisia ma; jifa mua tieni mu ngenge gbayangɔ wienga Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu, mua Klɛmɛnt-ni kɛɛ nya mbaa ngengeblaa wekɛisia gbi, ti biyɛi nyɛingɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi na hu fuublɛisia ti lɛisia ti hu.
50004004	A goohu nɛɛ waa kpele gbi ji wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu. Gbɛɛ ngi nde gbɔma: a goohunɛɛ.
50004005	A bɛwɛbɛwɛya gɛ a numu kpɛlɛɛ. Ndemɔi lɔ wama hugutungɔ.
50004006	Hinda gbi aa wu liihɛlɛ, kɛɛ wu yee yɛni gbi Ngewɔ vɛlima, a ngi vɛli kpele gbi a na wu gbewengɔ fa tawao wu siɛgboto gbua ngi ma watii gbi wa yɛ ngi vɛlima.
50004007	Faale ndiilɛli na Ngewɔ a fe, na numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ngi yɛyii gɔla a wu liisia mahugbelɔ kɛɛ wu nɛmahuisia jifa wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
50004008	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kɛlɛma yɛpɛi lɔ ngi ndema kɔlɛi ji hu a ya a gili a hindei nasia lekee ti gbekpengɔ tawao nungaa ta tato: tia mia a hindei nasia ti lɔnyangɔ, baagɔma i ti ma, ti wɔnangɔ, ti sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ, hindei nasia numu gbi a lo la tawao ti malɔwɔi nyandengɔ.
50004009	Hindei nasia wu majɔɔni a nge, a ngayenge kia ngi yɛ nde la kɛɛ kia ngi yɛ pie; tawao Ngewɔ na a ndiilɛli ve mu wɛ a yɛlɔ wu wooma.
50004010	Nya goohu nɛngɔ wa Ndemɔi hu, kɛ kia na hu i lɛmbinga ka, nya ma lii i yamanga wu goohu. Ngii ndema ngaa yɛma nya hinda i gbeilɔ a gbewela wu ma sabu lɔ wuii majɔɔni kɛva kɛ wu gbewengɔe nya va.
50004011	Tawao ngii ji lema jifa ngi gilinga la kɛ wu nya gbuanga ndɔgbɔ, jifa nya liilɛlingɔe a na gbi a yɛ nya yeya.
50004012	Ngi kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ hinda-gbɔundaa le a yɛ numu ma kɛɛ ji nɛnɛɛ a yɛ numu ma. Yeemakɛi ji gungɔe nya hu aako hinda gbi ngi yɛ na, watii gbi nya liilɛlingɔe, nya goovengɔ i yɛla ɔɔ ndɔlɛ i yɛ nya ma, hani i yɛ nya yeya mɔnungɔ nya ma ɔɔ i yɛ kulo hii.
50004013	Kristi lɔ a kpaya ve nya wɛ guva hinda gbi bu.
50004014	Kɛɛ hinda yekpe waa mia wu pieni ji wu gbɔni nya ma nya hinda-gbɔugbɔi hu.
50004015	Wua vulii wu Kristimableisia wu Filipai wu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ watii na ngi gbuani Masidonia lɔlei hu, Ngowili Yekpei legbele ninɛi wu ma, wua yakpe mia Kristimablaa a wue wu gbɔni nya ma; wua lekee mia nya hinda-gbɔugbɔi i lani mua wueni ma kɛɛ yeenafei.
50004016	Ji ngi yɛ Tɛsalonika la wai hu, ngi gbeweni kpɔma va tewengɔ heima yila ma, wu njooyoilɔ nya wɛ.
50004017	Tii yɛma nya longɔ lekee ngi yɛ a hani majɔɔ a wue gbama; nya longɔ wu yɛ a kpekpeyei mato wie, i yɛ a wu yeena mahu wu pienga.
50004018	Kɔlɛi ji a selilɔ kɛ hani kpɛlɛɛ wu fenga nya wɛ, ngi majɔɛilɔ tawao i guilɔ, i mɔnu! Kia na Ipafɔditɔsi i wanga a wu hindawanda hani kpɛlɛɛ, na hii nya gbewengɔ fa ngi yeemaleema jɔnga. Yeehani jisia ti wiengɔe kia saahanii gunɛnɛ numu a fe Ngewɔ wɛ, saai na bonda a nɛɛ ngi wɛ tawao a ndahou.
50004019	Tawao Yesu Kristi sabui hu, na gbi wa gbewe fa, nya Yewɔɛi a kpualɔ ngi gbatɛ wai hu i fe wu wɛ.
50004020	Ngɔlɔyɛi i yɛ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ wɛ kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ! Amiina.
50004021	Ngewɔ nungei nasia Yesu Kristi woo a tie, nya fama gboto yoyoma ti wɛ. Kristimablei nasia ti mbei nya gama, tɛ ta va wu ma.
50004022	Ngewɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ti mbei tiaa fama gboto yooyoma wu wɛ, kakayee nasia ti Rom Mahɛi yeepɛlɛbu.
50004023	Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima kɔɔ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
51001001	Nya Pɔɔl, nya i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ nya yɛva a tomɔ Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima mua mu ndewei Timoti,
51001002	Ngewɔ nungei nasia gama ti heini Kɔlɔsi laa wai hu, ti yɛngɔ a mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti langɔ a Kristi, jifa ti wilingɔ hu tia Kristi-ni. Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i ngauwanda gɛ a wue i wu gɔ a ndiilɛli.
51001003	Ma siɛgbualɔ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ ma watii gbi ma yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima wu va,
51001004	ajifa mu mɛninga kia wu langɔ a Yesu Kristi kɛɛ kia wu longɔ a Ngewɔ nungeisia.
51001005	Watii na Ngowili yeetɔnyangɔi, na Ngowili Yekpei le, i foni wu ma haala, yeewatii mia wu hani yekpei na hinda humɛnini wu lii i ma majɔɔva. Faale wu lalei a Kristi kɛɛ wu loyii a Ngewɔmableisia ti gbuani na hu lɔ wu kulɔgbema; tawao yeehanii na lamagbatɛngɔe pandaa ngelegoohu.
51001006	Ngowili Yekpei lɔ tuuŋ piema kpekpeya a wa nungaa gama tawao taa lekee vayama dunyei hu gbi, kia lɔɔ i vayanga wu maahu i hiye folei na ma wu Ngewɔ yauwandei hinda humɛni, tawao wu ngi yɛyii yeetɔnyɛi gɔɔni vulii.
51001007	Ɛpafras lɔ i ji hinda hugɛni a wue, mu liima yengemɔi na mua tieni mu yengema Kristi wɛ, a mu wooma gbewe gbua.
51001008	I ndomɛi na hinda hugɛnga a mue Ngewɔ Yafei i punga wu lii hu.
51001009	Sabui ji va lɔ mu Ngewɔ vɛlima tuuŋ wu va i hiye watii na ma mu wu hinda humɛnini. Mua Ngewɔ manɛnɛma aako i ngi liima hindei gɔla yeenɛmahulewe waa ve wu wɛ, kɛɛ nɛmahulewei kɛɛ hinda hugɔɔlei na gbi Ngewɔ Yafei a fe.
51001010	Na wiengaa wa gulɔ a luvala kia Ndemɔi longɔ la, watii gbi wa ngi liima hindei wie. Wu luvayii hu, wa kpekpe laasi gbi wielɔ, tawao wu Yewɔ gɔlɛi maa a tolɔ tuuŋ.
51001011	Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima aako i pie ngi gbaya gabandengɔ wai i pie wu lii i lo wu gu hindei gbi bu. Tawao a siɛgbua a kohunɛ mu Kɛkɛ ma, na i pienga wu gunga a yɛla hanii na ma Ngewɔ i ndamagbatɛnga ngi nungeisia va ngi mahayɛi na hu foofo lekee i na.
51001013	I mu gbuanga jumbui lemayɛi yeekpindii hu, i wanga a mue ngi liima Hindoloi mahayɛi hu,
51001014	na i mu wumawonga a ji i pienga Ngewɔ i mu jumbuisia lufenga.
51001015	Ngewɔ na numu ɛɛ gu a tɔla, ngi gbuayei mia a Kristi na nungaa ti yɛ gu a tɔla. Ta lɔ Kplaloi le, ngi lewengɔ hani gbi ma Ngewɔ i kpatɛni.
51001016	Gbamaile Ngewɔ i hanii gbi gbatɛni a ngi loko lɔ, nasia ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ nasia ti dunyei hu, nasia numu a gu a tɔla kɛɛ nasia numu ɛɛ gu a tɔla, kɛɛ ngafangeisia ti lunyɛi kɛɛ ndebleisia tia yeemahangeisia kɛɛ mahubleisia. Ngewɔ i ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunyei gbi gbatɛni a ngi loko lɔ tawao i kpatɛni ngi va lɔ.
51001017	Kristi i yɛ na lɔ pɛiŋ Ngewɔ i yaa hani gbi gbatɛ, tawao ngi gbayei lɔ i houni hanii kpɛlɛɛ ma ti yɛmɛisia.
51001018	Kristi lɔ sɔsii yeengui le na yɛni a ngi gbuhɛi; ta lɔ ndɛvui a gbua ngi gama. Ta lɔ Kplaloi a ngie Ngewɔ i ngi wuni hee hu aako ta yakpe i yɛ a hindei gbi yeekulɔmɔ.
51001019	Gbamaile Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i hugbatɛni yɛ ngi Yewɔyɛi yeehuvɛi yɛyii gbi i yɛ ngi Hindoloi hu.
51001020	Faale Ngewɔ Hindoloi sabui hu, ta ngi Ngewɔ i hugbatɛilɔ pieva hanii gbi ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya ti yama ngi ma. Ngewɔ i wailɔ a ndiilɛli hee va ngi Hindoloi i pieni krɔsii ma, i hanii gbi ti dunyei hu kɛɛ ngelegoohu yama ta yekpe ma.
51001021	Watii yila wɔɔ, wu maguhangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ tawao ngi juwungaa yɛla a wue hinda nyamui nasia va wu yɛ pie ɔɔ wu yɛ gili la.
51001022	Kɛɛ kiahuna na, jifa ngi Hindoloi i haani kia nuuvu na, Ngewɔ i wu yamanga na tayekpe ma, aako i pie wu loo ngi gulɔ jumbu wulo bɛɛ ii wu ma.
51001023	Kɛɛ mahoungɔ wu yɛ a la tuuŋ a Ngowili Yekpei, wu lo kpaŋ kia pɛlei hitɛ gɔtii i na, wuɛɛ luma gbɛogbɛ aa wu loko gbenda na ma wu lii i loni ma sɔɔva ji wu Ngowili Yekpei mɛnini. Ngowili Yekpei ji lɔ nya nya Pɔɔl ngi woteni a yeengengemɔ Ngowili Yekpei ji numu laasi gboto ti hugɛnga a numu gbi dunyei hu.
51001024	Kiahuna nya goohu nɛngɔe kpalɛisia va ti lama nya ma wu va, ajifa kpaalɛi nasia ta la nya gbuhɛi ma tia lɔ ta pie ngi kpaalɛi nasia yeemɔɔnii yakpua i lani Kristi ma Kristimableisia gbi va ngi gbuhɛi a tie.
51001025	Tawao Ngewɔ i nya yɛnga a Kristimableisia ti yengemɔ, i yeengengei ji venga nya wɛ pieva wu gbekpeya va. Yeengengei i yɛni a ngi Wowili lelaa lɔ gbalauŋ nungaa ma,
51001026	ta lɔ ndɔwuma hindei le i ndɔwunga wɔɔ gba nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛɛ i magɛnga na a ngi nungeisia.
51001027	Na i Ngewɔ nɛmahu pieva ta mia a ngi lɔwuma hindei hugɛla a ngi nungeisia, ndɔwuma-hinda gabandengɔ wai na i ngi yeya nuuvui yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ va. Tawao yeendɔwuma-hindei lɔ a ji kɛ Kristi lɔ heini wu liisia hu, tawao na a kɛlɔ kɛ wa Ngewɔ wɔlɔyei wu ndɛi majɔɔlɔ.
51001028	Famia ma Kristi hinda hugɛ a numu gbi. Nɛmahulewei na gbi lekee i mu wɛ, ma ngayengelɔ ti laahiva kɛɛ ti gaava aako mu pie yeengila gbi i lo Ngewɔ gulɔ kia nuuvu laavengɔ, tia Kristi ti wilingɔ hu.
51001029	Aako ji i wie, nga mɔnɛlɔ, nga lapi a Kristi gbayawai na gbi i yengema nya hu.
51002001	Gbɛɛ ngi mɔnɛ wai na hugɛ a wue ngi pienga wu va kɛɛ Laodisia lawai hubleisia va kɛɛ nungaa wekei nasia gbi tii yaa nya lɔni taa nya gɔɔ.
51002002	Nyaa ji wiema kɔɔ ti liisia ti yɛ kpaukpau tawao ti lalagblanga ndoma hu aako ti hinda hugɔɔla gbatɛ lavengɔi majɔɔ. Ji wiengaa, ta gulɔ a Ngewɔ hinda hulɔwungɔi gɔla, na i yɛni a Kristi vulii.
51002003	Ta lɔ Ngewɔ nɛmahulewei kɛɛ ngi hinda-hugɔlei lɔwungɔ ngi hu.
51002004	Faale, gbɛɛ ngi ji le wu ma aako numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ a ndɛɛ yɛpɛngaa, yeenjɛpɛisia ti gbua bɛɛ kaka a njɛpɛ yekpengaa.
51002005	Ajifa kia bɛɛ nya gbuhɛi ii wu lia, na hu gbi nyalii lɔ wu gama, tawao nya goohu nɛngɔe ji ngi tɔma wu wilingɔ hu tawao wuɛɛ wotewote wu lalei hu a Kristi.
51002006	Kia na wu kɔɔnga tao wu lumanga kɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ wu Lemɔi le, wua tieni wu wilingɔ hu i yɛla.
51002007	Wa gulɔ a ji wiela a ji wa pie Kristi i hei wu liisia hu kia wu langɔ a ngie, tawao wu wu lɛɛvuisia loo ngi ma, wu lalei a ngie maa a yɛ a to, kia ti wu gaani la pieva. Tawao siɛgboto gbuala Ngewɔ ma aa baa wu la.
51002008	A wu mahugbe hɔɔ, kɔɔ numu gbi aa wu yama gbɔma nduwɔya hu a nuuvu nɛmahulewei na ta nungaa yaka la gbama, na a gbua kaai nasia hu ndebleisia ta ndo a ti leengeisia kɛɛ dunyei yeengafangeisia, kɛɛ ii gbuani Kristi gama.
51002009	Na gbi i Ngewɔ hu taa Kristi hu, watii bɛɛ i yɛ nuuvuya hu,
51002010	tawao Ngewɔ i ndɛvui yeekpekpei vulii venga wu wɛ ji wua Yesu-ni wu wilingɔ hu, tawao Yesu leweni ngafangaa ti mahangeisia ma kɛɛ ti mahublɛisia.
51002011	Ji wua Kristi-ni wu wilini hu, wu woteilɔ a biliblaa, bili na ii le nuuvungaa ta hei, bilii na le Kristi a hei, na i yɛni a mu gbualalɔ jumbu gbayei yeya.
51002012	Ajifa watii na ti wu wuani, ti wu gbɔwuilɔ kia ti Kristi gbɔwuni la, tawao watii ti yɛ wu wuama i wieilɔ bɛɛ wu lalei a Ngewɔ gbaya wai na i Kristi wuni la hee hu i wua bɛɛ wumbunga hee hu.
51002013	Watii yila ma wɔɔ wu wielɔ kia haablaa Ngewɔ yaama wu jumbuisia wooma ajifa Juublaa yaa a wue tawao jifa Mojisi Jawei ii wu yeya. Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i wu wunga na hee hu kia i Kristi wuni hee hu. Ngewɔ i manuilɔ mu ma mu jumbui kpɛlɛɛ va;
51002014	i kɔlɛi na hunyaniilɔ mu wienyamuisia ti nyɛingɔ hu, kɛɛ Sawei nasia kpɛngɔ ma, i gbe gbua feu yeekɔlɛi hinda hu i kpakpa krɔsii ma.
51002015	Ji Kristi i yɛ krɔsii ma, i ta yekpe gbuɛilɔ ngafangeisia ti mahangeisia kɛɛ ti mahublɛisia ti gbayei bu, i pie numui gbi ti ti lɔ ta to ngi ma kia kɔ-houngaa temaya vahɛi na hu ti yɛ tooni ngi ma.
51002016	Faale, numu gbi aa sawangaa la wu yeya kɔlooni na wa mɛ ɔɔ wa kpɔli, ɔɔ Kayema voleisia va ɔɔ Ngalu Ninɛi yeekomɛisia ɔɔ Ndɛvu Volei ndɛisia.
51002017	Hindei jisia nyɔkɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti yɛni a kulɔma hindeisia yeenɛnɛi lɔ; yeetɔnyɛi a Kristi lɔ.
51002018	Waa luma numu gbi aa pie wu baa a wu mawaa jifa a nde yɛ i leweni nungaa wekeisia ma jifa malikangaa ti gɛnga wɔɔ a ngie, a nɔɔ nungaa tia yekpe mayeiva a ndɛɛ kɛɛ hɛɛva malikeisia ma. Yeenumui ji bonda ngi giliyii a pielɔ ngi yaama i lɛ gbama,
51002019	tawao i gbenga a hɛlɛla a Kristi, na Kristimableisia gbi ti wui a ngie, ngi gbuhɛi a tie. Kpuhɛi na gbi i Kristi va a mɛhɛɛ jɔlɔ i gbɔvɔ, ndatɛisia ti yeehaniisia gbi hou kpaŋ ti yɛmɛisia, tawao yeekpuhɛi na a loolalɔ kia Ngewɔ longɔ i loola.
51002020	Wua Kristi-ni wu haanga tawao wu gbuanga ngafangei nasia bu kpaya i ti wɛ dunyei hu. Gbɛe hɔɔ wu luvama bi tɔngaa bɛɛ dunyei ji woo lɔ a wue? Gbɛe wa sawei nasia nyɔkɔ hou ta nde tɛɛ,
51002021	“Baa ji hou a loko, ɔɔ Baa na gɔɔ, ɔɔ Baa jaa a yeepekei?”
51002022	Ji kpɛlɛɛ i yɛpɛma hanii nasia lɔ va ta nyani ji lekee numu a yenge a tie; nuuvunga lekee lɔ ti yeesawei nasia gbatɛni kɛɛ yeekaaisia.
51002023	A tɔnya nungaa ta gililɔ tɛɛ sawei nasia bonda ti lablɛisia ti nɛmahu lewengɔe a ji ta nɔɔ nungaa ma hɛɛva malikeisia ma, ta tia yekpe mayei a ndɛɛ, ta ti gbuhɛisia goma a hanii nasia ti gbekpengɔ ndɛvui va; kɛɛ sawei jisia tɛɛ gbɔ numui na ma ngi longɔ i ta yekpe huhou hindei nasia wieva ta ngi gbuhɛi liilɛli.
51003001	Kia Ngewɔ i Kristi wunga hee hu i pienga wu ndɛvu nina majɔɔnga, faale a gbewe hanii nasia va ti Ngewɔ yeya wu va ngelegoohu mia Kristi i heini na ngi maha-heimɛi Ngewɔ yejei hu.
51003002	A gbewe tuuŋ hanii nasia va ti mahui, waa gbewe hanii nasia va ti mbei dunyei hu.
51003003	Ajifa piengɔe bɛɛ wu haanga, kɛɛ wu lɛɛvui yeekpekpei lɔwungɔe Ngewɔ gama, Kristi sabui hu.
51003004	Wu lɛɛvui yeekpekpei i Kristi yeya lɔ, tawao watii na a gbua nga, yeewatii na lɔ wua bɛɛ wa gbua nga wua tieni wu gbɔ ngi wɔlɔyɛi ma.
51003005	Mahoungɔ hɔɔ wu dunyama mani nyamui nasia waa ta wu yayenge kia nyɔkɔ: puegbuala, manɔhɔ hindei, nyaha mani, hinda nyamu wie mani kɛɛ hani-mani (ajifa hani-mani i yɛni a nɔmɔli vɛlilei yeelasii yila lɔ.)
51003006	Hindei jisia nyɔkɔ va, Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ maluwangɔ lalɔ nasia ma tɛɛ golo ngi wɛ.
51003007	Watii yila wɔɔ, mani nyamui jisia ti yɛlɔ wua bɛɛ vulii hu, wa pie ji wu yɛ yeemanii nasia yeya.
51003008	Kɛɛ kiahuna na mahoungɔ wu gbe a hinda nyamui jisia kpɛlɛɛ wiela: ndiilewei, ndiimavulɛi, kɛɛ kili nyamuisia. Njia nyamu nungaa wekeisia va ɔɔ manyimi yɛpɛ aa gbua wu laa kunafɔ.
51003009	Waa ndɛɛ guala wu nyɔunyɔ wɛ, ajifa wu gbuanga na wu yɛyii wovei hu kɛɛ hinda nyamui nasia kungɔ yɛla wu hu pieva,
51003010	wu yɛyii nina wumbunga. Numu ninɛi ji wu yɛnga la, wu Gbatɛmɔi Ngewɔ waa lɔ piema a gbua lekee a ngie aako wu ngi hinda hugɔɔ pandawanda.
51003011	Faale, nduahugɛ gbi ii yaa nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti luahu tia Juublaa, biliblɛisia tia pɔnɔblɛisia, ndɔlɔ weka hublɛisia, makɛvɛliblɛisia, nduwɔngɛisia kɛɛ nasia nduwɔ yaa tie, kɛɛ Kristi lɔ baama hanii le tawao numui kpɛlɛɛ hu.
51003012	Ngewɔ nungeisia lɔ a wue; i loilɔ a wue i wu yɛ a ngi woo. Faale na, a yɛ a nungaa mamaanu lɔ, wa hinda wanda wie, wa wua yekpe mayei, wu liigɔlɛngɔ, tawao wu liilongɔ i yɛla.
51003013	Wu wiehindei i gu wu nyɔunyɔ hu, wa manu wu nyɔunyɔ ma watii na numu yila a nyamu ga a pekei. Mahoungɔe wu manu wu nyɔunyɔ ma kia lɔɔ mu Lemɔi i manunga la wu ma.
51003014	Tewengɔ hindei jisia kpɛlɛɛ wiela ma, a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ ajifa na lɔ a pie wu wili hu, wu lii i yɛ yakpe kia mahoungɔ i wiela.
51003015	Ndiilɛli na Kristi a fe i na pele gɛva lɔ a wue hinda gbi hu wa pie; ajifa Ngewɔ i wu lɛnga ma hinda yila wu yɛva a kpuha yila aako wu yeendiilɛli ji yaati gɔɔ. Mahoungɔ wu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma.
51003016	Mahoungɔe Kristi Wowili gabandengɔ wai i yɛ tuuŋ wu liisia hu. A yɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ gaa, wu yɛ a pele wɔnɛi gɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ a nɛmahulewei. A Saam wuleisia yaa, kɛɛ nguleisia kɔlooni Kristi ma kɛɛ ngulei nasia Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ; a yɛ a wule Ngewɔ ma, wa siɛgboto gbua ngi ma a wu lii gbi.
51003017	Na gbi wa pie ɔɔ wa nde, mahoungɔ wu pie ɔɔ wu nde mu Lemɔi Yesu biyɛi hu kia wa siɛgbua la mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ ma ngi biyɛi hu.
51003018	Hiniblɛisia, a wuaa wu hiningɛisia bu, ajifa na mia mahoungɔ wu pie kia Kristimablaa a wue.
51003019	Nyahableisia, a lo a wu nyahangeisia, tawao waa gbandi a tie.
51003020	Ndeengɛisia, kia Kristimablaa a wue, kpa le wu ma golova wu leblɛisia wɛ kpele gbi, ajifa na mia a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.
51003021	Ndooblɛisia, waa wu leengeisia ti gbalɛma hinda wie; na wiengaa ti lii a nyanilɔ.
51003022	Nduwɔngɛisia, a golo wu luwɔkɛisia wɛ hinda gbi hu, watii na lekee ii le ta yɛ wu yabɛɛma waa yɛ goloma jifa wu longɔ ti wu lato; kɛɛ a golo a ndiigole bagɔɔmɛi na va i wu wɛ mu Lemɔi va.
51003023	Hinda gbi i yaa wu yeya pieva, a pie a wu lii gbi bi tɔa bɛɛ wu yengema mu Lemɔi lɔ wɛ, kɛɛ nuuvu va ii le.
51003024	I ye wu nɛmahu kɛ na mu Lemɔi i ndamagbatɛnga ngi nungeisia va a wu gɔlɔ hu a mawaa. Ajifa Kristi vulii lɔ Ndemɔi le wu yengema ngi wɛ.
51003025	Tawao Ngewɔ a hinda nyamu wiemɔ gbi pawalɔ hinda nyamui nasia va a pie, ajifa numui gbi ti gbɛmboyii i yakpe, Ngewɔ ɛɛ topooma wie.
51004001	Nduwɔkɛisia, a pɔɔna-hinda wie a wu luwɔngɛisia, waa ti gava. I yɛ wu nɛmahu kɛ numu lɔ ngelegoohu ngi woo a wua bɛɛ.
51004002	A nɔɔ Ngewɔ vɛlila ma, tawao wu ya aa lema, wa siɛgbua ngi ma.
51004003	A yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli muabɛɛ va kɔɔ Ngewɔ i pele ve mu wɛ ngi Wowili na leva ndɔwungɔ wɔɔ kɔlooni Kristi ma. Gbamaile na vamia ngi kpindiwɛlei bu kiahuna.
51004004	Faale, a Ngewɔ vɛli kɔɔ ngi gu ngi ngi Wowili ji yeembui gɛ gbalauŋ kia mahoungɔ ngi pie la.
51004005	A nɛmahulewe wie wu wiehindei hu nasia gama tii lani a Kristi, watii gbi aa lewe wu ma kɛva a tie kɛ wua wu langɔe a Kristi.
51004006	Mahoungɔe wu layie manɛngɔ i yɛla kpele gbi nungaa woohu nahi yeemani i yɛ a ti lɔ, tawao mahoungɔe wu kpɛmboi na gɔɔ mbɛgɔma nguava numu gbi gama.
51004007	Mu liima ndewei Taikikɔsi, na ngengemɔ a ngie numu a gu i liilo ngi ma tawao mu mbaa ngengemɔɔ a ngie mu Lemɔi yengei hu, a vɛi kpɛlɛɛ gɛlɔ a wue kɔloongɔ nya ma.
51004008	Na vamia ngi ngi looma wu gama kɔɔ i pie wu goohu i nɛɛ gbɔma a ji a mu kpɛlɛɛ gama va gɛ a wue.
51004009	Tia Onɛsimɔsi mia ti wama, mu liima ndewei na mu liilongɔ ngi ma, tawao wua tieni mia Kristimableisia a wue miando. Ta hindei gbi hugɛlɔ a wue i wiema mbei.
51004010	Aristakɔs na mua ta mu kpindiwɛlei bu yɛ a va kaka wu ma, hii Maaki bɛɛ i na, Banabasi ndewei (Wu wilanga a fɛimawoo majɔɔla, loko heiva Maaki bu pandawanda ji a foo wu ma.)
51004011	Jɔsua na ta toli gbɔma a Jɔstɔs, ta bɛɛ yɛ a va kaka wu ma. Jisia sawei jisia lekee lɔ Juublaa a tie ti langɔ a Kristi mua tieni mu yengema Ngewɔ Mahayɛi va, tawao ti kpɔma waa wienga nya ma.
51004012	Ipafras yɛ a va kaka wu ma; wua vulii wu yilayee mia a ngie kɛɛ Yesu Kristi yengemɔ. Taa kpele gbi Ngewɔ vɛlima a ngi lii gbi wu va yɛ Ngewɔ i pie wu lo kpaŋ kia Kristimablaa huhitingɔngaa a wue, wu golo pandawanda Ngewɔ liima hindei bu.
51004013	Nya vulii nga gulɔ a selila kɛ i ngenge gbayangɔ waa wienga gbɔva wu ma kɛɛ nungei nasia ti Laodisia kɛɛ Haiarapolis laa waisia hu.
51004014	Mu liima Halemɔi Luki taa Diimas bɛɛ tɛɛ ta va kaka wu ma.
51004015	Mua fama yoyoma Kristimablei nasia gama ti Laodisia, kɛɛ nyapoi Niifa taa Kristimablei nasia ta gomɛ ngi wɛleibu.
51004016	Wu kpɔyɔngaa a kɔlɛi ji gaala wu tɔ i gaa Kristimablei nasia gama ti Laodisia. Hii mahoungɔ wu kɔlɛi na gaa mu ndeengɛi nasia ti Laodisia ti njoyoma wu gama.
51004017	A nde Akipɔs ma i Ndemɔi yengei na wie ti feni ngi wɛ.
51004018	Nya vulii nya lokoi mia ngi famɛi jisia nyɛima la ngi njoyoma wu wɛ. Waa lema kɛ nyaa kpindiwɛlei bu. Ngewɔ i ngauwanda gɛ a wue.
52001001	Nya Pɔɔl, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma. Mua Sailas kɛɛ Timoti, Wu Kristimablei nasia gama wu heini Tɛsalonika, mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ woo a wue tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi. Ngewɔ i wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
52001002	Ma siɛgbualɔ Ngewɔ ma kpele gbi wu kpɛlɛɛ va, ma Ngewɔ vɛli wu gbi va watii gbi ma yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima.
52001003	Ajifa kpelema gbi lekee mu yaa mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima, ma laalilɔ wu layii a Kristi yaayengeyii ma kɛɛ ngenge gbayangɔi na wu pieni jifa wu longɔ a ngie kɛɛ kia wu lii i looni mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ma kpaukpaungɔ.
52001004	Mu ndeengɛisia, mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ longɔe a wue tawao i wua wu wumbunga yɛva a ngi woo.
52001005	Mu wailɔ wu gama a Ngowili Yekpei kɔɔlooni Yesu Kristi ma, muii wani a laahu-yɛpɛ gbama lekee, mu wailɔ a kaabande hindangaa Ngewɔ Yafei i pieni tawao mu kɛilɔ gbalauŋ kɛ mu langɔe la kɛ tɔnya vulii lɔ a yee-Ngowili Yekpei. Wu kɔɔlɔ kia mu yɛ luva la ji mu yɛ wu lia; wu nda gbekpeyɛi vamia na kpɛlɛɛ i wieni.
52001006	Wu mu wookɔilɔ mua Ndemɔi-ni; tawao kia bɛɛ kpalɛ gboto i lani wu ma, wu lailɔ a yeengowili a Kohunɛ na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe.
52001007	Famia wu woteilɔ a tɔmaseli Kristimablei nasia kpɛlɛɛ gama ti Masidonia kɛɛ Akaya.
52001008	Ajifa ii gɛlɛni ngowili ma kɔlooni Ndemɔi ma wu fayani Masidonia kɛɛ Akaya, wu layii a Ngewɔ yeetɔwɔi i vayanga hu gbi. Famia njɛpɛ weka gbi ii na mahoungɔ mu nde.
52001009	Nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ lɔ yɛpɛma kɔɔlooni pelei na ma wu mu houni ji mu wani wu gama, kɛɛ ji wu wounveni nɔmɔliisia ma, wu wote Ngewɔ gama, yengeva tɔnya Yewɔ vulungɔi wɛ,
52001010	kɛɛ ngi Hindoloi mawulova i hiye ngelegoohu i wa, ngi Hindoloi Yesu na i mbumbuni hee hu, kɛɛ na a pie mu bawo watii na Ngewɔ liilewe yagbalɛngɔ wai a hiti ma.
52002001	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, wua vulii wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ pei na mu pieni wu gama ii yɛni a kɛwɛ jia.
52002002	Wu kɔɔlɔ kia ti kpalɛ lani la mu ma, ta mu bɛlɛ nyani Filipai pɛiŋ mu yaa wa wu gama Tɛsalonika. Tawao kia bɛɛ nungaa ti yɛ lapi waa a mue, mu Yewɔɛi i mu gɔilɔ a ndiilo Ngowili Yekpei na leva wu ma a gbua ngi gama.
52002003	Ji mu lapini aako wu la a Ngowili Yekpei muii ndɛɛ gualani tawao muii manɔhɔ hinda wieni tawao muii kava gulani numu gbi ma.
52002004	Kia maa na wie, watii gbi ma na lɔ le Ngewɔ longɔ mu nde, ajifa i mu hugɔɔnga i tɔnga kɛ mu mahoungɔe Ngowili Yekpei loko wuava mu yeya. Muii lapima nuuvungaa liilɛliva, mu lapima Ngewɔ lɔ liilɛliva, na i mu liisia huvei kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔngɔ.
52002005	Wu kɔɔlɔ vuli pandawanda kɛ muii wani wu gama a numu lɛ yɛpɛ ɔɔ njɛpɛi nasia ta mani nyamui nasia malɔwu ma pie nungaa wekɛisia ti yeya-hanisia va. Ngewɔ lɔ mu jeli le.
52002006	Muii lapini tato majɔɔva a numu gbi, muii loni a wu lato ɔɔ nungaa wekangaa ti nda,
52002007	kia bɛɛ mua ma gulɔ mu hani gboto gbua wu yeya ajifa toblaa lɔ a mue Kristi va. Na hu gbi mua mu ndii bɛbɛngɔ lɔ gɛni ji mu yɛ wu gama, kia koimɛi a ngi leengeisia nyini, a ti mahugbe.
52002008	Ndoma wai na va mu piengɔ a wue, mu magbatɛngɔ yɛla pieva wua bɛɛ wu Ngowili Yekpei hinda hugɔɔ a gbua Ngewɔ gama kɛɛ hinda gbi wieva gbɔva wu ma. Mu longɔ yɛla a wue hulewengɔ.
52002009	Taa wu nɛmahu vulii, mu mbaa Kristimableisia, kia mu yengeni kpayangɔ waa! Mu yengeilɔ a folo kɛɛ kpindi aako maa yɛ a kaha wu ma ji mu yɛ Ngowili Yekpei na lema wu ma a gbua Ngewɔ gama.
52002010	Wua lɔ mu jelisia a wue kɛɛ Ngewɔ kɛ mu luvayii wua wu Kristimableisia gama sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ yɛla, pɔɔnangɔ, tawao nyamu gbi ii hu.
52002011	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ mu wu yilayee gbi houilɔ kia kɛkɛi a ngi nda leengeisia hou la.
52002012	Mu wu liiloilɔ, mu wu nɛpɔ, tawao mu yɛlɔ a nɔɔ wu ma jiava a pelei na a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ na i wu lolima aako wua tieni wu gbɔ ngi Mahayɛi ma kɛɛ ngi wɔlɔyɛi.
52002013	Tawao sabu weka lɔ na ma siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma kpele gbi. Ji mu wani wu gama mu Ngewɔ wowili hugɛ a wue, wu mɛniilɔ tawao wu lailɔ la, wuii mbumbuni kia nuuvu wowili gbama, wu mbumbuilɔ a Ngewɔ wowili, tawao hii vulii i na. Ajifa Ngewɔ lɔ hinda wiema wu hu wua wu langɔ a ngie.
52002014	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, hindei nasia ti wu wienga tia mia ti Kristimablei nasia wieni ti heiheini Judia lɔlei hu, nasia ti na Yesu Kristi woo a tie. Wu gbɔugbɔu gɛnyɛblɛisia ti juwuya hitɛilɔ wu wooma a toloma yakpei na Juublaa ti hitɛni la ti wooma,
52002015	Juublaa nasia ti Ndemɔi Yesu waani kɛɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia, ti hitɛni mu wooma a juwuya. Ti hinda i gbalɛni kpa Ngewɔ ma! Ti loloni kpa a numui gbi!
52002016	Ti lapilɔ gbɔma tɛɛ ti mu maabali maa Ngowili Yekpei na le nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie kɔɔ taa bawo. Hii ti jumbui kpɛlɛɛ laavenga ti piema wɔɔ gba. Faale kɛlɛmɛi ji lɔɔ, Ngewɔ i liilewenga ti ma.
52002017	Kɛɛ mua, mu mbaa Kristimableisia, ji mua wueni mu luahu i gɔlɛni kulo, kia bɛɛ wu hinda ii yɛ gbua mu nɛmahu, wu mani i mu lɔni kpa tawao mu lapini kpa wu lɔva gbɔma!
52002018	Mu longɔ yɛla mu yama gbɔma wu gama. Nya, Pɔɔl vulii ngi lapilɔ tewengɔ heima yila ma yamava wu gama, kɛɛ Seitana ii lumani mu wɛ.
52002019	Gbamaile wua vulii lɔ mu lii valamɛi a wue kɛɛ mu goohunɛi kɛɛ mu sabui lawova a temaya majɔɔla mu Lemɔi Yesu gulɔ watii na a wa gbɔma.
52002020	Tɔnya vulii le kɛ wua mia wa pie mu matagbua, mu kohunɛ jɔɔ!
52003001	Kɛlɛmɛi muii guni a mawulo weka wiela. Faale mu hugbatɛilɔ muɛɛ mua lekee mu lo Atɛns,
52003002	ji mu Timoti loni wu gama, mu ndewei na mua tieni mu yengema Ngewɔ wɛ a ji ma Ngowili Yekpei le kɔɔlooni Kristi ma. Mu ngi yoyoilɔ aako i pie wu layii a Kristi maa i to,
52003003	aako wu yilayee bɛɛ aa yama a wooma wee juwuyei jisia va. Wua vulii wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ juwuyei jisia nyɔkɔ ti yɛni a Ngewɔ liima hindei lɛɛngaa lɔ mu va.
52003004	Gbamaile watii na lɛ mu yɛ wu lia, mu humbuilɔ a hugɛ a wue kɛ nungaa ta juwuya hitɛlɔ wu wooma; tawao kia wu kɔɔngɔ la pandawanda, na mia lɔɔ i wieni.
52003005	Na vamia ngi Timoti yoyoni. Ngii yaa guni a mawulo wiela aa lewe na ma, famia ngi ngi loni kɔɔ i wu layii a Kristi hugbɛkpɛ. A tɔnya nya luwangɔ yɛla ngɛ Seitana i wu gɔlɛma a pelei lɛɛnga hu we, kɛ mu mɔnɛi kpɛlɛɛ i yɛnga mu ma a kɛwɛ mɔnɛ!
52003006	Timoti i yamanga mbei na tawao i wanga a va nɛnɛɛ kɔlooni wu layii ma a Ngewɔ kɛɛ ndomɛi na wu piengɔ a ngie. I hugɛnga a mue yɛ wa kili yekpe wielɔ a mue watii gbi, tawao yɛ wu longɔe wu mu lɔ kia lɔɔ mu longɔ mu wu lɔ.
52003007	Famia ndiinyani kɛɛ kpalɛi na kpɛlɛɛ hu i langa mu ma, wu hinda i mu lii nɛpɔnga, mu mbaa Kristimableisia. Wu layii a Kristi mia i mu lii nɛpɔni,
52003008	ajifa ndɛvui vulii lɔ na mu hu ji mu kɔɔnga kɛ wu lala a Ndemɔi i ya kpau.
52003009	Ma siɛgbualɔ mu Yewɔɛi ma wu va. Kɛɛ muɛɛ gu a siɛgbuala ngi ma pandawanda ngi yaama kohunɛi va i mu hu kɔlooni wu ma.
52003010	A folo kɛɛ kpindi mua ngi vɛlima a mu lii gbi aako i pie mua wueni mu yaama wɛlɛ ma, mu na ve wu gbewengɔ fa wu lalei va.
52003011	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vulii kɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu ti pele la mu wɛ wava wu gama.
52003012	Ndemɔi i pie ndomɛi na wu peingɔ a wu nyɔunyɔ kɛɛ numui gbi maa i to i wɔlɔ i wie kia ndomɛi na i na mu piengɔ a wue.
52003013	Ji wiengaa, Ndemɔi a kpaya wuaalɔ wu hu, tawao nyamu gbi ɛɛ yɛ wu hu wu magayemangɔ a yɛla mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ yaama ji mu Lemɔi Yesu a wa tia nasia gbi ngi woo a tie.
52004001	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, gbɛɛ ngi ji le njɛpɛi ji yakpuava: mu kɛilɔ a wue wa yee luva na a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ. Tawao yeetuvei mia wɔɔ wu piema. Kiahuna na mua wu manɛnɛma Ndemɔi Yesu biyɛi hu yeetuvei na mato wieva.
52004002	Wu na gɔɔlɔ mu ndeni wu ma pieva kia Ndemɔi Yesu i puni mu laa ndeva.
52004003	Ngewɔ longɔ wu luva a pelei na a kɛ kɛ Ngewɔ woo lɔ a wue, wu loko gbi ii puegbua hinda hu.
52004004	Mahoungɔ wu yilayee gbi i kɔɔ kia mahoungɔ i ta yekpe houla puehinda hu mbɛlɛya hu kɛɛ pelei na a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ,
52004005	tii yɛma sɔɔ-hinda lekee i gbewe wu ma kia nungei nasia ti na tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ.
52004006	Faale Nyahajɔɔ hindei hu, numu gbi aa ngi mba Kristimamɔ gava kulo bɛɛ. Mu ji lenga wu ma ngovama tawao mu wu laahilɔ kpɔtukpɔtu kɛ Ndemɔi a kpalɛ lalɔ nasia gbi ma ta na wie.
52004007	Ngewɔ ii mu lolini heiva a puegbuala, i mu lolini luvava lɔ kia nungei nasia na ngi woo a tie.
52004008	Faale na, numu gbi lekee a gbele kaai ji ma, ii gbeelema nuuvu lɔ ma kɛ Ngewɔ na a ngi Yafa Yekpei ve wu wɛ.
52004009	Sabu gbii na kɔlɔ nyɛiva wu gama kɔɔlooni ndomɛi na ma mahoungɔ wu pie a wu mbaa Kristimableisia. Ngewɔ i wua vulii gaanga kia wa yee lo a wu nyɔunyɔ.
52004010	Tawao a tɔnya, hii wu pienga a Kristimablei nasia gbi ti Masidonia lɔlei hu gbi. Faale, mua wu manɛnɛma, mu mbaa Kristimableisia, wu mato wie.
52004011	A wu lii huyili waa loko wili ndabla hu ɔɔ sɔlɛ, wu woo i yɛ wu nda hindei lekee ma, tawao a yenge a gahu hanii nasia majɔɔva wa gbewe fa kia mu ndeni la wu ma.
52004012	Ji lɔ a wie nasia tii lani a Ngewɔ ti baa gɔɔ wu ma, tawao waa hɛlɛ a numu gbi hanii nasia va wa gbewe fa.
52004013	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, Mu longɔ wu tɔnyɛi hugɔɔ kɔɔlooni nungei nasia ma ti haanga, aako wu lii aa nyani, kia nungei nasia ti na ti lii ii ma ngelegoohu majɔɔva.
52004014	Mu langɔe la kɛ Yesu i haailɔ, i hiye gbɔma hee hu, faale mu langɔe la kɛ nasia ti loni lama a Kristi ti haanga, Ngewɔ a pielɔ ti vulu ti lɛ mia Yesu i na.
52004015	Kaai na Ndemɔi i kɛni a mue tamia mu wu gaama la kiahuna: Mua mu vulungɔ a yɛla folei na ma Ndemɔi a wa, mua yese muɛɛ li ngi gama nasia gulɔ ti haanga.
52004016	Ngewɔ malikei yeembawai a yɛpɛlɔ ngeleya, kɛɛ Ngewɔ bulii woi, tawao Ndemɔi a gbualɔ ngelegoohu i yei. Nasia ti loni lama a Kristi ti haanga, tia yese ta vulu lɔ ti hiye;
52004017	na wooma mua mu vulungɔ a yɛla a watii na Ngewɔ a mua tieni lɛlɔma hinda yila fɛfɛi hu, Ndemɔi maliva lugbui hu. Na wiengaa, mua Ndemɔi-ni ma heilɔ kunafɔ.
52004018	Faale na, a yɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ nɛpɔ a njɛpɛi jisia.
52005001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, sabu gbi ii na ngi kɔlɔ nyɛi wu gama kɔɔlooni lɔwɔi yeefoloi na ma Ndemɔi a yama mbei.
52005002	Ajifa wua vulii wu kɔɔlɔ pandawanda kɛ Ndemɔi wa-Volei a walɔ kia humamɔi a wa kualama hu a kpindi.
52005003	Ji nungaa ta tɔɔto a ndela tɛɛ, “Mu liilɛlingɔe tawao hinda nyamu gbi ii mu gama,” yeewatii na mia hunyani waa a yei ti ma fulo kia ndoo le goohugbalɛi i na, a gbundɛ nyahɛi ma ji ngi lo le watii a fo ma, tawao numu gbi ɛɛ gbua mbu.
52005004	Kɛɛ wua, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kia wuii yeehindei ji yeekpindi hu, maa ii houni folei na i gɔla wu ma kia humamɔi a gɔla numu ma.
52005005	Wu kpɛlɛɛ wu yɛni a nungaa lɔ wa luva bi tɔa bɛɛ wa hinda gbi wie folei yeefofoi hu lɔ. Muɛɛ luva kia nungei nasia na ta hinda wie kpele gbi kpindi hu.
52005006	Faale na, maa ii houni mu yɛ njii hu, kia nungaa wekɛisia ti na; mahoungɔ mu valangɔ i yɛla tawao mu gungɔ mu lii ma.
52005007	Kpindi lɔ nungaa ta yii; kpindi lɔ ndɔi a nungaa hou.
52005008	Kɛɛ mua ma hinda gbi wie a folei lɔ tawao mahoungɔ mu gu mu lii ma. Mahoungɔ mu la a Ngewɔ mu lo a ngie na a wielɔ bi tɔa bɛɛ mu mu mayilinga kɔi va, tawao mu lii i yɛ vulii ma kɛ Ngewɔ a mu bawolɔ: na a wielɔ bi tɔa bɛɛ wu kɔlu-bɔlɛi lɔ wɛlɛnga wumba.
52005009	Ngewɔ ii loko looni mu ma aako mu kpalɛ majɔɔ ngi liilewei va kɛɛ aako mu mbawoyei maajɔɔ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi sabui hu,
52005010	na i haani mu va kɔɔ mu yɛna mua tieni, i bɛ mu vulungɔi ma ɔɔ mu haangɔi ma watii ma a yama mbei.
52005011	Faale, a yɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ lii nɛpɔ, wa gbɔ wu nyɔunyɔ ma, kia lɔɔ wu piema kiahuna.
52005012	Mua wu manɛnɛma, mu mbaa Kristimableisia, muɛɛ wu yɛ a baagɔma yekpe ve nasia wɛ ti yengema wu lia, nasia Ndemɔi i ti lolinga kɔɔ ti pele gɛ a wue, tawao ta wu gaa a pelei na mahoungɔ Kristimamɔi i jia la.
52005013	A baagɔma waa ve ti wɛ, wu lo a tie ngengei na kpɛlɛɛ va ti piema. Fawɔli gbi aa yɛ wu nyɔunyɔ luahu.
52005014	Mua wu manɛnɛma, mu mbaa Kristimableisia, muɛɛ wu kɛwɛ-gbuablɛisia laahii, wu nduwableisia liilo, wu gbɔ nasia ma ti gbewengɔ kpɔma va, waa gbandi a numu gbi.
52005015	Waa lo heini numu gbi aa hinda nyamu hunyɔɔ a hinda nyamu, tawao a lapi vulii watii gbi hinda yekpe wieva a wu nyɔunyɔ kɛɛ numui gbi.
52005016	Wu goohu nɛngɔ i yɛla watii gbi,
52005017	a Ngewɔ vɛli kpema gbi,
52005018	gbɛogbɛ bɛ i wie a yɛ a siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma. Tuvei ji lɔ Ngewɔ longɔ wu pie wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
52005019	Waa pie Ngewɔ Yafei aa gbe a ngi yengei wiela;
52005020	Waa lɛɛ Ngowili nasia hu Ngewɔ a pu nungaa ti lii hu ndeva.
52005021	A yɛ a gbua hindei gbi wooma, wu yɛ a na wie kpekpengɔ,
52005022	waa loko wili hinda nyamu yeelasii gbi wiela hu.
52005023	Ngewɔ na a ndiilɛli ve mu wɛ i pie wu gbua a ngie a pelei gbi, i pie wu lɛɛvui kɛɛ wu yafei kɛɛ wu gbuhɛi gbi i yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ aako watii na mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a wa gbɔma njia ɛɛ yɛ wu ma.
52005024	Ngewɔ na i wu lolima yɛva a ngi nda nungeisia a na wielɔ, ajifa ngi layie ɛɛ nyani.
52005025	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, a yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli mua bɛɛ va.
52005026	A va Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ ma a ndoma lii.
52005027	Nyaa ndema wu ma a kpayei na mu Lemɔi i feni nya wɛ ngɛɛ wu kɔlɛi ji gaa Kristimableisia gbi gama.
52005028	Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i ngauwanda ve wu wɛ.
53001001	Nya Pɔɔl, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma, mua Sailas kɛɛ Timoti. Wua wu Kristimablei nasia gama wu heini Tɛsalonika, mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ woo a wue tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi.
53001002	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ kɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ti ngauwanda gɛ a wue, ti wu gɔ a ndiilɛli.
53001003	Mu mbaa Kristimableisia, mahoungɔ mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma watii gbi wu kpɛlɛɛ va ajifa wu layii a Ngewɔ lɔ gbayama waa, tawao ndomɛi na i wu yilayee gbi hu wu mbaa wekɛisia va taa wɔlɔma.
53001004	Na vamia mua vulii ma matagbualɔ a wue Ngewɔ sɔsiisia hu kɛɛ guyii va hinda gbɔugbɔu bu wu layii a Kristi kia bɛɛ nungaa ti hitɛnga wu wooma a juwuya, ta kpalɛngaa la wu ma.
53001005	Ji kpɛlɛɛ a kɛlɔ leiŋ kɛ Ngewɔ a kiti lewe a pɔɔna lɔ, faale a pielɔ wu yɛ ngi mahayɛi na bu na kpalɛ i lama wu ma fa.
53001006	Na pɔɔnangɔ ta lɔ Ngewɔ a pie: a kpalɛ lalɔ nungei nasia bɛɛ ma ti kpalɛ lama wu ma,
53001007	tawao wua kpalɛ i lama wu ma kiahuna Ngewɔ a wu nɛpɔlɔ kɛɛ mua bɛɛ. A ji wielɔ watii na Ndemɔi Yesu a hiye ngelegoohu i gbua nga taa ngi malikei nasia kpaya waa i ti wɛ hinda waawaa wieva,
53001008	kɛɛ ngɔmbuvo waa, hinda nyamui hunyɔva nasia ma tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ kɛɛ nasia tɛɛ luma taa na wie Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni mu Lemɔi Yesu ma i ndeni.
53001009	Ngewɔ a kpalɛ lalɔ ti ma, i ti nyani kunafɔ va, tɛɛ foo mia Ndemɔi i na tawao tɛɛ ngi wɔɔlɔya gabandengɔ wai hulɔ,
53001010	ji a wa folei na ma ngɔɔlɔya kɛɛ mbɛlɛya majɔɔva a ngi nungei nasia gbi ti langɔ a ngie. Wua bɛɛ wa yɛlɔ ti lia ajifa wu langa a ngowili na mu ndeni wu ma.
53001011	Na vamia mu Ngewɔ vɛlima wu va watii gbi. Ma mu Yewɔɛi manɛnɛlɔ aako i pie wu maa i hou tuvei na wieva i wu lolinga fa. Ngewɔ gbayei i pie wu gu a kpekpei na kpɛlɛɛ wiela mani i wu ma pieva, i wu yengei yakpua wa pie ajifa wu langɔ a Kristi.
53001012	Ji lɔ a wie mu Lemɔi Yesu biyɛi i ngɔɔlɔya majɔɔ a wue, wua bɛɛ wu majɔɔ a ngie, tawao ji a wielɔ mu Yewɔɛi kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ti yauwandei yeesabui hu.
53002001	Kɔɔlooni mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yamalei ma mbei kɛɛ mu lɛla ma hinda yila aako mua tieni mu hei, nyaa wu manɛnɛma vulii, nya mbaa Kristimableisia,
53002002	waa luma nasia ti ndema tɛɛ Ndemɔi wa-gbelei i hitinga taa wu nɛmahu baa. Tɛngaa kulɔmayia lemɔ mia i ji leni ɔɔ vaagɛmɔ, ɔɔ tɛnga ti gililɔla kɛ mua mia mu ji wuni kɔlɔ ma.
53002003	Waa luma numu gbi aa wu yaka kulo bɛɛ. Gbamaile Ndemɔi wa-Volei ɛɛ hiti kɛlee watii na numu gboto waa ta ganga a Ngewɔ, tawao Sawa Nyanimɔi a gbuanga, na Ngewɔ i wama ngi nyanima i ngi wili jahama.
53002004	Hanii kpɛlɛɛ kɛɛ ngafei gbi nungaa ta hɛɛ ma, yeenumui ji ɛɛ ti wumbu a gbɛogbɛ tawao a ta yekpe lɛlɔ ti gbi maahu. A wuaalɔ vulii bɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛlɛ bu i hei a nde a ndawɔlɔ nungaa ma yɛ ta lɔ Ngewɔ a ngie.
53002005	Ii loni wu nɛmahu? Ngi ji gbi leilɔ wu ma ji ngi yɛ wu lia.
53002006	Na hu gbi wu kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ i Sawa Nyanimɔi gbangɔhu kiahuna. Ngi gbangɔi hu aako i gbuanga watii yekpe ma.
53002007	Kɛɛ kiahuna kpaya Lɔwungɔ Nyamulɔ yengema dunyei hu, i wama wiema ɛɛ wie kɛlee numui na ngi gbekpangɔ kulɔ i gbua na.
53002008	Watii na ma lɔ sawa nyanimɔi a gbuanga, tawao Ndemɔi Yesu a ngi waalɔ a ngi laavɛfɛi, i ngi nyani a ngi vooyii na numu yaama ɛɛ loo ma watii na a wa.
53002009	Sawa nyanimɔi a wa a seitana gbayei lɔ i ndɛɛ gabande hindei yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ wie kɛɛ ndɛɛ naali hugɛlei taa kanakoisia,
53002010	i nungeisia wɛlɛ a nyamu, nungei nasia ti wama jukuluma huɛɛŋ. Ta jukululɔ ajifa ti gangɛilɔ a lola a tɔnyɛi na a ti bawo.
53002011	Sabui ji va Ngewɔ i ngafa nyamui yoyoma kɔɔ i ti huwu kɛɛ i pie ti ya a la a ndɛɛ yɛpɛisia.
