58011014	Nasia ta njɛpɛ bondɛi nasia le tiaa ndama leiŋ kɛ ti nda lɔlei mia ti kɔkɔlima.
58011015	Tii lɛmbini gilima a ti lɔlei na ti gbuani hu; ina ti lɔlei yeemani i ti lɔilɔ, gbɛogbɛ ii yɛ aa ti huhou yamava na.
58011016	Kɛɛ tɔnyɛi a ji lɔ kɛ ndɔlei na kpekpengɔ na mia yeemani i ti ma, ndɔɔlɔ weka gbi ii le kɛlee ngelegoohu. Faale na ii wufeni Ngewɔ wɛ ji ta ngi loli a ti Yewɔɛi, jifa i taa waa loonga ti wɛ.
58011017	Jifa Ebraham langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i yɛ ngi hindoloi gbuama a saa, ji Ngewɔ i ngi hugɔɔni. Ebraham lɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni ngi gama, na hu gbi ngi magbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi hindolo yakpei Aisaki gbuava a saa.
58011018	Ngewɔ i yɛ ndeilɔ ngi ma yɛ, “Bi bɔɔsɔ vaha wai nasia ngi yeelahei wumbuni bi gaama, ba ti majɔɔ a Aisaki lɔ.”
58011019	Ebraham i kɔɛilɔ nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ a gulɔ i Aisaki vulu i ngi wumbu hee hu tawao Ngewɔ i pieilɔ Aisaki i yama ngi ma bi tɔaa bɛɛ i gbuanga hee hu lɔ.
58011020	Jifa Aisaki langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i Lahei wumbuni yɛ a ngi leengeisia luba lɔ, Jekɔpi kɛɛ Isɔ.
58011021	Jifa Jekɔpi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i Josɛfi leengeisia lubani a ngilangila ji ngi haalɛi i loni te. Ngi valangɔ yɛla ngi likpɔi ma i hɛɛni Ngewɔ ma.
58011022	Jifa Josɛfi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ji ngi haa-gbelei i loni te, i yɛpɛilɔ kɔlooni Isrɛelblɛisia ti gbualei ma Ijipt, i yama i hugɛ a nungeisia gbɔɔ mahoungɔ ti pie a ngi womɛi.
58011023	Jifa Mojisi leblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ti ngi lɔwuilɔ ngawu sawa va ngi lengɔi wooma. Ti tɔilɔ kɛ ndoi nyandengɔ waa le famia tii luwani a mahɛi jawei nyanila.
58011024	Jifa Mojisi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia kia i lakpani, ii yɛ luma numu aa ngi loli a mahɛi nyahaloi goohu hindoloi.
58011025	Ji wɔɔ a gbɛɛ Ngewɔ nungeisia ma kɔɔ kpaalɛ i la taa tieni ma, manɛngɔ yɛla ngi wɛ i lewe ji a goohunɛɛ jumbu ma watii hugutungɔ va.
58011026	I tɔilɔ kɛ ji mbɛnyani a numu maale Kristi va, nafa i hu i lewe polouŋ kpatɛi kpɛlɛɛ ma i Ijipt lɔlei hu, ajifa ngi lii i yɛ mawaa na lɔ ma i wama sɔɔma kulɔma.
58011027	Jifa Mojisi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i gbuani Ijipt ii luwani ndiilewei na ma mahɛi i pieni; i gangailɔ a yamala, bi tɔa bɛɛ i Ngewɔ na lɔilɔ numu ɛɛ ngi lɔ.
58011028	Jifa ngi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i Tewema Gomɛi gbɔkuilɔ tawao i nde yɛ ti yeembala ŋamɛi jia ti wɛleisia lama aako Numu-waa malikei aa Isrɛelblɛisia ti gbla-lengeisia waa.
58011029	Jifa Isrɛelblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ti guni a jiala ndɔma bengɔi ma ti gbooyɛi na lewe ta toli a Rɛd Sii; kia Ijiptblɛisia ti hitɛni ti wooma, njɛi i yeilɔ a tie ti lo hu.
58011030	Jifa Isrɛelblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i pieilɔ Jɛliko yeegɔlɔi i gula ji ti yɛ jia ta kaala heima yila folo ma njii wɔfla va.
58011031	Jifa hitɛ-nyahɛi Rehab langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia Isrɛlbleisia tii ngi waani taa nasia ti gangangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ajifa i loko heiilɔ pandaa Isrɛlbleisia ti nɛnɛjiagablɛisia bu.
58011032	Ngi nungei jisia yeepekeisia gbi ti hinda hugɛ? Watii ii nya yeya ngaa gu Gidiɔn hinda hugɛva kɛɛ Berak kɛɛ Samisi kɛɛ Jɛfta kɛɛ Devidi kɛɛ Samuɛl kɛɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia.
58011033	Jifa ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ti gɔilɔ a kɛnyɛ wekangaa ti ti vaya. Ti pɔɔna hindei lɔ wieni tawao ti na majɔɛilɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa. Ti pieilɔ njalɛisia ti londo,
58011034	ti ngɔmbu maaluwangɔngaa lufe, ta bawo kɔbowei yeya. Kaahu gbi ii yɛ ti ma kɛɛ ti gbayailɔ; ti gbayangɔ yɛla kɔi hu tawao ti kɛnyɛblaa wekeisia ti gɔblɛisia vayɛilɔ.
58011035	Jifa nyahangaa lɛɛnga ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ti lenyɔuisia ti yɛ hiyelɔ hee hu ta yama ti ma. Pekei nasia tii lumani taa gbe a laala a Ngewɔ aako ti gbe ti ma, ti ngagbalɛ haa wieilɔ aako ti hiye hee hu ndɛvu yekpe majɔɔva.
58011036	Nungaa ti yɛlɔ a ti lɛɛngaa gbafa, ta ti lewe, ta ti lɛɛngaa wu jɔɔwɔisia ya, ta li a tie kpindi-wɛlei bu.
58011037	Ti yɛlɔ a ti hɔwɔhɔwɔ a kɔtiisia ta haa, ta ti lewendia, ta ti waa a kɔbowei. Ti yɛlɔ a lewetewe mbala-kɔlɛisia ɔɔ nje-kɔlɛisia ti ti ma a kula, ti vɛlingɔ hulewengɔ, juwuya i ti ma, ta ndoli nyamunyamungaa wie a tie.
58011038	Ti gbekpengɔ waa yɛla na hii dunyei ji ii yɛ gbekpeni ti heiva hu. Ti yɛlɔ a lewetewenga ndɔgbɔlambɛisia ma kɛɛ ngiyeisia hu ta yii puisia hu kɛɛ ndoweisia ndɔwu.
58011039	Nungɛi jisia gbi ti hinda i nɛɛilɔ waa Ngewɔ wɛ ajifa ti lani a ngie; na hu gbi tii hani na majɔɔni Ngewɔ i yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva ti wɛ,
58011040	ajifa i yɛlɔ Ngewɔ nɛmahu hinda hugbatɛva mu va kpekpengɔ tewengɔ yeengovei ma. I yɛ ngi lii hu lɔ kɛ ɛɛ tia lekee wote a pɔɔnablaa mu wooma.
58012001	Mua bɛɛ, kia seli vaha wai nasia ti mu galangɔ, mahoungɔe mu loko gbua hinda gbi a mu gbaha hindei nasia ma mahoungɔ mu pie, kɛɛ jumbui na fɛɛfɛngɔ kpauŋ mu ma, mu mu lii huyili hindei wieva kia mahoungɔ mu pie ndɛvui yeena hu mu wama majɔɔma.
58012002	A mu yɛ a gili tuuŋ a Yesu na i pienga mu langa a Ngewɔ i hiye watii na ma mu lani a ngie. I yɛ kɔɔlɔ kɛ na i wama piema dunya a pielɔ ti ngi waa krɔsii ma kɛɛ ii gbeni na va. Koohunɛɛ na Ngewɔ i yɛ wama fema ngi wɛ, ii krɔsi-ma-hee yeembɛnyanii lɔni a gbɛogbɛ, tawao taa na heini Ngewɔ maha-heimɛi yeengejahui.
58012003	A gili lɛɛ a kpaalɛi na kpɛlɛɛ i lani ngi ma; a gili a kpaalɛi kinɛiŋ jumbublei nasia ti lolongɔ yɛla a ngie ti ndani ngi ma i guni mbu! Faale waa luma wu gahu aa gbɔyɔ wa gbe a lala a Ngewɔ.
58012004	Ajifa magawoi ji hu wu wu magawoma la jumbui yeya, wuii yaa foni lɛ mia wa lo wu magawoma na ti wu waa.
58012005	Wu lemanga numu liigba yɛpɛi nasia ma Ngewɔ a nde wu ma jifa ngi leengeisia a wue yɛ, “Nya loi, wolo Ndemɔi ma i bi lo pele ma, tawao bi lii aa lewe ji a lumbe bi laa.
58012006	Jifa numu gbi lekee Ndemɔi longɔ la a ngi loolɔ pele ma, tawao a numu gbi liima belɔ ji a ngi wumbu a ngi loi.”
58012007	A gu kpaalɛi nasia bu ta la wu ma kia kpaalɛi na na kɛkɛi a nda ndoima ji a kpulanga wie; gbamaile wu gbalei a kɛlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ lɔ wu houma kia ngi leengaa. Ndo lɔ na wɔɔ na ngi kɛkɛ ii kpaalɛ lani ngi ma?
58012008	Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ lalɔ ngi leengeisia kpɛlɛɛ ma ti loova pele ma, faale ii kpaalɛ lailɔ wu ma, na a kɛlɔ kɛ ngi leengaa vulii yaa a wue, kɛ pue-leengaa mia a wue.
58012009	Mu kɛkɛ nasia ti mu leni dunyei hu, ti kpaalɛ lailɔ mu ma mu makɛva tawao mu wuaailɔ ti bu. Faale mahoungɔ waa le mu gu kpaalɛi na bu mu Kɛkɛ na i ngelegoohu a pie i la mu ma aako mu ndɛvu majɔɔ a ngie!
58012010	Mu kɛkɛ nasia ti yɛ dunyei hu ti kpaalɛ lailɔ mu ma hinda hugutungɔ va kia pɔɔnangɔ yɛla ti yaama; kɛɛ Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ la mu ma mua yekpe mu gbekpeyɛi va lɔ, aako mu gbua a ngie.
58012011	Ngewɔ i kpaalɛ langaa mu ma, a wielɔ mu gama bɛɛ i pienga mu lii nyaniva lɔ, mu goohu nɛva ii le. Kɛɛ pooma, nasia yeekpalɛi na a pie ti makɛ ta mawaa majɔɔlɔ, ta mia a ji ta wote a pɔɔna wieblaa, ti ndiilɛlihu.
58012012	Faale, a wu loko huhaangɔisia lɛ ngelema, wu wu wombii nasia hulata ti gbɛlima wu bu!
58012013	A yɛ tuuŋ a jia a pele wɔnangaa kɔɔ wu gɔwɔ gbalɛngɔisia taa haa, ti bawo.
58012014	A lapi wua numui gbi wu hei ndiilɛli hu, tawao a lapi wu luva kia numui na na ngi lɛɛvui vengɔ Ngewɔ wɛ, ajifa wuii na wieilɔ, wuɛɛ Ndemɔi lɔ.
58012015	A wu mahugbe waa wounve Ngewɔ yauwandei ma. Numu gbi aa wie kia tuhani ŋɔnangɔ, na a lakpa i numu gboto hubɔnɔ.
58012016	Numu gbi aa yɛ a puegbua kɛɛ numui na ii baagɔɔ hani nasia ma Ngewɔ woo le kia Isɔ i pieni, i ndewewayɛi majiɛilɔ mɛhɛɛ wulo hii va, i baa a poohani na kpɛlɛɛ i yɛ looni kulɔ.
58012017	Wu hugɔɔlɔ kɛ na wooma ngi longɔ yɛla ngi kɛkɛ i hɛɛ ngi wɛ, hindei yangamava i pieni wɔɔ, kɛɛ ii guni a bɛla ma kia bɛɛ i yɛpɛni kaka a wɔɔ.
58012018	Wuii wani kia Isrɛelblɛisia ti wani hani na gama wa gu a ngati gɔlaa ngiyei na ti yɛ toli a Sainai, ngɔmbu waa a vo ngumba, kpindi nilinili waa i heini ma kɛɛ ma yaa pumulu, viivii a wa na,
58012019	bulii a vɛ na, Ngewɔ yɛpɛwoi a gbua na. Kia nungeisia ti Ngewɔ yiawoi mɛnini, ti manɛnɛ wuaailɔ tɛɛ Ngewɔ aa njɛpɛ yakpe bɛɛ le gbɔma ti ma,
58012020	ajifa tii yɛ gu sawei na bu Ngewɔ ndani yɛ, “Ndɔgbɔ-hua bɛɛ i gbitingaa ngiyei na ma, mahoungɔ ti lo hɔwɔhɔwɔma ti paa.”
58012021	Hindei na i yɛ wie Sainai yiyei hu i nungaa huluwailɔ hulewengɔ kɛ Mojisi i ndenga yɛ, “Ngi luwanga nya maa lɔ gbɛlima.”
58012022	Wuii lini Sainai Yiyei gama, wu wanga Sayɔn Yiyei lɔ hu kɛɛ Ngewɔ vulungɔi laa wai, Jelusalɛm, na i ngelegoohu, taa ngi malika tauji gboto wai.
58012023	Wu wanga komɛi na hu lɔ Ngewɔ gblalengaa goohu nɛngɔisia ti pienga, nasia ti lɛisia nyɛingɔ ngelegoohu. Wu wanga Ngewɔ gama, na nuuvu gbi ti gbɛmbomɔi a ngie, tawao wu wanga numu yekpei nasia gama lɔ Ngewɔ i ti yɛni wɔɔ a pɔɔnablaa.
58012024	Wu wanga Yesu gama, na yɛni a sabu hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi hu i gbatɛni, tawao ngi ŋamɛi na i wuni i yɛnga a Lahei haningaa veva mu wɛ ti gbekpengɔ tewengɔ polouŋ na ma Ebɛl ŋamɛi a gu a fela.
58012025	Faale, a tɔ vulii wu wolo pandawanda numui na ma i yɛpɛma. Nasia ti gangani a wolola numui na ma i Ngewɔ wowili leni dunyei hu tii bawoni. I laailɔ ke kɛ muɛɛ bawo ina mu wounveilɔ numui na ma i ngelegoohu a yɛpɛ.
58012026	Ngewɔ woi i dunyei gbɛlilɔ a watii na, kɛɛ i Lahei wumbunga na yɛ, “Nga gbɔma dunyei jɛsialɔ kɛɛ ta lekee ɛɛ yɛla, taa ngelegoohu a yɛla.”
58012027	Ji i ndeni, “Yɛ gbɔma” a dunyei jɛsialɔ, i kɛ maa a mue leiŋ kɛ a ngi gbatɛhanisia jɛsialɔ i ti gule, aako hanii nasia tɛɛ jɛɛsia ti lo.
58012028	A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ajifa mua tieni ma yɛlɔ mahayɛi na hu ɛɛ jɛɛsia. A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma mu hɛɛ ngi ma a pelei na a nɛɛ ngi wɛ, a baagɔma waa kɛ nduwahu,
58012029	ajifa mu Yewɔɛi gbuangɔ vuli a hinda hunyani yɔmbu lɔ.
58013001	A yɛ tuuŋ a lo a wu nyɔunyɔu kia mahoungɔ Kristi lehubleisia ti pie.
58013002	Waa lema a hotangɛisia gulula wu wɛleisia bu. Nunga lɛɛnga ti loilɔ wɔɔ ji wiema ti gbekpe a malikangaa tii kɔɔ kɛ malikangaa mia.
58013003	Nasia ti kpindi wɛlei bu ti hinda i yɛ tuuŋ wu nɛmahu bi tɔa bɛɛ wua tieni mia wu na. A gbewe tuuŋ nasia va kpalɛ i ti ma bi tɔa bɛɛ yeekpalɛi i wua tieni lɔ ma.
58013004	Mahoungɔ numui gbi ti baa gɔɔ nyaha-jɔɔ taa hini-jɔɔ ma, tawao maa ii houni nyahamɔ ɔɔ hinimɔ gbi taa numu weka ti la. Ngewɔ a nasia gbɛmbolɔ ta manɔhɔ kɛɛ puegbua hindeisia wie.
58013005	Navoo-mani aa yɛ wu hu kulo bɛɛ, tawao wu lii i lɛli a na i wu yeya. Gbamaile Ngewɔ i ndenga yɛ, “Ngɛɛ gbe bi ma tawao ngɛɛ gbua bi woohu.”
58013006	Faale, a mu nde a ndiilo muɛɛ, “Ndemɔi lɔ a gbɔ nya ma, ngɛɛ luwa. Gbɔɔ numu gbi a gu i pie a nge?”
58013007	A gili a wu mahublɛisia wɔɔ, nasia ti Ngewɔ wowili hugɛni a wue. A gili lɛɛ a ti luvayii wɔɔ kɛɛ ti haayii, wu ti wokɔɔ a ti layii hu a Ngewɔ.
58013008	Yesu Kristi ɛɛ wotewote, kia i yɛ na wɔɔ, hii i na kiahuna tawao hii a yɛ na kunafɔ.
58013009	Waa luma kaa gɛwɛgɛwɛ laasii kpɛlɛɛ taa wu yaka wu gbua tɔnya welei ma; nyandengɔ waa le ji Ngewɔ a mu liisia gbaya a ngi yauwandei hu we, i lewe sawangaa houla ma kɔloongɔ mɛhɛɛngaa ma; yeesawei jisia tii yɛ gbɔni nasia ma ta ti hou.
58013010	Saagbuablei nasia ta saa gbua Juubleisia ti hɛɛmɛi, ii wɔnani ti va saahanii na mɛva ma kpua a saa mu nda jaa gbuamɛi.
58013011	Juu Jaagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai a walɔ a huangaa ti ŋamɛi Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai na bu Ngewɔ a yɛ na kpuava a saa nungaa ti jumbuisia va; kɛɛ ta gbualɔ a yeehuangɛsia ti woomɛi tei hu ti mɔ.
58013012	Na vamia Yesu bɛɛ i gbuani taa wai hu i haa aako i jumbuisia wua nungeisia ma a ta vulii ngi ŋamɛi.
58013013	Faale, a mu li ngi gama tei wooma ngufei na i lɛni ngi ma i lɛ mua tieni ma.
58013014	Gbamaile taa gbi ii na mu va mbei dunyei ji hu a yɛ na kunafɔ; mu taa wai na lɔ gulɔgbema i wama wama kulɔmɛi.
58013015	Faale a mu yɛ a Ngewɔ lato kpele gbi, yeetatoi i yɛ a mu jaahani Yesu sabui hu, tawao yeetatoi ji lɔ saahanii le ndaguli nasia ta nde tɛɛ Yesu lɔ Ndemɔi le.
58013016	Waa lema a kpekpe kɛɛ kpɔma wiela wu nyɔunyɔu ma, ajifa saa jisia lɔ a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.
58013017	A golo wu gulɔbleisia wɛ, wu yɛ a na wie ta nde wu ma pieva. Tia mia ta wu yafeisia mahugbe ndɛvu ii ti ma, jifa i ti ma a kpa lɔ gonava Ngewɔ ma a ngengei na ti pienga. Wu golongaa ti wɛ, ta ti yengei wielɔ a kohunɛɛ; wuii goloilɔ ti wɛ, ta ti yengei wie a ndiinyani lɔ, tawao na ɛɛ wu nafa.
58013018	A yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli mu va tuuŋ. Mu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ mu hinda nyamu wova gbi ii na aa yɛ wu lii mɔnɛma, ajifa ma hindei yeepɔnɛi lɔ wie watii gbi.
58013019	Nyaa wu manɛnɛma vulii a kɔnɛkɔnɛ wu Ngewɔ vɛli kɔɔ i nya yama gbɔma wu gama hugutungɔ.
58013020	Ngewɔ i pienga mu Lemɔi Yesu na mbalangɛisia ti Mahugbemɔ Wai a ngie i vulunga i hiyenga hee hu ajifa i ta yekpe gbuani a saa i haa, yeehɛi na i kalɛ wuaa kunafɔ hinda yangilingɔi hu. Ngewɔ na a ndiilɛli ve mu wɛ i hani yekpe gbi ve wu wɛ wu gbewengɔ fa aako wu ngi liima hindei wie, tawao Yesu Kristi sabui hu, i ngi liima hindei wie mu hu. Tato i yɛ Yesu Kristi ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ va! Amiina.
58013022	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nyaa wu manɛnɛma kɔɔ wu ndahii ji mɛni vulii a ndii yekpe; gbamaile kɔlɛi ji ngi nyɛinga wu gama hu ii guhani wa.
58013023	Nya longɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ ti mu ndewei Timoti gbuanga kpindiwɛlei bu. I humbungaa a wa mbei, mua ta lɔ ma wa wu gama.
58013024	Ma va wu lokulɔisia gbi ma kɛɛ Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ. Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia Italiblaa a tie tiaa vama wu ma kaka.
58013025	Ngewɔ i ngauwanda gɛ a wu kpɛlɛɛ.
59001001	Nya Jemisi, Ngewɔ yengemɔ a nge kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi bɛɛ, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma Ngewɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ gama ti vayafayangɔ dunyei hu gbi. Nga va wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
59001002	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a koohunɛɛ waa wie ji hinda gbɔugbɔu gɛwɛgɛwɛngaa ta wu male,
59001003	ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu longaa houni wu lalei ma wu yeehinda gbɔugbɔisia huvo, kɛ wu kɛnga kɛ wa gulɔ hinda gbɔugbɔu bu.
59001004	Tawao a pie wu hinda gbɔugbɔu huhoulɛi hu aa lewe tawao waa gbaha, aako wu yɛ a Kristimablaa lavengɔngaa, wu nyamu gbi aa yɛ na!
59001005	Nɛmahulewe ii yɛlɔ wu yilaye wɛ, i Ngewɔ vɛli, na ngi lokohu lambongɔ hani majiava numu gbi ma, kponyɛ wooma ii le, Ngewɔ a nɛmahulewe velɔ ngi wɛ.
59001006	Kɛɛ mahoungɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli ngi langɔ la vulii kɛ Ngewɔ a ngi hɛɛwoi mɛnilɔ, tawao sekahu gbi aa yɛ ngi lii hu, gbamaile numui na a sekahu wie ngi gbuangɔ a gboyei yeenjagatei lɔ fɛfɛi a ngi hɔwɔhɔwɔ hu.
59001007	Yeenumui na nyɔkɔ, a wotewote ngi giliyii hu kɛɛ ngi wiehindei, aa gili la kɛ a hani gbi majɔɔlɔ a Ndemɔi.
59001009	Mahoungɔ Kristimamɔi na ngi vɛlingɔ i goohunɛɛ ji Ngewɔ a ngi lɛ,
59001010	tawao Kristimamɔi na ngi gbatɛngɔ i goohunɛɛ ji Ngewɔ a ngi yei. Ajifa kpatɛblaa ta haalɔ hugutungɔ kia kpitii yeepuɛi a haa.
59001011	Gbamaile folei a gbualɔ kpandingɔ waa i kpitii mɔ kɛ yeepuɛi i logbonga i gula, kɛ ngi nyandei i jukulunga. Hii kpatɛblaa jukulu watii na ti wugbakpangɔ a yɛla ti navoo gɔlilei hu.
59001012	Numui na goohu nɛngɔe ɛɛ gbe a lala a Ngewɔ ji hinda gbɔugbɔngaa ta ngi male, ajifa i hugɔɔmahindei nasia huvoongaa pandaa, Ngewɔ a ngi pawalɔ a kunafɔ lɛɛvui na i Lahei wumbunga feva nasia wɛ ti longɔ a ngie.
59001013	Hinda gbɔugbɔu bondɛi nasia ti numu gɔlɛngaa jumbu hinda wieva, maa ii houni i nde yɛ, “Ngewɔ mia i nya gɔlɛma;” ajifa numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa Ngewɔ gɔlɛ hinda nyamu wieva, tawao ta vulii ɛɛ numu gbi gɔlɛ.
59001014	Kɛɛ numu gbi ngi liima hinda nyamuisia mia ta ngi laala ti ngi wili jumbui hu.
59001015	Kɛɛ numu i golongaa ngi liima hinda nyamui wiela wɛ, a jumbui lɔ wie tawao numu i nɔɔngaa jumbui wiela ma, ngi yafei a haalɔ kunafɔ va.
59001016	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ.
59001017	Mboya hani yekpe gbi kɛɛ hani gbi lekee ma majɔɔ gbama, a gbua ngelegoohu lɔ; a gbua mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ gama lɔ na i ngelema voofoisia gbatɛni, ɛɛ wotewote tawao ɛɛ wounve mu ma aa mu lo kpindi hu.
59001018	I nɛni Ngewɔ vulii lɔ wɛ pieva ngi wowili lɔnyangɔe i pie ti mu le a nina jifa ngi longɔ mu gbekpe mu lewe ngi gbatɛ-hanii kpɛlɛɛ ma.
59001019	Ji i yɛ wu nɛmahu, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, numu gbi ngi hu i vula a wolola, kɛɛ ngi hu i lɛli a yɛpɛla kɛɛ liileweva.
59001020	Ndiilewe ɛɛ gu a wala a pɔɔnɛi na Ngewɔ lii i ma ngi nungeisia va.
59001021	Faale a gbe numu nɔhɔ hindei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ma piela gungɔ wu hu kɛɛ tuva nyamui gbi. A golo Ngewɔ wɛ wu njɛpɛi na gulu i hiima wu liisia hu, njɛpɛi na a gu a wu bawola.
59001022	Waa wua yekpe wɛlɛ a ji wa wolo lekee Ngowili Yekpei ma; kia aa yɛ hii, a na wie Ngowili Yekpei a wu gaa la.
59001023	Numu gbi lekee a wolo gbama Ngowili Yekpei ma kɛɛ ɛɛ na wie a nde, ngi wiengɔe kia numui i na a mɛmɛɛ hugbee i ngi yɛyii yeetɔnyangɔi lɔ.
59001024	A ta yekpe gbelɔ vulii pandawanda kɛɛ ngi gbuangɔ lekee kɛ i lema ngi yɛyii ma ngaama.
59001025	Kɛɛ numui na a sawei gaa vulii pandawanda kpekpengɔ tewengɔ sawei gbi ma, sawei na a nungaa gbua nduwɔya hu, i nɔɔ kaala ma tawao ɛɛ mɛni lekee gbama aa lema ma, kɛɛ a na wie yeesawei i ndeni, Ngewɔ a ngi nafalɔ hinda gbi hu a pie.
59001026	Numu gbi langɔe la yɛ Kristimamɔ yekpe lɔ a ngie? Ina yeenumui na ii guni ngi nɛi ma, kɛ baabaa-hinda gbama mia a ngi Yewɔ-hindei tawao kɛ taa ta yekpe wɛlɛma.
59001027	Ngewɔ-hindei na sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ tawao kpekpengɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ yaama ta lɔ a ji: poleengeisia tia ponyahangeisia mahugbela ti hinda gbɔugbɔi hu kɛɛ numu bia yekpe mahugbela aako baa yɛ a dunyei ji yeejumbu wieblɛisia yilayee.
59002001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kia wu langɔ a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi, Ngɔlɔya Lemɔ wai, waa nungaa huwɔyɔ ti yɛyii va ti luwui ma.
59002002	Gbamaile wu gomɛngaa mia kpatɛmɔ a wa na, kanigbɔli i ngi lokohu kɛɛ ndoma nyande waa i ngi ma, kɛ fɛɛlimɔi bɛɛ i wa na ndoma hawei i ngi ma,
59002003	bi baagɔma vengaa kpatɛmɔi wɛ bi nde ngi ma bɛɛ, “Hei heiwulii yeekpekpe wai ji ma mbei,” kɛ bi ndenga fɛɛlimɔi ma bɛɛ, “Li bi lo mia,” ɔɔ “Hei mbei ndɔmɛi nya gɔɔbu,”
59002004	kɛ wua wua yekpe luahu gɔlɛma, wa kiti lewe la nungaa ma a ndii nyamui.
59002005	A wolo, nya mbaa Kristimableisia! Ngewɔ i nasia lɔ wumbuni ti vɛlingɔ dunyei ji hu i ti wote a kpatɛbla ti layii va a ngie tawao i ti gbɛɛ nasia ma ti ngi mahayɛi na bu i Lahei wumbuni feva nasia wɛ ti longɔ a ngie.
59002006	Kɛɛ wuaa fɛɛliblɛisia bɛlɛ nyanima. Yeeni lɔ ti ngulu liigbama wu bolowooma, ta li a wue kootiisia gulɔ a kpaya? Kpatɛblaa le!
59002007	Tia lɔ ta baa gbua mbiyɛ yekpei na ma ti fenga wu wɛ.
59002008	Hindei yeepɔnangɔi mia wa pie ji wa jia a Mahɛi Ngewɔ jawei na i ngi Gɔlɛi hu i ndeni yɛ, “Lo a bi heinyɔui kia bi longɔ a bia yekpe.”
59002009	Kɛɛ bi nungaa luahu gɔlɛngaa, bi longɔ a ti lɛɛngaa tewengɔ yeepekeisia ma, kɛ bi jumbu wulinga tawao Sawei a bi wumbu a sawa-nyanimɔ lɔ.
59002010	Numu na a Sawei yeengila nyani, i sawei kpɛlɛɛ lɔ nyanini.
59002011	Gbamaile numu yakpei na i ndeni yɛ, “Baa puegbua,” ta lɔ gbɔma i ndeni yɛ, “Baa numu waa.” Faale kiaa bɛɛ bii puegbuani, kɛɛ bi numu waangaa, kɛ bi sawei kpɛlɛɛ nyaninga.
59002012	Faale a yɛ a yɛpɛ, wa hinda wie kia nungei nasia na Ngewɔ i wama ti gbɛmboma a sawei na a mu gbua nduwɔyahu.
59002013	Ajifa Ngewɔ ɛɛ manuma wie ji a yɛ numui na gbɛmboma ii manuma wieni; kɛɛ manuma a temaya jɔlɔ kitilewela maahu.
59002014	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, gbɛ nafa le jii numui a nde yɛ ngi langɔe a Kristi a sɔbɛ ina ngi wiehindeisia tii kɛni kɛ ngi langɔe a Kristi? Ngi lalei na a Kristi a ngi bawolɔ?
59002015	Ina bi ndehingɛisia lɔ na ɔɔ bi ndenyahaleengeisia kula ii ti ma tawao mɛhɛɛ yekpe ii ti yeya;
59002016	a yee ti nafa ina bi ndeilɔ lekee ti ma bɛɛ, “Ngewɔ i wu luba! Kɔlɛ-vɛfɛ aa wu vɛ tawao a mɛhɛɛ mɛ kpoto wu goo i ve!” Ina bii hanii nasia veni ti wɛ ti haamingɔ fa ti lɛɛvui yeva na?
59002017	Faale lanayei lekee yaa numu wɛ kɛɛ kpekpeya wiela gɛngɔ ii le ma kɛ hu haangɔi.
59002018	Kɛɛ tɛngaa numu yila a ndelɔ yɛ, “Numu yila langɔe a Ngewɔ kɛɛ yee pekei ta a hinda yekpe lɔ wie.” Kɛ a nge kɛ bɛɛ hinda yekpe wie kɛɛ bi langɔe a Ngewɔ, nya bɛɛ nga kɛlɔ a bie kɛ kpekpei na nga pie a kɛlɔ kɛ nya langɔe a Ngewɔ.
59002019	Bi langɔe la kɛ Ngewɔ i yakpe? Na nyandengɔe. Ngafa nyamuisia vulii bɛɛ ti langɔe a Ngewɔ tawao ti maa a gbɛli lɔ a nduwɛi.
59002020	Bia bi kpowamɔi ji! Bi longɔe ngi kɛ a bie kɛ lala lekee a Ngewɔ ii gbekpeni hinda yekpe wiela wooma?
59002021	Ngewɔ i yee mu maada Ebraham woteni a pɔɔnamɔ, i tia ta luahu gbatɛ? I ji wieni Ebraham wiehindeisia lɔ va, ji i ngi hindoloi Aisaki veni Ngewɔ wɛ a saai hani.
59002022	Bii tɔma? Ebraham layii a Ngewɔ kɛɛ ngi wiehindeisia ti makpɔilɔ ti yenge; ngi wiehindeisia lɔ ti ngi lalei a Ngewɔ yakpani.
59002023	Tawao Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi layie i longa ma ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ebraham lailɔ a Ngewɔ, tawao jifa i lani a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi wumbuilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ.” Faale ti Ebraham loliilɔ a Ngewɔ ndiamɔ.
59002024	Bi tɔnga na kɛ numu wiehinda yekpeisia lɔ ta pie Ngewɔ i ngi wote a pɔɔnamɔ, ngi lalei lekee ii le a Ngewɔ.
59002025	Hii lɔɔ i wieni a hitɛ-nyahɛi Rehab. Ngewɔ i ngi woteilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ, i taa ta luahu gbatɛ hinda yekpei nasia va i pieni ji i loko heini Juubleisia ti nɛnɛjiagablɛisia bu, i gbɔ ti ma ti yama a pele weka tawao tii ti houni.
59002026	Faale le kia lɔɔ ngafei ii yɛlɔ numu gbuhɛi hu yeekpuhɛi haangɔ a yɛla, hii lanaya bɛɛ haangɔ a yɛla ina hinda yekpe wiela ii pooma.
59003001	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wua wu longɔ wu yɛ a Ngewɔ hindei yeekaamɔngaa, waa gboto, ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ a mua mu kaamɔisia gbɛmbo a ndiimabe lɔ i lewe nungaa wekeisia ma.
59003002	Mu gbi ma kpulanga gboto wielɔ. Kɛɛ numui na ɛɛ kpulanga wie wɔɔ gba njɛpɛi nasia hu a nde, kɛ nyamu gbi ii ngi hu tawao kɛ a gulɔ a tayekpe huhoula.
59003003	Ma kɔlii wuaalɔ soi baahu aako i golo mu wɛ, mu gu mu pie i li mia mu longɔ a na.
59003004	Ɔɔ a gili a njaya-lɛndɛi: kia bɛɛ ngɔlɔngɔ waa tawao kɛ fɛfɛ gbayangɔ waa lɔ a gu i jia a ngie hani wulo lɔ a ngi lo pele ma, a pie i li mia gbi ngi njiamɔi longɔ i li na.
59003005	Hii lɔɔ numu nɛi i na: kia bɛɛ kulongɔ, a lawolɔ yɛ a gulɔ a hinda waawanga wiela. A gili lɛɛ kia ngɔmbuvo wulohii a gu a ngola lakpa waa mɔla.
59003006	Numu nɛi wiengɔe kia ngɔmbui i na. Piengɔe gbɔma kia dunyei na hinda nyamu wiela lekee i na, i heini ngi nda yɛmɛi mu luwui hu, a pie mu gbuhɛi gbi i nyamu. A ngɔmbu yatɛlɔ mu lɛɛvui hu hindei kpɛlɛɛ ma, ngɔmbui na a wa ngi gama a gbua jahama vulii.
59003007	Nuuvu a gulɔ tawao i gunga a fuuhani wekeisia gbi makɛla, ndɔgbɔ-huangaa kɛɛ ŋɔningɛisia kɛɛ ndala-hanisia kɛɛ nyɛngɛisa.
59003008	Kɛɛ numu gbi ii yaa wɔɔ gba guni a nɛi makɛla. Hani nyamu lɔ a ngie, numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ngi makɛla, a gu a numu waala kia kaali nyamunyamu.
59003009	Mu nɛi lɔ ma siɛgbua la mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Kɛkɛ ma, ma gbɔma mu mbaa nuuvuisia jondu la, na Ngewɔ i kpatɛni gbuava a ngie.
59003010	Nda yakpei lɔ njia yekpei a gbua hu kɛɛ njia nyamu. Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, maa ii houni ji i wie.
59003011	Nja nɛnɛɛ kɛɛ nja ŋɔnaŋɔna tɛɛ gbua ndowa yakpei hu.
59003012	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, figi wulii ɛɛ gu aa wua a ɔlivi; glepii ɛɛ gu aa wua a figi, tawao nja nɛnɛɛ ɛɛ gu a gbuala njalowɛi na hu a kpolo-yɛi ve.
59003013	Numu lɔ wu lia ngi nɛmahu lewengɔ tawao i hinda hugɔɔngɔ? Mahoungɔ i ji magɛ a tuva yekpei na a pie kɛɛ hinda yekpei nasia a pie a nɛmahulewe tawao ngi yaama ɛɛ lɛ.
59003014	Kɛɛ ina toloi lɔ wu liisia hu kɛɛ ndiimanyamu tawao wu longɔ a kpekpeyei gbi wua yekpe lekee va, wuaa lawola tawao wa ndɛɛ gula tɔnyɛi ma.
59003015	Nɛmahulewei na bonda ii gbuama Ngewɔ gama, dunyei ji woo mia, Ngewɔ Yafei ndɛi ii le, ngafa nyamuisia ti nde mia.
59003016	Gbamaile mia nungaa ti yɛngaa na wu lia ti lolongɔ tawao ta tia yekpe lekee ti gbekpeyɛi gɔli, ngo-ya-vayei a yɛlɔ na kɛɛ hinda nyamui yeelasii gbi.
59003017	Kɛɛ nungei nasia Ngewɔ a nɛmahulewei na ve ti wɛ a gbua ngi gama, nyamu ii ti hu, ta nungaa luahu gbatɛlɔ, tɛɛ jɔlɛ, ti longɔ a ndiamɔya; ta manu nungaa ma tawao hinda yekpei yeelasii gbi wiela i ti gɔɔngɔ; tɛɛ topooma wie tawao tɛɛ baaya hinda wie.
59003018	Tawao tuhani gaalɛi na nduahugbatɛbleisia ta hii wava a ndiilɛli, a wa kpekpeya lɔ.
59004001	Ndapi jisia kpɛlɛɛ kɛɛ njianjiɛisia ti wu luahu ti gbuama gbɔɔ hu? Tii gbuama nɛnɛɛisia yeemanii nasia hu lɔ ti lapima wu liisia hu?
59004002	Wu longɔe a haningaa kɛɛ wuɛɛ gu a ti majɔɔla, faale wu magbatɛngɔe numu waava. Wu haamingɔ waa le haningaa va kɛɛ wuɛɛ gu waa ti majɔɔ, famia wa yia, wa lapi. Wuɛɛ hanii nasia majɔɔ wu haamingɔ fa jifa wuɛɛ fɛli Ngewɔ ma.
59004003	Tawao wu ti vɛli bɛɛ Ngewɔ ma wuɛɛ ti majɔɔ ajifa wa ti vɛli hinda nyamu lɔ va. Wa haningaa vɛli Ngewɔ ma nguava wu liima hinda nyamuisia hu lɔ.
59004004	Wua wa Ngewɔ wekeisia vɛli! Wuii kɔɔ kɛ bi yɛngaa a dunyei ndiamɔ kɛ bi yɛnga a Ngewɔ juwu lɔ? Numui na lekee gbi ngi longɔ i yɛ a dunyei ndiamɔ, i ta yekpe yɛnga a Ngewɔ juwu.
59004005	Waa gili la kɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ii tɔnya yia leni ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ngafei na Ngewɔ i puni mu hu, ngi longɔ waa le la tawao a malolo gbualɔ waa.”
59004006	Kɛɛ ngauwandei na Ngewɔ piengɔ a mue i leweni na ma. Famia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni yɛ, “Ngewɔ ɛɛ luma mamaniblɛisia wɛ taa ti liimɛi wie, kɛɛ a ngauwanda velɔ nungei nasia wɛ ta tia yekpe mayei.”
59004007	Faale na, a golo Ngewɔ wɛ. A lapi a Seitana kɛ i lewenga a piimɛ i gbua wu gama.
59004008	A lukpe Ngewɔ gbla, ta bɛɛ a lukpelɔ wu gbla. A wu yeyɛisia wua ti yɛ sɛwɛ, wu jumbublɛi jisia! A wu liisia hu yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ, wu baayablɛi jisia!
59004009	A wu mamamau, wu wɔlɔ kaka; a gbe a yɛlɛla wu tɔtoo a wɔlɔla, wu gbe a goohunɛɛla wu lii i nyani.
59004010	A wua yekpe mayei Ndemɔi gulɔ, a wu yalɛlɔ.
59004011	Waa njia nyamu le wu nyɔunyɔu ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia. Numu gbi lekee a njia nyamu le kɔlooni ngi mbaa Kristimamɔ ma yɛ ngi nyamungɔe, i njia nyamu lenga Sawei ma yɛ Sawei nyamungɔe. Bi ndengaa bɛɛ Sawei nyamungɔe, kɛ bii yɛni gbɔma a Sawei houmɔ, bi yɛnga na a kiti lewemɔ lɔ Sawei ma.
59004012	Ngewɔ yakpe lɔ Sawa lamɔ a ngie kɛɛ kiti lewemɔ. Ta yakpe lɔ a gu a numu bawola ɔɔ numu nyanila. Bi langɔ la yelɔ a bie ba nde bɛɛ bi mbaa nuuvu nyamungɔe?
59004013	A wolo ji ma, wua wa nde wuɛɛ, “Haa ɔɔ sina ma lilɔ tei na bonda hu, mu foo yila gbɔyɔ na, mu fele gɔ na, mu navoo gboto jɔɔ.”
59004014	Wuii kɔɔ vulii wu lɛɛvui a yee yɛ na sina! Wu wiengɔe kia ndulii na a hɛlɛ kulo kɛ i longa hu fulo.
59004015	Na mahoungɔ wu nde ta lɔ a ji: “Ina Ndemɔi i lumangaa, ndɛvu a yɛlɔ mu hokpala ji bonda wieva ɔɔ na.”
59004016	Kɛɛ kiahuna wu mamaingɔ, wa lawo; tawao ndawoei na bonda kpɛlɛɛ nyamungɔe.
59004017	Faale na, numu i hindei na gɔngaa mahoungɔ i pie, ii pieilɔ, kɛ yeenumui na lɔ jumbu wiema.
59005001	A wolo naa ji ma, wu kpatɛbleisia! A wɔlɔ, wu yelei gula kpaalɛi nasia va ti wama lama wu ma.
59005002	Wu gbateisia ti lulanga, gilingɛisia ti wu magulɛisia mɛnga.
59005003	Kaayei i wu ganigbɔli nyaninga kɛɛ wu gani-golei, tawao Kpɛmbo-Volei ma yeekaayei ji a selilɔ kɛ wu gbewengɔ wɔɔ wua yekpe lekee lɔ va tawao a wu luwui mɔlɔ kia ngɔmbui na. Wu kpatɛ gboto lɛnga ma dunyei ji hu i wama gbɔyɔma.
59005004	Wuii yaa pawa gbi veni ngengeblɛi nasia wɛ ta yenge wu gbalɛisia hu. A wolo lɛɛ ti gboonyɛwoisia ma! Nasia ta wu luhanisia lewe, ti wɔɔwoi i fonga Ngewɔ ma, Ndemɔi na kpayei gbi i ngi wɛ.
59005005	Wu yɛngɔi hu dunyei hu, wu koohunɛɛ hu lɔ tuuŋ, wa nɛnɛɛ lekee mɛ, wu wua yekpe wulɔnga kia fuuhanii nasia ta ti wulɔ ti waava.
59005006	Wu nungei nasia lɛɛnga tii hinda nyamu gbi wieni, wu ti waanga, tawao tii lapini a wue.
59005007	Faale a liilo, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, haaŋ Ndemɔi i yama mbei. A tɔ lɛɛ kia kpaa lamɔi a liilo ji a yɛ tuhani yekpe mawuloma majɔɔva ngi lɔlɔmɛi. A haama-yɛi mawulolɔ a ndiilo haaŋ i wua.
59005008	Mahoungɔe wua bɛɛ wu liilo. Wu gahu aa gbɔyɔ gbamaile Ndemɔi wa-Volei magutungɔe.
59005009	Waa gboonyɛ a wu nyɔunyɔu, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, aako Ngewɔ aa wu gbɛmbo. Numui gbi ti Gbɛmbomɔi wala hugutungɔe.
59005010	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a gili a Ngewɔ lutui nasia ti yɛ Ndemɔi wowili le nungaa ma. Ti guyii hinda gbɔugbɔu bu i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ mahoungɔ wu pookɔɔ.
59005011	Ma ndelɔ muɛɛ mahoungɔe mu nasia lato ti guni hinda gbɔugbɔu bu. Wu mɛninga kia Job i liiloni, tawao wu kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ Ngewɔ pieni ngi wɛ kɛlɛmɛi. Ajifa Ndemɔi manumangɔ tawao ngi hindawandangɔ.
59005012	Tewengɔ ji kpɛlɛɛ ma nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu yaa Lahei wumbuma waa jondu ngelegoohu ma ɔɔ dunyei ɔɔ hani weka gbi. Luma lekee ji bi lii a yɛ tumɛi ma, bi mawali ji bi lii a mawali ma, na lɔ a wie Ngewɔ ɛɛ bi lɛɛ.
59005013	Numu lɔ wu lia hinda gbɔugbɔu i ngi ma? Mahoungɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli. Numu lɔ na ngi goohunɛngɔ? Mahoungɔe i siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ngule hu.
59005014	Numu lɔ wu lia ngi heegbɛngɔ? Mahoungɔ i Kristimableisia yeekpakoleisia loli ti Ngewɔ vɛli ngi va, ti ɔlivi wulɔi jia ngi ma a mu Lemɔi biyeihu.
59005015	Kristimableisia yeekpakoloisia ti langɔ yɛngaa la kɛ Ngewɔ a ti hɛɛwoi mɛnilɔ, heegbɛmɔi na a bawolɔ; Ndemɔi a kahugbua velɔ ngi ma, i manu ngi ma jumbui nasia va i pienga.
59005016	Faale na, a gaye a wu jumbuisia wu nyɔunyɔu gama, wu Ngewɔ vɛli wu nyɔunyɔu va aako Ngewɔ i wu bawo. Hɛɛ na numu yekpei a pie Ngewɔ ma a gulɔ a hinda waawaa wiela.
59005017	Ilaija i yɛni wɔɔ a nuuvu lɔ kia mu na. I nɔɛilɔ Ngewɔ vɛlila ma yɛ nja gbi aa wua, tawao nja gbi ii wuani aa wu ndɔlei ma foo sawa kɛɛ yeekutu va.
59005018	Na wooma i gbɔma Ngewɔ vɛlilɔ kɛ njɛi i tɔtongɔ a wuala, tuhanisia ti gbɔma gbekpe kpaalɛisia hu.
59005019	Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu yilayee i gbuangaa tɔnya welei ma, numu wekei i yama a ngie tɔnya welei ma,
59005020	a ji la nɛmahu; numu gbi lekee a jumbumɔi gbua kaka-welei ma i ngi yama tɔnya welei ma, a yeejumbumɔi na yafei mabawolɔ kunafɔ hee yeya, i pie Ngewɔ i manu jumbu gboto ma.
60001001	Nya Pita, tomɔ a nge Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛinga Ngewɔ nungaa wumbungɔi nasia gama ti gbuanga ti yee ti heiheini hotaya hu Pɔntɔsi plɔvinsi hu, kɛɛ Galesia kɛɛ Kapadosia kɛɛ Esia kɛɛ Bitinia.
60001002	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i wu wumbuilɔ kia hugbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi nɛmahu, Ngewɔ Yafei i pie wu wote a pɔɔnablaa aako wu golo Yesu Kristi wɛ, tawao wu yɛ sɛwɛ a ngi ŋamɛi. Ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli i yɛ wu hu ndavengɔ kpauŋ.
60001003	A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ! Jifa ngi manumangɔ waa, i ndɛvu nina veilɔ mu wɛ a ji i Yesu Kristi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu. Na Ngewɔ i pieni, ta lɔ i pienga mu liilomɛi na gulɔgbema i yeya mu va na ɛɛ gbɔyɔ;
60001004	famia mu lii lɔ ma kpekpeya wai nasia majɔɔva Ngewɔ i ndamagbatɛnga feva ngi nungeisia wɛ. I ndamagbatɛnga ngelegoohu wu va tawao ɛɛ lula, ɛɛ nyani tawao ɛɛ lohu.
60001005	Ti na wu va lɔ, wua Ngewɔ gbayei i wu mahugbema jifa wu langɔ a Kristi aako wu mbawoyei na majɔɔ Ngewɔ magbatɛngɔ na magɛva kɛlɛma volei ma.
60001006	A goohunɛɛ ji va, kia bɛɛ kiahuna hinda hugutungɔ va hinda gbɔugbɔu laasi gbotoi nasia va ti lama wu ma.
60001007	Kpaalɛi jisia ti lama wu ma gbuava pooma mia ina wu langɔe a Kristi a tɔnya. Nungaa ta gulɔ a kanigbɔlui vulii nyanila, kɛɛ ta gbua pooma a ngɔmbui lɔ tɔva ina kpekpengɔe; hii mahoungɔ gbuava wu lalei wooma na baagɔma i ma tewengɔ kanigbɔlui ma, aako i lɛmbi. Na wiengaa, wa tato majɔɔlɔ kɛɛ ngɔlɔya kɛɛ mbɛlɛhei Folei na ma Yesu Kristi a ta yekpe gɛ a numui gbi.
60001008	Wu longɔe a ngie kia bɛɛ wɔɔ gba wuii yaa ngi lɔni, tawao wu langɔe a ngie, kia bɛɛ wuɛɛ gu a ngi lɔla kiahuna. Faale wa koohunɛɛ lakpa waa wielɔ na numu gbi ɛɛ gu i hungɛ,
60001009	ajifa wu langa a ngie, na vamia wu yafeisia ti mbawoyei majɔɔnga.
60001010	Ngewɔ lutuisia ti mbawoyei ji hinda hugbɛkpɛilɔ a, tɔmbɛyama wee, tawao i loni kulɔma lɔ ti mbawoyei na hinda hugɛ Ngewɔ a fe wu wɛ gbama.
60001011	Ti lapilɔ kɔɔva migbe lɔ mbawoyei ji a wa tawao a yee wa. Watii ji lɔ Kristi Yafei na i ti hu i loko loni ma ji i yɛ kpaalɛi nasia hinda hugɛma i wama lama Kristi ma kɛɛ ngɔlɔyɛi na a majɔɔ na wooma.
60001012	Ngewɔ kɛilɔ a ngi lutui jisia kɛ tii ti yengei wiema ti yekpe nafava kɛlee wua, ji ti yɛ yɛpɛ kɔlooni hindei nasia ma wu mɛninga na a nasia ti Ngowili Yekpei hugɛni a wue Ngewɔ Yafei na Ngewɔ i ngi yoyoni a gbua ngelegoohu ngi gbayei hu. Jisia ti yɛni a hindangaa lɔ malikeisia vulii bɛɛ ta yɛ loni ti mbugɔɔ.
60001013	Faale naa, a wu lii huyili yengeva. Wu ya aa lema, wu valangɔ i yɛla, wu mbawoyei na yakpe gulɔgbe Yesu Kristi a fe wu wɛ gbama watii na a ta yekpe magɛ a numui kpɛlɛɛ.
60001014	A golo Ngewɔ wɛ tawao waa luma mani nyamui nasia ti yɛ wu lɔ watii lɛ wɔɔ wuii yɛ Ngowili Yekpei hinda hugɔɔ kɔlooni Kristi ma.
60001015	Kia waa na wie, a joowi hinda nyamu laasi gbi ma wu wiehindei kpɛlɛɛ hu kia lɔɔ Ngewɔ na i wu lolini ngi yengei wieva ngi lolongɔ a hinda nyamu.
60001016	Ngewɔ ndeilɔ ngi Gɔlɛi hu yɛ, “Jumbu gbi aa yɛ wu ma ajifa jumbu gbi ii nya ma.”
60001017	Wa Ngewɔ loli a wu Kɛkɛ, ji wa yɛ ngi vɛlima; ta lɔ a numui gbi gbɛmbo ngi wiehindeisia ma. Ɛɛ topooma wie. Faale naa, a baagɔma waa ve ngi wɛ wu lɛɛvui yeemɔni hu gbi mbei ngelebu.
60001018	Gbamaile wu kɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i yee wu wumawoni i wu gbua wu luvayii wovei hu, tuva huwopongɔ gbamɛi na wu maadani ti ndoni a wue. Ngewɔ ii wu wumawoni a na a nyani kia nyɔkɔ kanigole ɔɔ kanigbɔlu,
60001019	kɛɛ i wu wumawoni a saa baagbangɔ waa lɔ i kpuani a Kristi na i wieni kia mbaalɛi na mbɛ gbi ii ma.
60001020	Pɛiŋ wɔɔ Ngewɔ i yaa dunyei gbatɛ, i loko loilɔ Kristi ma kɛ ngi sabui hu lɔ a wu bawo; famia Kristi i wani kɛlɛma volei jisia ma kɔɔ i wu bawo.
60001021	Ta lɔ i yɛni a sabu wu lani a Ngewɔ na i ngi vuluni, i ngi wumbu hee hu, i ngi gɔ a ngɔlɔya waa; faale wu langɔ a Ngewɔ lɔ, wu lii i looni ngi ma.
60001022	Kia naa wu sawei nasia hounga Ngowili Yekpei kɛni tawao na i pienga Ngewɔ i manunga wu jumbui ma wu yafeisia ti yɛnga sɛwɛ, ji lɔ i pienga wu ndoma yekpe wienga a wu mbaa Kristimableisia, a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ a wu lii gbi.
60001023	Ngewɔ layia vulungɔe na a yɛ na kunafɔ, i ndɛvu nina venga wu wɛ, wu wienga kia ndeengɛi nasia ti lemɔi ɛɛ haa kunafɔ kia mu nda leblɛisia ta haa.
60001024	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni yɛ, “Nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ ti wiengɔe kia kpitii i na, tawao ti wɔlɔyɛi gbi wiengɔe kia ngulu-wuɛisia ti na. Kpitii a belɔ, tawao ngulu-wuɛisia ta gulalɔ ti nyani,
60001025	kɛɛ njɛpɛi na Ndemɔi i ndenga a yɛlɔ na kunafɔ.” Njɛpɛi ji i yɛni a Ngowili Yekpei na lɔ ti ndeni wu ma gbalauŋ.
60002001	Faale, a gbe hinda nyamui yeelasii gbi wiela ma; waa gbɔma ndɛɛ guala, waa numu wɛlɛ, waa lolo a numu gbi, waa mbɛlɛnyani yɛpɛ le a numu.
60002002	A wie kia ndoola nɛnɛɛngaa ti na, wa wɔɔ nyiniya senyangɔi na va numu yafei longɔ la, aako wu yɛ a kpɔle wu yafeisia ti lakpa tawao ti bawo.
60002003	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Wua yekpe vulii wu Ndemɔi gbekpeyii lɔnga na.”
60002004	A yɛ a lukpe Ndemɔi gbla. Ngi wiengɔe kia pɛlɛ- lo-gɔtii na pɛlɛ loblɛisia ti pilini tɛɛ ii gbekpeni kɛɛ Ngewɔ i mbumbuni a kɔtu baagbangɔ waa.
60002005	A wa Ndemɔi gama kia kɔtii yekpengaa, wu luma Ngewɔ Yafei i Ngewɔ Wɛlei lo a wue, wu wote na a Ngewɔ jaagbuablaa Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu, wa saai nasia gbua Ngewɔ ma ngi Yafei a kɛ a wue tawao a nɛɛ ngi wɛ.
60002006	Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngi kɔtu baagbangɔ wumbuilɔ, tamia ngi ngi yɛma a dɛmɛ gɔtiwai mia Jayɔn; tawao numu gbi lekee a la a ngie, ngi yaa ɛɛ wufe kunafɔ.”
60002007	Kɔtii ji baa wɔlɔngɔ waa le wu va wua wu langɔ a Kristi; kɛɛ nasia tii lani a Kristi: “Kɔtii na pɛlɛ loblɛisia ti pilini tɛɛ ii gbekpeni, i woteilɔ a bagɔma gɔtii tewengɔ kɔtii kpɛlɛɛ ma.”
60002008	Tawao Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yeepekei i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Kɔtii ji lɔ nungaa ta lugba la, ta gula.” Ti lugbɛilɔ jifa tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei; namia i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ ti va.
60002009	Kɛɛ wua lɔ kɛnyɛi na a wue Ngewɔ i wu mbumbuni, mahɛi jaagbuablɛisia a wue, wu vengɔ Ngewɔ yengei wɛ, tawao ngi nungaa lɔ a wue, i wu wumbuni ngi wiehinda gabandengɔisia hugɛva a numui gbi, Ngewɔ na i wu lolini i wu gbua jumbui yeekpindii hu, i wa a wue ngi bawoyɛi yeefoofo gabandengɔ wai hu.
60002010	Watii lɛɛnga wɔɔ, wuii yɛni a Ngewɔ nungaa, kɛɛ kiahuna na ngi nungeisia lɔ a wue; watii lɛɛnga wɔɔ, wuii Ngewɔ manumɛi majɔɔni, kɛɛ kiahuna na wu ngi manumɛi majɔɔnga.
60002011	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, nyaa wu manɛnɛma jifa hotangaa lɔ a wue kɛɛ nasia tii wani lɛmbima dunyei ji hu! A loko gbua hindei nasia hu wa pie wu luwui liilɛliva, hindei nasia ta kɔ wɛlɛ numu yafei ma watii gbi.
60002012	Wu luvayii i gbekpe nasia ti lia Juublaa yaa tie, nahi ti ndɛɛ gualangaa tɛɛ hinda nyamu wieblaa lɔ a wue, ti hinda yekpei nasia lɔ wa pie, ta lumalɔ tɛɛ numu yekpengaa lɔ a wue, tawao ti Ngewɔ lato folei na ma a wa.
60002013	A golo nuuvu lemaya gbi bu jifa mu Lemɔi woomablaa a wue; a golo Rom Maha Wai bu, na ngi lewengɔ ti gbi ma,
60002014	kɛɛ Gɔvinɛi nasia i ti heinga kpaalɛ lava hinda nyamu wieblɛisia ma kɛɛ nasia lato va ta hinda yekpe wie.
60002015	Gbamaile Ngewɔ longɔ wu yɛ a hinda yekpe wie tuuŋ aako wu kpɔhu wu nguhubaablei nasia laa gbɔwu ta baa wu ma.
60002016	A luva kia nasia na tii nduwɔyahu, na hu gbi waa gili la kɛ ji wuii ndɔwuya hu kpaya vengɔi wu wɛ hinda nyamu gbi wieva, kɛɛ a luva kia Ngewɔ luweisia.
60002017	A baagɔɔ numu gbi ma, wu lo a wu mbaa Kristimableisia, wu luwa Ngewɔ ma, wu baagɔɔ Rom Maha Wai ma.
60002018	Mahoungɔ wua Kristimablaa a wue wu nduwɔya hu, wu golo wu luwɔkɛisia wɛ, wu baagɔma waa ve ti wɛ, nasia lekee ii le ta wu hindawanda ta gili a wue pandaa, kɛ nasia bɛɛ ti yagbalɛngɔ.
60002019	Ngewɔ a wu lubalɔ ji va, ina wu liiloilɔ wu gu kpalɛi na bu ta nda wu ma mbaama hu, ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hii i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ.
60002020	Tatoi yeegbɔɔ wu langɔ la wa majɔɔ ina wu guilɔ ndewe bu hinda nyamu va wu pienga? Kɛɛ kpaalɛ i langaa wu ma ji wa hinda yekpe bɛɛ wie, Ngewɔ a wu lubalɔ fa.
60002021	Ji lɔ i wu lolini ma, ajifa kpaalɛ i lailɔ Kristi vulii ma wu bawova, tawao i tɔmaseli longa a wue pookɔɔva.
60002022	Ii jumbu hinda gbi wieni tawao ndɛɛ yɛpɛ gbi ii gbuani ngi laa.
60002023	Ji nungaa ti yɛ a ngi bɛlɛ nyani, ii hunyɔni a mbɛlɛnyani; ji ti kpaalɛ lani ngi ma, ii ti huluwani kpaalɛ lava ti ma, kɛɛ i ta yekpe loko wuaailɔ Ngewɔ yeya, na a kiti gbi lewe a pɔɔna.
60002024	Kristi vulii i numui gbi ti jumbuisia wumbuilɔ ngi luwui hu i li la krɔsii ma, i haa na aako i mu wumawo i mu gbua jumbui luwɔyɛi hu, mu jia a pele wɔɔni na Ngewɔ longɔ la. Jifa ti kpaalɛ lani Kristi ma, mu mbawoya majɔɔnga.
60002025	Wu wiengɔ yɛla kia mbalangɛi nasia ta lohu, kɛɛ kiahuna na Ngewɔ i yamanga a wue Kristi gama, na a wu yafeisia mahugbe kia mbala mahugbemɔi a pie a ngi baalangɛisia.
60003001	Hii mahoungɔ wu nyahangeisia wu golo wu hiningeisia wɛ aako ina ti lɛɛnga tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei, wu luvayii a pielɔ ti la la kiaa bɛɛ wuii yeenjɛpɛ gbi leni ti ma,
60003002	ajifa ta bagɔɔmɛi na lɔlɔ wa fe ti wɛ kɛɛ pɔɔnɛi na wa yɛ hu.
60003003	Waa hanihani gboto yilingili wu ma aako wu nyande, kia nyɔkɔ ngundia baagbangɔisia ɔɔ kanigbɔluisia ɔɔ kula baagbangɔisia wa wu mayili la.
60003004	Kia waa lapi wu luwuma nyandei va, wu nyandei i yɛ a wu yɛyii yeekpekpei na ndɔwungɔ wu bu numu ɛɛ tɔ. Yeenyandei ɛɛ jambo tawao a yɛ nungei nasia lɔ ma ti lii gɔlɛngɔ tawao tɛɛ jɔlɛ. Nyandei ji nyɔkɔ lɔ Ngewɔ i baa gɔɔngɔ ma.
60003005	Gbamaile Ngewɔ vɛli nyahangɛi nasia wɔɔ ti liiloni Ngewɔ ma, ti yɛ a tia yekpe nyande a ji lɔ ti yɛ golo ti hiningɛisia wɛ.
60003006	Hii Sera i yɛ na; i goloilɔ Ebraham wɛ, a ngi loli a ngi Kaamɔ. Wu yɛnga na a ngi leengeisia lɔ ina wu pɔɔna hindei wieilɔ tawao wuɛɛ luwa hinda gbi ma ta wu huluwa la.
60003007	Wua wu nyahableisia, mahoungɔ wua wu nyahangeisia wu hei wu kɔɔngɔ vuli kɛ hingaa ti gbayani nyahangaa ma. A baagɔma ve ti wɛ ajifa wua tieni lɔ wa kunafɔ lɛɛvui na majɔɔ Ngewɔ a fe gbama. A ji wie aako Ngewɔ i wu hɛisia mɛni.
60003008	Njɛpɛi ji yakpuava gbɛɛ ngi ji le wu ma: mahoungɔ wu kpɛlɛɛ wu giliyii i yɛ yakpe, wu lii i nyani ji wu mbaangaa ta wɔɔ, wu goohunɛɛ ji ti goohu a nɛɛ; a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ kia mahoungɔ njekohungaa ti pie, wu gbewe vulii wu nyɔunyɔ va tawao waa wua yekpe huwɔlɔ.
60003009	Waa hinda nyamu hunyɔɔ numu gbi ma a hinda nyamu, tawao waa mbɛlɛnyani hunyɔɔ a mbɛlɛnyani; kia waa na wie, a Ngewɔ vɛli i gbekpe a tie, ajifa ji nyɔkɔ wieva lɔ Ngewɔ i wu lolini aako wu poohani na majɔɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva wu wɛ.
60003010	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i lɛmbi dunyei hu koohunɛ hu, tawao ngi longɔ nɛnɛɛ i lɛ ngi ma, aa njia nyamu le nungaa wekangaa ma tawao i gbe a ndɛisia gualala;
60003011	i wounve hinda nyamu wiela ma i pɔɔna hinda wie; i ndiilɛli gɔkɔli i to pooma.
60003012	Gbamaile Ndemɔi a kpekpe wieblɛisia mahugbelɔ i woolo ti hɛɛwoi ma; kɛɛ ngi wounvengɔe nyamu wieblɛisia ma.”
60003013	Ye lɔ a kpaalɛ la wu ma ina wuaa lapima vulii hinda yekpe wieva watii gbi?
60003014	Kɛɛ kia bɛɛ nungaa ta kpaalɛ lalɔ wu ma jifa wa pɔɔna hindei wie, koohunɛɛ a yɛlɔ wu ma. Waa luwa numu gbi ma, tawao wu lii aa hɛlɛ.
60003015	Kɛɛ mbɛlɛya waa i yɛ wu liisia hu Kristi va, wu baagɔɔ ngi ma jifa ta yakpe lɔ Ndemɔi a ngie. Numu gbi lekee a wu mɔli gbɔɔ wu kulɔgbema, wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla watii gbi hugɛva a ngie.
60003016	Kɛɛ wu yaa yeemɔli gbɛmboma waa kpɔnda numu gbi ma lava a Kristi tawao wu bagɔɔ na ma a yɛ tia bɛɛ nɛmahu. Wu wiehindei i kɛ kɛ wuii yaa hinda gbi wieni wu lii aa nde yɛ nyamungɔe aako nasia ta nde tɛɛ nungaa nyamungaa lɔ a wue kia bɛɛ wa hinda yekpe lekee wie jifa Kristi woomablɛisia a wue, ti wufe na va ta nde wu ma.
60003017	Ajifa fesangɔ kpaalɛ i la numu ma hinda yekpe wieva, ina ji lɔ a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ, i lewe na ma kpaalɛ a la numu ma hinda nyamu wieva.
60003018	Mahoungɔe wu luma kpaalɛ i la wu ma ji wa hinda yekpe wie, ajifa Kristi vulii, ii jumbu yakpe bɛɛ wieni, i haailɔ yakpe mu jumbuisia kpɛlɛɛ va. Hee na i pieni ta lɔ i yɛni a sabu Ngewɔ i guni a manula mu jumbuisia ma, faale i pienga mu pele jɔnga livaa Ngewɔ gaama. Nuuvu yɛla a Kristi watii na ti ngi waani; watii na Ngewɔ i ngi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu, i yɛni a ngafa lɔ, na ɛɛ haa,
60003019	i loni yeengafayei hu lɔ i li i Ngewɔ yiɛi le ngafangei nasia ma ti makpangɔ yɛla.
60003020	Ngafangei jisia mia a nungei nasia tii yɛ goloni Ngewɔ wɛ ji i ti mawuloni kaka watii na Noa i yɛ ngi lɛndɛi gbatɛma. Numu sɛkɛngɔi nasia ti yɛ ndɛndɛi hu, ti kpɛlɛɛ ti yɛ wayakpa, ti bawoilɔ njavei yeya.
60003021	Njɛi na i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ nguɛi na va ta wu wua la tawao i pienga Ngewɔ i wu bawonga na jumbui yeya. Yeenguɛi ji ii yɛni a manɔhɔ wuala lekee luwuma, i yɛni a Lahei na lɔ wu mbumbuni Ngewɔ gama a kiliya sɛwɛsɛwɛ hu we. Yeenguɛi ji a pielɔ wu bawo jifa Kristi i hiyeilɔ hee hu;
60003022	na i lɛnga ngelegoohu i heinga Ngewɔ yejei hu, tawao Ngewɔ i ngi yɛnga a Maha malikeisia gbi maahu kɛɛ mahubleisia, kɛɛ nasia kpaya i ti yeya ti ngi bu.
60004001	Jifa ti kpaalɛ lani Kristi vulii ma mu va, mahoungɔ wua bɛɛ wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla kpaalɛ majɔva kia ngi magbatɛngɔ yɛla kpaalɛ majɔva, gbamaile numu gbi lekee kpaalɛ a la ngi gbuhɛi ma kia i lani Kristi ma, i wounvenga jumbu wiela ma.
60004002	Faale, i hiye watii ji ma i to wu lɛɛvui gɛlɛmɛi dunyei ji hu, mahoungɔ wu golo Ngewɔ liima hindei wiela bu, waa golo wu liima hindeisia bu.
60004003	Wu lɛmbinga wɔɔ hindei nasia wiema nungei nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti longɔ a piela. Wu wu lɛɛvui kpɛlɛɛ wuaani puegbua hindei hu lɔ kɛɛ hinda nyamu wie-manii kɛɛ ndɔhou pɛɛpɛi kɛɛ ndɔ gbɔle gomɛisia kɛɛ nɔmɔli vɛlila gɛwɛgɛwɛisia.
60004004	Kiahuna na kualangɔe nasia ma tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ji wuɛɛ yaa gbɛɛ ti ma yeehinda nyamu hulewengɔ yakpei jisia wieva, famia ta nde tɛɛ numu nyamungaa lɔ a wue.
60004005	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ a ti gbɛmbolɔ ti wiehindeisia va, Ngewɔ na i wama fuublaa kɛɛ haablaa gbɛmboma hugutungɔ.
60004006	Sabui na va lɔ Kristi i Ngowili Yekpei leni haablɛisia bɛɛ ma nasia Ngewɔ i ti gbɛmboni pɛiŋ ti yaa haa kia Ngewɔ a nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ gbɛɛmbo la; i Ngowili Yekpei leilɔ ti ma kɔɔ ti yafeisia ti luva kia Ngewɔ a luvala.
60004007	Hani gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi hugutunga; faale wu lii aa wulima tawao wu nɛmahui i yɛ wu gbla aako wu gu a Ngewɔ vɛlila a yeepelei.
60004008	Tewengɔ hindei gbi ma, a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ hulewengɔ, ajifa wu longaa a wu nyɔunyɔ, wu magbatɛngɔ a yɛla kpele gbi manuva nungaa wekɛisia ma hinda nyamui nasia va ta pie a wue.
60004009	A loko hei wu nyɔunyɔ bu a koohunɛɛ wu wɛleisia bu tawao waa gbonyɛ.
60004010	Ngewɔ i wu Kristimableisia gbi a ngilangila gɔnga a mboya hanisia tawao mahoungɔ numu gbi i gu a yee mboya hanii na houla pandaa Ngewɔ i fenga ngi wɛ, i ngayenge numui kpɛlɛɛ ti gbekpeyɛi va.
60004011	Numu gbi lekee a Ngowili Yekpei le, i Ngewɔ Wowili vulii le; numu gbi lekee tia Kristimableisia ti yengema, i yenge a kaahui na Ngewɔ a fe ngi wɛ aako hinda gbi hu numui gbi ti Ngewɔ lato Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu, na ngi woo a ngɔlɔyɛi kɛɛ kpayei kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
60004012	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, hinda yaagbalɛngɔi jisia ti wu wiema wu hugɔɔva, aa guala wu ma bi tɔaa bɛɛ hinda nina mia i wu wiema.
60004013	Kia na aa wie, a goohunɛɛ ajifa kpaalɛ i lama wu ma kia i lani Kristi ma, aako wu goohu i nɛɛ ji a ngi wɔlɔyei magɛ.
60004014	Mahoungɔ wu goohu i nɛɛ ji nungaa ta wu bɛlɛ nyani jifa Kristi woomablɛisia a wue; ji a pielɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ Ngewɔ Yafa gabandengɔ wai lɔ heini wu hu.
60004015	Nungaa ti kpaalɛ langaa wu yilayee gbi ma, aa yɛ ajifa numu-waamɔ a ngie ɔɔ humamɔ ɔɔ hinda nyamu wiemɔ ɔɔ numui na a loko wili nungaa ti hindeisia hu.
60004016	Na hu gbi, nungaa ti kpaalɛ langaa bi ma jifa Kristimamɔ a bie, baa yeengufe wie kɛɛ siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma jifa Kristi biyɛi i bi ma.
60004017	Ngewɔ a tɔɔtolɔ hugungɔ a numui gbi gbɛmbola tawao ngi nda nungeisia yese lɔ a ti gbɛmbo. Ina kpɛmboi i lɔɔtoma mua lɔ ma, nasia tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei na Ngewɔ i njoyoni ta yee wie?
60004018	Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Ina kpaukpaungɔi pɔɔnableisia va ti bawo, gbɔɔ hɔɔ a jumbublɛi nasia wie tii gbeweni Ngewɔ va?”
60004019	Faale naa, nasia kpaalɛ a la ti ma jifa hii i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ ti va, mahoungɔ kpekpei nasia ta pie a nungaa wekɛisia i pie ti ti yafeisia loko wuaa ti Gbatɛmɔi yeya, na ngi Lahei wumbungɔi hu ɛɛ nyani.
60005001	Nya vulii bɛɛ Kristimableisia ti gbakolo a nge, nyaa yɛpɛma a nya lii gbi Kristimableisia ti gbakolei nasia gama ti wu lia. Ngi kpaalɛi nasia hulɔilɔ i lani Kristi ma, tawao Kristi wɔlɔyɛi na Ngewɔ i wama kɛma a numui gbi, nga nya ndɛi majɔɔlɔ. Nyaa wu manɛnɛma,
60005002	wu yɛ a Kristimablei nasia mahugbe Ngewɔ i ti veni wu wɛ kia mbala mahugbemɔi a pie a ngi baalangɛisia tawao wu ti mahugbe a koohunɛɛ kia Ngewɔ longɔ wu pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ ti kpɔndangalɔ wu ma. Waa Kristimableisia ti mahugbe yengei ji wie aako ti wu pawa a navoo, a pie jifa mani vulii i wu ma gbɔva ti ma.
60005003	Waa lapi mahaya mɛva nasia maahu Ngewɔ i ti loko wuaanga wu yeya ti mahugbeva, tawao wu luvayii i yɛ a tɔmaseli ta lo ti pookɔɔ.
60005004	Tawao watii na Mbala Mahugbemɔi na tewengɔ mbala mahugbeblɛisia kpɛlɛɛ ma a gbua nga, wa ngɔlɔya maha-bɔlɔ gabandengɔi na majɔɔlɔ a lo vooma kunafɔ.
60005005	Wua wu kɔɔngɛisia bɛɛ, mahoungɔe wu golo kpakoleisia wɛ, tawao mahoungɔe wu Kristimableisia gbi wu yɛngaa hinda yekpe wiema a wu nyɔunyɔ wu wua yekpe mayei tawao waa pie a mamani; ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngewɔ a mamaniblɛisia ti ma hindei hunyanilɔ, kɛɛ a kpekpe lɔ wie a nasia tii mamanini.”
60005006	Faale a wua yekpe mayei Ngewɔ gulɔ, Ngewɔ na ngi gbayangɔ wu mahugbeva, aako i wu lɛ watii na ma i kɛnga.
60005007	A wu liihɛlɛmɛisia kpɛlɛɛ lukpe ngi ma ajifa ngi gbewengɔi wu va.
60005008	Wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla na gbi va a wie! Wu juwui Seitana lɔ lewetewema ngi laawongɔ kia njalɛi a yɛ gbelema a numu gɔkɔli hunyivinyivi va.
60005009	Gbɛogbɛ aa pie wu layii a Kristi maahu aa gbua, tawao waa hinda gbi wie Seitana a wu lo piema ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ kpaalɛi nasia ti lama wu ma, yeekpaalɛ yakpei lɔ lama wu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ma ti vayangɔ dunyei hu gbi.
60005010	Kɛɛ kpaalɛi i langaa wu ma watii wulo va, Ngewɔ na ngi yauwandangɔ a wue hulewengɔ, tawao i wu lolinga kunafɔ wɔlɔyɛi wu ndɛi majɔva jifa wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, a wu hinda hugbatɛlɔ a nina, i pie wu layii a Kristi maahu aa gbua, i wu liisia gbaya, i pie wu hapi wuaa, waa jɛɛjia wu lalei hu a Kristi.
60005011	Ngewɔ i lo ngi mahayɛi ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ va! Amiina.
60005012	Sailas na ngi mbumbunga a nya ndewe jifa nya longɔ a ngie, tamia i gbɔni nya ma kɔlɔ gutui ji yoyova wu gama. Nya longɔ ngi wu lii nɛpɔ tawao nyaa seli wuaama kɛ ji kpɛlɛɛ ngi punga kɔlɛi ji hu kɔloongɔ ngauwandei na ma lɔ Ngewɔ a pie a wue jifa ngi longɔ a wue hulewengɔ. A hou kpaŋ wu lalei ma a Kristi, waa yɔkɔ.
60005013	Wu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti heini Babilɔn, Ngewɔ i tia bɛɛ wumbuni, tɛɛ ta va wu ma; tawao nya hindoloi Maaki bɛɛ yɛ a va wu ma.
60005014	A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wu wu nyɔunyɔ gulu kɛva kɛ wu longɔe a wu nyɔunyɔ. Ngewɔ i ndiilɛli ve wu kpɛlɛɛ wɛ Kristi woo a wue.
61001001	Nya Saimɔn Pita, Yesu Kristi yengemɔ a nge kɛɛ tomɔ, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma, wu kpɛlɛɛ gama wua wu lanaya majɔɔnga kia mua vulii mu ndɛi na jifa mu Yewɔɛi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi wɔnangɔ;
61001002	Ngewɔ yauwandei kɛɛ ngi liilɛli wu gama maa i yɛ a to tuuŋ jifa wu Ngewɔ gɔnga tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi.
61001003	Ngewɔ gbayei lɔ Yesu Kristi hu tawao i hani gbi venga mu wɛ mu gbewengɔ fa kɔɔ mu yɛ a jia a Ngewɔ liima welei jifa mu Kristi gɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda, Kristi na i mu lolini aako i mu gɔ ngi nda wɔlɔyei hu kɛɛ ngi gbekpeyii.
61001004	Ji kpɛlɛɛ yeehuvɛi lɔ a ji i hani baa gbangɔ wai nasia venga mu wɛ i Lahei wumbuni fa aako mu bawo numu yafei jukulu hinda nyamui nasia yeya nungaa ti maningɔ ma dunyei hu, tawao wu yɛyii i wie kia Ngewɔ yɛyii i na.
61001005	Sabui ji vulii va, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu wu layii a Kristi mato a hinda yekpe wiela, wu wu hinda yekpe wielei mato a Ngewɔ liima hindei gɔɔla;
61001006	wu wu Yewɔ liima hindei gɔlɛi mato a joowila wu liima hinda nyamuisia ma, wu wu joowilɛi wu liima hinda nyamuisia ma mato a gula hinda gbɔugbɔu bu, wu wu gulɛi hinda gbɔugbɔu bu mato a Ngewɔ liima hindei wiela.
61001007	Mahoungɔ wu yɛ a ndoma gɛ a wu mbaa Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ, tawao mahoungɔe wu lo a numui gbi.
61001008	Mahoungɔe makɛi jisia ti yɛ wu hu tawao ti yɛngaa a mato wu hu, ta pielɔ wu gu a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi gɔɔla pandawanda.
61001009	Kɛɛ Kristimamɔi na makɛi jisia tii ngi hu ngi wiengɔe kia numui na i na pumui i ngi yaama ɛɛ hinda lɔ, tawao i lemanga kɛ Kristi i ngi jumbu wovei gbi wuanga fo ngi ma.
61001010	Faale, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu wu lolilei kɛɛ wu wumbulei yɛ a hinda waa; wu na wiengaa wuɛɛ gbe a lala a Kristi.
61001011	Wu lapingaa a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu kɛ wu luvayii gbi hu kɛ Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i wu lolini i wu wumbu, Ngewɔ a lumalɔ wu wɛ liva mia mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi i mahayɛi ma na kunafɔ va.
61001012	Faale, nga yɛlɔ a hindei jisia hitɛ wu wɛ watii gbi kia bɛɛ wu ti gɔɔngɔ tawao wu hɛlɛngɔ a tɔnyɛi na ti wu gaani la.
61001013	Nya langɔ la mahoungɔe nya va ngi yɛ a pie waa lema hindei jisia ma a ji nga yɛ a ti hitɛ wu nɛmahu kia lɛ ndɛvui i nya hokpala.
61001014	Ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nya haala hugutungɔe naa kia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i ndeni la nya ma leiŋ.
61001015	Nga nya sɛmbɛi gbi wielɔ pieva hindei jisia ti gu a hitɛla wu wɛ kpema gbi lekee nya haangɔi wooma.
61001016	Gbamaile ndɛɛ dɔmingaa ii le mua hugbatɛ nɛmahu maa kpua wu wɛ ji mu hugɛni a wue muɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a yamalɔ mbei a kpaya waa. Mua mu ngi wɔlɔyei hulɔilɔ a yaama.
61001017	Mu yɛ nalɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i ngi wɔlɔyii kɛɛ ngi gabandeyii gɛni kɛɛ ji ngoi i gbuani Ngewɔ gama ngelegoohu i wani ngi gama yɛ, “Nya liima Hindoloi lɔ, ngi hinda i nya liilɛlingɔ waa!”
61001018	Mua vulii mu ngoi ji mɛniilɔ i gbuani ngelegoohu ji mua tieni mu yɛ Ngewɔ nda yiyei na hu.
61001019	Faale mu lailɔ na vulii waa a ngowili na kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni. A yɛ a kpɔma lɔ wu va ji wa la a ngowili nasia Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni ajifa ti wiengɔe kia lamboi na a lo voma kpindi-kpindimɛi haaŋ ngele i wo, Kristi voofoi na yeesawulɛi a ngenda lumbekei i voo wu liisia hu.
61001020	Na hu gbi, na tewengɔ hindei gbi ma ta lɔ a ji: numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa Ngewɔ lutuisia ti laayiɛi na fasai i Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu a ngi wuma wee ina Ngewɔ Yafei ii gbɔni ngi ma.
61001021	Ajifa Ngewɔ lutuisia tii ti wuma yɛpɛ lɔ leni, kɛlee Ngewɔ wowili na ngi Yafei i yɛ pu ti lii hu ndeva.
61002001	Kɛɛ ndɛɛ Yewɔ lutuisia ti yɛlɔ a gbɔku wɔɔ Isrɛlbleisia lia kia lɔɔ ndɛɛ kaamɔisia ti wama gbɔkuma wu lia. Ta wu gaalɔ a hindangaa bi tɔaa bɛɛ tɔnyɛi mia kɔlooni Ngewɔ ma kɛɛ tii lɔnyani kulo bɛɛ tawao ta gulɔ a piela nungaa ti la a hindei nasia tii lɔnyani kɔloongɔ Ngewɔ ma; tawao ta gbelelɔ Kaamɔɛi Yesu Kristi vulii bɛɛ ma na i ti wumawoni tawao ji a pielɔ ti jukulu fulo.
61002002	Na hu gbi, yeemanɔhɔ luvei nasia ndɛɛ kaamɔisia ta pie Kristimabla gboto ta pookɔɔlɔ tawao ti wiehindei na a pielɔ nasia tii lani a Kristi ti njia nyamungaa le Ngowili Yekpei na ma.
61002003	Jifa ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti hanimaningɔ, ta ndɛisia lɔ guala wu wɛ kɔɔ ti gbatɛ wu hu. Ngewɔ i ti lɛɛnga wɔɔ kpɔɔ tawao i hugbatɛnga wɔɔ kpɔɔ ti waava. Ngewɔ ɛɛ yii tawao kpaalɛi na i ndeni yɛ a nda ti ma, hu ɛɛ nyani.
61002004	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ ii manuni malikei nasia ma ti jumbu hinda wieni; i ti wiliilɔ jahama, jɔwɔi gulangɔ ti ma ti heini kpindi hu ta Kpɛmbo Volei mawulo.
61002005	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ ii manuni wɔɔwɔɔmablɛi nasia bɛɛ ma tii yɛ ngi gɔɔ, i njave waa yeilɔ ti ma i ti gbi waa; nasia lekee i ti bawoni tia mia a Noa kɛɛ numu weka wɔfila, Noa na i yɛ a pɔɔna welei na gɛ Ngewɔ longɔ nungaa ti jia la.
61002006	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i taa waawa fele, Sɔdɔm kɛɛ Gomɔra, lɛɛlɔ i ti mɔ kpae a ngɔmbui, i ti yɛ a tɔmaseli kɛva gbɔɔ i wama peima a nasia tii lani a ngie.
61002007	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Lɔt bawoilɔ yeengɔmbui na hu; numu yekpe lɔ wɔɔ a ngie tawao folo gbi ngi lii i yɛ nyanilɔ waa tuva nyamui nasia va nungei nasia tɛɛ sawa hou ti yɛ pie.
61002008	Numu yekpei na i yɛ heini ti lia lɔ, tawao folo gbi ngi lii i yɛlɔ a nyani waa ti hinda nyamui nasia va i yɛ hulɔ kɛɛ na i yɛ humɛni.
61002009	Ji kpɛlɛɛ a kɛlɔ kɛ nasia ti langɔ a Kristi, Ndemɔi bɛɛngɔe a ti bawola ti hinda gbɔugbɔisia hu; kɛɛ a numu nyamuisia liima belɔ kpindi-wɛlei bu haaŋ Kpɛmbo Volei i hiti,
61002010	kakayee nungei nasia puegbuala gɛwɛ hindei na a numu nɔhɔ Ngewɔ yaama gungɔ ti hu, ti lɛɛngɔ Ngewɔ lemayɛi hu. Ndɛɛ kaamɔi nasia ti yaama bengɔi tawao ti yongangɔ, tii baa gɔɔ malika gbayangɔi nasia ma ti ngelegoohu; kia taa baa gɔɔ ti ma, ta ti bɛlɛ lɔ nyani.
61002011	Malikeisia vulii bɛɛ, kia bɛɛ ti wɔlɔngɔ tawao ti gbayangɔ tewengɔ yeendɛɛ kaamɔi nasia ma, tɛɛ ti bɛlɛ nyani ji ta ti lɛɛ Ndemɔi gulɔ.
61002012	Kɛɛ ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti yɛngaa hinda gbi wiema tɛɛ gili, ti wiengɔe kia ndɔgbɔ huangɛisia ti na, ta ti le lekee ti houva ti ti waa; yeendɛɛ kaamɔɛi jisia ta baa gbualɔ hinda gbi ma tii yeembui gɔɔ. Ta ti waalɔ kia nungaa ta ndɔgbɔ huangɛisia waa la,
61002013	tawao ti pawɛi a yɛ a kpaalɛ lɔ a la ti ma kpaalɛi na va ti ndanga nungaa ma. Ti liima hindei lɔ a hinda gbi weila foofo hu a ti luwui liilɛli; ti hinda mawufengɔe tawao mbɛlɛnyani le ji wua tieni wa loko hitɛ wu mɛhɛɛi hu, ti goohu nɛngɔ jifa ta wu wɛlɛ.
61002014	Ti longɔ nyaha gbi ta tɔ tia tieni ti la; jumbu wie-manii ɛɛ gu a tie. Ta pielɔ nungei nasia ti layii a Kristi ii gbayani ti yaka ti wili jumbui hu. Hanimani lewengɔe ti hu tawao ti bɛɛngɔ waa le a na majɔɔla ti longɔ la. Ngewɔ i ti jondunga tawao ta jukululɔ huɛɛŋ.
61002015	Ti gbuanga pelei yeepɔnɛi ma ti yakanga; ti na lɔ wieni tutui Belam, Biɔ hindoloi, i pieni. Belam lumɛilɔ jumbu wuliva aako i navoo majɔɔ.
61002016	Kɛɛ ngi jakasi i ngi lahouilɔ yɛ aa kpowa hinda wie. Fuuhani na i yɛpɛilɔ kia nuuvu, i yia Belam ma ngi jumbui va.
61002017	Ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti wiengɔe kia njɛi na a bɛɛli, ɔɔ njagbili na viivii a lewe la; Ngewɔ i hinda gbatɛnga ti va kpindi yeenilinilii hu.
61002018	Ta ndawo waawaangaa lɔ wie gbama ngeleya, ta kpowa yɛpɛngaa le, tawao kia tɛɛ sawa hou, ta lapilɔ pieva nasia ti tɔɔtonga a wounvela jumbui nasia ma ti heini ndia, ti gbɔma ti wokɔɔ ti luwui liilɛli hinda nyamuisia wiela hu kɛɛ puegbua gɛwɛ hindei.
61002019	Yeendɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ta Lahei wumbulɔ tɛɛ ta pielɔ yeenungeisia ti gbua jumbui luwɔyɛi hu kɛɛ tia vulii nduwɔngaa lɔ a tie jumbui nasia bu ta numu yafei jukulu gbamaile hinda gbi lekee i wɛlɛni numu maahu, ngi luwɔ mia a yeenumui na.
61002020	Mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi gɔɔla i piengaa nungaa ti bawo jumbui nasia yeya ta numu yafei jukulu, na wooma yeejumbui nasia ti gbɔma wɛlɛ ti maahu, yeenungɛi nasia ti yɛyii a yɛ nyamuni kɛlɛmɛi i lewe tɔɔtomɛi ma.
61002021	Aa fesalɔ polouŋ ti va ina tii yɛ pelei wɔɔni na gɔɔni Ngewɔ longɔ mu jia la, i lewe ji ma ti kɔɔngɔ ti wounvenga Ngewɔ jawei nasia ma ti kɛni a wue.
61002022	Na i ti wieni a kɛlɔ kɛ tɔnya lɔ a salei nasia ti ndeni tɛɛ, “Ngilɛi lɔ yamama gbɔma hani na gama i balini la” kɛɛ “Ndondɛi na ti nguanga fo, taa yamama gendebelema patɛi hu.”
61003001	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, kɔlɛi yeefeleyei lɔ naa ngi nyɛinga wu gama. Ngi lapinga yeekɔlɛi veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ hu pieva wu kili sɛwɛsɛwɛngaa wie a ji ngi hindei jisia hitɛma wu nɛmahu.
61003002	Nya longɔ kulɔmayiɛi nasia Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni wɔɔ ti yɛ wu nɛmahu, kɛɛ mu Lemɔi, mu Bawomɔi Kristi jawei na ngi looblɛisia ti kɛni a wue Ngowili Yekpei hu.
61003003	Baama hinda waa le wu va kɔɔva kɛ kɛlɛma voleisia ma, nungei nasia ti longɔ a ti liima hinda nyamuisia lekee wiela, ta wu gbafalɔ jifa wu langɔ a Kristi,
61003004	tawao ta wu mɔlilɔ tɛɛ, “Ii Lahei wumbuni yɛ a walɔ gbɔma? Taa na mindo? Mu maadani ti haanga wɔɔ, kɛɛ hindei kpɛlɛɛ lɔ wiema kia lɔɔ wɔɔ i wiema i hiye dunyei gbatɛ-gbelei ma!”
61003005	Ti wounveilɔ tɔnya wai ji ma kɛ Ngewɔ i njɛpɛ lɔ wɔɔ leni kɛ ngelegoohu i gbatɛnga kɛɛ dunyei. I pieilɔ dunyei i gbua njɛi bu tawao i kpatɛni a njɛi lɔ,
61003006	tawao njavei lɔ i gbɔma yeedunya wovei na gbɔyɔila.
61003007	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ laayia yakpei na lɔ i ngelegoohu lamagbatɛnga kɛɛ dunyei yeeji i na kiahuna aako ngɔmbui i ti nyani. Ngewɔ i ti mahugbema folei na va a nungei nasia lɛɛ ta gbele ngi ma, i ti nyani.
61003008	Kɛɛ waa lema hinda yila ma, nya liima ndiamɔisia; folo yila kɛɛ foo tauji yila tii gba ti nyɔunyɔu ma Ndemɔi yaama, ti veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti yakpe ngi wɛ.
61003009	Ndemɔi hulɛlingɔ ii le hinda gbi wieva i Lahei wumbunga fa, kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ta nde la tɛɛ ngi hulɛlingɔe, kɛɛ a ngi liilɔ hou wu va, ajifa ii loni numu gbi i jukulu, ngi longɔ numui gbi ti wounve ti jumbuisia ma.
61003010	Kɛɛ Ndemɔi wa-Volei a weilɔ kia humamɔi a guala numu ma. Yeefolei na ma, ngelegoohu a lolɔ hu a yelewoo waa, ngelema hanisia gbi ta mɔlɔ ti nyani tawao dunyei taa hani gbi ti ngi hu ta gbɔyɔlɔ.
61003011	Jifa hani kpɛlɛɛ dunya ti wama jukulumaa hii, nungaa yeegbɛngaa lɔ mahoungɔ wu yɛla? Mahoungɔ wu wua yekpe loko wuaa Ngewɔ yeya, jumbu gbi ii wu ma,
61003012	kia lɛ wu yeefolei na mawuloma Ngewɔ a dunyablaa gbi gbɛmbo, wu lapima a wu sɛmbɛi gbi lɔ aako yeefolei i humbu a wa, folei na ngɔmbu waa a ngelegoohu mɔ i na gbi nyani, nduenduei i ngelema hanisia gbi gbandi ti wu ti wote a njɛi.
61003013	Kɛɛ mua mu Kristimableisia, mu hani na lɔ gulɔgbema Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva mu wɛ; tamia a ngelegoohu nina kɛɛ dunya nina, mia numui gbi ta pɔɔna hindei lekee wie na.
61003014	Faale, nya liima ndiamɔisia, kia wu hindei jisia ti wiela mawuloma, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ, jumbu gbi aa yɛ wu ma Ngewɔ yaama Folei na ma tawao wua tieni wu hei ndiilɛli hu.
61003015	Mu Lemɔi a ngi lii houlɔ huguhangɔ tawao mahoungɔe wu kɔɔ kɛ wua mia i wu mawuloma hitɛva pelei na ma ta mbawo majɔɔ la. Mu liima ndewei Pɔɔl i kɔlɔ nyɛilɔ wu gama kɔlooni yeehinda yakpei ji ma, a nɛmahulewei na yayenge Ngewɔ i feni ngi wɛ.
61003016	Ndemɔi walɛi ji lɔ a nde ngi gɔlɛi kpɛlɛɛ hu ji a kɔlɔ nyɛi kɔloongɔ yeenjɛpɛi ji ma. Hinda lɛɛnga Pɔɔl gɔlɛisia hu kpaukpaungɔe yeembui gɔva tawao nungei nasia tii hinda hugɔɔ kɛɛ nasia ta wotewote ta fasailɔ a ndɛɛ, kia lɔɔ ta pie a Ngewɔ Gɔlɔ wekɛisia. Ji ti piema tamia a pie ti jukulu Kpɛmbo Volei ma.
61003017	Kɛɛ wua, nya liima ndiamɔisia, wu hindei jisia hugɔɔlɔ kpɔyɔngɔ. Faale, wu valangɔ i yɛla aako waa gbua toma yekpei na i wu looni na tɔnyɛi gɔlɛi hu, waa wili kpulangei nasia hu sawa nyanibleisia ta wili hu.
61003018	Mahoungɔe wu luvayii i pie ngauwandei na mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi piengɔ a mue maa i yɛ a to tawao mu li gulɔma tuu a ngi gɔɔla, Ngɔlɔya i yɛ ngi wɛ kiahuna kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina!
62001001	Mua kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama kɔlooni ndɛvu ve Yiɛi ma, na i na wɔɔ gba i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Mu yee-Njiɛi mɛninga, mu tɔnga a yaama, mu kpenga, mu jaanga la a loko.
62001002	Ji yeendɛvui ji i gɛni numu a gu a tɔla, mu tɔilɔ; famia mu seli wuaama fa, ma kunafɔ lɛɛvui na gona wu ma i yɛ Kɛkɛi gama i gɛni a mue.
62001003	Na mu tɔnga tawao mu mɛninga, mua konama wua bɛɛ ma kɔɔ wu gbɛɛ mu ma ngoyilɛi na hu mua Kɛkɛ-ni mu hu kɛɛ ngi Hindoloi Yesu Kristi.
62001004	Mua kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako mu goohunɛɛi laa i ve.
62001005	Ngowili a ji lɔ mu mɛninga a ngi Hindoloi, mu konama wu ma, kɛ Ngewɔ i yɛni a foofo lɔ, tawao kpindi gbi ii ngi hu kulo bɛɛ.
62001006	Mu ndengaa hɔɔ muɛɛ mua tieni lɔ ngoyila hu kɛɛ ma jia kpindi hu, kɛ mu ndɛɛ gualanga, tawao kɛ muii jiama a tɔnya welei.
62001007	Kɛɛ mu jiangaa fofoi na hu Ngewɔ i hu, ma yɛlɔ ngoyila hu a mu nyɔunyɔ, tawao ngi Hindoloi Yesu ŋamɛi a jumbui gbi wualɔ mu ma mu yɛ sɛwɛ.
62001008	Mu ndengaa muɛɛ jumbu gbi ii mu hu kɛ mu mua yekpe wɛlɛnga tawao kɛ tɔnyɛi ii mu hu.
62001009	Kɛɛ mu gayengaa Ngewɔ gama muɛɛ mu jumbu hinda wienga, Ngewɔ ɛɛ wotewote tawao ngi wɔnangɔ: a manulɔ muma mu jumbuisia va, i mu nyamuisia kpɛlɛɛ wua mu ma i mu yɛ sɛwɛ.
62001010	Mu ndengaa muɛɛ muii yaa jumbu hinda gbi wieni, kɛ mu Ngewɔ yɛnga a ndɛɛ gualamɔ tawao kɛ ngi laayiɛi ii mu hu.
62002001	Nya leengeisia, nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako waa jumbu hinda wie; numu gbi i jumbu hinda wiengaa, pɔɔnamɔi Yesu Kristi lɔ mu yeya a Kɛkɛi manɛnɛ mu va.
62002002	Tawao Kristi vulii lɔ i yɛni a sabu Ngewɔ i manuni mu jumbuisia ma, tawao mu jumbuisia lekee ii le, dunyablaa kpɛlɛɛ ti jumbuisia bɛɛ.
62002003	Mu Ngewɔ jaweisia houngaa kɛ mu langa la kɛ mu ngi gɔɔlɔ.
62002004	Numu i ndengaa yɛ, “Ngi ngi gɔɔlɔ,” kɛɛ ɛɛ ngi jaweisia hou, ndɛɛ gualamɔ mia a yeenumui na tawao tɔnyagbi ii ngi hu.
62002005	Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a Ngewɔ laayiɛi hou, ta lɔ ngi layii a Ngewɔ ndavengɔ. Ji lɔ a pie mu gu mu la la kɛ mua Ngewɔ-ni mu wilingɔe hu:
62002006	numu gbi lekee a nde yɛ taa Ngewɔ ti wilingɔe hu, mahoungɔi i jia kia lɔɔ Yesu i jiani la.
62002007	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, sawa nina ii le ngaa yɛ nyɛima wu gama; sawa wovei na le wu majɔɔni i hiye tɔto-gbelei ma. Sawa wovei lɔ ngowili na le mu humɛnini.
62002008	Na hu gbi, sawei ji ngi nyɛima wu gama ninangɔe, tawao numu a ngi lɔnyala gɔɔ Kristi luvayii lɔ ma kɛɛ wua bɛɛ wu ndɛi. Ajifa kpindi lɔ gbɔyɔma, tawao fofoi yeekpekpei lɔ na vooma.
62002009	Numu gbi lekee a nde yɛ taa fofoi na hu kɛɛ ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, kɛ taa kpindi hu kiahuna bɛɛ.
62002010	Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ a ngi ndewei kɛ taa fofoi hu, tawao kɛ hinda gbi ii ngi hu a pie numu weka i jumbu hinda wie.
62002011	Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, taa kpindi hu; a jia yeekpindii hu lɔ tawao ii kɔɔ mia i lima na ajifa kpindi i pumui wɛlɛnga ngi yaama.
62002012	Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, nya leengeisia, ajifa Ngewɔ i wu jumbuisia lufenga Kristi sabui hu.
62002013	Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɛkɛ-ni, ajifa wu numui na gɔɔngɔ i yɛ na wɔɔ i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɔɔngɛisia, ajifa wu temaya majɔɔnga Seitana maahu.
62002014	Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, nya leengeisia, ajifa wu Kɛkɛi gɔɔngɔ. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɛkɛ-ni, ajifa wu numui na gɔɔngɔ i na wɔɔ gba i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɔɔngɛisia, ajifa wu gbayangɔ; Ngewɔ laayiɛi lɔ wu hu fɔ tawao wu temaya majɔɔnga Seitana maahu.
62002015	Waa wu lii wu dunyei yeehindei hu ɔɔ hanii gbi lekee i yeedunyei ji hu. Wu longaa a dunyei, kɛ ndoma ii wu lii hu Kɛkɛi va.
62002016	Hanii gbi lekee i dunyei ji hu na jumbubleisia ti haamingɔ fa, na nungaa ta tɔ ti lo la kɛɛ hanii kpɛlɛɛ lekee i dunyei ji hu nungaa ta mata gbua la, yeengila bɛɛ ii gbuani Kɛkɛi gama, kpɛlɛɛ a gbɔku dunyei ji hu lɔ.
62002017	Dunyei kɛɛ hanii gbi nungaa ti hamingɔ fa ti gbɔyɔmaa; kɛɛ numui na a Ngewɔ liima hindei wie a yɛlɔ na kunafɔ va.
62002018	Nya leengeisia, hanii gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi i lukpenga kpla. Ti hugɛnga a wue kɛ Yesu juwui a walɔ; tawao kiahuna na Yesu juwu gboto ti wilanga bɛɛ a gbuala nga, faale mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hanii gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi i lukpenga kpla.
62002019	Nungɛi jisia tii yɛ vulii mu lia a ti lii, na vamia ti vayani mu ma; kiaa mua tieni yɛla ti yɛ lolɔ mu lia. Kɛɛ ti vayɛilɔ mu ma aako i gɛ leiŋ kɛ ti yilayee bɛɛ ii yɛ mu ma.
62002020	Kɛɛ wua, Kristi i Ngewɔ Yafei yeinga wu ma, famia wu gbi wu tɔnyɛi gɔɔngɔ.
62002021	Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama ajifa tii yɛma wuii tɔnyɛi gɔɔ, kɛɛ jifa wu kɔɔngɔ, tawao gbɔma wu kɔɔngɔ kɛ ndɛɛ yiɛi ɛɛ gbua tɔnyɛi hu.
62002022	Ye lɔ na hɔɔ ndɛɛ gualamɔi le? Tamia a numui na a nde yɛ Yesu ii le aa yɛ a Ngewɔ Maha Heingɔi. Kristi juwui mia a yeenumui ji ngi gbelengɔe Kɛkɛi tia ngi Hindoloi veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ma.
62002023	Gbamaile numu gbi lekee a gbele Ngewɔ Hindoloi ma, i gbeeleni Kɛkɛi bɛɛ lɔ ma; numu gbi lekee a loko hei Kɛkɛi Hindoloi bu, i loko heinga Ngewɔ bɛɛ lɔ bu.
62002024	A tɔ vulii ngowili na wu majɔɔni tɔtomɛi i yɛ wu liisia hu. Na wu mɛnini tɔtomɛi ina wu ndama gbatɛilɔ wu liisia hu wa yɛlɔ ngoyila hu wua Ngewɔ Hindoloi-ni kɛɛ Kɛkɛi.
62002025	Tawao ji lɔ Kristi vulii i Lahei wumbuni feva mu wɛ kunafɔ lɛɛvui.
62002026	Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama kɔloongɔ nasia ma ti lapima wu yakava.
62002027	Kɛɛ wua, Kristi i ngi Yafei yeinga wu ma. Ina lekee ngi Yafei lɔ wu hu, wuii gbeweni numu gbi va wu gaava. Ajifa ngi Yafei lɔ a wu gaa kɔlooni hinda gbi ma, tawao na a wu gaa la tɔnya le, ndɛɛ ii le. A golo hɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei gaai bu, wu yɛ Kristi hu.
62002028	Hii i na, nya leengeisia, a yɛ ngi hu, aako ndiilo waa i yɛ mu wɛ ji a gbuanga, maa lɔwu ngi ma a ngufe folei na ma a wa.
62002029	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Kristi wɔnangɔe; mahoungɔe hɔɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ numui na lekee a pɔɔna hindei wie Ngewɔ loi mia a ngie.
62003001	A ndomɛi na lɔ lɛɛ Ngewɔ piengɔ a mue! Ngi lomɛi wɔlɔngɔ waa le na hii ta mu loli a Ngewɔ leengeisia, tawao a tɔnya hii mu na. Sabui na va dunyei ii mu gɔɔ, tamia a ji ii yaa Ngewɔ gɔɔni.
62003002	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, Ngewɔ leengeisia lɔ naa a mue, kɛɛ ii yaa gɛni lɛ leiŋ mu wama yɛma a gbɔɔ. Kɛɛ ma kɔɔlɔ kɛ watii na Kristi a gbuanga ma gbualɔ a ngie, ajifa ma ngi lɔlɔ kia i na vulii.
62003003	Numu gbi lekee a liilo hii Kristi ma, a ta yekpe yɛlɔ sɛwɛ kia Kristi sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ.
62003004	Numu gbi lekee i jumbu hinda wiengaa, kɛ ngi lɛɛ le Ngewɔ jawei nyaniva; ajifa sawei nyanila lɔ jumbui le.
62003005	Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Kristi i wailɔ dunyei hu aako i nuuvuisia ti jumbuisia gbua ti ma, tawao ta vulii jumbu gbi ii ngi ma.
62003006	Faale numu gbi lekee i Kristi hu ɛɛ nɔɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma; kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a nɔɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma ii yaa Kristi lɔni tawao ii ngi gɔɔ.
62003007	Numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ, nya leengeisia! Numu gbi lekee a pɔɔna hindei wie, pɔɔnamɔ lɔ a ngie, kia lɔɔ Kristi wɔnangɔ la.
62003008	Numu gbi lekee ngi nɔɔngɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma, Seitana wolɔ a ngie, ajifa Seitana i jumbu hinda wienga wɔɔ kpɔɔ i hiye hanii gbi ti lɔto-gbelei ma. Ngewɔ Hindoloi i wani sabui ji vulii lɔ va, aako i Seitana yenge lokoisia hunyani.
62003009	Numu gbi lekee Ngewɔ loo a ngie ɛɛ nɔɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma, ajifa Ngewɔ yɛyii vulii lɔ ngi hu, tawao gbɔma jifa Ngewɔ lɔ ngi Kɛkɛ le, ɛɛ nɔɔ jumbu wiela ma.
62003010	Nduahugɛ lokeloke gbe Ngewɔ leengeisia luahu kɛɛ Seitana ndɛisia: numu gbi lekee ɛɛ pɔɔna hinda wie ɔɔ ii loni a ngi ndewei, Ngewɔ loo yaa a ngie.
62003011	Ji lɔ ngowili le wu mɛnini i hiye tɔto-gbelei ma kɛ mahoungɔe mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ,
62003012	maa wie kia Ken i yɛ na wɔɔ, Seitana woo a ngie, i ngi gbɔugbɔu ndewei waa. Tawao gbɛva lɔ i ngi waani? Ajifa ngi wiehindeisia ti nyamungɔ yɛla, kɛɛ ngi ndewei wiehindeisia ti wɔnangɔ.
62003013	Faale aa guala wu ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ina dunyei i loleilɔ a wue.
62003014	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ mu gbuanga hee hu mu wilinga ndɛvuihu, ajifa mu longɔ a mu ndeengɛisia. Numu gbi lekee ndoma ii ngi lii hu i haa hu lɔ lɛ.
62003015	Numu gbi lekee ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, numu waamɔ lɔ a ngie; tawao wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ kunafɔ lɛɛvui ii numu waamɔ hu.
62003016	Hii ma kɔɔ gbɔɔ ndomɛi le: ji Kristi i ngi lɛɛvui veni mu va. Mahoungɔe mua bɛɛ mu mu lɛɛvuisia ve mu ndeengɛisia va!
62003017	Numu gbatɛngɔ yɛngaa la, i ngi ndewei lɔ hinda gbɔungɔ ngi laa, i liilo i yeendewei na goma, a yee gu i nde yɛ ndoma lɔ ngi lii hu Ngewɔ va?
62003018	Nya leengeisia, mu lomɛi aa yɛ a lahu layia gbama lekee kɛɛ njɛpɛ, mahoungɔ i yɛ a ndomɛi yeetɔnyangɔi na a ta yekpe gɛ mu wiehindei hu.
62003019	Hii ma kɔɔ kɛ tɔnyɛi gungɔe mu hu, hii mu liisia ti gbangɔ a yɛla Ngewɔ gɔɔbu.
62003020	Mu lii i mu lɛɛngaa, mu kɔɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i leweni mu lii ma, tawao kɛ i hindei gbi hugɔɔlɔ.
62003021	Faale, nya liima ndiamɔisia, mu lii ii mu lɛɛlɔ, ma ndiigba majɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ gɔɔbu.
62003022	Na gbi lekee ma fɛli ngi ma, ma majɔɔlɔ, ajifa ma ngi jaweisia hou, ma na wie a nɛɛ ngi wɛ.
62003023	Ngi jawei lɔ a ji: yɛ mu la a ngi Hindoloi Yesu Kristi biyɛi, tawao mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ, kia lɔɔ Kristi i feni mu wɛ a sawa.
62003024	Numu gbi lekee a Ngewɔ jaweisia hou, i Ngewɔ hu lɔ, tawao Ngewɔ i ngi hu. Tawao hii ma kɔɔ kɛ Ngewɔ lɔ mu hu: ma kɔɔlɔ ngi Yafei na va i fenga mu wɛ.
62004001	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, waa la a numui kpɛlɛɛ ta nde tɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ ti hu, kɛɛ a ti jɔgbɛ tɔva ina ngafei na i ti hu i gbuani Ngewɔ gama lɔ. Ajifa ndɛɛ Yewɔ lutu gboto ti vayanga hu gbi.
62004002	Hii wa gu a kɔɔla ina Ngewɔ Yafei mia: numu gbi lekee a nde gbalauŋ yɛ Yesu Kristi i wailɔ dunyei hu nuuvuya hu, kɛ ngafei na i ngi hu i gbuani Ngewɔ gama lɔ.
62004003	Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a ji hou a mawali Yesu va, ngafei na i ngi hu ii gbuani Ngewɔ gama. Ngi nda yafei i gbuani Yesu Juwui gama lɔ; wu mɛniilɔ kɛ a walɔ, tawao taa na bɛɛ mbei dunyei hu.
62004004	Kɛɛ Ngewɔ woo lɔ a wue, nya leengeisia, tawao wu temaya majɔnga ndɛɛ lutuisia maahu; ajifa Ngafei na i wu hu i gbayani i lewe ngafei na ma i nasia hu dunyei woo a tie.
62004005	Ta dunyama hindeisia yeenjɛpɛi lɔ hugɛ tawao dunyamablaa ta wololɔ ti ma ajifa dunyei woo lɔ a tie.
62004006	Kɛɛ mua, Ngewɔ woo lɔ a mue. Numu gbi lekee i Ngewɔ gɔɔngɔ a wololɔ mu ma; numu gbi lekee Ngewɔ woo yaa a ngie ɛɛ wolo mu ma. Hii ma gu a kɔɔla kia tɔnya Yafei i yee yɛni gba ndɛɛ yafei ma.
62004007	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, a mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ ajifa ndomɛi a gbua Ngewɔ gama lɔ. Numu gbi lekee ndoma i ngi lii hu i yɛni a Ngewɔ loo lɔ tawao kɛ i Ngewɔ gɔɔlɔ.
62004008	Numu gbi lekee ndoma ii ngi lii hu ii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ajifa ndoma lɔ kungɔ Ngewɔ hu.
62004009	Hii Ngewɔ i ndomɛi na gɛni i piengɔ a mue, i ngi Hindolo yakpei yoyeilɔ dunyei hu aako mu ndɛvu majɔɔ ngi sabui hu.
62004010	Ji lɔ ndoma le; ii wieni bɛɛ mua lɔ mu longa a Ngewɔ, ta lɔ i loni a mue, i ngi Hindoloi yoyo yɛva a sabu mu manuma majɔɔ mu jumbuisia va.
62004011	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, ina Ngewɔ i loilɔ a mue hii, kɛ mahoungɔ mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ.
62004012	Numu gbi ii yaa wɔɔ gba a Ngewɔ lɔni; ina mu loilɔ a mu nyɔunyɔ, Ngewɔ a yɛlɔ mu hu kɛ ngi lomɛi laa i venga mu hu.
62004013	Ji lɔ a pie mu la la kɛ mu Ngewɔ hu lɔ, ta bɛɛ i mu hu ajifa i ngi Yafei venga mu wɛ.
62004014	Tawao mu tɔnga, mu konanga nungaa wekɛisia ma kɛ Kɛkɛi i ngi Hindoloi yoyeilɔ yɛva a dunyabawomɔi.
62004015	Numu gbi lekee a nde leiŋ yɛ Yesu i yɛni a Ngewɔ Hindoloi lɔ, kɛ Ngewɔ lɔ ngi hu, ta bɛɛ i Ngewɔ hu.
62004016	Tawao mua vulii mu kɔɔlɔ tawao mu langɔ a ndomɛi na Ngewɔ piengɔ a mue. Ndoma lɔ kungɔ Ngewɔ hu tawao numu gbi lekee ndoma i ngi lii hu i Ngewɔ hu lɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi hu.
62004017	Ndomɛi ji laavengɔe mu hu aako mu ndiigba majɔɔ Kpɛmbo Volei ma; tawao ma yeendiigbɛi majɔlɔ ajifa mu jiayii dunyei ji hu tia Yesu ndɛi ti yakpe.
62004018	Nduwa gbi ii ndoma hu; ndomɛi yeendavengɔi a nduwɛi gbi gbɛlɔ. Faale naa, numui na a luwa, ndomɛi laavengɔ ii le ngi hu, a luwalɔ ajifa i kɔɔlɔ kɛ kpalɛ a lalɔ ngi ma.
62004019	Ndoma a yɛlɔ mu lii hu ajifa Ngewɔ yese i loni a mue.
62004020	Numu i ndengaa yɛ, “Nya longɔe a Ngewɔ,” kɛɛ ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, ndɛɛ gualamɔ lɔ a ngie. Ajifa ɛɛ gu i lo a Ngewɔ na ii yaa tɔni, ina ii loni a ngi ndewei, na i tɔnga.
62004021	Ji lɔ hɔɔ sawei le Kristi feni mu wɛ, kɛ numui na ngi longɔ a Ngewɔ kpa le ngi ma lova a ngi ndewei bɛɛ.
62005001	Numu gbi lekee ngi langɔ la kɛ Yesu lɔ Ngewɔ Maha Heingɔi le, i yɛni a Ngewɔ loo lɔ, tawao numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ a ndoo le kɛi a lolɔ a ndoi.
62005002	Ji lɔ a pie mu kɔɔ kɛ mu longɔe a Ngewɔ leengeisia, ji ma lo a Ngewɔ, mu ngi jaweisia hou.
62005003	Ajifa mu lola a Ngewɔ a ji lɔ ma ngi jaweisia hou. Tawao ngi jaweisia tii kpaukpauni waa mu va ti houva.
62005004	Gbamaile Ngewɔ loo gbi a gulɔ i temaya majɔɔ dunyei maahu; tawao pelei na ma temayɛi majɔɔ la dunyei maahu tamia a mu lalei a Ngewɔ.
62005005	Ye lɔ a gu i temaya majɔɔ dunyei maahu? Numui na lekee ngi langɔ la kɛ Ngewɔ Hindoloi mia a Yesu.
62005006	Yesu Kristi lɔ numui na le i wani; ji i wani ti ngi wuailɔ a Ngewɔ yɛi tawao ji i haani ngi ŋamɛi wuilɔ. Ii wani a njɛi lekee, i wailɔ a njɛi kɛɛ ŋamɛi. Tawao Ngewɔ Yafei vulii lɔ selima kɛ tɔnya lɔ a ji, jifa tɔnyɛi lɔ kungɔ Ngewɔ Yafei hu.
62005007	Seli sawangaa mia ti na:
62005008	Ngewɔ Yafei, njɛi kɛɛ ŋamɛi; tawao ti jaangɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti woo i yila.
62005009	Wu langɔe a seli na nuuvungaa ta nguaa, kɛɛ seli na Ngewɔ a nguaa i gbayani na ma polouŋ, tawao seli ji lɔ Ngewɔ i nguanga kɔlooni ngi Hindoloi ma.
62005010	Faale numu gbi lekee ngi langɔ a Ngewɔ Hindoloi, seli ji lɔ ngi lii hu; kɛɛ numu gbi lekee ii lani a Ngewɔ, i Ngewɔ wotenga a ndɛɛ gualamɔ, ajifa ii yaa lani a na Ngewɔ i ndenga ji i seli wuaanga kɔlooni ngi Hindoloi ma.
62005011	Seli wuaangɔi a ji lɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i kunafɔ lɛɛvui venga mu wɛ, tawao yeendɛvui ji i ngi Hindoloi lɔ hu.
62005012	Numu gbi lekee taa Ngewɔ Hindoloi ti wilingɔ hu, ndɛvui ji lɔ ngi hu; numu gbi lekee taa Ngewɔ Hindoloi ti wilingɔ ii le hu, ndɛvu ii ngi hu.
62005013	Wua wu langɔ a Ngewɔ Hindoloi biyɛi, wua lɔ ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako wu kɔ kɛ wu kunafɔ lɛɛvui majɔnga.
62005014	Ndiigba lɔ mu wɛ Ngewɔ gɔɔbu ajifa mu langɔe la vulii kɛ a mu woo mɛnilɔ ji ma ngi vɛli a hani gbi a nɛɛ ngi wɛ.
62005015	A mu woo mɛnilɔ watii gbi lekee ma ngi vɛli; kia mu kɔɔngɔ kɛ tɔnya lɔ a ji, mu kɔɔlɔ gbɔma kɛ a na velɔ mu wɛ ma ngi vɛli fa.
62005016	Numu gbi i ngi ndewei lɔnga a jumbu hindei na wie ɛɛ wa a hee ngi maahu, mahoungɔ i hɛɛ Ngewɔ ma, a ndɛvui velɔ ngi wɛ. Ngi ji lema nungei nasia lɔ va ti jumbui ɛɛ wa a hee ti maahu. Kɛɛ jumbui lɔ na a wa a hee tawao ngii yɛma wu Ngewɔ vɛli yeejumbui ta ngi va.
62005017	Hinda nyamu gbi wiela jumbu le, kɛɛ jumbui lɔ na ɛɛ wa a hee numu maahu.
62005018	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ loo gbi ii na aa nɔɔ jumbu wiela ma jifa Ngewɔ Hindoloi a ngi mahugbe tawao Seitana ɛɛ gu aa hinda nyamu wie a ngie.
62005019	Mu kɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ woo lɔ a mue kia bɛɛ dunyei gbi i Seitana gbayei bu.
62005020	Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ Hindoloi i wanga, tawao i mu gɔnga a nɛmahulewe, na hii mu tɔnya Yewɔɛi gɔnga. Mu lɛɛvuisia ti tɔnya Yewɔɛi hu lɔ ngi Hindoloi Yesu Kristi hu. Tɔnya Yewɔɛi lɔ a ji, tawao kunafɔ lɛɛvu lɔ a ji.
62005021	Nya leengeisia, a wua yekpe maguha a ndɛɛ yewɔɛisia.
63001001	Nya Kpakolei a nge, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Baama Nyahɛi na gama nya liimamɔi le taa ngi leengei nasia nya longɔ a tie vulii a tɔnya. Nya yaangɔ ii le, nasia gbi ti tɔnyɛi gɔɔngɔ ti longɔe a wue,
63001002	ajifa tɔnyɛi lɔ mu hu tawao a lolɔ mu hu kunafɔ va.
63001003	Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ taa ngi Hindoloi Yesu Kristi ti ngauwanda gɛ a mue, ti mu gɔ a manuma, kɛɛ ndiilɛli, ti yɛ a mu woo tɔnya hu kɛɛ ndoma.
63001004	Nya goohu i nɛɛilɔ hulewengɔ tɔva bi leengeisia lɛɛnga ti toma tɔnyɛi ma kia lekee Kɛkɛi i sawei veni la mu wɛ.
63001005	Faale, nya liima Baama Nyahɛi, nyaa ndema bi ma: mu gbi a mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔu. Sawa nina yaa ji ngaa yɛ nyɛima bi gama; sawei ji lɔ mu majɔɔni i hiye tɔɔtomɛi.
63001006	Ndomɛi ji ngi yɛpɛma kɔlooni ma i yɛni a ji lɔ ma Ngewɔ jaweisia hou kpema gbi. Yeesawei, kia wu gbi wu mɛninga la i hiye tɔɔtomɛi, ta lɔ a ji wu gbi wa yɛ heini ndoma hu.
63001007	Numu wɛlɛblaa gboto ti hitɛnga dunyei hu gbi, tɛɛ nde leiŋ taa yɛma Yesu Kristi i wailɔ kia nuuvu na. Numu wɛlɛmɔ mia a numui na nyɔkɔ kɛɛ Kristi juwui.
63001008	A wu mahugbe aako waa baa a na wu yengenga fa tawao wu wu pawɛi majɔɔ ndavengɔ.
63001009	Numu gbi lekee ɛɛ gɛlɛ kaai na ma Yesu i kɛni, a windɛ maahu i kaa weka gɛ, Kɛ Ngewɔ ii ngi hu. Numu gbi lekee a kaai na lekee gɛ Kristi i kɛni, Kɛkɛi taa ngi Hindoloi veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ lɔ ngi hu.
63001010	Numu gbi i wangaa wu gama a kaa weka Yesu ndɛi wooma, waa loko hei ngi bu wu guwuisia hu; waa va ngi ma lɛ pɛiŋ.
63001011	Ajifa numui na a va yeenumui na nyɔkɔ ma a yɛ a ngi mbaa lɔ nyamui nasia hu i piema.
63001012	Kia bɛɛ hinda gboto i na ndeva bi ma kɔlɛi ji hu, ngii yaa loni ngi kɔlɔ-gole hunyani, ajifa nya lii lɔ ma wava mua wueni mu lɔ, mu hei yaama, ngi yɛpɛ wu gama aako mu goohunɛɛi laa i ve.
63001013	Bi liima ndeenyahaloi leengeisia tɛɛ ta va bi ma.
64001001	Nya Kpakolei a nge, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima nya liimamɔi Gayɔs gama na nya longɔ la vulii a tɔnya.
64001002	Nya liima ndiamɔi, nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima aako hindei gbi hu i gbatɛ bi gama, tawao bi yɛ kaahugbua hu, kia ngi kɔɔngɔ bi yafei gaahu gbuangɔ la.
64001003	Nya goohu i nɛɛilɔ waa ji mu ndeengɛisia lɛɛngaa ti wani mbei ti hugɛ tɛɛ bi hɛlɛngɔ waa le a tɔnyɛi, kia lɔɔ tɔnyɛi gungɔ bi hu watii gbi.
64001004	Hinda gbi ɛɛ nya goohu nɛɛ aa lewe ji nga mɛni tɛɛ nya leengeisia ti hɛlɛngɔe a tɔnyɛi.
64001005	Nya liima ndiamɔi, na mahoungɔ bi pie tamia bi piema ji ba ngenge gbi wie mu ndeengɛisia wɛ, ti yɛ bɛɛ a hotangaa.
64001006	Ti bi lomɛi hugɛnga a Kristimablei nasia ti mbei. Kɔnɛɛ gbɔ ti ma ti jiei hu a pelei na a nɛɛ la Ngewɔ wɛ.
64001007	Ajifa ta ti jiei wumbulɔ Kristi yengei wieva tɛɛ loko hei hani gbi bu nasia tii lani a Ngewɔ ta fe.
64001008	Mahoungɔe hɔɔ, mua Kristimableisia a mue, mu gbɔ ti ma aako mu gbɛɛ ti ma ngengei na hu ti piema tɔnyɛi va.
64001009	Ngi kɔlɔ gutu nyɛilɔ Sɔsiibleisia gama, kɛɛ Dayotɛfis na ndongɔ a tokulɔyei, ɛɛ woolo kulo bɛɛ na ma nga nde.
64001010	Ngi wangaa, yeewatii na mia nga ngi wiehindei kpɛlɛɛ wu ngitiya; njɛpɛ maluwangɔi nasia a nde mu va kɛɛ ndɛi nasia a kuala! Kɛɛ na lekee ii guni a ngie; ɛɛ loko hei mu ndeengɛisia bu ji ta wa, tawao a nasia mabalilɔ ti longɔ a yɛla ti loko hei ti bu, a lapi yɛ i ti gbɛ sɔsii hu.
64001011	Nya liima ndiamɔi, baa hinda nyamu wokɔɔ, kɛɛ na wokɔɔ kpekpengɔ. Numu gbi lekee a kpekpe wie Ngewɔ woo lɔ a ngie. Numu gbi lekee a na wie nyamungɔ, ii yaa Ngewɔ lɔni.
64001012	Numui kpɛlɛɛ lɔ Dɛmitɔs yɛpɛ yekpe lema; tawao tɔnyɛi vui bɛɛ lɔ ngi jeli wua ma. Mua seli wuaama i gbɛɛ ti ndɛisia ma, tawao bi kɔɔlɔ kɛ na ma nde tɔnya le.
64001013	Hinda gboto lɔ na ndeva bi ma kɔlɛi ji hu kɛɛ maa ii houni ngi nyɛi kɔlɔ hu;
64001014	nya lii lɔ bi lɔla ma hugutungɔ tawao ma gulɔ mu hei yaama mu yɛpɛ.
64001015	Ndiilɛli i yɛ bi ma. Bi ndiamɔisia gbi ta va bi ma. Va mu ndiamɔisia kpɛlɛɛ ma a ngila-ngila.
65001001	Nya Judi, Yesu Kristi yengemɔ a nge kɛɛ Jemisi ndewe wuloi, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛinga wua wu gama Ngewɔ wu lolini, mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ longɔ a wue, Yesu Kristi a wu mahugbe:
65001002	Ngewɔ i manu wu ma kpele gbi, i wu gɔ a ndiilɛli, i lo a wue waa.
65001003	Nya liima ndiamɔisia, mani waa yɛlɔ nya ma kɔlɔ nyɛiva wu gama kɔlooni mbawoyɛi na ma mu Kristimableisia gbi mu majɔnga. Kɛɛ kiahuna ngi tɔnga kɛ mahoungɔe ngi kɔlɔ nyɛi kaakaa aako ngi wu lii vulu lapiva a wu sɛmbɛi gbi Ngowili Yekpei na magaova Ngewɔ i fenga ngi nungeisia wɛ, Ngowili Yekpei na mumu gbi ɛɛ gu a maluvela.
65001004	Nungɛi nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti lɛɛnga ti wilinga wu lia yɛlɛŋ muii kɔɔni. I Ionga wɔɔ kulɔma lɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i kpaalɛi na hinda hugɛnga Ngewɔ i wama ndama ti ma. Yeenungɛi jisia ta Ngewɔ yauwandei yeengowili maluvelɔ aako ti numu nɔhɔ hindei nasia malɔwu ta pie tawao ta gbelelɔ Yesu Kristi ma tɛɛ ii yɛni a mu Kaamɔ yakpei kɛɛ mu Lemɔi.
65001005	Gbamaile kia bɛɛ wu ji kpɛlɛɛ hugɔɔngɔ, nya longɔ ngi hitɛ wu wɛ kia wɔɔ Ndemɔi Ngewɔ i Isrɛelblɛisia gbuani nduwɔyɛi hu Ijipt lɔlei hu kɛɛ na wooma i nasia waa tii lani a ngie.
65001006	A gili a malikei nasia wɔɔ kpayei na Ngewɔ i feni ti wɛ ii ti liilɛlini, ti gbuani ti heimɛi, ti yilingɔe a jɔwɔi nasia tɛɛ nyani kunafɔ, ti laani kpindi hu ndɔubleisia ti yɛmɛi, mia Ngewɔ i ti wunga na folo wai na mawulova i ti lɛɛ ma.
65001007	A gili a Sɔdɔm kɛɛ Gomɔra kɛɛ tei nasia ti yɛ ti gblanga, yeenungeisia ti luveilɔ kia malikei nasia ti pieni, ta gbɔma puegbua gɛwɛgɛwɛisia wie. Ngewɔ i yeetei nasia tia yeehublɛisia gbi nyanilɔ a ngɔmbui na ɛɛ lufe kunafɔ va, kɔɔ ji i yɛ a ndahii kengelee jumbu hinda wieblɛisia kpɛlɛɛ gama.
65001008	Hii lɔɔ ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia bɛɛ ta hengangaa wielɔ, yeehengɛisia ta pie ta manɔhɔ hindangaa wie a ti luwuisia; ta lɛɛlɔ Ngewɔ lemayɛi hu, ta malika bɛɛheingɔ wai nasia vulii bɛɛ bɛlɛnyani ti ngelegoohu.
65001009	Malikeisia ti gulɔmɔi Maikɛl vulii bɛɛ ii ji wieni. Ji taa Seitana ti yiani Mojisi woomɛi va, ta mawali hou ina a lo ye lɔ yeya, Maikɛl ii Seitana yɛlini ji i yɛ ngi lɛɛma, i ndeilɔ lekee yɛ, “Ndemɔi i kpaalɛ la bi ma!”
